card.title: The Prancing Pony
card.game_text: Fellowship: Add a burden to play Aragorn from your draw deck.

card.title: Bill the Pony
card.notes: Lists: ERL, MXL. When the fellowship moves with Bill the Pony to an underground site, the Shadow number of that site is reduced before Bill the Pony is discarded.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Hobbit companion. The Shadow number of each site is -1. Discard Bill the Pony if he is at an underground site during the fellowship or regroup phase.

card.title: Fireworks
card.game_text: Spell. Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to shuffle up to 2 [GANDALF] or up to 2 [SHIRE] cards from your discard pile into your draw deck.

card.title: Council Courtyard
card.game_text: Sanctuary. When the fellowship moves from Council Courtyard, remove [2].

card.title: Horn of Boromir
card.game_text: Bearer must be Boromir. Maneuver: Exert Boromir and spot an ally. Until the regroup phase, that ally is strength +3 and participates in archery fire and skirmishes.

card.title: Balin's Tomb
card.game_text: Underground. Maneuver: Discard a tale from play or from hand to heal your companion.

card.title: Book of Mazarbul
card.game_text: Tale. Bearer must be a Dwarf. At the start of each fellowship phase when the fellowship is at site 4 or higher, you may draw a card for each Dwarf companion.

card.title: Galadriel's Glade
card.game_text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Exert an Elf to look at an opponent's hand.

card.title: Phial of Galadriel
card.game_text: To play, exert an Elf. Bearer must be the Ring-bearer. Bearer's resistance is +2.

card.title: The Balrog
card.subtitle: Durin's Bane
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. While you can spot The Balrog, discard all other minions. Skip the archery phase. Discard The Balrog if not underground.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Servant of the Eye
card.game_text: Saruman may not take wounds during the archery phase and may not be assigned to a skirmish. Assignment: Exert Saruman to assign an [ISENGARD] minion to a companion (except the Ring-bearer). That companion may exert to prevent this.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Son of Gloin
card.game_text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert Gimli to make him strength +2.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Greenleaf
card.lore: ;Archer. Archery: Exert Legolas to wound a minion
card.game_text: Legolas does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Ranger of the North
card.game_text: Ranger. Maneuver: Exert Aragorn to make him defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Son of Thranduil
card.game_text: Archer. While Legolas is at a river or forest, add 1 to the fellowship archery total.

card.title: Faramir
card.subtitle: Son of Denethor
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Ranger. An opponent may not play skirmish events or use skirmish special abilities during skirmishes involving Faramir.

card.title: Eowyn
card.subtitle: Lady of Rohan
card.game_text: Valiant. Response: If an unbound companion is about to take a wound, exert Eowyn and add [1] to prevent that wound.

card.title: Smeagol
card.subtitle: Old Noser
card.game_text: Ring-bound. To play add a burden. Regroup: Exert Smeagol (or Gollum) twice to reveal the top 4 cards of your draw deck. Wound a minion for each Shadow card revealed. Place those 4 cards beneath your draw deck in any order.

card.title: Theoden
card.subtitle: King of the Golden Hall
card.game_text: Valiant. Maneuver: Play a [ROHAN] possession on Theoden to heal a [ROHAN] ally.

card.title: Black Rider
card.game_text: Fierce. This minion is strength +1 for each companion you can spot.

card.title: Treebeard
card.subtitle: Guardian of the Forest
card.game_text: Unhasty. Assignment: Exert an unbound Hobbit to allow Treebeard to skirmish. Skirmish: Exert Treebeard to make an Ent damage +1.

card.title: Fell Beast
card.game_text: To play, discard 2 cards from hand. Bearer must be a Nazgul. Bearer is fierce.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Captain of Gondor
card.game_text: Knight. At the start of each fellowship phase, you may add [2] to heal another [GONDOR] companion.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Elven Stalwart
card.game_text: Archer. While you can spot 3 wounded minions, each minion skirmishing Legolas is strength -3.

card.title: Denethor
card.subtitle: Wizened Steward
card.game_text: Denethor is strength +1 for each other [GONDOR] Man you can spot (limit +4).

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Defender of the West
card.game_text: While you cannot spot 3 companions of the same culture, Gandalf is strength -2.

card.title: Frodo
card.subtitle: Resolute Hobbit
card.game_text: Ring-bearer (resistance 12).

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: Fair Elf Maiden
card.game_text: While skirmishing a fierce minion, Arwen is strength +3.

card.title: Eowyn
card.subtitle: Dernhelm
card.game_text: Valiant. While skirmishing a mounted minion, Eowyn is strength +2. While skirmishing a fierce minion, Eowyn is strength +2.

card.title: The Balrog
card.subtitle: Terror of Flame and Shadow
card.game_text: Damage +2. The twilight cost of The Balrog is -3 if you can spot a [MORIA] minion. The Balrog cannot be assigned to skirmish companions or allies of strength less than 6.

card.title: The Pale Blade
card.game_text: Bearer must be The Witch-king. He is damage +1. Response: If The Witch-king wins a skirmish, exert him to discard a Free Peoples condition.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Mithrandir
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time the fellowship moves, wound Gandalf.

card.title: Firefoot
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. If bearer is Eomer, he is defender +1. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert.

card.title: Gimli's Helm
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gimli. He takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase. Skirmish: Discard Gimli's Helm to prevent all wounds to him.

card.title: Faramir
card.subtitle: Captain of Gondor
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Ranger. The twilight cost of each other [GONDOR] Man in your starting fellowship is -1. While skirmishing a roaming minion, Faramir is strength +2.

card.title: Whip of Many Thongs
card.game_text: Bearer must be The Balrog. Skirmish: Exert The Balrog to discard a helm, shield, or armor borne by a character The Balrog is skirmishing.

card.title: The Witch-king
card.subtitle: Lord of the Nazgul
card.game_text: Twilight. Return to Its Master may not be played. Each time The Witch-king wins a skirmish, you may exert him to wound the Ring-bearer twice.

card.title: Gandalf's Staff
card.subtitle: Walking Stick
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. While you can spot 2 twilight tokens, Gandalf is damage +2.

card.title: Eowyn
card.subtitle: Sister-daughter of Theoden
card.game_text: Valiant. Response: If Eowyn is exhausted and about to take a wound in a skirmish, discard 2 cards from hand to prevent that wound.

card.title: Axe of Erebor
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gimli. He is damage +1. Skirmish: Discard a [DWARVEN] condition or a card stacked on a [DWARVEN] condition to make Gimli strength +1.

card.title: Aragorn's Bow
card.lore: ;Bearer must be Aragorn. He is an archer. Archery: Exert Aragorn to wound a minion
card.game_text: Aragorn does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.title: The Balrog's Sword
card.game_text: Bearer must be The Balrog. It is damage +1. This weapon may be borne in addition to 1 other hand weapon.

card.title: Ulaire Nelya
card.subtitle: Ringwraith in Twilight
card.game_text: Twilight. While you can spot 2 burdens or 2 wounds on the Ring-bearer, Ulaire Nelya is fierce and damage +1.

card.title: Glamdring
card.subtitle: Lightning Brand
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. He is damage +1. Each time you play a spell during a skirmish, you may make Gandalf damage +1 until the end of that skirmish.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Third Marshal of Riddermark
card.game_text: While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Eomer is strength +2 for each wound on each minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Skilled Defender
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may wound a minion assigned to skirmish an unbound companion.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Defender of Free Peoples
card.game_text: Skirmish: Remove an [ELVEN] token to make a minion skirmishing Aragorn strength -3. Skirmish: Remove a [DWARVEN] token to heal a Dwarf. Regroup: If Aragorn is mounted, remove a [ROHAN] token to wound a minion twice.

card.title: Shelob
card.subtitle: Last Child of Ungoliant
card.game_text: Enduring. Fierce. While in a fierce skirmish, Shelob is damage +1.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Keeper of Oaths
card.game_text: Valiant. When you play Eomer (except in your starting fellowship), you may reveal the top 10 cards of your draw deck and play all [ROHAN] possessions revealed. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.title: Glorfindel
card.subtitle: Revealed in Wrath
card.game_text: When Glorfindel is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -2. Skirmish: Reveal the top card of your draw deck. You may exert Glorfindel to make a Nazgul he is skirmishing strength -X, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.title: Radagast
card.subtitle: The Brown
card.game_text: The move limit is +1. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, each opponent may discard 2 cards from hand to draw 2 cards.

card.title: Goldberry
card.subtitle: River-daughter
card.game_text: Each time the fellowship moves to a river, heal Goldberry and Tom Bombadil. Skirmish: If the fellowship is at a river, exert Goldberry to make a companion strength +1.

card.title: Tom Bombadil
card.subtitle: The Master
card.game_text: To play, remove 2 burdens or 2 threats. Skirmish: Spot 2 [SHIRE] companions and exert Tom Bombadil X times, where X is the fellowship's site number, to cancel a skirmish involving a [SHIRE] companion.

card.title: Sauron
card.subtitle: The Lord of the Rings
card.game_text: Damage +2. Enduring. Fierce. For each burden you spot, threat you spot, and site you control, Sauron's twilight cost is -1.

card.title: Gorgoroth Swarm
card.game_text: Besieger. When you play this minion, if you can spot another besieger, you may spot 6 companions to play a besieger from your discard pile and control a site.

card.title: Ghan-buri-Ghan
card.subtitle: Chieftain of the Woses
card.game_text: While you can spot 2 other Men, Ghan-buri-Ghan cannot be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled. While at a forest site, Ghan-buri-Ghan is defender +1.

card.title: Radagast's Staff
card.game_text: Bearer must be Radagast. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may draw 2 cards.

card.title: Anarion
card.subtitle: Lord of Anorien
card.game_text: Skirmish: Play a [GONDOR] skirmish event to make each minion skirmishing Anarion strength -X, where X is Anarion's vitality.

card.title: Erkenbrand
card.subtitle: Master of Westfold
card.game_text: If you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, you may play Erkenbrand any time you could play a skirmish event. When you play Erkenbrand, you may discard a Shadow possession.

card.title: Tom Bombadil's Hat
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [SHIRE] companions. Each time a Shadow card adds a burden or a threat, add a [SHIRE] token here. Fellowship: Remove 2 [SHIRE] tokens from here to remove a burden.

card.title: The Witch-king
card.subtitle: Black Captain
card.game_text: Enduring. Each Man skirmishing The Witch-king loses all strength bonuses from weapons.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Dwarven Delegate
card.game_text: Damage +1.

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: Maiden of Rivendell
card.game_text: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert Arwen to make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -2.

card.title: Boromir
card.subtitle: Steward's Heir
card.game_text: Knight. Ranger. Ring-bound.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Forthwith Banished
card.game_text: Damage +1. Valiant. While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1.

card.title: Frodo
card.subtitle: Mr. Underhill
card.game_text: Ring-bearer (Resistance 10). The twilight cost of each artifact, possession, and [SHIRE] tale played on Frodo is -1.

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: The Binding Ring
card.game_text: Fellowship: Add 2 burdens to play a ring from your draw deck. Maneuver: Exert bearer to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

card.title: Nocked
card.game_text: Exert an Elf who has resistance 4 or more to wound a minion.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Leader of the Company
card.game_text: While Gandalf is in region 1, each other companion is strength +2. While Gandalf is in region 2, each companion is strength +1. While Gandalf is in region 3, he is strength +2.

card.title: Boromir
card.subtitle: Hero of Osgiliath
card.game_text: Knight. Each time Boromir wins a skirmish, you may heal a [GONDOR] companion.

card.title: Bow of Minas Tirith
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. At the start of the archery phase, if bearer is at a battleground site, you may exert him or her to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.title: Armored Easterling
card.game_text: Skirmish: Remove [2] to make a lurker strength +1. Skirmish: Remove [2] to make a lurker fierce until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Remove [2] to make a lurker damage +1.

card.title: Poleaxe
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Skirmish: Remove [2] to make a [MEN] minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Champion Orc
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [ORC] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.)

card.title: Spurred to Battle
card.game_text: To play, exert an [ORC] minion. At the start of the Shadow phase, add [1].

card.title: Riders of the Mark
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [ROHAN] companions. You may play Riders of the Mark any time you could play a skirmish event. When you play Riders of the Mark, you may exhaust a minion.

card.title: Sam
card.subtitle: Steadfast Friend
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Each other companion is resistance +1.

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: Staunch Defender
card.game_text: Each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -1 for each forest site on the adventure path.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Eored Leader
card.game_text: While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Maneuver: If you can spot more minions than companions, exert Eomer to play a [ROHAN] companion from your draw deck.

card.title: Ulaire Toldea
card.subtitle: Black Shadow
card.game_text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Toldea, you may exert him to take a [RINGWRAITH] event from your discard pile into hand.

card.title: The Witch-king's Beast
card.subtitle: Fell Creature
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. If bearer is The Witch-king, after all skirmishes and fierce skirmishes have been resolved, you may exert him twice to make him participate in one additional assignment and skirmish phase.

card.title: Ulaire Attea
card.subtitle: Second of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Attea is assigned to a fierce skirmish involving a character who has resistance 4 or less, you may exert Ulaire Attea to add a burden.

card.title: Sting
card.subtitle: Weapon of Heritage
card.game_text: Bearer must be Bilbo, Frodo, or Sam. Maneuver: If bearer is Bilbo or Frodo, exert him to make another companion resistance +2 until the regroup phase. If bearer is Sam, each time he wins a skirmish, you may remove a burden.

card.title: Olog-Hai Bestial
card.game_text: Degats +1. Acharne. Pour jouer, designez un seide [ORC]. Affectation : Affaiblissez ce seide pour l'affecter a un compagnon qui detient un artefact. Le joueur des Peuples Libres peut defausser un artefact en jeu pour prevenir ceci.

card.title: Pippin
card.subtitle: Brave Decoy
card.game_text: Skirmish: If Pippin is not assigned to a skirmish, spot an unbound companion who has less resistance than Pippin to have Pippin replace him or her in a skirmish.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Companion of the Ring
card.game_text: While Legolas is at a battleground or forest site, he is strength +2 and resistance +2.

card.title: Eowyn
card.subtitle: Shieldmaiden of Rohan
card.game_text: Each time Eowyn wins a skirmish, each other [ROHAN] Man is strength +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Jarnsmid
card.subtitle: Barding Emissary
card.game_text: At the start of each skirmish involving Jarnsmid, you may remove a burden (or 2 burdens if you can spot another [GANDALF] companion).

card.title: Vapour and Steam
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert your [GANDALF] companion and add a burden to make that companion damage +1.

card.title: Massing Strength
card.game_text: Discard any number of your [ORC] minions from play to make an [ORC] minion strength +3 for each one discarded.

card.title: Morgul Tormentor
card.game_text: Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to skirmish an unwounded companion, he or she must add a burden or discard a card from hand.

card.title: Farmer Maggot
card.subtitle: Hobbit of the Marish
card.game_text: While Farmer Maggot is at a dwelling or forest site, he is strength +4.

card.title: Mithril-coat
card.subtitle: Dwarf-mail
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Ring-bound Hobbit. Each minion skirmishing bearer loses all damage bonuses. Skirmish: Exert bearer to make each minion he is skirmishing lose fierce and unable to gain fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Agent of the Dark Lord
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert Saruman to make an [URUK-HAI] minion strength +2. Each time a companion is killed, you may heal Saruman.

card.title: Keening Wail
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [RINGWRAITH] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a Nazgul to add a burden.

card.title: Ulaire Nelya
card.subtitle: Third of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Fierce. Shadow: Exert Ulaire Nelya to replace the fellowship's current site with a site from your adventure deck.

card.title: Ulaire Lemenya
card.subtitle: Black Enemy
card.game_text: When you play Ulaire Lemenya, you may play a [RINGWRAITH] mount from your discard pile.

card.title: Ulaire Nelya
card.subtitle: Black Hunter
card.game_text: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Nelya wins a skirmish, you may draw a card.

card.title: The Mouth of Sauron
card.subtitle: Messenger of Mordor
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert The Mouth of Sauron to play a [MEN] condition or [MEN] possession from your draw deck.

card.title: Orophin
card.subtitle: Brother of Haldir
card.game_text: While Orophin is at a forest site and you can spot another Elf, Orophin is an archer.

card.title: Grima
card.subtitle: Footman of Saruman
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time a Free Peoples character is killed, you may spot another [MEN] minion to exert each companion.

card.title: Ulaire Otsea
card.subtitle: Zwarte Schim
card.game_text: Shadow: Exert Ulaire Otsea and discard a [RINGWRAITH] condition from hand to discard a Free Peoples condition from play.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Of Many Colours
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) When you play Saruman, name a culture. Each companion of the named culture is strength -1.

card.title: Ulaire Otsea
card.subtitle: Seventh of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: When you play Ulaire Otsea, you may spot a companion who has X wounds to reveal the top X cards of your draw deck. Take each [RINGWRAITH] card revealed this way into hand.

card.title: Hama
card.subtitle: Captain of the King's Guard
card.game_text: Hama is strength +1 for each Shadow possession you can spot. Each time Hama wins a skirmish, you may discard a possession from play.

card.title: Guard of the White Tree
card.game_text: Knight. Skirmish: Discard a [GONDOR] condition from your support area to make this companion strength +2.

card.title: The Witch-king
card.subtitle: Captain of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Fierce. Toil 2. (For each [RINGWRAITH] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.title: Ulaire Attea
card.subtitle: Second of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Attea is assigned to a fierce skirmish involving a character who has resistance 4 or less, you may exert Ulaire Attea to add a burden.

card.title: Ulaire Nelya
card.subtitle: Third of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Fierce. Shadow: Exert Ulaire Nelya to replace the fellowship's current site with a site from your adventure deck.

card.title: Ulaire Cantea
card.subtitle: Fourth of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: While Ulaire Cantea is at a forest or dwelling site, he is strength +2 and fierce.

card.title: Ulaire Lemenya
card.subtitle: Fifth of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Each character skirmishing Ulaire Lemenya who has resistance 5 or less is strength -3.

card.title: Ulaire Enquea
card.subtitle: Sixth of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Enquea, if you can spot 2 other Nazgul, you may exert 2 unbound companions (or exert each companion if you can spot 6 companions).

card.title: Ulaire Otsea
card.subtitle: Seventh of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: When you play Ulaire Otsea, you may spot a companion who has X wounds to reveal the top X cards of your draw deck. Take each [RINGWRAITH] card revealed this way into hand.

card.title: Ulaire Toldea
card.subtitle: Eighth of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Toldea wins a skirmish, you may play the fellowship's next site.

card.title: Ulaire Nertea
card.subtitle: Ninth of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) While Ulaire Nertea is at a forest site, he is strength +2. While you can spot 6 companions, each Nazgul is strength +2.

card.title: Faramir
card.subtitle: Prince of Ithilien
card.game_text: While you can spot Boromir, Faramir is twilight cost -1. While you can spot Denethor, Faramir is twilight cost -1. While Faramir bears a [GONDOR] possession, he is defender +1.

card.title: Eowyn
card.subtitle: Restless Warrior
card.game_text: Each possession you play on Eowyn during the fellowship phase is twilight cost -1. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may reinforce a [ROHAN] token (or reinforce 2 [ROHAN] tokens if you can spot Eomer or Theoden).

card.title: Isildur
card.subtitle: Heir of Elendil
card.game_text: Knight. Isildur is resistance +1 for each card in your hand. At the end of any phase, if Isildur has resistance 0, place him in your dead pile. Each time you reconcile, you may draw a card.

card.title: Isengard Marauder
card.game_text: To play, discard 3 cards from your hand. While you can spot 2 other [ORC] minions, this minion is fierce.

card.title: Covetous Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each possession you spot.

card.title: Haldir
card.subtitle: Sentry of the Golden Wood
card.notes: The Hunters Release. Scan courtesy of HawkeyeSPF.
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. While the fellowship is at a battleground site, Haldir is strength +2. While the fellowship is at a forest site, Haldir is an archer.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Eager Hunter
card.notes: dAgent Exclusive. Scan courtesy of HawkeyeSPF.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.)

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Fleet-footed Hunter
card.notes: dAgent Exclusive. Scan courtesy of HawkeyeSPF.
card.game_text: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Regroup: Exert 2 hunter companions to draw a card.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Swift Hunter
card.notes: dAgent Exclusive. Scan courtesy of HawkeyeSPF.
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Skirmish: Exert Aragorn to make a hunter companion strength +1.

card.title: Lurtz
card.subtitle: Now Perfected
card.notes: Tournament Director Exclusive. Scan courtesy of HawkeyeSPF.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time Lurtz wins a skirmish, the Free People's player must exert X companions, where X is the current region number.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Defender of Rohan
card.notes: dAgent Exclusive. Scan courtesy of HawkeyeSPF.
card.game_text: Valiant. While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, each [ROHAN] companion gains hunter 1.

card.title: Primitive Brand
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish you may transfer this possession to another [MEN] minion. If you do, stack a [MEN] minion from play on a [MEN] possession in your support area.

card.title: Watcher at Sarn Ford
card.subtitle: Ranger of the North
card.notes: dAgent exclusive. Scan courtesy of HawkeyeSPF.
card.game_text: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert a [GONDOR] Man with a resistance 6 or more to make that Man strength +3.

card.title: Faramir
card.subtitle: Captain of Ithilien (AFD)
card.notes: April Fool's Day Joke Card. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 2. When you play Faramir, Shadow players cannot play minions until the end of the turn. The move limit is +2.

card.title: Buckland Homestead
card.game_text: Dwelling. Shadow: Play a Nazgul to discard a condition from play.

card.title: Caras Galadhon
card.game_text: Forest. No more than 1 minion can be assigned to each skirmish.

card.title: Cavern Entrance
card.game_text: Underground. Skirmish special abilities cannot be used.

card.title: Neekerbreekers' Bog
card.game_text: Marsh. When the fellowship moves to here, heal each character who has resistance 5 or more and exert each other character.

card.title: Theodred
card.subtitle: Second Marshal of the Mark
card.game_text: While you can spot a [Rohan] Man who has resistance of 7 or more, Theodred is twilight cost -1. At the start of each skirmish involving Theodred, you may exert each minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Elendil
card.subtitle: High-King of Gondor
card.game_text: Knight. To play, spot 2 [GONDOR] knights or exert 2 [GONDOR] men. Each of your [GONDOR] companions is resistance +1. Maneuver: Remove a [GONDOR] token to make an unbound companion resistance +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Ordnance Grunt
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot an [ORC] minion. Shadow: Discard an [ORC] condition from play to play this minion from your discard pile.

card.title: Bilbo
card.subtitle: Aged Ring-bearer
card.game_text: Ring-bound. While Bilbo is not assigned to a skirmish, each Ring-bound Hobbit is strength +1. At the start of each skirmish involving Bilbo, you may remove a burden for each other Ring-bound Hobbit you can spot.

card.title: Cave Troll of Moria
card.subtitle: Menace of the Underdeeps
card.notes: Incorrectly numbered? Bilbo, Aged Ring-bearer is also 0D8. This looks like it belongs in the Triumph and Menace Series for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot a [MORIA] Orc. Menace - When you play this minion you may draw 3 cards.

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: Maiden of Rivendell
card.notes: League Card for LOTRO. No phyiscal card exists.
card.game_text: Ranger. Archer. Skirmish: Exert Arwen to make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -2. While you can spot an Elf, Arwen is twilight cost -1. While skirmishing a Nazgul, Arwen is strength +3. Fellowship: Exert an Elf to draw a card.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Stormcrow
card.notes: League Card for LOTRO. No phyiscal card exists.
card.game_text: Damage +3. Defender +3. Skirmish: Exert Gandalf to make a companion strength +1.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Many-coloured Wizard
card.notes: League Card for LOTRO. No phyiscal card exists.
card.game_text: Damage +3. Fierce. Assignment: Exert Saruman to assign him to an unbound companion. Skirmish: Exert Saruman to make him strength +1.

card.title: Moria Skirmishers
card.notes: League Card for LOTRO. No phyiscal card exists.
card.game_text: Archer. Each time Moria Skirmishers wins a skirmish, you may exert a companion. While skirmishing an Elf or a Dwarf, Moria Skirmishers is strength +2. Shadow: Discard this minion to play a [MORIA] minion. That minion's twilight cost is -10.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Forthwith Banished
card.notes: League Card for LOTRO. No phyiscal card exists.
card.game_text: Valiant. Damage +3. Fellowship: Exert Eomer to play a mount on him from your draw deck. Eomer is strength +2 for each wound on each minion he is skirmishing. At the start of your turn, you may heal a [ROHAN] ally. While you can spot a [ROHAN] man, Eomer is twilight cost -1.

card.title: Morgul Patrol
card.notes: League Card for LOTRO. No phyiscal card exists.
card.game_text: Besieger. Tracker. The site number of each [SAURON] Orc is -3. Response: If Morgul Patrol wins a skirmish, exert it to make it fierce until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Exert Morgul Patrol to wound a character it is skirmishing. Regroup: Exert Morgul Patrol to make the Free Peoples player exert X companions, where X is the number of burdens you can spot.

card.title: The Lord of the Rings
card.subtitle: Trading Card Game
card.notes: Oversized. Decipher, Inc. is proud to present... The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game. Coming November 6th, 2001.

card.title: The Lord of the Rings
card.subtitle: Trading Card Game
card.notes: Oversized. Release schedule for the first nine sets: 1. The Fellowship of the Ring - November 2001. 2. Mines of Moria - March 2002. 3. Realms of the Elf-lords - July 2002. 4. The Two Towers - November 2002. 5. Battle of Helm's Deep - March 2003. 6. Ents of Fangorn - July 2003. 7. The Return of the King - November 2003. 8. Siege of Gondor - March 2004. 9. Mount Doom - July 2004

card.title: Goblet of the White City (SPD)
card.notes: Saint Patrick's Day Promo for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] companion. Each time you move to a site, bearer is strength +1 until the end of the game. At the start of your fellowship phase, discard 2 random cards from hand or discard this possession.

card.title: Green Dragon Mug (SPD)
card.notes: Saint Patrick's Day Promo for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Each time you move to a site, bearer is strength +1 until the end of the game. At the start of your fellowship phase, exert bearer or discard this possession.

card.title: Rohirrim Stein (SPD)
card.notes: Saint Patrick's Day Promo for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] companion. Each time you move to a site, bearer is strength +1 until the end of the game. At the start of your fellowship phase, add [2] or discard this possession.

card.title: Army of Dunland
card.notes: Triumph and Menace Series for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: To play, spot a [DUNLAND] Man. Menace - When you play this minion, discard up to 2 Free People's possessions.

card.title: Dwarven Escort
card.notes: Triumph and Menace Series for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Triumph - At the start of the fellowship phase draw 4 cards.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Nimble Elf
card.notes: Triumph and Menace Series for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: Archer. Triumph - At the start of the archery phase, make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.title: Treebeard
card.subtitle: Enemy of the Hand
card.notes: Triumph and Menace Series for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: Triumph - At the start of a skirmish involving Treebeard discard a minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Gollum
card.subtitle: Worker of Mischief
card.notes: Triumph and Menace Series for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: To play, spot a [GOLLUM] condition. Menace - When you play Gollum make the move limit for this turn -1.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: The Dunadan
card.notes: Triumph and Menace Series for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: Ranger. Triumph - At the start of the maneuver phase, you may wound a minion.

card.title: Army of Isengard
card.notes: Triumph and Menace Series for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: Damage +1. To play, spot an Uruk-hai. Menace - When you play this minion, it becomes fierce.

card.title: Army of Moria
card.notes: Triumph and Menace Series for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: To play, spot a [MORIA] Orc. Menace - When you play this minion, draw 3 cards.

card.title: Army of Harad
card.notes: Triumph and Menace Series for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: Southron. Archer. To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. Menace - When you play this minion, add ten tokens to the twilight pool.

card.title: The Nazgul
card.notes: Triumph and Menace Series for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: Fierce. To play, spot a Nazgul. Menace - When you play this minion add 2 burdens.

card.title: Eowyn
card.subtitle: Daughter of Kings
card.notes: Triumph and Menace Series for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: Triumph - At the start of the fellowship phase, the move limit for this turn is +1.

card.title: Army of Sauron
card.notes: Triumph and Menace Series for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: To play, spot a [SAURON] Orc. Menace - When you play this minion, make it strength +10.

card.title: Sam
card.subtitle: Lover of Trees
card.notes: Triumph and Menace Series for LOTRO. No physical card exists.
card.game_text: Triumph - At the start of the fellowship phase remove 3 burdens. Response: If Frodo dies, make Sam the Ring-bearer (Resistance 5).

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: Isildur's Bane
card.lore: ...the Ring slipped from his fingers as he swam....
card.game_text: Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, he wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, add 2 burdens instead.

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: Isildur's Bane
card.lore: ...the Ring slipped from his fingers as he swam....
card.game_text: Response: If bearer is about to take a wound in a skirmish, he wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound during a skirmish, add a burden instead.

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: The Ruling Ring
card.lore: One Ring to rule them all....
card.game_text: Response: If bearer is about to take a wound in a skirmish, he wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound during a skirmish, add a burden instead.

card.title: Axe Strike
card.lore: Though Gimli's words were praised by the Lady of Light, he proved his best skill was swinging his axe.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or +3 if bearing a [DWARVEN] hand weapon).

card.title: Battle Fury
card.lore: The Dwarves quickly dispatch Orcs and Uruk-hai with their mighty battle axes.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert a Dwarf to make that Dwarf strength +3 and damage +1.

card.title: Cleaving Blow
card.lore: The shoddy workmanship of Orc-smiths cannot withstand the fury of Durin's folk.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2 and damage +1.

card.title: Delving
card.lore: '...they delved too greedily and too deep, and disturbed that from which they fled, Durin's Bane.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert a Dwarf companion to draw 3 cards.

card.title: Dwarf Guard
card.lore: Dwarves from Din's people are stout companions, trustworthy and loyal.
card.game_text: To play, spot a Dwarf.

card.title: Dwarven Armor
card.lore: The strongest armour still being made in Middle-earth is forged by Dwarves. It is so heavy that only they can bear it.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Bearer may not be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled.

card.title: Dwarven Axe
card.notes: This card can trigger only once for each Shadow player with a minion in that skirmish, regardless of how many minions that player had.
card.lore: 'Buckler and corslet, axe and sword / And shining spears were laid in hoard.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Each time a player's minion loses a skirmish to bearer, that player discards the top card from his draw deck.

card.title: Dwarven Heart
card.lore: '...a Dwarf goes on, be the burden twice his own weight....'
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. When you play this condition, heal bearer up to 2 times. At the start of each of your turns, exert bearer.

card.title: Farin
card.subtitle: Dwarven Emissary
card.lore: Among the envoys sent to represent the Dwarves of Erebor at the Council of Elrond was Farin, a young but wise Dwarf, and a fierce foe in battle.
card.game_text: To play, spot a Dwarf. While skirmishing an Orc, Farin is strength +2.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Dwarf of Erebor
card.lore: Gimli now walked ahead by the wizard's side, so eager was he to come to Moria.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fellowship: If the twilight pool has fewer than 2 twilight tokens, add [2] to place a card from hand beneath your draw deck.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Son of Gloin
card.lore: There was a younger dwarf at Glin's side: his son Gimli.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert Gimli to make him strength +2.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Son of Gloin
card.lore: There was a younger dwarf at Glin's side: his son Gimli.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert Gimli to make him strength +2.

card.title: Gimli's Battle Axe
card.lore: Beside them Gimli stood with his stout legs apart, wielding his dwarf-axe.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gimli. He is damage +1. Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may wound an Orc.

card.title: Gimli's Battle Axe
card.lore: Beside them Gimli stood with his stout legs apart, wielding his dwarf-axe.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gimli. He is damage +1. Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may wound an Orc.

card.title: Gimli's Helm
card.lore: A helm fashioned under the Lonely Mountain protects the head of Gimli the Dwarf.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gimli. He takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase. Skirmish: Discard Gimli's Helm to prevent all wounds to him.

card.title: Greatest Kingdom of My People
card.lore: 'With golden roof and silver floor / And runes of power upon the door.'
card.game_text: Tale. Exert a Dwarf to play this condition. Plays to your support area. Each time your opponent plays an Orc, that player discards the top card of his or her draw deck.

card.title: Grimir
card.subtitle: Dwarven Elder
card.lore: Old and grey after many years spent in exile before the Lonely Mountain was reclaimed, Grimir can still wield his axe with strength.
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert Grimir to shuffle a [DWARVEN] event from your discard pile into your draw deck.

card.title: Halls of My Home
card.lore: 'I will go and look on the halls of Durin, whatever may wait there....'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert a Dwarf to reveal the top 3 cards of any draw deck. You may discard 1 Shadow card revealed. Return the rest in any order.

card.title: Here Lies Balin
card.subtitle: Son of Fundin
card.lore: 'I have looked on Moria, and it is very great, but it has become dark and dreadful; and we have found no sign of my kindred.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a Dwarf to wound 2 Orcs or to wound 1 Orc twice.

card.title: Let Them Come!
card.lore: 'There is one Dwarf yet in Moria who still draws breath!'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time a Dwarf wins a skirmish against an Orc, discard that Orc. Discard this condition if a Dwarf loses a skirmish.

card.title: Lord of Moria
card.lore: Gimli rushed ahead into the vast, empty chamber to see a huge slab of white stone. Knowing instinctively the significance of this tomb, he fell to his knees, overcome with grief.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each Dwarf is damage +1.

card.title: Mithril Shaft
card.lore: 'Mithril! All folk desired it.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a Dwarf to discard cards from the top of your draw deck until you choose to stop (limit 5). Add [1] for each card discarded in this way. Take the last card discarded into hand.

card.title: Nobody Tosses a Dwarf
card.lore: 'My folk have never had dealings with any of the servants of the Enemy.'
card.game_text: Response: If a Dwarf wins a skirmish, make an opponent discard 3 cards from the top of his or her draw deck.

card.title: Stairs of Khazad-dum
card.lore: 'Moria - Khazad-dm! Greatest of the dwarf-halls - What I would not give to look upon its treasures!'
card.game_text: Tale. Plays to your support area. While a Dwarf skirmishes a [MORIA] minion, that Dwarf is strength +1.

card.title: Still Draws Breath
card.lore: When thirteen had fallen the rest fled shrieking, leaving the defenders unharmed....
card.game_text: Response: If a Dwarf wins a skirmish, heal that Dwarf.

card.title: Their Halls of Stone
card.lore: 'These are not holes,' said Gimli. 'This is the great realm and city of the Dwarrowdelf. And of old it was not darksome, but full of light and splendour, as is still remembered in our songs.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or +4 if at an underground site).

card.title: Thrarin
card.subtitle: Dwarven Smith
card.lore: A blacksmith by trade, Thrarin puts down his hammer and takes up his axe to fight when the need arises.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert Thrarin to allow him to participate in archery fire and skirmishes until the regroup phase.

card.title: Wealth of Moria
card.lore: 'For here alone in all the world was found Moria-silver, or true-silver as some have called it: mithril is the Elvish name.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf to reveal the top 3 cards of your draw deck. Take all Free Peoples cards revealed into hand and discard the rest.

card.title: Ancient Enmity
card.lore: Hard and bitter is the Elven hatred of Orcs, for they have lost many kinsmen to Orc savagery.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make an Elf strength +1. If a minion loses this skirmish to that Elf, that minion's owner discards 2 cards at random from hand.

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: Daughter of Elrond
card.lore: Long she had been in the land of her mother's kin, in Lrien beyond the mountains, and was but lately returned to Rivendell to her father's house.
card.game_text: Ranger. While skirmishing a Nazgul, Arwen is strength +3.

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: Daughter of Elrond
card.lore: Long she had been in the land of her mother's kin, in Lrien beyond the mountains, and was but lately returned to Rivendell to her father's house.
card.game_text: Ranger. While skirmishing a Nazgul, Arwen is strength +3.

card.title: Asfaloth
card.lore: 'Noro lim, Asfaloth, noro lim!'
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Elf. When played on Arwen, Asfaloth's twilight cost is -2. While at a plains site, bearer is strength +2. Discard Asfaloth when at an underground site.

card.title: Border Defenses
card.lore: 'None of the Orcs will ever return out of Lrien. And there will be many Elves hidden on the northern border before another night falls.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing an archer).

card.title: Bow of the Galadhrim
card.lore: To Legolas she gave a bow such as the Galadhrim used, longer and stouter than the bows of Mirkwood, and strung with a string of elfhair.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Legolas. Each time Legolas wins a skirmish, you may wound a minion.

card.title: Celeborn
card.subtitle: Lord of Lorien
card.lore: They were clad wholly in white ... and the hair of the Lord Celeborn was of silver long and bright; but no sign of age was upon them, unless it were in the depths of their eyes
card.game_text: for these were keen as lances in the starlight, and yet profo

card.title: The Council of Elrond
card.lore: 'You will hear today all that you need in order to understand the purposes of the Enemy .... What shall we do with the Ring, the least of rings, the trifle that Sauron fancies? That is the doom that we must deem.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot an Elf to play a tale from your draw deck.

card.title: Curse Their Foul Feet!
card.lore: 'A strong company of Orcs has passed. They crossed the Nimrodel - curse their foul feet in its clean water!'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert an Elf to reveal an opponent's hand. That player discards a card from hand for each Orc revealed.

card.title: Defiance
card.lore: 'If you want him, come and claim him!'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing a Nazgul).

card.title: Double Shot
card.lore: The affray was sharp, but the orcs were dismayed by the fierceness of the defence. Legolas shot two through the throat.
card.game_text: Archery: Spot an Elf archer companion to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.title: Elf-song
card.lore: ...the beauty of the melodies and of the interwoven words in elven-tongues, even though he understood them little, held him in a spell, as soon as he began to attend to them.
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot an Elf to remove a burden.

card.title: Elrond
card.subtitle: Lord of Rivendell
card.lore: He was the Lord of Rivendell and mighty among both Elves and Men.
card.game_text: To play, spot Gandalf or an Elf. At the start of each of your turns, heal every ally whose home is site 3. Fellowship: Exert Elrond to draw a card.

card.title: Elven Bow
card.lore: 'We live now upon an island amid many perils, and our hands are more often upon the bowstring than upon the harp.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Elf. Bearer is an archer.

card.title: Elven Cloak
card.lore: '...never before have we clad strangers in the garb of our own people.'
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Bearer must be a companion. The minion archery total is -1.

card.title: Far-seeing Eyes
card.notes: Erratum: This Elven condition is unique.
card.lore: Keen Elven eyes see farther and more clearly than those of Men or Dwarves.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time you play an Elf, choose an opponent to discard a card from hand.

card.title: Foul Creation
card.lore: Saruman's Uruk-hai mirrored the singular focus of their master, viewing with contempt and disgust all they encountered.
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert an Elf to reveal an opponent's hand. You may discard a [ISENGARD] minion revealed to draw 2 cards.

card.title: Galadriel
card.subtitle: Lady of Light
card.notes: Lists: EXL, MXL. The twilight cost of an Elf played using Galadriel's text is zero, and cannot be raised or lowered.
card.lore: Very tall they were, and the Lady no less tall than the Lord; and they were grave and beautiful ... and the hair of the Lady was of deep gold....
card.game_text: At the start of each of your turns, heal every ally whose home is site 6. Fellowship: Exert Galadriel to play an Elf for free.

card.title: Gift of Boats
card.lore: 'They will not sink, lade them as you will; but they are wayward if mishandled.'
card.game_text: To play, exert an Elf ally. Plays to your support area. When the fellowship moves from a river during the fellowship phase, the move limit for this turn is +1.

card.title: Gwemegil
card.lore: Forged by the Elven-smiths of Rivendell, Arwen's blade bears enchantments to ward off the forces of the Great Eye.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Arwen. She is damage +1. Skirmish: Exert Arwen or discard 2 cards from hand to make her strength +1.

card.title: Haldir
card.subtitle: Elf of the Golden Wood
card.lore: 'But there are some of us still who go abroad for the gathering of news and the watching of our enemies .... I am one. Haldir is my name.'
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. While Haldir is at site 6, 7, or 8, he is strength +2.

card.title: The Last Alliance of Elves and Men
card.lore: But Sauron of Mordor assailed them, and they made the Last Alliance of Elves and Men, and the hosts of Gil-galad and Elendil were mustered....
card.game_text: Tale. Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Limit 1 per bearer. Bearer is strength +1 for each Elf you can spot (limit +3).

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Greenleaf
card.lore: 'And I too will go with him,' said Legolas. 'It would be faithless now to say farewell.';Archer. Archery: Exert Legolas to wound a minion
card.game_text: Legolas does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Greenleaf
card.lore: 'And I too will go with him,' said Legolas. 'It would be faithless now to say farewell.';Archer. Archery: Exert Legolas to wound a minion
card.game_text: Legolas does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Prince of Mirkwood
card.lore: There was also a strange Elf clad in green and brown, Legolas, a messenger from his father, Thranduil, the King of the Elves of Northern Mirkwood.
card.game_text: Archer. While skirmishing a Nazgul, Legolas is strength +3.

card.title: Lightfootedness
card.lore: '...let a ploughman plough, but choose an otter for swimming, and for running light over grass and leaf, or over snow - an Elf.'
card.game_text: Archery: Spot an Elf companion to make the minion archery total -1.

card.title: Lorien Elf
card.lore: '...we dwell now in the heart of the forest, and do not willingly have dealings with any other folk.'
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf.

card.title: Mallorn-trees
card.lore: Upon the further side there rose to a great height a green wall encircling a green hill thronged with mallorn-trees taller than any they had yet seen in all the land.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Reveal an [ELVEN] card from hand and place it beneath your draw deck.

card.title: The Mirror of Galadriel
card.lore: 'What you will see I cannot tell....'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each Elf ally whose home is site 6 is strength +1. Maneuver: If an opponent has at least 7 cards in hand, exert Galadriel to look at 2 of those cards at random. Discard one and replace the other.

card.title: Orophin
card.subtitle: Lorien Bowman
card.lore: The swift bow of Orophin, Haldir's kinsman, has slain many Orcs.
card.game_text: Archer. Archery: Exert Orophin to wound an Uruk-hai.

card.title: Rumil
card.subtitle: Elven Protector
card.lore: Brother to Haldir, Rmil guards the northern marches of the Golden Wood.
card.game_text: Archer. Archery: Exert Rumil to wound an Orc.

card.title: The Seen and the Unseen
card.lore: 'You have entered the realm of the Lady of the Wood - you cannot go back.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert 2 Elves to discard a condition.

card.title: Shoulder to Shoulder
card.lore: 'May it be a sign that though the world is now dark better days are at hand, and that friendship shall be renewed between our peoples.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Add [1] and exert a Dwarf to heal an Elf, or add [1] and exert an Elf to heal a Dwarf.

card.title: Silinde
card.subtitle: Elf of Mirkwood
card.lore: Among the representatives of the Elves of Northern Mirkwood was Silinde, friend of the House of Thranduil.
card.game_text: While you can spot your site 3, Silinde has the game text of that site.

card.title: Songs of the Blessed Realm
card.lore: Elves seem to like music and poetry and tales as much as Hobbits like food.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time you play an [ELVEN] tale, you may remove a burden.

card.title: The Splendor of Their Banners
card.lore: 'It recalled to me the glory of the Elder Days and the hosts of Beleriand, so many great princes and captains were assembled.'
card.game_text: Tale. Bearer must be an Elf companion. Archery: If bearer is an archer, exert bearer to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.title: Stand Against Darkness
card.lore: 'What power still remains lies with us, here in Imladris, or with Crdan at the Havens, or in Lrien. But have they the strength, have we here the strength to withstand the Enemy...?'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert an Elf to discard a [SAURON] minion, a [SAURON] condition, or a [SAURON] possession.

card.title: Support of the Last Homely House
card.lore: Merely to be there was a cure for weariness, fear, and sadness.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert an Elf ally whose home is site 3. Until the regroup phase, that ally is strength +3 and participates in archery fire and skirmishes.

card.title: Swan-ship of the Galadhrim
card.lore: ...and suddenly they perceived that it was a ship, wrought and carved with elven-skill in the likeness of a bird.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert an Elf ally whose home is site 6. Until the regroup phase, that ally is strength +3 and participates in archery fire and skirmishes.

card.title: The Tale of Gil-galad
card.lore: Gil-galad was an Elven-king / Of him the harpers sadly sing: / the last whose realm was fair and free / between the Mountains and the Sea.
card.game_text: Tale. Bearer must be an Elf. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make bearer strength +2.

card.title: Uruviel
card.subtitle: Maid of Lorien
card.lore: An Elf-maid of the Galadhrim, Uruviel has dwelt for years beneath the mallorn-trees of Lothlrien.
card.game_text: While you can spot your site 6, Uruviel has the game text of that site.

card.title: The White Arrows of Lorien
card.lore: Straight and true, the arrows of the Golden Wood are known to leave a deadly mark.
card.game_text: Tale. Bearer must be an Elf companion. Archery: If bearer is an archer, exert bearer to make an opponent discard 2 cards at random from hand.

card.title: Albert Dreary
card.subtitle: Entertainer From Bree
card.lore: Typical of Bree-folk, Albert is a plain but stout-hearted fellow. He does not seek trouble, but he is willing to protect his home.
card.game_text: To play, spot Gandalf. Maneuver: Exert Albert Dreary to discard a [ISENGARD] or [MORIA] condition.

card.title: Barliman Butterbur
card.subtitle: Prancing Pony Proprietor
card.lore: 'You don't know much even about them, if you think old Barliman is stupid,' said Gandalf. 'He is wise enough on his own ground.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert Barliman Butterbur to take a [GANDALF] event into hand from your discard pile.

card.title: Durin's Secret
card.lore: 'They are wrought of ithildin that mirrors only starlight and moonlight, and sleeps until it is touched by one who speaks words now long forgotten in Middle-earth.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot Gandalf, a Dwarf, and an Elf to make the move limit for this turn +1.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Friend of the Shirefolk
card.lore: 'Among the Wise I am the only one that goes in for hobbit-lore: an obscure branch of knowledge, but full of surprises.'
card.game_text: Gandalf is strength +1 for each of these races you can spot in the fellowship: Hobbit, Dwarf, Elf, and Man.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Friend of the Shirefolk
card.lore: 'Among the Wise I am the only one that goes in for hobbit-lore: an obscure branch of knowledge, but full of surprises.'
card.game_text: Gandalf is strength +1 for each of these races you can spot in the fellowship: Hobbit, Dwarf, Elf, and Man.

card.title: Gandalf's Cart
card.lore: ...a cart came in through Bywater ... An old man was driving it all alone.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Stack a Free Peoples artifact (or possession) from hand on this card, or play a card stacked here as if played from hand.

card.title: Gandalf's Pipe
card.lore: 'I know what is the matter with me,' he muttered, as he sat down by the door. 'I need smoke!'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Fellowship: Discard a pipeweed possession and spot X pipes to remove X burdens.

card.title: Glamdring
card.lore: ...in his other hand Glamdring gleamed, cold and white.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. He is damage +1. Fellowship or Regroup: Exert Gandalf to reveal an opponent's hand. Remove [1] for each Orc revealed.

card.title: Intimidate
card.lore: 'Go back to the Shadow!'
card.game_text: Spell. Response: If a companion is about to take a wound, spot Gandalf to prevent that wound.

card.title: Let Folly Be Our Cloak
card.lore: 'Well, let folly be our cloak, a veil before the eyes of the Enemy! ... Into his heart the thought will not enter that any will refuse it, that having the Ring we may seek to destroy it.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert X companions to remove (X).

card.title: Mysterious Wizard
card.lore: '...there are older and fouler things than Orcs in the deep places of the world.'
card.game_text: Spell. Skirmish: Make Gandalf strength +2 (or +4 if there are 4 or fewer burdens on the Ring-bearer).

card.title: The Nine Walkers
card.lore: 'Nine companions to match the Nine Ringwraiths ... So be it.'
card.game_text: To play, spot Gandalf. Plays to your support area. Each time you play a companion whose race you cannot spot, that companion's twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Ottar
card.subtitle: Man of Laketown
card.lore: The Men of Laketown come from the North, where they trade with the Dwarves of the Lonely Mountain.
card.game_text: To play, spot Gandalf. Fellowship: Exert Ottar to discard up to 3 cards from hand and draw an equal number of cards.

card.title: Questions That Need Answering
card.lore: 'There are some things that I must see to....'
card.game_text: Spell. Fellowship: If the twilight pool has fewer than 3 twilight tokens, spot Gandalf to look at the top 4 cards of your draw deck. Take 2 of those cards into hand and discard the rest.

card.title: Risk a Little Light
card.lore: 'Let me risk a little more light.'
card.game_text: Spell. Fellowship: If the twilight pool has fewer than 2 twilight tokens, spot Gandalf to look at the top 2 cards of your draw deck. Take one into hand and discard the other.

card.title: Servant of the Secret Fire
card.lore: 'I am a servant of the Secret Fire, wielder of the flame of Anor. You cannot pass.'
card.game_text: Spell. Skirmish: Spot Gandalf to make a minion strength -3.

card.title: Servant of the Secret Fire
card.lore: 'I am a servant of the Secret Fire, wielder of the flame of Anor. You cannot pass.'
card.game_text: Spell. Skirmish: Spot gandalf to make a minion strength -3.

card.title: Sleep
card.subtitle: Caradhras
card.notes: 'Discard every condition' means to discard every active condition. Inactive conditions are not discarded.
card.lore: 'Losto Caradhras, sedho, hodo, nuitho i ruith.'
card.game_text: Spell. Fellowship: Exert Gandalf to discard every condition.

card.title: Strength of Spirit
card.lore: 'There are many powers in the world, for good or for evil. Some are greater than I am. Against some I have not yet been measured. But my time is coming.'
card.game_text: Spell. Response: If a companion is about to exert, spot Gandalf to place no token for that exertion.

card.title: Treachery Deeper Than You Know
card.lore: 'By foul craft, Saruman has crossed Orc with Goblin Men - he is breeding an army in the Caverns of Isengard.'
card.game_text: Spell. Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to reveal an opponent's hand.

card.title: A Wizard Is Never Late
card.lore: 'A wizard is never late, Frodo Baggins, nor is he early. He arrives precisely when he means to.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Play a [GANDALF] character from your draw deck.

card.title: An Able Guide
card.lore: '...though I cannot disappear, I have hunted many wild and wary things and I can usually avoid being seen, if I wish.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Spot a ranger to remove [4].

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Ranger of the North
card.lore: 'Lonely men are we, Rangers of the wild, hunters - but hunters ever of the servants of the Enemy....'
card.game_text: Ranger. Maneuver: Exert Aragorn to make him defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Ranger of the North
card.lore: 'Lonely men are we, Rangers of the wild, hunters - but hunters ever of the servants of the Enemy....'
card.game_text: Ranger. Exert Aragorn to make him Defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Aragorn's Bow
card.lore: Rangers learn the bow as well as the blade.;Bearer must be Aragorn. He is an archer. Archery: Exert Aragorn to wound a minion
card.game_text: Aragorn does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.title: Aragorn's Pipe
card.lore: He had a tall tankard in front of him, and was smoking a long-stemmed pipe curiously carved.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] companion. Fellowship: Discard a pipeweed possession and spot X pipes to heal X companions.

card.title: Armor
card.lore: Then Elendil the Tall and his mighty sons, Isildur and Anrion, became great lords; and the North-realm they made in Arnor, and the Southrealm in Gondor....
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Man. Bearer takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase.

card.title: Arwen's Fate
card.lore: For the love of a mortal Man, Arwen, daughter of Elrond, must forsake her Elven heritage, and give up forever her journey to the Undying Lands.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert Aragorn to make Arwen strength +3, or exert Arwen to make Aragorn strength +3.

card.title: Athelas
card.lore: The hands of the king are the hands of a healer, and so shall the true king be known.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Fellowship: Discard this possession to heal a companion or to remove a Shadow condition from a companion.

card.title: Blade of Gondor
card.lore: With the valour of Boromir's mighty longsword, the Enemies of the West are kept at bay.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Boromir. He is damage +1. Skirmish: Exert Boromir to wound an Orc or Uruk-hai he is skirmishing.

card.title: Boromir
card.subtitle: Lord of Gondor
card.lore: '...Boromir will also be in the Company. He is a valiant man.'
card.game_text: Ranger. Boromir is not overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled.

card.title: Boromir
card.subtitle: Lord of Gondor
card.lore: '...Boromir will also be in the Company. He is a valiant man.'
card.game_text: Ranger. Boromir is not overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled.

card.title: Boromir
card.subtitle: Son of Denethor
card.lore: 'Long has my father, the Steward of Gondor, held the forces of Mordor at bay - by the blood of our people are the lands of others kept safe.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert Boromir to make a Hobbit strength +3.

card.title: Boromir's Cloak
card.lore: He was cloaked and booted as if for a journey on horseback; and indeed though his garments were rich, and his cloak was lined with fur, they were stained with long travel.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Boromir. Maneuver: Exert Boromir to discard a weather condition.

card.title: Change of Plans
card.lore: 'Then let me help you. There are other ways, Frodo - other paths that we might take.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert a ranger to make an opponent shuffle his hand into his draw deck and draw 8 cards.

card.title: The Choice of Luthien
card.lore: 'But she chose mortality, and to die from the world, so that she might follow him; and it is sung that they met again beyond the Sundering Seas....'
card.game_text: Tale. Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Exert Aragorn to heal Arwen, or exert Arwen to heal Aragorn.

card.title: Coat of Mail
card.lore: Soldiers of the White Tower have long appreciated the craftsmanship of the Gondorian metalsmiths.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Man. Bearer may not be overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.title: Dagger Strike
card.lore: Every warrior needs a sword, bow, or axe - but sometimes, a dagger is enough.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a [GONDOR] or [SHIRE] companion bearing a hand weapon strength +2 and damage +1.

card.title: Elendil's Valor
card.lore: 'In panoply of ancient kings, / in chaind rings he armoured him; / his shining shield was scored with runes / to ward all wounds and harm from him....'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Make a [GONDOR] companion defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Eregion's Trails
card.lore: Guided by Aragorn they struck a good path. It looked to Frodo like the remains of an ancient road, that had once been broad and well planned....
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a ranger to make each roaming minion strength -3 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Foes of Mordor
card.lore: Through the long years, the Men of the Tower of Guard have shielded the West from the minions of the Eye.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Exert a [GONDOR] character to wound a [SAURON] minion.

card.title: Gondor's Vengeance
card.lore: A Ranger in the wild is a deadly foe for the forces of the Shadow.
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert a ranger companion to discard a minion.

card.title: Great Shield
card.lore: The Kingdom of Gondor has smiths much practiced in creating strong tools of war.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Man. The minion archery total is -1.

card.title: No Stranger to the Shadows
card.lore: 'Ah, but you had not got me with you then,' laughed Strider. 'My cuts, short or long, don't go wrong.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be a ranger. Limit 1 per ranger. Each site's shadow number is -1.

card.title: One Whom Men Would Follow
card.lore: 'The skill of the elves can reforge the Sword of Elendil - but only you have the power to wield it.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert Aragorn to spot an ally. Until the regroup phase, that ally is strength +2 and participates in archery fire and skirmishes.

card.title: Pathfinder
card.lore: 'Strider can take you by paths that are seldom trodden. Will you have him?'
card.game_text: Fellowship or Regroup: Spot a ranger to play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

card.title: Pursuit Just Behind
card.lore: 'We must do something to delay the enemy first. We will make them fear the Chamber of Mazarbul!'
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert a ranger companion to wound every minion.

card.title: Ranger's Sword
card.lore: Aragorn is a trustworthy companion and a deadly foe. His years roaming the wild have honed his swordfighting skills.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Aragorn. He is damage +1.

card.title: A Ranger's Versatility
card.lore: 'If you bring a Ranger with you, it is well to pay attention to him, especially if the Ranger is Aragorn.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a ranger at a river or forest to exhaust a minion.

card.title: The Saga of Elendil
card.lore: From out of the depths of the Sea, from the foundered land of Nmenor, came Elendil to Middle-earth to found the kingdoms of Arnor and Gondor.
card.game_text: Tale. Bearer must be a [GONDOR] companion. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make bearer strength +2.

card.title: The Saga of Elendil
card.lore: From out of the depths of the Sea, from the foundered land of Nmenor, came Elendil to Middle-earth to found the kingdoms of Arnor and Gondor.
card.game_text: Tale. Bearer must be a [GONDOR] companion. Skirmish: discard this condition to make bearer strength +2.

card.title: Strength of Kings
card.lore: 'Believe not that in the land of Gondor the blood of Nmenor is spent, nor all its pride and dignity forgotten.'
card.game_text: Response: If a Skirmish event is played during a skirmish involving a [GONDOR] Man, cancel that event.

card.title: Swordarm of the White Tower
card.lore: 'By our valour the wild folk of the East are still restrained, and the terror of Morgul kept at bay; and thus alone are peace and freedom maintained in the lands behind us, bulwark of the West.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a [GONDOR] companion strength +2 (or +4 if he is defender +1).

card.title: Swordsman of the Northern Kingdom
card.lore: 'This is no mere Ranger. He is Aragorn, son of Arathorn ... and you owe him your allegiance.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a ranger strength +2 (or +4 when skirmishing a roaming minion).

card.title: Valiant Man of the West
card.lore: '...I swore to protect you.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Make Aragorn defender +1 and he takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase until the regroup phase.

card.title: What Are They?
card.lore: 'They were men ... once.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot a ranger to discard a roaming minion.

card.title: Alive and Unspoiled
card.lore: 'Bring them to me.... Kill the others....'
card.game_text: To play, exert an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove [3] and spot X burdens to make the Free Peoples player reveal X cards at random from hand. You may discard 1 revealed card.

card.title: Bred for Battle
card.lore: 'You are the Uruk-hai of Isengard! The blood in your veins is black and cold - you do not know pain, you do not know fear - for you are the servants of the White Hand - the hand that gives you Man flesh to eat!'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert an Uruk-hai to make it strength +3.

card.title: Breeding Pit
card.lore: 'He is breeding an army in the Caverns of Isengard. An army that can move in sunlight and cover great distance at speed.'
card.game_text: Response: If you play an Uruk-hai, take all copies of that card in your discard pile and place them beneath your draw deck.

card.title: Caradhras Has Not Forgiven Us
card.lore: 'It was no ordinary storm. It is the ill will of Caradhras.'
card.game_text: Spell. Weather. Maneuver: Exert a [ISENGARD] minion and spot 5 companions to discard an exhausted companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Cruel Caradhras
card.lore: 'Yonder stands Barazinbar, the Redhorn, cruel Caradhras....'
card.game_text: Spell. Weather. Maneuver: Exert a [ISENGARD] minion to make the opponent choose to either exert the Ring-bearer or add a burden.

card.title: Greed
card.lore: 'It is a strange fate that we should suffer so much fear and doubt over so small a thing....'
card.game_text: To play, spot an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Spot 6 companions and remove [2] to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Hunt Them Down!
card.lore: 'Do not stop until they are found!
card.game_text: Maneuver: Make an Uruk-hai fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Lurtz
card.subtitle: Servant of Isengard
card.lore: 'And now... perfected. Grown beyond the height of Men - straight-limbed and strong, fearing nothing.'
card.game_text: Archer. Damage +1. Maneuver: Spot another Uruk-hai to make Lurtz fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Lurtz
card.subtitle: Servant of Isengard
card.lore: 'And now... perfected. Grown beyond the height of Men - straight-limbed and strong, fearing nothing.'
card.game_text: Archer. Damage +1. Maneuver: Spot another Uruk-hai to make Lurtz fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Lurtz's Battle Cry
card.lore: 'Find the Halflings!'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make an Uruk-hai strength -1 and damage +1.

card.title: The Misadventure of Mr. Underhill
card.lore: 'You're drawing far too much attention to yourself... Mr. Underhill.'
card.game_text: To play, exert an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of each companion played to a site which is not a sanctuary is +2.

card.title: No Ordinary Storm
card.lore: 'So Gandalf... you try to lead them over Caradhras. And if that fails - where then will you go?'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time you play a weather condition, exert a [GANDALF] companion or [GANDALF] ally.

card.title: Orthanc Assassin
card.lore: Black-feathered arrows from Uruk-hai bows reign over the corpses of Saruman's enemies.
card.game_text: Archer. Damage +1.

card.title: Parry
card.lore: Even the sword of a powerful warrior can be parried by the strength of an Uruk-hai.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot an Uruk-hai to cancel the strength bonus from a possession until the regroup phase.

card.title: Saruman's Ambition
card.lore: 'I did not expect you to show wisdom, even in your own behalf; but I gave you the chance of aiding me willingly, and so saving yourself much trouble and pain.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of your [ISENGARD] events is -1. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make an Uruk-hai strength +2.

card.title: Saruman's Chill
card.lore: Saruman's hand can control the chill of winter.
card.game_text: Spell. Weather. To play, exert a [ISENGARD] minion. Plays on a site. Limit 1 per site. Each Hobbit who moves from this site must exert. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

card.title: Saruman's Frost
card.lore: The small and weak suffer first from the The White Wizard's powerful sorcery.
card.game_text: Spell. Weather. To play, exert a [ISENGARD] minion. Plays on a site. Limit 1 per site. Each Hobbit at this site is strength -2. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

card.title: Saruman's Power
card.lore: The Uruks of Saruman are bred to be the instruments of his will, destroying his enemies with foul cruelty.
card.game_text: Spell. Shadow: Exert a [ISENGARD] minion to discard all conditions.

card.title: Saruman's Reach
card.lore: Saruman used both magic and minions to impose his will.
card.game_text: Search. Maneuver: Exert an Uruk-hai to make the opponent choose to either exert 2 companions or make the Ring-bearer put on The One Ring until the regroup phase.

card.title: Saruman's Snows
card.notes: Lists: EXL. Game text is a clarification.
card.lore: Saruman's spells can hinder even the wary.
card.game_text: Spell. Weather. To play, exert a [ISENGARD] minion. Plays on a site. No player may play skirmish events or use skirmish special abilities during skirmishes at this site. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

card.title: Savagery to Match Their Numbers
card.notes: Lists: ERL, MXL. The strength +4 bonus lasts until the regroup phase.
card.lore: Uruk-hai match their enemies' strength with their own feral rage.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make an Uruk-hai strength +2, or spot 5 companions to make an Uruk-hai strength +4 and fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Spies of Saruman
card.lore: '...they are crebain out of Fangorn or Dunland. I do not know what they are about....'
card.game_text: To play, exert a [ISENGARD] minion. Plays on a site. While the fellowship is at this site, skip the archery phase. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

card.title: Their Arrows Enrage
card.lore: The ferocious charge of the Uruk-hai catches enemy archers groping for their swords.
card.game_text: To play, spot Saruman or an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. Each archer companion and archer ally is strength -1.

card.title: Traitor's Voice
card.lore: 'In all the long wars with the Dark Tower treason has ever been our greatest foe.'
card.game_text: Search. To play, spot an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. While the Ring-bearer is exhausted or you can spot 5 burdens, the move limit for this turn is -1 (to a minimum of 1).

card.title: Troop of Uruk-hai
card.lore: Attacking in swarming hordes, the Urukhai close with the enemy rapidly to make weapons useless.
card.game_text: Damage +1. A character skirmishing this minion does not gain strength bonuses from weapons.

card.title: Uruk Bloodlust
card.lore: 'Take them alive!'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Response: If your Uruk-hai wins a skirmish, remove [1] to heal him.

card.title: Uruk Brood
card.lore: 'He does not see the caverns hidden deep beneath this tower... nor does he know what is growing there.'
card.game_text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Remove [2] to make this minion strength +1 for each other Uruk-hai you spot.

card.title: Uruk Fighter
card.lore: Not stealth or cunning, but strength and ferocity are the weapons of Saruman's army of abominations.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Maneuver: Spot 5 companions to make this minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Uruk Guard
card.lore: 'SWolves and orcs were housed in Isengard, for Saruman was mustering a great force....'
card.game_text: Damage +1. Assignment: Exert this minion and spot a companion to prevent the opponent from assigning that companion to this minion.

card.title: Uruk Lieutenant
card.lore: Uruk-hai leaders gain savagery from their following hordes to maintain the rule of the strong.
card.game_text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each other Uruk-hai you can spot.

card.title: Uruk Messenger
card.lore: Saruman uses his Uruks abroad to gain information on the movements - and weaknesses - of his many enemies.
card.game_text: Damage +1. While you can spot a weather condition, this minion is strength +3.

card.title: Uruk Rager
card.lore: A bloodthirsty bellow from a huge Uruk can win a skirmish before it begins.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must discard the top 2 cards of his draw deck.

card.title: Uruk Savage
card.lore: 'The friendship of Saruman is not lightly thrown aside. One ill turn deserves another .... We have work to do.'
card.game_text: Damage +1.

card.title: Uruk Shaman
card.lore: Uruk shamans know the arts of healing as well as those of battle.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Maneuver: Remove [2] to heal an Uruk-hai.

card.title: Uruk Slayer
card.lore: A foe who is willing to kill or die outright is a foe to be feared indeed.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Remove [1] to make this minion strength +1 (limit +3).

card.title: Uruk Soldier
card.lore: Saruman's Uruk-hai band together as an extremely effective fighting unit.
card.game_text: Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may make the Free Peoples player discard the top card of his draw deck.

card.title: Uruk Spy
card.lore: A wary eye on the mission could undo the quest.
card.game_text: Response: If the Ring-bearer puts on The One Ring, exert this minion. Discard a card from the top of your draw deck for each [ISENGARD] minion you spot. Add a burden for each Shadow card discarded in this way.

card.title: Uruk Warrior
card.lore: Powerful and fearless, Uruk-hai warriors are not intimidated by the weapons or numbers of their enemies.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Maneuver: Spot 6 companions to make this minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Uruk-hai Armory
card.lore: The ranks of Saruman's army include forgers of weapons and armour.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. While you can spot an Uruk-hai, the fellowship archery total is -1.

card.title: Uruk-hai Raiding Party
card.lore: 'Imagine, Gandalf, an army - born from the earth of Isengard.'
card.game_text: Damage +1.

card.title: Uruk-hai Rampage
card.lore: Victory breeds rage in Saruman's foul creations.
card.game_text: To play, spot an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. Response: If your Uruk-hai wins a skirmish, remove [3] to make him fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Uruk-hai Sword
card.lore: Their malevolent strength worsens the wounds from the gruesome weapons of the Uruks.
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Uruk-hai. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must discard the top card of his draw deck.

card.title: Wariness
card.lore: Even Hobbits have trouble evading the Uruk-hai.
card.game_text: Search. Response: If a stealth event is played, exert or discard your Uruk-hai to cancel that event.

card.title: Worry
card.lore: 'One by one, regardless of their strength to good or evil... they fell.'
card.game_text: To play, exert an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving an Uruk-hai, the opponent must choose to either exert the Ring-bearer or add a burden.

card.title: Ancient Chieftain
card.lore: ...a huge orc-chieftain, almost man-high, clad in black mail from head to foot, leaped into the chamber; behind him his followers clustered in the doorway.
