card.game_text: For each other [MORIA] Orc you can spot, Ancient Chieftain is strength +1.

card.title: Bitter Hatred
card.lore: Bitter and long is the hatred of the Orcs for the Elves, and thus they prefer Elves as targets.
card.game_text: Archery: Spot a [MORIA] archer to wound an Elf.

card.title: Cave Troll of Moria
card.subtitle: Scourge of the Black Pit
card.lore: Frodo's quest nearly ended before his companions halted the Cave Troll's ferocious attack.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot a [MORIA] Orc. At an underground site, Cave Troll of Moria's twilight cost is -3.

card.title: Cave Troll of Moria
card.subtitle: Scourge of the Black Pit
card.lore: Frodo's quest nearly ended before his companions halted the Cave Troll's ferocious attack.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot a [MORIA] Orc. At an underground site, Cave Troll of Moria's twilight cost is -3.

card.title: Cave Troll's Hammer
card.lore: Suddenly the door burst into fragments and the Cave Troll was among them, his huge hammer striking like thunder.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Cave Troll of Moria. Cave Troll of Moria is damage +1.

card.title: Denizens Enraged
card.lore: ...there came a great noise: a rolling Boom that seemed to come from depths far below, and to tremble in the stone at their feet.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a [MORIA] Orc strength +1 for each other [MORIA] Orc you spot (limit +4).

card.title: Drums in the Deep
card.lore: The drum-beats broke out wildly: doomboom, doom-boom, and then stopped ... Doom, doom went the drum-beats again....
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a [MORIA] Orc strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing a Dwarf).

card.title: The End Comes
card.lore: 'They have taken the Bridge and the second hall; we have barred the gates -_but cannot hold them for long....'
card.game_text: Assignment: Spot 5 [MORIA] minions to make the Free Peoples player assign the Ring-bearer to a skirmish.

card.title: Fool of a Took!
card.lore: 'Fool of a Took! Throw yourself in next time and rid us of your stupidity!'
card.game_text: Shadow: Spot a Hobbit (except the Ring-bearer) to reveal cards from the top of your draw deck until you reveal one that is not a [MORIA] minion. Take the revealed cards into hand.

card.title: Frenzy
card.lore: The Goblins of the Misty Mountains, like all of their race, use their teeming numbers to slaughter their foes.
card.game_text: Assignment: Assign an exhausted companion (except the Ring-bearer) to skirmish a [MORIA] Orc.

card.title: Goblin Archer
card.lore: An arrow whistled over Frodo's head.
card.game_text: Archer. While you can spot another [MORIA] Orc, the fellowship archery total is -6.

card.title: Goblin Armory
card.lore: For scavenging vermin, the weapons of fallen foes are prized possessions.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time you play a [MORIA] weapon, add [1]. Response: If a [MORIA] Orc is about to take a wound, discard this condition to prevent that wound.

card.title: Goblin Backstabber
card.lore: An attack from behind provides a cowardly Goblin with a boldness much like courage.
card.game_text: This minion is damage +2 while in the same skirmish as another [MORIA] Orc.

card.title: Goblin Domain
card.lore: The once beautiful kingdom of Khazaddm has become Moria, the black pit.
card.game_text: Search. To play, spot a [MORIA] minion. Plays to your support area. Each time a companion is played to site 4 or higher, that companion comes into play exhausted.

card.title: Goblin Marksman
card.notes: Italic text within parentheses is descriptive only, and has no added gameplay effect.
card.lore: Arrows fell among them. One struck Frodo and sprang back. Another pierced Gandalf's hat and stuck there like a black feather.

card.title: Goblin Patrol Troop
card.lore: As they ran they heard the beat and echo of many hurrying feet behind. A shrill yell went up: they had been seen. There was a ring and clash of steel.

card.title: Goblin Runner
card.lore: ...a great horn was blown in the hall, and answering horns and harsh cries were heard further off. There was a hurrying sound of many feet.
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may add [2].

card.title: Goblin Scavengers
card.lore: 'The Orcs have often plundered Moria; there is nothing left in the upper halls.'
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may play a weapon from your discard pile on your [MORIA] Orc.

card.title: Goblin Scimitar
card.lore: Some of the swords were crooked: orcscimitars with blackened blades.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MORIA] Orc. When you play this possession, you may draw a card.

card.title: Goblin Sneak
card.lore: Their limber forms allow the Goblins of Moria to slither past barred doors and collapsed passageways.
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may place a [MORIA] Orc from your discard pile beneath your draw deck.

card.title: Goblin Spear
card.lore: Simple creatures with simple weapons can be as deadly as an armoured warrior with a fine sword.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MORIA] minion. If bearer kills a companion in a skirmish, add 1 burden (or 2 burdens if that companion was a Hobbit).

card.title: Goblin Swarms
card.lore: Beyond the fire he saw swarming black figures....
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Response: If your [MORIA] Orc wins a skirmish, discard cards and wounds on that Orc and stack that Orc on this condition. Shadow: Play an Orc stacked here as if played from hand.

card.title: Goblin Wallcrawler
card.lore: Skittering along the walls of Moria, Goblins attack without warning.
card.game_text: While at an underground site, this minion is strength +2. While you can spot another [MORIA] Orc, the fellowship archery total is -1.

card.title: Goblin Warrior
card.lore: The ancient enmity between Goblins and Dwarves burns brightly still.
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may discard a [DWARVEN] ally or [DWARVEN] condition.

card.title: Guard Commander
card.lore: His broad flat face was swart, his eyes were like coals, and his tongue was red....
card.game_text: Skirmish: Remove [3] to make a [MORIA] Orc strength +2.

card.title: Host of Thousands
card.lore: Killing one is no victory, since a dozen from the warrens below will take his place.
card.game_text: Shadow: Play a [MORIA] Orc from your discard pile.

card.title: The Long Dark
card.lore: 'So ended the attempt to retake Moria! It was valiant but foolish. The time is not come yet.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. When the fellowship moves to site 4 or 5, add [2] for each Dwarf companion. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make your [MORIA] Orc strength +2.

card.title: Lost to the Goblins
card.lore: Dwarven graves stood open in plundered disarray.
card.game_text: Response: If the Ring-bearer exerts or takes a wound, discard a card from the top of your draw deck for each [MORIA] minion you spot. For each Shadow card discarded in this way, add a burden (limit 3 burdens).

card.title: Moria Axe
card.lore: Goblins without scimitars wrest axes from the remains of fallen Dwarves.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MORIA] Orc. Bearer is damage +1. Skirmish: Exert bearer to make him strength +2.

card.title: Moria Scout
card.lore: Like their kindred in the North, the Orcs of Moria have keen noses, often following their prey by scent.
card.game_text: When you play this minion, spot an Elf to add [2].

card.title: Pinned Down
card.lore: Arrows whined and whistled down the corridor as he sprang back.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. While you can spot a [MORIA] archer, the fellowship archery total is -1.

card.title: Plundered Armories
card.notes: If a minion bearing a [MORIA] weapon is discarded due to losing a skirmish, Plundered Armories takes effect before optional actions triggered by winning/losing that skirmish occur. When an effect discards 'all ' minions (thereby discarding their weapons), they are discarded at the same time. None of those minions may have weapons played on them with Plundered Armories.
card.lore: The Goblins of Moria have oft plundered the deep armouries of Durin's folk.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Response: If your [MORIA] weapon is discarded, play it from your discard pile (that weapon's twilight cost is -1).

card.title: Relentless
card.lore: 'Then dig a hole in the ground,' said Legolas, 'if that is more after the fashion of your kind. But you must dig swift and deep, if you wish to hide from Orcs.'
card.game_text: Search. Response: If a stealth event is played, spot 3 [MORIA] minions to cancel that event.

card.title: Relics of Moria
card.lore: By both the doors they could now see that many bones were lying, and among them were broken swords and axe-heads, and cloven shields and helms.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove [2] to play a [MORIA] possession from your discard pile.

card.title: They Are Coming
card.lore: 'The last thing written is in a trailing scrawl of elf-letters: they are coming.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Discard 3 cards from hand to play a [MORIA] Orc from your discard pile.

card.title: Threat of the Unknown
card.lore: The danger of what lay hidden in the dark was more terrifying than the known perils of Moria.
card.game_text: Shadow: Exert your [MORIA] Orc to draw 2 cards.

card.title: Through the Misty Mountains
card.lore: 'One must tread the path that need chooses.'
card.game_text: Search. To play, exert a [MORIA] minion. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves to site 4, 5, or 6 and contains a Dwarf or Elf, the Free Peoples player discards 2 cards at random from hand.

card.title: Troll's Keyward
card.lore: Though shorter than a Man, the Troll's Keyward is a deadly adversary.
card.game_text: Cave Troll of Moria's twilight cost is -2.

card.title: The Underdeeps of Moria
card.lore: 'I am afraid Balin is buried deep, and maybe something else is buried there too.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove [3] to reveal the bottom card of your draw deck. If it is a [MORIA] Orc, take it into hand. Otherwise, discard it.

card.title: Unfamiliar Territory
card.lore: Knowing the dark terrain of Moria gives Orcs a strategic advantage when attacking their foes.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a [MORIA] Orc strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing an archer).

card.title: What Is This New Devilry?
card.lore: 'This foe is beyond any of you! Run!'
card.game_text: Search. To play, exert a [MORIA] Orc. Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at site 5 or higher, each companion's twilight cost is +2.

card.title: All Blades Perish
card.lore: '...all blades perish that pierce that dreadful King. More deadly to him was the name of Elbereth.'
card.game_text: Response: If a Nazgul is about to take a wound, prevent that wound.

card.title: All Veils Removed
card.lore: 'Give up the Halfling...!'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a Nazgul strength +2 (or +5 if the Ring-bearer wears The One Ring).

card.title: Beauty Is Fading
card.lore: '...the Three will fail, and many fair things will fade and be forgotten.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a Nazgul to discard a Free Peoples possession or Free Peoples condition. If you can spot no such card, discard an ally or companion (except the Ring-bearer) instead.

card.title: Bent on Discovery
card.lore: The riding figure sat quite still.... From inside the hood came a noise as of someone sniffing....
card.game_text: Search. Plays to your support area. At the beginning of each of your Shadow phases, draw 1 card. At the end of each of your Shadow phases, exert a Nazgul or discard this condition.

card.title: Black Breath
card.lore: Vile breath infects the living with Shadow.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to a character skirmishing a Nazgul. Burdens and wounds may not be removed from bearer.

card.title: Black Steed
card.lore: '...these horses are born and bred to the service of the Dark Lord in Mordor.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. While at a plains site, bearer is strength +2. Discard this possession when at an underground site.

card.title: Blade Tip
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Response: If your Nazgul wins a skirmish, transfer this condition from your support area to the losing character. Limit 1 per character. Wound bearer at the start of each fellowship phase. (If bearer is the Ring-bearer, add a burden instead )

card.title: Dark Whispers
card.lore: 'The Ring... The Ring... The Ring....'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Spot 3 burdens to make a Nazgul strength +1 and damage +1, or spot 6 burdens to make a Nazgul strength +3 and damage +2.

card.title: Drawn to Its Power
card.notes: Version: *. Game text is a clarification.
card.lore: 'And also the Ring drew them.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time a companion is killed in a skirmish involving a Nazgul, add a burden.

card.title: Fear
card.lore: 'Never has such a thing happened in my time! ... Guests unable to sleep in their beds, and good bolsters ruined and all! What are we coming to?'
card.game_text: Search. Maneuver: Exert your Nazgul to discard an ally.

card.title: Frozen by Fear
card.lore: ...he was quaking as if he was bitter cold, but his terror was swallowed up in a sudden temptation to put on the Ring.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a Nazgul strength +2 (or +3 if the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish that has not resolved).

card.title: In the Ringwraith's Wake
card.lore: 'He is fading.... We must get him to my father.'
card.game_text: Response: If a Nazgul wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player chooses to either exert the Ring-bearer or add a burden.

card.title: The Master's Will
card.lore: ...something seemed to be compelling him to disregard all warnings, and he longed to yield.
card.game_text: Search. Shadow: Spot X Nazgul to reveal the top X cards of your draw deck. Take into your hand all [WRAITH] cards revealed and discard the rest.

card.title: Morgul Blade
card.lore: The gates of Minas Morgul issued Nine Riders into the free lands, a blasphemy to ancient kings.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. This weapon may be borne in addition to 1 other hand weapon. Skirmish: Discard this possession to transfer Blade Tip from your support area or discard pile to a companion bearer is skirmishing.

card.title: Morgul Gates
card.game_text: Shadow: Play a Nazgul. His twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Nazgul Sword
card.lore: The weapons of the Nine are wielded by unseen hands willed by Sauron's hate.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. While you can spot 3 burdens, bearer is damage +1.

card.title: The Nine Servants of Sauron
card.lore: 'That Black Rider was looking for something ... or someone - Frodo?'
card.game_text: Search. Plays to your support area. Each time you play a Nazgul, you may exert a Hobbit (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Not Easily Destroyed
card.lore: 'They were Kings... great Kings of Men. Sauron gave to them Nine Rings of Power and with them the promise of eternal rule... unending life.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Maneuver or Skirmish: Remove [3] to heal a Nazgul.

card.title: The Pale Blade
card.lore: In his wretched grip, the Captain raised a Pale Sword.
card.game_text: Bearer must be The Witch-king. He is damage +1. Response: If The Witch-king wins a skirmish, exert him to discard a Free Peoples condition.

card.title: Paths Seldom Trodden
card.notes: This card can replace sites only in the Fellowship block format.
card.lore: 'You will have to leave the open road after tonight; for the horsemen will watch it night and day.'
card.game_text: Search. To play, spot a Nazgul. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove [3] to replace the fellowship's site with your version of the same site.

card.title: Relentless Charge
card.lore: Even the fastest arrows are of no avail against the Black Steeds of the Nine Riders.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a Nazgul to wound every archer companion.

card.title: Return to Its Master
card.notes: This card creates a skirmish in addition to regular and fierce skirmishes.
card.lore: 'The Riders made straight for you....';Response: If the Ring-bearer wears The One Ring at the end of a skirmish phase, cancel all remaining assignments and assign a Nazgul to skirmish the Ring-bearer
card.game_text: The One Ring's game text does not apply during this skirmish.

card.title: Sword of Minas Morgul
card.lore: The Morgul hilt seared the flesh that would touch it, but the pierce was painless.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Ulaire Lemenya. He is damage +1. Skirmish: Exert Ulaire Lemenya to discard a possession borne by a character he is skirmishing.

card.title: Their Power Is in Terror
card.lore: 'In dark and loneliness they are strongest... and already some in Bree are in their clutch.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a Nazgul to wound every ally.

card.title: Threshold of Shadow
card.lore: 'They did not need the guidance of their horses any longer: you had become visible to them....'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a Nazgul strength +2 (or +4 if you spot 5 burdens).

card.title: The Twilight World
card.lore: Immediately, though everything else remained as before, dim and dark, the shapes became terribly clear. He was able to see beneath their black wrappings.
card.game_text: Response: If Ring-bearer puts on The One Ring, exert a Nazgul to add 2 burdens.

card.title: Ulaire Attea
card.subtitle: Keeper of Dol Guldur
card.lore: Those that knew the most power as kings were placed in particular ways for the Will of Sauron.
card.game_text: Fierce. Skirmish: Remove [1] to make Ulaire Attea strength +1 (limit +5).

card.title: Ulaire Cantea
card.subtitle: Lieutenant of Dol Guldur
card.lore: The Ringwraith has no semblance to the Man, its being passed into twilight, life spirit into void.
card.game_text: Fierce. Skirmish: Exert Ulaire Cantea to discard a weapon borne by a character he is skirmishing.

card.title: Ulaire Enquea
card.subtitle: Lieutenant of Morgul
card.lore: The Nine Riders were embodiments of Sauron's will, searching all of Middle-earth for his prize.
card.game_text: Fierce. Maneuver: Spot 6 companions (or 5 burdens) and exert Ulaire Enquea to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Ulaire Enquea
card.subtitle: Lieutenant of Morgul
card.lore: The Nine Riders were embodiments of Sauron's will, searching all of Middle-earth for his prize.
card.game_text: Fierce. Maneuver: Spot 6 companions (or 5 burdens) and exert Ulaire Enquea to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Ulaire Lemenya
card.subtitle: Lieutenant of Morgul
card.lore: 'Do you wish them to find you? They are terrible!'
card.game_text: Each companion or ally who bears a [WRAITH] condition is strength -2.

card.title: Ulaire Nelya
card.subtitle: Lieutenant of Morgul
card.notes: Lists: EXL. This card can replace sites only in the Fellowship block format.
card.lore: Many of the Nine were princes of majesty and power.
card.game_text: Fierce. Shadow: Exert Ulaire Nelya and spot an opponent's site to replace it with your site of the same number.

card.title: Ulaire Nertea
card.subtitle: Messenger of Dol Guldur
card.notes: Lists: MXL. If two or more minions are played, the Shadow player decides in what order those minions are played.
card.lore: Some accepted Sauron's gift for glory and a notion of great deeds.
card.game_text: When you play Ulaire Nertea, for each companion over 4, you may play 1 minion from your discard pile.

card.title: Ulaire Otsea
card.subtitle: Lieutenant of Morgul
card.notes: Card title and game text are errata. Image fixed
card.lore: ...under their mantles were long grey robes; upon their grey hairs were helms of silver
card.game_text: in their haggard hands were swords of steel.

card.title: Ulaire Toldea
card.subtitle: Messenger of Morgul
card.lore: 'Open, in the name of Mordor!' said a voice thin and menacing.
card.game_text: Fierce. Assignment: Spot 4 burdens to assign a companion (except the Ring-bearer) to skirmish Ulaire Toldea.

card.title: The Witch-king
card.subtitle: Lord of Angmar
card.lore: ...his hair was long and gleaming and on his helm was a crown.
card.game_text: Fierce. For each other Nazgul you can spot, The Witch-king is strength +2.

card.title: The Witch-king
card.subtitle: Lord of Angmar
card.lore: ...his hair was long and gleaming and on his helm was a crown.
card.game_text: Fierce. For each other Nazgul you can spot, The Witch-king is strength +2.

card.title: Wreathed in Shadow
card.lore: They are beings in twilight, without form to catch the points of weapons.
card.game_text: To play, spot a Nazgul. Plays to your support area. Archery: Remove [1] to make the fellowship archery total -1.

card.title: All Thought Bent on It
card.lore: '...for the Ring yearns, above all else, to return to the hand of its Master: they are one....'
card.game_text: Search. Maneuver: Spot a [SAURON] Orc and 5 companions to make the Free Peoples player exert a companion for each companion over 4.

card.title: Band of the Eye
card.lore: Far more Orcs has Sauron bred in the pits under Barad-dr than Saruman could ever imagine.
card.game_text: Response: If this minion wins a skirmish, remove [2] to make the Free Peoples player discard a card at random from hand.

card.title: Curse From Mordor
card.lore: The Dark Lord harbors an ancient hatred for descendants of Gil-galad and those that marched with his gleaming host.
card.game_text: Shadow: Spot a [SAURON] Orc to discard an [ELVEN] condition.

card.title: The Dark Lord's Summons
card.lore: Orcs obey the Dark Lord unquestioningly.
card.game_text: Search. To play, spot a [SAURON] Orc. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove [3] to reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is a [SAURON] card, take it into hand. Otherwise, discard it and one other card from hand.

card.title: Despair
card.lore: 'The Nameless Enemy has arisen again. Smoke rises once more from Orodruin that we call Mount Doom.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: If the total number of burdens and companions in the dead pile is at least 12, spot a [SAURON] Orc to corrupt the Ring-bearer.

card.title: Desperate Defense of the Ring
card.lore: The Company must defend the Ring at all costs.
card.game_text: To play, exert a [SAURON] Orc. Plays on a companion. Each time bearer is assigned to a skirmish, the Free Peoples player chooses to either discard 3 cards from hand or add a burden.

card.title: Desperate Measures
card.lore: 'Go back, Sam. You can't swim. I'm going to Mordor alone.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot a [SAURON] Orc and remove a burden to make the Free Peoples player discard top 5 cards from his draw deck.

card.title: Enduring Evil
card.lore: 'The Dark Tower was broken, but its foundations were not removed; for they were made with the power of the Ring, and while it remains they will endure.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Spot X burdens to make a character skirmishing a [SAURON] Orc strength -X.

card.title: Enheartened Foe
card.lore: Orcs feed on their own success. The greater their exploits in battle, the greater their confidence grows.
card.game_text: Response: If a [SAURON] Orc wins a skirmish, make that Orc fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Forces of Mordor
card.lore: '....the Dark Lord is not without allies. The Easterlings and Haradrim now pay tribute to Mordor.'
card.game_text: Shadow: Spot X [SAURON] minions to add (X).

card.title: Gleaming Spires Will Crumble
card.lore: Gondor has long been a target for the wrath of Sauron the Great.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each [SAURON] Orc skirmishing a [GONDOR] character is strength +2. Discard this condition if your [SAURON] Orc loses a skirmish.

card.title: Hate
card.lore: Orcs are filled with hatred not only for their foes, but for all that lives.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a [SAURON] Orc to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: A Host Avails Little
card.notes: If you can spot 7 or more companions, you may wound the same companion more than once.
card.lore: 'Had I a host of Elves in armour of the Elder Days, it would avail little....'
card.game_text: Search. Maneuver: Spot a [SAURON] Orc and 6 companions to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Do this once for each companion over 5.

card.title: The Irresistible Shadow
card.lore: Once more the desire to slip on the Ring came over Frodo; but this time it was stronger than before.
card.game_text: To play, exert a [SAURON] Orc. Plays to your support area. If you can spot 5 burdens and the Free Peoples player has no cards in his or her draw deck, the Ring-bearer is corrupted.

card.title: Journey Into Danger
card.lore: 'I do not foretell, for all foretelling is now vain: on the one hand lies darkness, on the other only hope.'
card.game_text: Search. To play, exert a [SAURON] Orc. Plays to your support area. While you can spot 5 companions, each companion's twilight cost is +2.

card.title: Mordor Enraged
card.lore: The armies of Elendil and Gil-galad inflamed Sauron's anger and hatred.
card.game_text: Plays on a [SAURON] minion. Shadow: Exert bearer to add [1] for each archer companion.

card.title: Mordor's Strength
card.lore: 'It should have ended that day, but evil was allowed to endure.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert a [SAURON] Orc to wound a character he is skirmishing.

card.title: Morgul Hunter
card.lore: Sauron's hatred lives in the hearts of his minions.
card.game_text: For each companion you can spot, this minion is strength +1.

card.title: Morgul Hunter
card.lore: Sauron's hatred lives in the hearts of his minions.
card.game_text: For each companion you can spot, this minion is strength +1.

card.title: Morgul Skirmisher
card.lore: The Orcs of Mordor, heartened by the promise of blood and plunder, are dangerous foes in battle.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Remove [3] to exert a Hobbit (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Morgul Skulker
card.lore: Sly servants of the Ringwraiths of Morgul Vale, Morgul Orcs are alert to the desires of their masters.
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may shuffle up to 2 [WRAITH] cards from your discard pile into your draw deck.

card.title: Morgul Warden
card.lore: With blind devotion, the Orcs of Mordor follow orders issued from the Dark Tower.
card.game_text: For each other [SAURON] Orc you can spot, Morgul Warden is strength +1.

card.title: The Number Must Be Few
card.lore: 'The number must be few, since your hope is in speed and secrecy.'
card.game_text: Search. Plays to your support area. While you can spot 7 companions, the move limit for this turn is -1 (to a minimum of 1).

card.title: Orc Ambusher
card.notes: This Fellowship of the Ring card was misprinted in the Gimli Mines of Moria starter deck. The word 'non-native ' should be 'roaming. '
card.lore: 'Orcs will often pursue foes for many leagues....'
card.game_text: Tracker. The roaming penalty for each [SAURON] minion you play is -1. Response: If a Free Peoples regroup event is played, exert this minion to cancel that event.

card.title: Orc Assassin
card.notes: This Fellowship of the Ring card was misprinted in the Gimli Mines of Moria starter deck. The word 'non-native ' should be 'roaming. '
card.game_text: Tracker. The roaming penalty for each [SAURON] minion you play is -1. Assignment: Spot 2 Hobbit companions to make the Free Peoples player assign a Hobbit to skirmish this minion.

card.title: Orc Banner
card.lore: Tribes of Orcs from throughout Mordor rally to the banner of the Dark Tower.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish that involves a [SAURON] Orc, each [SAURON] Orc is strength +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Orc Bowmen
card.lore: Where volleys of Orcish arrows fly, the defenders of the West fall.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. While you can spot a [SAURON] Orc, add 1 to the minion archery total.

card.title: Orc Butchery
card.lore: For sport, Orcs hew cruelly at the bodies of those they slay.
card.game_text: Response: If a companion is killed by a [SAURON] Orc, the Free Peoples player must discard 3 cards from the top of his draw deck for each card in the dead pile.

card.title: Orc Chieftain
card.lore: Orc chieftains are the most cruel of a heartless race. Both strength and malice are needed to lead such followers.
card.game_text: When you play a weapon on this minion, add [2] (limit once per turn).

card.title: Orc Hunters
card.lore: Bred for battle, Sauron's soldiers live for the thrill of the fight - and the spoils of victory.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a character he is skirmishing.

card.title: Orc Inquisitor
card.lore: Cruel questioners of Mordor tore the secret from poor Gollum, that Sauron's most prized possession once again was found.
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may make the Free Peoples player discard a card at random from hand.

card.title: Orc Scimitar
card.lore: An Orc's weapon reflects his passion for war and cruelty.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [SAURON] Orc. Skirmish: Remove [1] to make bearer strength +1 (limit +3).

card.title: Orc Scouting Band
card.lore: The cunning ambushes of the Orc armies rely upon scouts first finding the enemy.
card.game_text: Tracker. The roaming penalty for each [SAURON] minion you play is -1. Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a character it is skirmishing.

card.title: Orc Soldier
card.lore: Bearing cruel weapons, Orcs go forth from Mordor to serve the Eye.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a character he is skirmishing.

card.title: Orc War Band
card.lore: Sauron has countless armies of Orcs at his disposal.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a character it is skirmishing.

card.title: The Ring's Oppression
card.lore: The Ring that hung upon its chain about his neck grew heavy, heavier than a great stone, and his head was dragged downwards.
card.game_text: Response: If a [SAURON] Orc kills a companion, add 1 burden (or 3 if the Ring-bearer wears The One Ring).

card.title: Sauron's Defenses
card.lore: Sauron's minions are everywhere. Few roads escape the gaze of the Lidless Eye.
card.game_text: To play, exert [SAURON] a Orc. Plays to your support area. While there are 3 or more companions in the dead pile, the move limit for this turn is -1 (to a minimum of 1).

card.title: Seeking It Always
card.lore: '...the only measure that he knows is desire, desire for power; and so he judges all hearts.'
card.game_text: Search. Plays to your support area. Response: If a stealth event is played, exert a [SAURON] tracker to cancel that event.

card.title: Seeking Its Master
card.lore: 'This at least is plain: the evil of the Ring is already at work even in the Company, and the Ring must leave them before it does more harm.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Exert a [SAURON] Orc and remove [2] to draw a card.

card.title: Shadow's Reach
card.lore: 'Is it secret? Is it safe?'
card.game_text: Shadow: Exert a [SAURON] Orc to discard a Free Peoples condition.

card.title: Strength Born of Fear
card.lore: Fear of death in Barad-dr's dungeons spurs Mordor's servants to even greater savagery.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Remove [3] to make a [SAURON] Orc strength +1.

card.title: Thin and Stretched
card.lore: 'I am old, Gandalf. I don't look it....'
card.game_text: To play, exert a [SAURON] Orc. Plays on the Ring-bearer. Add a burden at the end of each turn during which bearer was not assigned to a skirmish (and another companion was).

card.title: Tower Lieutenant
card.lore: Sauron shows favour to those in his dungeons with the ambition to squeeze the information he needs from those caught spying out his borders.
card.game_text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player discards 2 cards at random from hand.

card.title: Under the Watching Eye
card.lore: What the Lidless Eye of Sauron does not see, his countless minions observe and report.
card.game_text: Search. To play, exert a [SAURON] tracker. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion.

card.title: The Weight of a Legacy
card.lore: 'It is because of Men, the Ring survives .... I was there the day the strength of Men failed.'
card.game_text: To play, exert a [SAURON] Orc. Plays on Aragorn.

card.title: You Bring Great Evil
card.lore: 'And what is this? We have not had dealings with the Dwarves since the Dark Days.'
card.game_text: To play, spot a [SAURON] Orc. Plays on a companion (except an Elf). While at a sanctuary, bearer cannot heal.

card.title: Bilbo
card.subtitle: Retired Adventurer
card.notes: Card title is an erratum. Image fixed
card.lore: '...I don't suppose I have the strength or luck left to deal with the Ring. It has grown, and I have not.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert Bilbo to shuffle a [SHIRE] card from your discard pile into your draw deck.

card.title: Bilbo's Pipe
card.lore: Bilbo has a fine pipe, carved for him by his Dwarven friends.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Fellowship: Discard a pipeweed possession and spot X pipes to shuffle X tales from your discard pile into your draw deck.

card.title: Bounder
card.lore: 'Aye, reckon we're in for a quiet night ... mind how you go.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert this ally to prevent a Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless that Hobbit's strength is tripled.

card.title: Extraordinary Resilience
card.lore: 'Don't despair!' said Strider. 'You must trust me now. Your Frodo is made of sterner stuff than I had guessed....'
card.game_text: Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to heal, remove a burden instead.

card.title: Farmer Maggot
card.subtitle: Chaser of Rascals
card.lore: 'Old Maggot is really a stout fellow - if you leave his mushrooms alone.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert Farmer Maggot to heal Merry or Pippin.

card.title: Frodo
card.subtitle: Old Bilbo's Heir
card.lore: 'But be that as it may, Mr. Frodo is as nice a young hobbit as you could wish to meet.'
card.game_text: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). At the start of each of your turns, you may heal a Hobbit ally.

card.title: Frodo
card.subtitle: Son of Drogo
card.lore: 'I think you'll find there's more to this Hobbit than meets the eye.'
card.game_text: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). Fellowship: Exert another companion who has the Frodo signet to heal Frodo.

card.title: The Gaffer
card.subtitle: Sam's Father
card.lore: No one had a more attentive audience than old Ham Gamgee, commonly known as the Gaffer. He held forth at The Ivy Bush, a small inn on the Bywater road; and he spoke with some authority, for he had tended the garden at Bag End for forty yea
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert The Gaffer to heal Frodo or Sam.

card.title: The Gaffer's Pipe
card.lore: 'This ... is the one art that we certainly claim to be our own invention. When Hobbits first began to smoke is not known....'
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Fellowship: Discard a pipeweed possession and spot X pipes to remove (X).

card.title: Halfling Deftness
card.lore: ...though they are inclined to be fat and do not hurry unnecessarily, they are nonetheless nimble and deft in their movements.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert a Hobbit to make him strength +3.

card.title: Hobbit Appetite
card.lore: 'What about Elevenses, Luncheon, Afternoon Tea and Supper - he knows about them, doesn't he?'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Add (X) to heal a Hobbit companion X times.

card.title: Hobbit Farmer
card.lore: '...where our hearts truly lie is in peace and quiet and good-tilled earth....'
card.game_text: While you can spot your site 1, this ally has the game text of that site. Fellowship: Exert this ally and spot opponent's site 1 to replace it with your site 1.

card.title: Hobbit Intuition
card.lore: 'What? That were just a little detour, that's all ... a shortcut.'
card.game_text: Stealth. Skirmish: At sites 1 to 4, cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit. At any other site, make a Hobbit strength +3.

card.title: Hobbit Party Guest
card.lore: 'More promising still (to the hobbits' mind): an enourmous open-air kitchen was erected....'
card.game_text: At the start of each of your turns, heal this ally. Fellowship: Exert this ally to heal another Hobbit ally whose home is site 1.

card.title: Hobbit Stealth
card.lore: They possessed from the first the art of disappearing swiftly and silently, when large folk whom they do not wish to meet come blundering by....
card.game_text: Stealth. Skirmish: At sites 1 to 5, cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit. At any other site, make a Hobbit strength +2.

card.title: Hobbit Sword
card.lore: 'Strap these on....'
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Hobbit.

card.title: Longbottom Leaf
card.lore: Longbottom Leaf is the pipeweed enjoyed by most Hobbits throughout the Shire.
card.game_text: Pipeweed. Plays to your support area. When you play this possession, you may discard up to 2 cards from hand.

card.title: Master Proudfoot
card.subtitle: Distant Relative of Bilbo
card.lore: His name, of course, was Proudfoot, and well merited; his feet were large, exceptionally furry....
card.game_text: Fellowship: If the twilight pool has fewer than 3 twilight tokens, add [2] to reveal the top 3 cards of your draw deck. Take all [SHIRE] cards revealed into hand and discard the rest.

card.title: Merry
card.subtitle: Friend to Sam
card.lore: 'We're coming too! You'll have to send us home tied up in a sack to stop us!'
card.game_text: Skirmish: If Merry is not assigned to a skirmish, exert him twice to add his strength to another companion.

card.title: Merry
card.subtitle: From O'er the Brandywine
card.lore: 'I don't know why he's so upset, it's only a few carrots ... my point is, he's overreacting.'
card.game_text: While Merry bears a weapon, he is strength +2.

card.title: Noble Intentions
card.lore: 'You carry the fate of us all, little one .... If this is indeed the will of the Council, then Gondor will see it done.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert a companion (except a Hobbit) to make a Hobbit strength +3.

card.title: Old Toby
card.lore: Bilbo's favorite pipeweed is Old Toby, the finest weed in the Southfarthing.
card.game_text: Pipeweed. Plays to your support area. When you play this possession, you may draw a card.

card.title: Pippin
card.subtitle: Friend to Frodo
card.lore: 'Baggins? Sure I know a Baggins - Frodo's my second cousin once-removed, on his mother's side and my third cousin twice-removed on his father's side, if you follow me.'
card.game_text: Your opponent may not discard your [SHIRE] tales from play.

card.title: Pippin
card.subtitle: Hobbit of Some Intelligence
card.lore: 'Anyway, you need people of intelligence on this sort of mission... quest... thing.'
card.game_text: When you play Pippin, remove a burden or wound from a companion.

card.title: Power According to His Stature
card.lore: 'The ring had given him power according to his stature.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Add 1 burden to wound each minion skirmishing the Ring-bearer.

card.title: Rosie Cotton
card.subtitle: Hobbiton Lass
card.lore: 'Go on Sam, ask Rosie for a dance.'
card.game_text: Sam is strength +1. Fellowship: Exert Rosie Cotton to heal Sam.

card.title: Sam
card.subtitle: Faithful Companion
card.lore: 'Mr. Frodo's not going anywhere without me!'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Play Bill the Pony from your draw deck. Response: If Frodo dies, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.title: Sam
card.subtitle: Son of Hamfast
card.lore: 'Oh, I've never held a girl's hand before. I ... I think I might just have myself another ale.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert Sam to remove a burden. Response: If Frodo dies, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.title: Sorry About Everything
card.lore: 'I am sorry that I brought this upon you ... sorry you must carry this burden.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert a Hobbit companion to remove a burden.

card.title: Sting
card.lore: 'This is Sting .... Take it, if you like.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Frodo. Fellowship or Regroup: Exert Frodo to reveal an opponent's hand. Remove [1] for each Orc revealed (limit [4]).

card.title: Stone Trolls
card.lore: For a couple o' pins,' says Troll, and grins, / 'I'll eat thee too, and gnaw thy shins. / A bit o' fresh meat will go down sweet!'
card.game_text: Tale. To play, spot Bilbo. Plays on any character. Limit 1 per character. Each time bearer skirmishes a Troll or Uruk-hai, bearer is strength +3.

card.title: Stout and Sturdy
card.lore: 'You have a stout heart, little hobbit, but your courage alone will not save you.'
card.game_text: Maneuver or Skirmish: Heal a Hobbit.

card.title: A Talent for Not Being Seen
card.lore: With their small size, Hobbits use any hole to hide in, and their trail is difficult to detect.
card.game_text: Stealth. To play, exert a Hobbit. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, spot 2 Hobbit companions to make the shadow number -1 (or spot 4 to make it -2).

card.title: There and Back Again
card.lore: 'So there I was - at the mercy of three monstrous trolls....'
card.game_text: Tale. Bearer must be a Hobbit companion. Maneuver: Discard this condition to make each Hobbit companion strength +2 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Thror's Map
card.lore: Bilbo still keeps a map of Erebor, the Lonely Mountain, as a memento of his journey with the Dwarves many years ago.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Fellowship or Regroup: Exert 2 Hobbits and discard Thror's Map to play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

card.title: Bag End
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert a Hobbit to play The Gaffer from your draw deck.

card.title: East Road
card.game_text: Each companion's twilight cost is +2

card.title: Farmer Maggot's Fields
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert a Hobbit to play Merry or Pippin from your draw deck.

card.title: Green Dragon Inn
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert a Hobbit to play Sam from your draw deck.

card.title: Green Hill Country
card.game_text: The twilight cost of each Hobbit is -1.

card.title: The Prancing Pony
card.game_text: Fellowship: Add a burden to play Aragorn from your draw deck.

card.title: Shire Lookout Point
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to play Gandalf's Cart from your draw deck.

card.title: Westfarthing
card.lore: ;Fellowship: Exert a Hobbit to play a companion or ally
card.game_text: that character's twilight cost is -1.

card.title: Bree Gate
card.game_text: While you can spot a ranger, the move limit is +1 for this turn.

card.title: Bree Streets
card.game_text: The roaming penalty for each Nazgul you play to Bree Streets is -2.

card.title: Breeland Forest
card.game_text: Forest. Stealth events may not be played.

card.title: Buckleberry Ferry
card.game_text: River. While only Hobbits are in the fellowship, there are no assignment and skirmish phases at Buckleberry Ferry.

card.title: Ettenmoors
card.notes: Version: *. Game text is a clarification.
card.game_text: Plains. Skirmish: Exert your companion or minion to make that character strength +2.

card.title: Midgewater Marshes
card.game_text: Marsh. Each time a Hobbit moves to Midgewater Marshes, that Hobbit must exert.

card.title: Midgewater Moors
card.game_text: Plains. Each time a minion is played, the Free Peoples player discards a card from hand.

card.title: Trollshaw Forest
card.game_text: Forest. Each time you play a possession or artifact on your companion, draw a card.

card.title: Weatherhills
card.game_text: Each Nazgul's twilight cost is -1.

card.title: Weathertop
card.game_text: Each Nazgul at Weathertop is fierce.

card.title: Council Courtyard
card.game_text: Sanctuary. When the fellowship moves from Council Courtyard, remove [2].

card.title: Ford of Bruinen
card.game_text: River. Sanctuary. The twilight cost of the first Nazgul played to Ford of Bruinen each turn is -5.

card.title: Frodo's Bedroom
card.game_text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Play a Hobbit to draw a card.

card.title: Rivendell Terrace
card.game_text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Play a Man to draw a card.

card.title: Rivendell Valley
card.game_text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Play an Elf to draw a card.

card.title: Rivendell Waterfall
card.game_text: Forest. Sanctuary. While you can spot a ranger at Rivendell Waterfall, the move limit is +1 for this turn.

card.title: Balin's Tomb
card.game_text: Underground. Maneuver: Discard your tale from play or from hand to heal your companion.

card.title: Dwarrowdelf Chamber
card.game_text: Underground. When the fellowship moves to Dwarrowdelf Chamber, Gimli or 2 other companions must exert.

card.title: Mithril Mine
card.game_text: Underground. Shadow: Remove [1] to play a Shadow weapon from your discard pile.

card.title: Moria Lake
card.game_text: Marsh. When the fellowship moves to Moria Lake, Frodo or 2 other companions must exert.

card.title: Moria Stairway
card.game_text: Underground. Each companion and minion bearing a hand weapon is damage +1.

card.title: Pass of Caradhras
card.game_text: Mountain. Shadow: Spot a [ISENGARD] minion to play a weather card from your draw deck (limit one per turn).

card.title: The Bridge of Khazad-dum
card.lore: ;Underground. Shadow: Play The Balrog from your draw deck or hand
card.game_text: The Balrog's twilight cost is -6.

card.title: Dimrill Dale
card.game_text: Sanctuary. The twilight cost of the first [MORIA] Orc played each Shadow phase is -2.

card.title: Galadriel's Glade
card.game_text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Exert an Elf to look at an opponent's hand.

card.title: Lothlorien Woods
card.game_text: Forest. Sanctuary. Each ally whose home is site 6 is strength +3.

card.title: Anduin Confluence
card.game_text: River. When the fellowship moves to Anduin Confluence, discard every ally.

card.title: Anduin Wilderland
card.game_text: Forest. River. While the fellowship is at Anduin Wilderland, skip the archery phase.

card.title: Silverlode Banks
card.game_text: River. When the fellowship moves to Silverlode Banks without a ranger, every companion must exert.

card.title: Anduin Banks
card.game_text: River. For each companion in the fellowship over 4, add 2 to the minion archery total.

card.title: Brown Lands
card.game_text: River. For each minion archer at Brown Lands, the minion archery total is +1 (limit +4).

card.title: Pillars of the Kings
card.game_text: River. Fellowship: Discard a [GONDOR] card from hand to heal a [GONDOR] companion.

card.title: Shores of Nen Hithoel
card.game_text: River. Shadow: Spot 5 Orc minions to prevent the fellowship from moving again this turn.

card.title: Emyn Muil
card.notes: Version: *. Game text is a clarification.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert your minion to make that minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Slopes of Amon Hen
card.game_text: The twilight cost of each [ISENGARD] minion is -1.

card.title: Summit of Amon Hen
card.game_text: When the fellowship moves to Summit of Amon Hen, each Shadow player may draw a card for each burden.

card.title: Tol Brandir
card.lore: ;River. Shadow: Play up to 3 trackers from your discard pile
card.game_text: end your Shadow phase.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: The Grey Wizard
card.lore: ...his long white hair, his sweeping silver beard, and his broad shoulders, made him look like some wise king of ancient legend.
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert Gandalf to play a companion who has the Gandalf signet. The twilight cost of that companion is -2.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: King in Exile
card.lore: 'He turned from that path a long time ago. He has chosen exile....'
card.game_text: Ranger. At the start of each of your turns, you may heal another companion who has the Aragorn signet.

card.title: The Lord of the Rings
card.subtitle: Trading Card Game
card.notes: Oversized. Decipher, Inc. is proud to present... The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game. Coming November 6th, 2001.

card.title: The Lord of the Rings
card.subtitle: Trading Card Game
card.notes: Oversized. Release schedule for the first nine sets: 1. The Fellowship of the Ring - November 2001. 2. Mines of Moria - March 2002. 3. Realms of the Elf-lords - July 2002. 4. The Two Towers - November 2002. 5. Battle of Helm's Deep - March 2003. 6. Ents of Fangorn - July 2003. 7. The Return of the King - November 2003. 8. Siege of Gondor - March 2004. 9. Mount Doom - July 2004

card.title: Lurtz
card.subtitle: Servant of Isengard
card.game_text: Archer. Damage +1. Maneuver: Spot another Uruk-hai to make Lurtz fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Beneath the Mountains
card.lore: 'There forged was blade, and bound was hilt; / The delver mined, the mason built.'
card.game_text: Tale. Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Discard the top 3 cards from your draw deck to play a [DWARVEN] weapon from your discard pile.

card.title: Disquiet of Our People
card.lore: 'Ah, alas!...When will the day come of our revenge?'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a Dwarf to make that Dwarf defender +1 (or defender +2 if you spot an Orc) until the regroup phase.

card.title: Dwarven Bracers
card.lore: Dwarven-smiths forge bracers for fit and agility.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, discard this possession to prevent that wound.

card.title: Endurance of Dwarves
card.lore: 'Dwarves too can go swiftly, and they do not tire sooner than Orcs.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make bearer strength +1.

card.title: Flurry of Blows
card.lore: With a second axe, a warrior of Erebor can parry on either flank and counter quickly.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or +4 and damage +1 if bearing 2 hand weapons).

card.title: Fror
card.subtitle: Gimli's Kinsman
card.lore: It appeared that amid the splendour of their works of hand the hearts of the Dwarves of the Lonely Mountain were troubled.
card.game_text: To play, spot a Dwarf. While skirmishing an Uruk-hai, Fror is strength +3.

card.title: Gloin
card.subtitle: Friend to Thorin
card.lore: 'But what then would happen, if the Ruling Ring were destroyed, as you counsel?'
card.game_text: For each [DWARVEN] tale you can spot, Gloin is strength +1 (limit +4).

card.title: Golden Light on the Land
card.lore: 'The Orcs will not, maybe, come out till after dusk, but we must be far away before nightfall.'
card.game_text: To play, spot a Dwarf. Plays to your support area. At a site which is not underground, each [MORIA] Orc's twilight cost is +2. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.

card.title: Great Works Begun There
card.lore: 'Moria! Moria!... Long have its vast mansions lain empty since the children of Durin fled.'
card.game_text: Tale. Plays to your support area. Each time you play a Dwarf, you may discard the top 2 cards from your draw deck to take a [DWARVEN] event into hand from your discard pile.

card.title: Hand Axe
card.lore: Their captain rallied two other orcs to attack. In answer, Gimli's side axe brought him down.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. This weapon may be borne in addition to 1 other hand weapon. Archery: Discard this weapon to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.title: Make Light of Burdens
card.lore: A Dwarf does not readily notice the weight on his back, or in his heart.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Exert a Dwarf companion and discard the top 3 cards from your draw deck to discard either a Shadow condition from a Dwarf or a weather condition.

card.title: Realm of Dwarrowdelf
card.lore: 'There must have been a mighty crowd of dwarves here... and every one of them busier than badgers....'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Discard the top 3 cards from your draw deck to make a Dwarf strength +1 (limit +3) and, if underground, damage +1 (limit +3).

card.title: Tidings of Erebor
card.lore: '...we have so far been fortunate, though we do not escape the shadow of these times.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Spot a Dwarf to draw 3 cards. Any Shadow player may remove [3] to prevent this.

card.title: Till Durin Wakes Again
card.lore: Gimli was silent. Having sung his song, he would say no more.
card.game_text: Tale. Plays to your support area. Each time a Dwarf companion moves from an underground site, you may heal that Dwarf.

card.title: What Are We Waiting For?
card.notes: If a second copy of this card is played and that Shadow player has already chosen to skip his or her next Shadow phase, that player may choose to skip the same Shadow phase again (which has no effect).
card.lore: 'It is not despair, for despair is only for those who see the end beyond all doubt.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert a Dwarf to make an opponent draw 2 cards. That player then chooses to either discard 2 Shadow cards from hand or skip his or her next Shadow phase.

card.title: A Blended Race
card.lore: '...he has been doing something to them.... For these Isengarders are more like wicked Men.'
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Plays to your support area. Each Uruk-hai is strength -2 and loses all damage bonuses. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.

card.title: Dismay Our Enemies
card.lore: Reeling from the bite of an arrow, the Cave Troll became enraged trying to strike the nimble Elf.
card.game_text: Response: If an Elf archer wins a skirmish, make an opponent choose a minion to discard. That opponent may remove [3] to prevent this.

card.title: Hosts of the Last Alliance
card.lore: '...many great princes and captains were assembled.'
card.game_text: Tale. Plays to your support area. While you can spot an Elf companion, the minion archery total is -1. Response: If an Elf is about to take a wound, discard this condition to prevent that wound.

card.title: Release the Angry Flood
card.lore: The three Riders that were still in the midst of the Ford were overwhelmed.... Their piercing cries were drowned in the roaring of the river as it carried them away.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert an Elf to wound each Nazgul once (or twice if at a river).

card.title: Secret Sentinels
card.lore: 'Yet so little faith and trust do we find now in the world beyond Lothlrien... that we dare not by our own trust endanger our land.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert an Elf ally to discard a condition (or 2 conditions if you spot an Orc).

card.title: Erland
card.subtitle: Advisor to Brand
card.lore: 'They are good folk the Bardings. The grandson of Bard the Bowman rules them, Brand son of Bain son of Bard.'
card.game_text: To play, spot Gandalf. Shadow players may not look at or reveal cards in your hand.

card.title: Gandalf's Staff
card.lore: As the wizard passed on ahead up the great steps, he held his staff aloft, and from its tip there came a faint radiance.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. The twilight cost of each [GANDALF] spell is -1. Skirmish: Exert Gandalf twice to cancel a skirmish involving him.

card.title: Gandalf's Wisdom
card.lore: Now as the companions sat or walked together they spoke of Gandalf, and all that each had known and seen of him came clear before their minds.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of each possession or artifact played on Gandalf or a character who has the Gandalf signet is -1.

card.title: Hugin
card.subtitle: Emissary from Laketown
card.lore: Several wise Bardings were sent to Elrond to tell of the Dark Lord's new offer.
card.game_text: To play, spot Gandalf. Fellowship: Exert Hugin to reveal a Free Peoples card from your discard pile and place it beneath your draw deck.

card.title: Jarnsmid
card.subtitle: Merchant from Dale
card.lore: The Men of Dale freely traded with the Dwarves of the Lonely Mountain for fine metalwork.
card.game_text: To play, spot Gandalf. Each time you play a shield, armor, helm, or hand weapon, its twilight cost is -1.

card.title: Speak Friend and Enter
card.lore: Picking up his staff he stood before the rock and said in a clear voice: Mellon!
card.game_text: Fellowship or Regroup: Spot Gandalf to play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary). Draw a card if you play an underground site.

card.title: Staff Asunder
card.lore: At that moment Gandalf lifted his staff, and crying aloud he smote the bridge before him.
card.game_text: Spell. Skirmish: Discard a staff Gandalf is bearing and then exert him twice to discard a minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Wielder of the Flame
card.lore: The Balrog made no answer. The fire in it seemed to die, but the darkness grew.
card.game_text: Spell. Maneuver: Spot Gandalf to make a companion defender +1 until the regroup phase. Any Shadow player may remove [3] to prevent this.

card.title: Wizard Staff
card.lore: 'We must have power - power to order things as we will for that Good which only the Wise can see.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Wizard. Skirmish: Exert bearer twice to make a minion strength -3.

card.title: You Cannot Pass!
card.lore: The Balrog fell back and its sword flew up in molten fragments. The wizard swayed on the bridge, stepped back a pace, and then again stood still.
card.game_text: Spell. Maneuver: Spot Gandalf bearing a staff to prevent a minion from being fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Blood of Numenor
card.lore: 'I do not know what strength is in my blood, but I swear to you - I will not let the White City fall....'
card.game_text: To play, exert a [GONDOR] companion. Plays to your support area. Each [SAURON] Orc comes into play exhausted. Skip the archery phase. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.

card.title: Flaming Brand
card.lore: ...a glimpse of Strider leaping out of the darkness with a flaming brand of wood in either hand.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Man. This weapon may be borne in addition to 1 other hand weapon. Bearer is strength +2 and damage +1 while skirmishing a Nazgul.

card.title: Flee in Terror
card.lore: Aragorn smote to the ground the captain that stood in his path, and the rest fled in terror of his wrath.
card.game_text: Response: If a [GONDOR] companion wins a skirmish, discard an exhausted Orc. That minion's owner may remove [3] to prevent this.

card.title: Gondor Will See It Done
card.lore: 'Boromir!... Go after those two young hobbits, and guard them at the least, even if you cannot find Frodo.'
card.game_text: Response: If a companion is about to take a wound, exert a [GONDOR] companion to prevent that wound.

card.title: Natural Cover
card.lore: The tree, the bough, the leaf. To a ranger, these are all defenses against the enemy.
card.game_text: To play, spot a ranger. Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at a forest, the minion archery total is -2.

card.title: No Mere Ranger
card.lore: 'If by my life or death, I can protect you, I will....'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert Aragorn to make another companion strength +2 (or +3 if that companion has the Aragorn signet).

card.title: Sentinels of Numenor
card.lore: ...they still preserved through the suns and rains of forgotten years the mighty likenesses in which they had been hewn.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a [GONDOR] companion strength +2 (or +4 if in a fierce skirmish).

card.title: Shield of Boromir
card.lore: Boromir bore the heirlooms of the Steward's house with pride.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] companion. The minion archery total is -1. If bearer is Boromir, each minion skirmishing him does not gain strength bonuses from weapons.

card.title: Beyond the Height of Men
card.lore: 'Whom do you serve?'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert an Uruk-hai to discard an armor possession, helm possession, or shield possession (or all such Free Peoples possessions if you can spot 6 companions).

card.title: Demands of the Sackville-Bagginses
card.lore: In the middle of the commotion, the Sackville-Bagginses arrived.
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ISENGARD] minion. Plays to your support area. Each time a [SHIRE] ally exerts, add [1].

card.title: Evil Afoot
card.lore: 'It is not the Eastern Shore I am worried about. A shadow and a threat has been growing in my mind. Something draws near, I can feel it.'
card.game_text: Shadow: Exert an Uruk-hai and spot X burdens to shuffle X minions from your discard pile into your draw deck.

card.title: Goblin Man
card.lore: 'He looks more than half like a goblin.'
card.game_text: Discard this minion if underground. Shadow: Exert this minion to look at the Free Peoples player's hand.

card.title: Lurtz's Sword
card.lore: The Uruk giant laid down his bow and drew a broad-bladed weapon.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Lurtz. He is damage +1. Each time Lurtz wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must discard the top 2 cards of his or her draw deck.

card.title: No Business of Ours
card.lore: 'Goblins? Cobblers! Far-off tales and children's stories, that's all that is!'
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ISENGARD] minion. Plays to your support area. The Free Peoples player may not look at or reveal cards in any Shadow player's hand.

card.title: Too Much Attention
card.lore: 'A little more caution from you - that is not a trinket you carry.'
card.game_text: Response: If the Ring-bearer puts on The One Ring, spot an [ISENGARD] minion to make the Free Peoples player discard the top 5 cards of his or her draw deck.

card.title: Uruk Captain
card.lore: The captains marched the Uruk-hai to the great river without halting.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Shadow: Remove [1] and exert Uruk Captain to play an Uruk-hai from your discard pile.

card.title: Uruk Scout
card.notes: The special ability of this minion may only cancel an event that specifically requires a ranger in its game text.
card.lore: Forward Uruk troops caught the fellowship unaware.
card.game_text: Tracker. Damage +1. The roaming penalty for each [ISENGARD] minion you play is -1. Response: If an event is played that spots or exerts a ranger, exert this minion to cancel that event.

card.title: Wizard Storm
card.lore: There was a black look in the sky, and the sun was wan. The wind had gone now round to the north-east.
card.game_text: Spell. Weather. To play, exert an [ISENGARD] minion. Plays on a site. Limit 1 per site. When the fellowship moves from this site, every companion must exert. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

card.title: Archer Commander
card.lore: Their commander led the Goblin bowmen to the highest rise across the gap.
card.game_text: Archer. Each other [MORIA] archer is strength +2.

card.title: The Balrog's Sword
card.lore: In its right hand was a blade like a stabbing tongue of fire....
card.game_text: Bearer must be The Balrog. It is damage +1. This weapon may be borne in addition to 1 other hand weapon.

card.title: The Balrog
card.subtitle: Durin's Bane
card.lore: 'Indeed I saw upon the bridge that which haunts our darkest dreams....'
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. While you can spot The Balrog, discard all other minions. Skip the archery phase. Discard The Balrog if not underground.

card.title: The Balrog
card.subtitle: Flame of Udun
card.lore: ...suddenly it drew itself up to a great height, and its wings were spread from wall to wall....
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot a [MORIA] Orc. Discard The Balrog if not underground. Shadow: Exert The Balrog and remove [2] to play a [MORIA] Orc from your discard pile.

card.title: The Balrog
card.subtitle: Flame of Udun
card.lore: ...suddenly it drew itself up to a great height, and its wings were spread from wall to wall....
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot a [MORIA] Orc. Discard The Balrog if not underground. Shadow: Exert The Balrog and remove [2] to play a [MORIA] Orc from your discard pile.

card.title: Cave Troll's Chain
card.notes: When an exhausted Cave Troll, armed with the Cave Troll's Chain, takes its last wound during the archery phase, the Chain cannot be used to wound an archer companion (since the wound is a required action and takes effect before the Chain can be used).
card.lore: 'They have a Cave Troll!'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Cave Troll of Moria. The Free Peoples player may choose for the archery phase to be skipped. Each time Cave Troll of Moria takes a wound during the archery phase, you may wound an archer companion.

card.title: Dark Fire
card.lore: ...he seemed small, and altogether alone: grey and bent, like a wizened tree before the onset of a storm.
card.game_text: To play, spot The Balrog. Plays on Gandalf. Each time the fellowship moves, Gandalf must exert.

card.title: Dark Places
card.notes: This card can replace sites only in the Fellowship block format.
card.lore: 'There is some new devilry here... devised for our welcome, no doubt.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each unique [MORIA] minion is strength +1. Shadow: Spot an opponent's site to replace it with your marsh or underground site of the same number.

card.title: Fill With Fear
card.lore: He drew, but his hand fell, and the arrow slipped to the ground. He gave a cry of dismay and fear.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. While you can spot The Balrog, skip the archery phase. Maneuver: Exert The Balrog to discard a ranged weapon.

card.title: Final Cry
card.lore: ...it swung its whip, and the thongs lashed and curled about the wizard's knees, dragging him to the brink.
card.game_text: Response: If a skirmish that involved The Balrog bearing Whip of Many Thongs is about to end, wound a companion in that skirmish twice.

card.title: Foul Tentacle
card.lore: Its fingered end had hold of Frodo's foot, and was dragging him into the water.
card.game_text: Tentacle. When you play this minion, you may play a tentacle from your draw deck. This minion may not bear possessions and is discarded if not at a marsh.

card.title: Foul Things
card.lore: 'Something has crept, or has been driven out of dark waters under the mountains.'
card.game_text: Shadow: Play a [MORIA] minion from your discard pile.

card.title: Goblin Bowman
card.lore: The crude arrows of the Goblins served notice of the dangers of Moria.

card.title: Goblin Flankers
card.lore: 'There are Orcs, very many of them.... And some are large and evil....'
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may add [3] if the fellowship has moved more than once this turn.

card.title: Goblin Pursuer
card.lore: Had the fellowship remained in Dimrill Dale, pursuers from Moria would have overwhelmed them.
card.game_text: If the fellowship has moved more than once this turn, this minion is strength +3.

card.title: Goblin Reinforcements
card.lore: 'We don't have a moment! Come nightfall these hills will swarm with Orcs!'
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may heal a [MORIA] minion.

card.title: Goblin Scrabbler
card.lore: Orcs were as keen as hounds on a scent, it was said, but they could also climb.
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may discard an [ELVEN] condition. The roaming penalty for each [MORIA] Orc you play is -1.

card.title: Goblin Spearman
card.lore: ...with the speed of a striking snake, he charged into the Company and thrust with his spear....
card.game_text: While bearing a Goblin Spear, this minion is damage +2.

card.title: Huge Tentacle
card.lore: Out from the water a long sinuous tentacle had crawled; it was pale-green and luminous and wet.
card.game_text: Tentacle. Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may play Watcher in the Water from your draw deck. This minion may not bear possessions and is discarded if not at a marsh.

card.title: Moria Archer Troop
card.lore: Most of the Goblin arrows flew harmlessly into the chasm, but there were so many!
card.game_text: Archer. While you can spot another [MORIA] archer, add 1 to the minion archery total.

card.title: Must Do Without Hope
card.lore: His enemy halted again, facing him, and the shadow about it reached out like two vast wings.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert The Balrog to add a burden.

card.title: Old Differences
card.lore: 'I'll be dead before I see the Ring in the hands of an Elf!'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make an Elf or Dwarf skirmishing a [MORIA] Orc strength -1 (or -3 if you spot an Elf and a Dwarf).

card.title: Power and Terror
card.lore: The ranks of the orcs had opened, and they crowded away, as if they themselves were afraid.
card.game_text: Shadow: Reveal any number of [MORIA] Orcs from your hand to play The Balrog. Its twilight cost is -2 for each Orc revealed.

card.title: Throw Yourself in Next Time
card.lore: 'This is a serious journey, not a hobbit walking-party....Now be quiet!'
card.game_text: To play, spot a [MORIA] Orc. Plays on a Hobbit companion. Bearer may be exerted only by Shadow cards.

card.title: Troubled Mountains
card.lore: 'The Dimrill Dale is full of vapour and clouds of smoke....There are noises in the deeps of the earth.'
card.game_text: Shadow: Exert a [MORIA] minion and spot X burdens to add (X) (limit [5]).

card.title: Watcher in the Water
card.subtitle: Keeper of Westgate
card.lore: The dark water boiled... there was a hideous stench.
card.game_text: Damage +1. While you can spot Watcher in the Water, discard all other minions (except tentacles). Each tentacle is strength +2 and damage +1. This minion may not bear possessions and is discarded if not at a marsh.

card.title: Whip of Many Thongs
card.lore: It raised the whip, and the thongs whined and cracked.
card.game_text: Bearer must be The Balrog. Skirmish: Exert The Balrog to discard a helm, shield, or armor borne by a character The Balrog is skirmishing.

card.title: Bill Ferny
card.subtitle: Swarthy Sneering Fellow
card.lore: '...as for Ferny, he would sell anything to anybody; or make mischief for amusement.'
card.game_text: Nazgul are not roaming. The Free Peoples player may not assign a character to skirmish Bill Ferny. Discard Bill Ferny if underground.

card.title: Helpless
card.lore: He heard Frodo's voice, but it seemed to come from a great distance, or from under the earth, crying out strange words.
card.game_text: To play, spot Frodo and a Nazgul. Plays on Sam. Sam's game text does not apply.

card.title: His Terrible Servants
card.lore: '...in the dark they perceive many signs and forms that are hidden from us: then they are most to be feared.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Response: If a twilight Nazgul is about to take a wound, remove [1] to prevent that wound.

card.title: It Wants to be Found
card.lore: ...perhaps it had tried to reveal itself in response to some wish or command that was felt in the room.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot a twilight Nazgul to add a burden.

card.title: Resistance Becomes Unbearable
card.lore: Not with the hope of escape, or of doing anything, either good or bad: he simply felt that he must take the Ring and put it on his finger.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a twilight Nazgul to exert the Ring-bearer.If the Ring-bearer is then exhausted, he puts on The One Ring until the regroup phase.

card.title: Stricken Dumb
card.lore: He felt his tongue cleave to his mouth and his heart labouring. His sword broke and fell out of his shaking hand.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert The Witch-king to discard a tale or weapon.

card.title: They Will Find the Ring
card.lore: ...to the dismay of Frodo and his friends out from the trees and rocks away on the left four other Riders came flying.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert 2 Nazgul and spot X burdens to exert X companions.

card.title: Ulaire Attea
card.subtitle: The Easterling
card.lore: 'They had words with Harry at Westgate on Monday.... He was white and shaking when they left him.'
card.game_text: Twilight. When you play Ulaire Attea, you may wound an ally.

card.title: Ulaire Enquea
card.subtitle: Ringwraith in Twilight
card.lore: In their white faces burned keen and merciless eyes....
card.game_text: Twilight. Each time Ulaire Enquea wins a skirmish, you may exert him to wound the Ring-bearer once (or twice if you spot 5 burdens).

card.title: Ulaire Nelya
card.subtitle: Ringwraith in Twilight
card.lore: Over the lip of the little dell, on the side away from the hill, they felt, rather than saw, a shadow rise, one shadow or more than one.
card.game_text: Twilight. While you can spot 2 burdens or 2 wounds on the Ring-bearer, Ulaire Nelya is fierce and damage +1.

card.title: The Witch-king
card.subtitle: Lord of the Nazgul
card.lore: 'A great king and sorcerer he was of old, and now he wields a deadly fear.'
card.game_text: Twilight. Return to Its Master may not be played. Each time The Witch-king wins a skirmish, you may exert him to wound the Ring-bearer twice.

card.title: Wraith-world
card.lore: 'He is passing into the shadow world, he will soon become a wraith like them.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Spot a twilight Nazgul and the Ring-bearer wearing The One Ring to add 3 burdens.

card.title: The Eye of Sauron
card.lore: '...he has indeed arisen again and left his hold in Mirkwood and returned to his ancient fastness in the Dark Tower of Mordor.'
card.game_text: Shadow: Exert a [SAURON] Orc and spot X burdens to draw X cards (limit 5).

card.title: Memory of Many Things
card.lore: 'But my memory reaches back even to the Elder Days.... I have seen three ages in the West of the world, and many defeats, and many fruitless victories.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a [SAURON] Orc to discard an ally (or 2 [ELVEN] allies).

card.title: Orc Scout
card.notes: The special ability of this minion may only cancel an event that specifically requires a ranger in its game text.
card.lore: 'Orc!...Not very near, and yet too near, it seems.'
card.game_text: Tracker. The roaming penalty for each [SAURON] minion you play is -1. Response: If an event is played that spots or exerts a ranger, exert or discard this minion to cancel that event.

card.title: Orc Taskmaster
card.lore: An Orc acts when the taskmaster promises reward or the whip.
card.game_text: Shadow: Exert this minion to add [1].

card.title: Southern Spies
card.lore: 'They will know all the news now, for they have visited Bill Ferny; and probably that Southerner was a spy as well.'
card.game_text: Response: If the Ring-bearer puts on The One Ring, spot a [SAURON] minion to make the Free Peoples player discard his or her hand.

card.title: Spies of Mordor
card.lore: 'Mordor Orcs patrol the Eastern Shore. We must wait for the cover of darkness.'
card.game_text: Search. To play, spot a [SAURON] Orc. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may draw a card (or 2 cards if you spot a [SAURON] tracker).

card.title: Tower Assassin
card.lore: A Ring of Power would not stop the blade of an assassin lying in wait.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert Tower Assassin to wound an ally.

card.title: Verily I Come
card.lore: There was an eye in the Dark Tower that did not sleep. He knew that it had become aware of his gaze.
card.game_text: To play, exert a [SAURON] Orc. Plays on the Ring-bearer. Each time the Free Peoples player draws a card (or takes a card into hand) during the fellowship phase, add a burden.

card.title: Vile Blade
card.lore: The blood of enemies slain that day blackened the edge of the commander's blade.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [SAURON] Orc. Bearer is strength +2 while skirmishing a Man or Elf.

card.title: Bilbo
card.subtitle: Well-spoken Gentlehobbit
card.notes: Card title is an erratum. Image fixed
card.lore: ...as Mr. Baggins was generous with his money, most people were willing to forgive him his oddities and his good fortune.
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert Bilbo and discard a tale to discard a Shadow condition from an opponent's support area.

card.title: Consorting With Wizards
card.lore: 'He wasn't always this peculiar! When I were a lad, old Bilbo was a most respectable Hobbit.'
card.game_text: Tale. Bearer must be Bilbo. Bilbo may not take wounds (except during the archery phase). Fellowship or Regroup: Exert Bilbo or discard this condition to remove [1].

card.title: Dear Friends
card.lore: He pressed him for news of himself and of the wide world... and they stayed up far into the night.
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert a companion to place a Free Peoples card from your discard pile beneath your draw deck (or 2 Free Peoples cards if that companion has the Frodo signet).

card.title: Deft in Their Movements
card.lore: They possessed from the first the art of disappearing swiftly and silently, when large folk who they do not wish to meet come blundering by.
card.game_text: Stealth. Regroup: Spot 2 Hobbits to make each site's Shadow number -2 until the end of the turn.

card.title: Fearing the Worst
card.lore: 'Even if we are allowed to leave Bree unhindered, we can hardly hope now to leave it unnoticed.'
card.game_text: Stealth. To play, exert 2 Hobbits. Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of each search card and each tracker is +2.

card.title: Filibert Bolger
card.subtitle: Wily Rascal
card.lore: Filibert knows paths and tracks that few have trodden. He is not adventurous by nature, but his escapades often require rapid departures.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert a Hobbit companion twice to cancel a fierce skirmish involving that Hobbit.

card.title: Frodo
card.subtitle: Reluctant Adventurer
card.lore: 'I am not made for perilous quests. I wish I had never seen the Ring! Why did it come to me? Why was I chosen?'
card.game_text: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). The cost of each artifact, possession, and [SHIRE] tale played on Frodo is -1.

card.title: Frodo
card.subtitle: Reluctant Adventurer
card.lore: 'I am not made for perilous quests. I wish I had never seen the Ring! Why did it come to me? Why was I chosen?'
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Ring-bearer. The cost of each artifact, possession, and [SHIRE] tale played on Frodo is -1.

card.title: Hobbit Sword-play
card.lore: Boromir sensed that a blade in a Halfling's hand would surprise a larger foe.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a Hobbit bearing a weapon to wound a minion. That minion's owner may remove [3] to prevent this.

card.title: Merry
card.subtitle: Horticulturalist
card.lore: 'Ow... I think I've broken somehing.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert Merry to play Farmer Maggot from your draw deck.

card.title: Mithril-coat
card.lore: '...its worth was greater than the value of the whole Shire and everything in it.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Frodo. The minion archery total is -1. Each minion skirmishing Frodo does not gain strength bonuses from weapons and loses all damage bonuses.

card.title: Mithril-coat
card.lore: '...its worth was greater than the value of the whole Shire and everything in it.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Frodo. The minion archery total is -1. Each minion skirmishing Frodo does not gain strength bonuses from weapons and loses all damage bonuses.

card.title: Nice Imitation
card.lore: 'Very life-like!... But what will happen when they have penetrated the disguise?'
card.game_text: Stealth. Plays to your support area. Response: If a Hobbit is about to take a wound, discard this condition to prevent that wound.

card.title: Not Feared in Sunlight
card.lore: '...our shapes cast shadows in their minds, which only the noon sun destroys....'
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Plays to your support area. Each Nazgul is strength -4. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.

card.title: O Elbereth! Gilthoniel!
card.notes: As skirmishes involving the Ring-bearer cannot be cancelled, the skirmish action of this condition can only be used to take off The One Ring.
card.lore: With a last effort Frodo... slipped the Ring from his finger and closed his right hand tight upon it.
