card.game_text: Tale. Bearer must be the Ring-bearer. Skirmish: Discard this condition to take off The One Ring or to cancel a skirmish involving the Ring-bearer and a Nazgul.

card.title: Orc-bane
card.lore: Glamdring shone with a pale light, and Sting glinted at the edges.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot Sting or Glamdring and exert its bearer X times to wound X Orcs or X Uruk-hai.

card.title: Pippin
card.subtitle: Mr. Took
card.lore: Pippin was evidently much enjoying the attention he was getting, and had become quite forgetful of their danger.;Fellowship: Play Gandalf or Aragorn
card.game_text: his twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Practically Everyone Was Invited
card.lore: Thank you, I shall certainly come.
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert Bilbo to play a Hobbit from your draw deck.

card.title: A Promise
card.lore: 'But I'm glad Sam. I cannot tell you how glad. Come along! It is plain that we were meant to go together.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. While you can spot Frodo and Sam and neither is exhausted, each is strength +1.

card.title: Red Book of Westmarch
card.lore: 'Don't adventures ever have an end? I suppose not. Someone else always has to carry on the story.'
card.game_text: Tale. Plays to your support area. Each time you play a tale, you may spot Bilbo to draw a card.

card.title: Sam
card.subtitle: Proper Poet
card.lore: 'First he was a conspirator, now he's a jester. He'll end up by becoming a wizard - or a warrior!'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert Sam twice to make him defender +1 until the regroup phase. Response: If Frodo dies, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.title: Hobbiton Party Field
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert a Hobbit to play Bilbo from your draw deck.

card.title: Hobbiton Woods
card.game_text: Forest. Fellowship: Exert a Hobbit to play your site 2 (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

card.title: Town Center
card.game_text: Fellowship: Play a [SHIRE] ally to draw a card.

card.title: Great Chasm
card.game_text: Underground. The twilight cost of the first [MORIA] archer played each Shadow phase is -2.

card.title: Hollin
card.game_text: Plains. Uruk-hai are not roaming.

card.title: Valley of the Silverlode
card.game_text: River. Sanctuary. When the fellowship moves to Valley of the Silverlode, each Hobbit companion may heal.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Dwarf of the Mountain-race
card.lore: 'In the ruins of the Dwarves, a dwarf's head will be less easy to bewilder than Elves or Men or Hobbits.'
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each underground site's Shadow number is -2.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: The Grey Pilgrim
card.lore: 'When evening in the Shire was grey / his footsteps on the Hill were heard; / before the dawn he went away / on journey long without a word.'
card.game_text: At the start of each of your turns, you may draw a card.

card.title: The Witch-king
card.subtitle: Lord of the Nazgul
card.game_text: Twilight. Return to Its Master may not be played. Each time The Witch-king wins a skirmish, you may exert him to wound the Ring-bearer twice.

card.title: Frodo
card.subtitle: Reluctant Adventurer
card.game_text: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). The cost of each artifact, possession, and [SHIRE] tale played on Frodo is -1.

card.title: Sam
card.subtitle: Proper Poet
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert Sam twice to make him defender +1 until the regroup phase. Response: If Frodo dies, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Dwarf of the Mountain-race
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each underground site's Shadow number is -2.

card.title: Book of Mazarbul
card.lore: 'It seems to be a record of the fortunes of Balin's folk....'
card.game_text: Tale. Bearer must be a Dwarf. At the start of each fellowship phase when the fellowship is at site 4 or higher, you may draw a card for each Dwarf companion.

card.title: Gimli's Pipe
card.lore: 'And certainly it was from Bree that the art of smoking the genuine weed spread in the recent centuries among Dwarves and such other folk....'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gimli. Fellowship: Exert Gimli to add 1 to the number of pipes you can spot.

card.title: Mines of Khazad-Dum
card.lore: 'Moria! Moria! Wonder of the Northern world!'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time you play a [DWARVEN] tale, you may heal a Dwarf companion.

card.title: A Royal Welcome
card.lore: 'There is even a chance that Dwarves are there, and that in some deep hall of his fathers, Balin son of Fundin may be found.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a Dwarf ally to heal a Dwarf companion.

card.title: Song of Durin
card.lore: No harp is wrung, no hammer falls: / The darkness dwells in Durin's halls....
card.game_text: Tale. To play, exert a Dwarf. Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of each [MORIA] weapon is +2. Fellowship: Discard this condition to discard up to 2 [MORIA] conditions.

card.title: Storm of Argument
card.lore: 'I will be dead before I see the Ring in the hands of an Elf!'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. Shuffle up to X [DWARVEN] cards from your discard pile into your draw deck, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: Elven Rider
card.lore: 'If I can cross the river, the power of my people will protect him.'
card.game_text: Ranger. Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, discard 3 cards from hand to prevent that wound.

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: Lady Undomiel
card.lore: Queenly she looked, and thought and knowledge were in her glance, as of one who has known many things that the years bring.
card.game_text: While you can spot 3 [ELVEN] allies whose home is site 3, each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -3.

card.title: Beren and Luthien
card.lore: 'Tinviel! Tinviel! / He called her by her elvish name; / And there she halted listening.'
card.game_text: Tale. Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert an [ELVEN] ally to discard the bottom card of your draw deck. If that card is an [ELVEN] card, make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -1.

card.title: Calaglin
card.subtitle: Elf of Lorien
card.lore: 'We have been keeping watch on the rivers, ever since we saw a great troop of Orcs going north toward Moria....'
card.game_text: Archer. Regroup: Exert Calaglin to wound a minion.

card.title: Cast It Into the Fire!
card.lore: 'It should have been cast then into Orodruin's fire nigh at hand where it was made.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot an Elf to make each opponent discard a card from his or her hand. Draw a card for each card discarded in this way.

card.title: Dinendal
card.subtitle: Silent Scout
card.lore: He was almost certain that he could hear stealthy movements.... Not Elves; for the woodland folk were altogether noiseless in their movements.
card.game_text: Archer. Regroup: Exert Dinendal to remove [2].

card.title: Elrond
card.subtitle: Herald to Gil-galad
card.lore: Venerable he seemed as a king crowned with many winters, and yet hale as a tried warrior....
card.game_text: At the start of each of your turns, you may spot an ally whose home is site 3 to heal that ally twice. Regroup: Exert Elrond twice to heal a companion.

card.title: Erestor
card.subtitle: Chief Advisor to Elrond
card.lore: 'Then there are but two courses... to hide the Ring for ever, or to unmake it.'
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Response: If an Elf is about to take a wound from a [SAURON] minion or [SAURON] event, exert Erestor to prevent that wound.

card.title: Forests of Lothlorien
card.lore: 'Alas for Lothlrien that I love! It would be a poor life in a land where no mallorn grew.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, you may spot 3 [ELVEN] allies to wound a minion.

card.title: Friends of Old
card.lore: 'You have been summoned here to answer the threat of Mordor.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. Heal X [ELVEN] allies, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.title: Galadriel
card.subtitle: Lady of the Golden Wood
card.lore: 'There is in her and in this land no evil, unless a man bring it hither himself. Then let him beware!'
card.game_text: At the start of each of your turns, you may heal an Elf. Fellowship: Exert Galadriel to play the fellowship's next site if it is a forest (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

card.title: Galdor
card.subtitle: Councilor From the West
card.lore: 'My heart tells me that Sauron will expect us to take the western way, when he learns what has befallen. He soon will.'
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Regroup: Exert Galdor and spot a minion to return that minion to its owner's hand.

card.title: Gift of the Evenstar
card.lore: 'It is mine to give to whom I will... like my heart.'
card.game_text: To play, spot Arwen. Bearer must be Aragorn. Skirmish: Exert Aragorn or discard 2 cards from hand to make a minion skirmishing Aragorn strength -1.

card.title: Golradir
card.subtitle: Councilor of Imladris
card.lore: Their stay at Rivendell provided the Fellowship with counsel from many sources.
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: Exert Golradir to make an Orc strength -1.

card.title: Long-knives of Legolas
card.lore: Sharp, bone-handled knives defend the Elves of Mirkwood at close quarters.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Legolas. Each Orc or Uruk-hai skirmishing Legolas is strength -2.

card.title: Master of Healing
card.lore: 'Elrond has cured you: he has tended you for days, ever since you were brought in.'
card.game_text: Fellowship or Regroup: Spot Elrond (or 2 [ELVEN] allies) to heal a companion or ally.

card.title: Nenya
card.lore: 'Verily it is in the land of Lrien upon the finger of Galadriel that one of the Three remains. This is Nenya, the Ring of Adamant, and I am its keeper.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Galadriel. At the start of each regroup phase, you may discard up to 2 cards from hand to draw the same number of cards.

card.title: Phial of Galadriel
card.lore: 'May it be a light to you in dark places, when all other lights go out. Remember Galadriel and her Mirror!'
card.game_text: To play, exert an Elf. Bearer must be the Ring-bearer. Bearer's resistance is +2.

card.title: Saelbeth
card.subtitle: Elven Councilor
card.lore: The wisdom of Saelbeth prepared the Company for the dangers they would face.
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: Exert Saelbeth to make an Uruk-hai strength -1.

card.title: Something Draws Near
card.lore: 'We have hunted and slain many Orcs in the woods....'
card.game_text: Fellowship or Maneuver: Exert an Elf to discard an [ISENGARD] possession or [ISENGARD] artifact.

card.title: Vilya
card.lore: Upon his finger was a ring of gold with a great blue stone, Vilya, mightiest of the Three.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Elrond. Maneuver: Exert Elrond twice and spot a Shadow condition to return that condition to its owner's hand.

card.title: Voice of Nimrodel
card.lore: 'Beside the falls of Nimrodel, / By water clear and cool, / Her voice as falling silver fell / Into the shining pool.'
card.game_text: Tale. Skirmish: Exert an Elf at a river or forest to cancel a skirmish involving that Elf.

card.title: Betrayal of Isengard
card.lore: 'There is only one Lord of the Ring.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time an opponent draws a card (or takes a card into hand) during the Shadow phase, you may remove [1]. Maneuver: Exert Gandalf to wound Saruman twice.

card.title: Deep in Thought
card.lore: He was... trying to recall every memory of his former journey in the Mines, and considering anxiously the next course that he should take....
card.game_text: Spell. Maneuver: Spot Gandalf and 4 twilight tokens to discard all Shadow conditions.

card.title: Depart Silently
card.lore: 'Be careful, both of you.'
card.game_text: Stealth. Maneuver: At sites 1 to 5, spot Gandalf to prevent Hobbits from being assigned to skirmishes until the regroup phase. At any other site, spot Gandalf to make a Hobbit strength +3 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Fireworks
card.lore: 'The finest rockets ever seen: / they burst in stars of blue and green....'
card.game_text: Spell. Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to shuffle up to 2 [GANDALF] or up to 2 [SHIRE] cards from your discard pile into your draw deck.

card.title: His First Serious Check
card.lore: ...a false turn now might be disastrous.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot Gandalf to reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. You may add (X) to discard that card, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.title: Narya
card.lore: 'For this is the Ring of Fire, and with it you may rekindle hearts in a world that grows chill.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. At the start of each of your turns, you may add [3] to remove a burden.

card.title: Trust Me as You Once Did
card.lore: 'Do not take me for some conjurer of cheap tricks! I am not trying to rob you. I am trying to help you.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert Gandalf to make a companion strength +1 for each companion with the Gandalf signet you can spot (limit +3).

card.title: Unknown Perils
card.lore: Suddenly he stopped as if listening. Frodo became aware that all was very quiet, inside and outside.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Response: If a companion is about to take a wound, spot 4 twilight tokens and exert Gandalf to prevent that wound.

card.title: Answering the Cries
card.lore: Drawing his bright sword and crying Elendil! Elendil! he crashed through the trees.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Discard a [GONDOR] tale from hand to make a [GONDOR] companion strength +2.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Heir to the White City
card.lore: '...his hood was cast back, and his dark hair was blowing in the wind, a light was in his eyes: a king returning from exile in his own land.'
card.game_text: Ranger. Each time the fellowship moves during the fellowship phase, remove [2].

card.title: Banner of the White Tree
card.lore: 'Many Elves and many mighty Men, and many of their friends, had perished in the war.'
card.game_text: Tale. Maneuver: Exert a [GONDOR] companion to make that companion strength +3 and defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Citadel of Minas Tirith
card.lore: 'One day our paths will lead us there, and the Tower guards shall take up the call - The Lords of Gondor have returned.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. You may heal a [GONDOR] companion at the end of each turn during which no companion or ally lost a skirmish.

card.title: Gondor Bowmen
card.lore: Arrows of the Last Alliance brought death to Sauron's forces.
card.game_text: Tale. Plays to your support area. Archery: Exert a [GONDOR] companion and discard this condition to make the fellowship archery total +2.

card.title: Horn of Boromir
card.lore: On a baldric he wore a great horn tipped with silver....
card.game_text: Bearer must be Boromir. Maneuver: Exert Boromir and spot an ally. Until the regroup phase, that ally is strength +3 and participates in archery fire and skirmishes.

card.title: Might of Numenor
card.lore: 'But the lords of Minas Tirith still fight on....'
card.game_text: Tale. Maneuver: Spot a [GONDOR] companion to reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. Heal X companions, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.title: The Shards of Narsil
card.lore: '...Narsil was broken and its light extinguished, and it had not yet been forged again.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Stack a [GONDOR] card from hand here. Fellowship: Add [1] to take a card stacked here into hand.

card.title: Some Who Resisted
card.lore: 'In the south the realm of Gondor long endured; and for a while its splendour grew....'
card.game_text: Tale. Maneuver: Spot a [GONDOR] companion to make the twilight cost of each maneuver event +2.

card.title: Still Sharp
card.lore: 'The shards of Narsil... the blade that cut the Ring from Sauron's hand.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Spot The Shards of Narsil to make a [GONDOR] companion strength +3 and damage +1.

card.title: Voice of Rauros
card.lore: As he ran the cries came louder, but fainter now and desperately the horn was blowing.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert Aragorn to make each companion with the Aragorn signet damage +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: We Must Go Warily
card.lore: 'This is the lawn of Parth Galen: a fair place in the summer days of old. Let us hope that no evil has yet come here.'
card.game_text: Response: If the fellowship moves in the regroup phase, exert a [GONDOR] companion twice to make each minion's twilight cost +1 until the next regroup phase.

card.title: Abandoning Reason for Madness
card.lore: 'And why not, Gandalf?... Why not? The Ruling Ring? If we could command that, then the power would pass to us.'
card.game_text: Shadow: Spot an [ISENGARD] minion to discard up to 3 cards from hand and draw an equal number of cards.

card.title: Can You Protect Me From Yourself?
card.lore: 'Where is the Ring?'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot an [ISENGARD] minion to exhaust Aragorn. The Free Peoples player may add 2 burdens to prevent this.

card.title: Coming for the Ring
card.lore: 'This evil cannot be concealed by the power of the Elves....'
card.game_text: Regroup: Reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. Heal X [ISENGARD] minions, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.title: A Fell Voice on the Air
card.lore: 'He's trying to bring down the mountain!'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Exert Saruman to play an [ISENGARD] weather condition from your discard pile. Its twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Hate and Anger
card.lore: The frenzy of Uruks is born of the fear of the very Goblins that work the pits.
card.game_text: Shadow: Spot an Uruk-hai and a [MORIA] minion to draw 3 cards.

card.title: Hollowing of Isengard
card.lore: 'Rip them all down!'
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ISENGARD] Orc. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Discard this condition to add [3].

card.title: Isengard Axe
card.lore: Axes eat into the forests of Isengard as well as the victims of Saruman's Orcs.
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ISENGARD] Orc. When you play this weapon, add [1].

card.title: Isengard Forger
card.lore: 'I looked on it and saw that, whereas it had once been green and fair, it was now filled with pits and forges.'
card.game_text: Shadow: Exert this minion to add [1].

card.title: Isengard Retainer
card.lore: '...the Eagles of the mountain went far and wide, and they saw many things: the gathering of wolves and the mustering of Orcs....'
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.title: Isengard Servant
card.lore: The servants of Isengard worked tirelessly to spread the influence of their master.
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.title: Isengard Shaman
card.lore: 'Over all his works a dark smoke hung and wrapped itself about the sides of Orthanc.'
card.game_text: Response: If an [ISENGARD] Orc is about to take a wound, remove [2] to prevent that wound.

card.title: Isengard Smith
card.lore: 'No other folk make such a trampling....'
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert this minion to discard a weapon (or all Free Peoples possessions if you can spot 5 companions).

card.title: Isengard Warrior
card.lore: 'There is evil afoot in Isengard, and the West is no longer safe.'
card.game_text: While you can spot another [ISENGARD] Orc, no player may use archery special abilities. Regroup:Exert this minion and spot 3 wounds on the Ring-bearer to exert every companion.

card.title: Isengard Worker
card.lore: 'They were Elves once. Taken by the dark powers - tortured and mutilated....'
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.title: One of You Must Do This
card.lore: 'And if we fail, what then? What happens when Sauron takes back what is his?'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert an [ISENGARD] minion to make the Free Peoples player exert X companions, where X is the number of these races you can spot in the fellowship: Dwarf, Elf, Man, and Wizard.

card.title: Orc Commander
card.lore: 'It seems their delight to slash and beat down growing things that are not even in their way.'
card.game_text: Each other [ISENGARD] Orc is strength +1. Regroup: Exert Orc Commander to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.title: Orc Overseer
card.lore: 'What orders from Mordor, my Lord? What does the Eye command?'
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert Orc Overseer twice to exhaust a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Orthanc Berserker
card.lore: The voice of Saruman compels his minions to stop at nothing to earn his favor.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Maneuver: Spot 5 burdens and exert Orthanc Berserker twice to exhaust a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: The Palantir of Orthanc
card.lore: 'Seven stars and seven stones....'
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ISENGARD] minion. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Spot an [ISENGARD] minion and remove [1] to reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. Place that card on top of that player's draw deck.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Keeper of Isengard
card.game_text: Saruman may not take wounds during the archery phase and may not be assigned to a skirmish. Uruk-hai are fierce. Response: If an Uruk-hai is about to take a wound, exert Saruman to prevent that wound.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Servant of the Eye
card.game_text: Saruman may not take wounds during the archery phase and may not be assigned to a skirmish. Assignment: Exert Saruman to assign an [ISENGARD] minion to a companion (except the Ring-bearer). That companion may exert to prevent this.

card.title: Servants to Saruman
card.lore: 'This is grievous news concerning Saruman... for we trusted him and he is deep in all our counsels.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make an [ISENGARD] Orc strength +2 (or +3 if you have fewer than 3 cards in hand).

card.title: Tower of Orthanc
card.lore: 'It was not made by Saruman, but by the men of Nmenor long ago; and it is very tall and has many secrets
card.game_text: yet it looks not to be a work of craft.'

card.title: Trapped and Alone
card.lore: '...I had no chance of escape, and my days were bitter.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each character skirmishing an [ISENGARD] Orc loses all damage bonuses from weapons.

card.title: The Trees Are Strong
card.lore: 'Their roots go deep.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Discard X [ISENGARD] Orcs to make the Free Peoples player wound X companions.

card.title: Uruk Raider
card.lore: There is no safety where Saruman's emblem is shown.
card.game_text: Damage +1. While an ally is in the dead pile, this minion is strength +3 and fierce.

card.title: Uruk Ravager
card.lore: '...a ruined and terrible form of life.'
card.game_text: Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may spot Saruman to add [2].

card.title: Dangerous Gamble
card.lore: Almost they began to hope that they would escape.
card.game_text: Shadow: Spot a [MORIA] minion to reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. Add (X), where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.title: Depths of Moria
card.lore: ...a great fissure had opened. Out of it a fierce red light came, and now and again flames licked at the brink.... Wisps of dark smoke wavered in the hot air.
card.game_text: To play, spot a [MORIA] Orc. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, add [2].

card.title: Hide and Seek
card.lore: 'Which way shall we go?'
card.game_text: Search. Skirmish: Spot 2 [SHIRE] companions to make a [MORIA] minion damage +1.

card.title: Malice
card.lore: Fueled by Sauron's hatred of living things, Orcs searched for the Ring of Power.
card.game_text: Archery: Spot a [MORIA] Orc and a [SAURON] Orc to wound an archer.

card.title: Such a Little Thing
card.lore: 'Boromir... give the Ring to Frodo.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot a [MORIA] minion to wound Boromir 3 times. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 Free Peoples possessions to prevent this.

card.title: Gates of the Dead City
card.lore: '...and they took Minas Ithil and abode in it, and they made it into a place of dread....'
card.game_text: To play, spot a Nazgul. Plays to your support area. Each time a [WRAITH] card adds a burden, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion.

card.title: News of Mordor
card.lore: 'Build me an army worthy of Mordor.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Spot an [ISENGARD] minion to make a Nazgul damage +1.

card.title: The Ring Draws Them
card.lore: 'If I move I shall be seen and hunted!'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, add [1] for each burden you can spot. At the end of each of your Shadow phases, exert a Nazgul or discard this condition.

card.title: They Will Never Stop Hunting You
card.lore: 'They're looking for Baggins, and if they mean well, then I'm a hobbit.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot a Nazgul to reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. Exert a companion bearing a ranged weapon X times, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.title: Too Great and Terrible
card.lore: His eyes flashed and his face was lit as by a fire within. 'Do not tempt me! For I do not wish to become like the Dark Lord himself.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot a Nazgul to wound Gandalf twice. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 [GANDALF] cards from hand to prevent this.

card.title: Ulaire Otsea
card.subtitle: Ringwraith in Twilight
card.notes: If Frodo dies in a skirmish involving Otsea with Sam also in play, The One Ring is transferred to Sam before Blade Tip may be transferred with Otsea's game text.
card.lore: '...at all times they smell the blood of living things, desiring and hating it.'
card.game_text: Twilight. Each time Ulaire Otsea wins a skirmish, you may exert him to transfer Blade Tip from your support area to the Ring-bearer.

card.title: The Dark Lord Advances
card.lore: 'A power was there that we have not felt before.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert a [SAURON] minion to reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. That player must discard X cards from hand, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.title: Get Off the Road!
card.lore: 'The Morgul-lord and his Black Riders have come forth. War is preparing!'
card.game_text: Search. Shadow: Spot a [SAURON] minion and a Nazgul to make the Free Peoples player discard a card from the top of his or her deck for each burden you can spot.

card.title: Gleaming in the Snow
card.lore: 'A Ring of Power looks after itself.... It may slip off treacherously, but its keeper never abandons it.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert a [SAURON] Orc and spot a [GONDOR] companion to add a burden.

card.title: Hand of Sauron
card.lore: 'The power of the Ring could not be undone.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a [SAURON] minion to make the Free Peoples player discard a card at random from his or her hand.

card.title: His Cruelty and Malice
card.lore: 'Into this Ring he poured his cruelty, his malice, and his will to dominate all life.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a [SAURON] minion to make the Free Peoples player discard the top card from his or her draw deck.

card.title: Massing in the East
card.lore: 'The power of the Black Land grows....'
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert a [SAURON] minion to discard a card from the top of the Free Peoples player's draw deck for each of these races you can spot in the fellowship: Dwarf, Elf, Man, and Wizard.

card.title: Morgul Slayer
card.lore: 'Sauron was diminished, but not destroyed. His Ring was lost but not unmade.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert this minion to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Orc Butcher
card.lore: 'And yet we see that Sauron can torture and destroy the very hills.'
card.game_text: For each [SAURON] condition you can spot, this minion is strength +1.

card.title: Orc Guard
card.lore: The malice of the Dark Tower thins the hopes of Men.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert this minion and discard your [SAURON] condition to discard a Free Peoples condition.

card.title: Orc Pillager
card.lore: Weapons of the West are often powerless against the threat of Sauron.
card.game_text: For each Free Peoples card borne by a character this minion is skirmishing, that character is strength -1.

card.title: Orc Slayer
card.lore: For it is a long tale, full of deeds great and terrible....
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert this minion to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Orc Swordsman
card.lore: 'Many evil things there are that your strong walls and bright swords do not stay.'
card.game_text: While this minion bears a weapon, he is strength +2.

card.title: Orc Trooper
card.lore: The Dark Lord's power grows in unseen ways.
card.game_text: For each card in your hand, this minion is strength +1.

card.title: Orc Veteran
card.lore: 'There was war, and the land was laid waste....'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Discard your [SAURON] condition to make a character skirmishing this minion strength -1.

card.title: Orc Warrior
card.lore: Orcs were multiplying again in the mountains.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert this minion and discard your [SAURON] condition to make the Free Peoples player discard the top 2 cards from his or her draw deck.

card.title: Our List of Allies Grows Thin
card.lore: 'The enemy is moving.... His eye is fixed on Rivendell. And Saruman, you tell me, has betrayed us.'
card.game_text: To play, exert a [SAURON] minion. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, add [1] for each ally you can spot.

card.title: Terrible as the Dawn
card.lore: 'In the place of the Dark Lord, you would have a Queen... All shall love me and despair!'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot a [SAURON] minion to wound Galadriel 3 times. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 Elves to prevent this.

card.title: Tower of Barad-dur
card.lore: The Dark Tower had been rebuilt, it was said. From there the power was spreading....
card.game_text: To play, exert a [SAURON] minion. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, the Free Peoples player must discard a card from hand.

card.title: Why Shouldn't I Keep It?
card.lore: 'No, wait, it's here in my pocket. Isn't that... isn't that odd now?'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot a [SAURON] minion to discard Bilbo. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 Free Peoples conditions to prevent this.

card.title: Bill the Pony
card.notes: When the fellowship moves with Bill the Pony to an underground site, the Shadow number of that site is reduced before Bill the Pony is discarded. Lists: ERL, MXL.
card.lore: 'That animal can nearly talk.... He gave me a look as plain as Mr. Pippin could speak....'
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Hobbit companion. The Shadow number of each site is -1. Discard Bill the Pony when at an underground site.

card.title: Frodo's Pipe
card.lore: 'All the same, observations that I have made on my own many journeys south have convinced me that the weed itself is not native to our parts of the world.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Frodo. Fellowship: Discard a pipeweed possession and spot X pipes to heal a companion with the Frodo signet X times.

card.title: Frying Pan
card.lore: 'I think I'm getting the hang of this!'
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Skirmish: Exert bearer to wound an Orc he or she is skirmishing.

card.title: Meant to Be Alone
card.lore: 'You are a Ring-bearer, Frodo... to bear a Ring of Power is to be alone.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot a Hobbit companion (except the Ring-bearer) to reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. Remove (X), where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.title: Melilot Brandybuck
card.subtitle: Merry Dancer
card.lore: Master Everard Took and Miss Melilot Brandybuck got on a table and with bells in their hands began to dance the Springle-ring: a pretty dance, but rather vigorous.
card.game_text: Response: If a burden is about to be added by a Shadow card, exert Melilot Brandybuck to prevent that burden.

card.title: Old Noakes
card.subtitle: Purveyor of Wisdoms
card.notes: If a Shadow card gives you the choice of discarding a card from hand or taking a different action, that card does not activate Old Noakes' game text.
card.lore: 'There's been some strange folk crossing the Shire - Dwarves and others of a less than savoury nature.'
card.game_text: Each time a Shadow card makes you discard a card from hand, you may also discard a minion or Shadow condition.

card.title: Seek and Hide
card.lore: A Hobbit's best friends in Moria are the very pillars that support its structure.
card.game_text: Stealth. Skirmish: Spot 2 [SHIRE] companions to make a minion lose all damage bonuses.

card.title: The Shire Countryside
card.lore: 'Life in the wide world goes on... scarcely even aware of the existence of hobbits....'
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [SHIRE] companions. Plays to your support area. Each time you remove a burden (except by a Hobbit's game text), you may heal a companion.

card.title: Three Monstrous Trolls
card.lore: 'Great big nasty twenty foot high smelly things _- and they're arguing... arguing about how they were going to cook us!'
card.game_text: Tale. Plays to your support area. Response: If a Shadow card is about to add any number of twilight tokens, exert a Hobbit ally to prevent this.

card.title: Caras Galadhon
card.game_text: Forest. Sanctuary. While the fellowship is at Caras Galadhon, no more than one minion may be assigned to each skirmish.

card.title: Eregion Hills
card.game_text: When the fellowship moves to Eregion Hills, add a burden.

card.title: Gates of Argonath
card.game_text: River. Maneuver events may not be played.

card.title: The Great River
card.game_text: River. While the fellowship is at The Great River, cards may not be played from draw decks or discard piles.

card.title: House of Elrond
card.game_text: Sanctuary. When the fellowship moves to House of Elrond, the Free Peoples player may spot 2 Elves to remove a burden.

card.title: Wastes of Emyn Muil
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot 4 companions and exert your [ISENGARD] Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Son of Thranduil
card.lore: 'Praised be the bow of Galadriel, and the hand and eye of Legolas!... That was a mighty shot in the dark, my friend!'
card.game_text: Archer. While Legolas is at a river or forest, add 1 to the fellowship archery total.

card.title: Boromir
card.subtitle: Defender of Minas Tirith
card.lore: ...seated a little apart was a tall man with a fair and noble face... proud and stern of glance.
card.game_text: Ranger. Fellowship: Add [2] to heal Boromir.

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: Elven Rider
card.game_text: Ranger. Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, discard 3 cards from hand to prevent that wound.

card.title: Hand of Sauron
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a [SAURON] minion to make the Free Peoples player discard a card at random from his or her hand.

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: Answer To All Riddles
card.lore: '...thought to have perished from the world.'
card.game_text: While wearing The One Ring, the Ring-bearer is strength +2, and each time he is about to take a wound in a skirmish, add a burden instead. Skirmish: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase.

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: The Answer To All Riddles
card.lore: '...thought to have perished from the world.'
card.game_text: While wearing The One Ring, the Ring-bearer is strength +2, and each time he is about to take a wound in a skirmish, add a burden instead. Skirmish: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase.

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: The Ruling Ring
card.lore: One Ring to rule them all....
card.game_text: Response: If bearer is about to take a wound in a skirmish, he wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound during a skirmish, add a burden instead.

card.title: Anger
card.lore: Rage filled the hearts of the Dunlending attackers.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Spot 3 [DUNLAND] minions or a site you control to make a [DUNLAND] Man fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Band of Wild Men
card.lore: 'The Wild Men of Dunland have no love for Thoden of Rohan since he took their land.'
card.game_text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may make it fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Burn Every Village
card.lore: 'Take your rabble through the Westemnet; take back the lands they stole from you.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a [DUNLAND] Man strength +2 (or +4 if you control a site).

card.title: Constantly Threatening
card.lore: The men of Dunland have hated the Rohirrim for many years.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: If the fellowship has moved more than once this turn, remove [2] to play a [DUNLAND] Man from your discard pile.

card.title: Dark Fury
card.lore: Dunland and Dunlendings are the names that the Rohirrim gave to them, because they were swarthy and dark-haired....
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a [DUNLAND] Man strength +2 (or +4 if at a sanctuary).

card.title: Death to the Strawheads
card.lore: The dark Dunlendings called their fairhaired enemies from Rohan Strawheads.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a [DUNLAND] Man strength +1 for each companion you spot.

card.title: Dunlending Arsonist
card.lore: 'They bring fire... and they are burning as they come, rick, cot, and tree.';Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may play a [DUNLAND] Man from hand
card.game_text: his twilight cost is -2. That Man is fierce and damage +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Dunlending Brigand
card.lore: 'This was a rich vale and had many homesteads. Alas for my folk!'

card.title: Dunlending Looter
card.lore: ...the Dunlendings raided often over the Isen.
card.game_text: When this minion wins a skirmish, you may stack him on a site you control. Shadow: If stacked on a site you control, play this minion. His twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Dunlending Madman
card.lore: 'They hate us, and they are glad; for our doom seems certain to them.'
card.game_text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may make him strength +2 and fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Dunlending Pillager
card.lore: 'Not in half a thousand years have they forgotten their grievance that the lords of Gondor gave the Mark to Eorl the Young and made alliance with him.'
card.game_text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may discard a Free Peoples possession (or 2 possessions if you spot 6 companions).

card.title: Dunlending Ransacker
card.lore: 'Yet there are many that cry in the Dunland tongue.'
card.game_text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may spot another [DUNLAND] Man to take control of a site.

card.title: Dunlending Ravager
card.lore: 'They will not give way now for dusk or dawn, until Thoden is taken, or they themselves are slain.'
card.game_text: While skirmishing a [ROHAN] Man, this minion is strength +2. Assignment: Spot an ally to make that ally participate in skirmishes and assign this minion to skirmish that ally.

card.title: Dunlending Robber
card.lore: 'We will fight....'
card.game_text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may make him strength +2 and fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Dunlending Savage
card.lore: The Dunlendings' fury could only end in the death of the king of Rohan.

card.title: Dunlending Warrior
card.lore: These were a remnant of the peoples that had dwelt in the vales of the White Mountains in ages past.
card.game_text: Assignment: Spot an ally to make that ally participate in skirmishes and assign this minion to skirmish that ally.

card.title: Hides
card.lore: Only heavy animal skins armored the Dunlendings.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. When you play this possession, you may draw a card. Response: If a [DUNLAND] Man is about to take a wound, remove [2] or discard this possession to prevent that wound.

card.title: Hides
card.lore: Only heavy animal skins armored the Dunlendings.
card.game_text: When you play this possession, you may draw a card. Response: If a [Dunland] Man is about to take a wound, remove [2] or discard this possession to prevent that wound.

card.title: Hill Chief
card.lore: '...Saruman has armed the wild hillmen and herdfolk of Dunland beyond the rivers, and these also he loosed upon us.'
card.game_text: Shadow: Spot a site you control and exert Hill Chief to draw 3 cards.

card.title: Hillman Band
card.lore: As in years past, the Dunlendings marched in force to the west.
card.game_text: Each time the fellowship moves, you may spot another [DUNLAND] Man to take control of a site.

card.title: Hillman Horde
card.lore: 'They are fierce folk when roused.'
card.game_text: While you control 2 sites, skip the archery phase. While you control 3 sites, each of your [DUNLAND] Men is fierce. While you control 4 sites, each of your [DUNLAND] Men is damage +1.

card.title: Hillman Mob
card.lore: 'That old hatred Saruman has inflamed.';Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may play a [DUNLAND] Man from hand
card.game_text: his twilight cost is -2. That Man is fierce and damage +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Hillman Rabble
card.lore: The relentless fury of the Dunlendings consumed one village after another.
card.game_text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may stack it on a site you control. Shadow: If stacked on a site you control, play this minion. Its twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Hillman Tribe
card.lore: 'They will not quail at the sun... the wild men of the hills.'
card.game_text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may spot another [DUNLAND] minion to take control of a site.

card.title: Iron Axe
card.lore: Saruman armed the Dunlendings with weapons forged by his Orcs in Isengard.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [DUNLAND] Man.

card.title: Living Off Rock
card.lore: 'The Horsemen took your land; they drove your people into the hills to scratch living off rock.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time a [DUNLAND] Man wins a skirmish involving a [ROHAN] Man, you may make that minion strength +2 and fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: No Defense
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove [3] to place a [DUNLAND] token here. Skirmish: Spot a [DUNLAND] Man and remove a [DUNLAND] token from this card. A character skirmishing that [DUNLAND] Man does not gain strength bonuses from possessions.

card.title: No Refuge
card.lore: As their homes were ravaged by the wild men, refugees fled to the safety of Helm's Deep.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. While a [DUNLAND] Man is stacked on a site, the Shadow number of each site is +5.

card.title: No Retreat
card.lore: Hordes from Dunland laid waste to villages as their numbers grew.
card.game_text: Plays on a site you control. Regroup: Spot 2 [DUNLAND] Men and discard this condition to make the Free Peoples player choose to move again this turn (if the move limit allows).

card.title: Over the Isen
card.lore: Like their ancestors years before, the Dunlendings came down from Isengard.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Assignment: Spot a site you control and remove [2] to assign a [DUNLAND] Man to an unbound companion.

card.title: Ravage the Defeated
card.lore: What the Dunlendings cannot steal, they destroy.
card.game_text: Response: If your [DUNLAND] Man wins a skirmish, discard all Free Peoples cards borne by the companion or ally he was skirmishing.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Rabble-rouser
card.game_text: Saruman may not be assigned to a skirmish. Each time the fellowship moves, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion for each [DUNLAND] Man you can spot. Skirmish: Exert Saruman to make a [DUNLAND] Man strength +2.

card.title: Secret Folk
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving a [DUNLAND] Man, you may place a [DUNLAND] token on this card. Maneuver: Discard a Free Peoples possession for each [DUNLAND] token here (limit 3). Discard this condition.

card.title: Wake of Destruction
card.lore: The anger of the wild men increased with every home they pillaged.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot 2 sites you control to make each of your [DUNLAND] Men fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: War Club
card.lore: The wooden weapons of the wild men slew scores of unarmed villagers.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [DUNLAND] Man. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may discard 2 Free Peoples possessions.

card.title: War Cry of Dunland
card.lore: 'Death to the Forgoil!'
card.game_text: Response: If a [DUNLAND] Man wins a skirmish, make him fierce and strength +4 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Wild Man of Dunland
card.lore: 'By our blood... we swear to fight for you....';Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may play a [DUNLAND] Man from hand
card.game_text: his twilight cost is -2. That Man is fierce and damage +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Wild Man Raid
card.lore: Not even the smallest of trinkets was safe from the destruction of the Dunlendings.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot 3 [DUNLAND] Men to discard a Free Peoples possession or condition.

card.title: Wulf
card.subtitle: Dunlending Chieftain
card.lore: 'Do you not hear their voices?'
card.game_text: Fierce. Response: If another [DUNLAND] Man wins a skirmish, exert Wulf to take control of a site.

card.title: Axe of Erebor
card.lore: '...wherever thou goest my thought goes with thee. But have a care to lay thine axe to the right tree!'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gimli. He is damage +1. Skirmish: Discard a [DWARVEN] condition or a card stacked on a [DWARVEN] condition to make Gimli strength +1.

card.title: Best Company
card.lore: An axe swung and swept back. Two Orcs fell headless. The rest fled.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or +4 if at a battleground).

card.title: Come Here Lad
card.lore: 'You are the canniest, luckiest, most reckless fool I've ever met! Bless you.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Stack the top 2 cards from your draw deck on a [DWARVEN] condition that has a card already stacked on it.

card.title: Courtesy of My Hall
card.lore: 'Now my guests, come!... Come and take such refreshment as haste allows.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, stack a card from your discard pile here. Fellowship: Discard a Free Peoples card stacked here to heal a Dwarf.

card.title: Dwarven Foresight
card.lore: 'I would guess that the burned bones of the hobbits are now mingled with the Orcs'.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf to take a Free Peoples card stacked on a [DWARVEN] condition into hand.

card.title: Ever My Heart Rises
card.game_text: Tale. Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, reveal the top 6 cards of your draw deck and stack them here. Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf and discard the top card of your draw deck to take a Free Peoples card stacked here into hand.

card.title: From the Armory
card.lore: 'It's a bit tight around the chest.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert a Dwarf and stack a Free Peoples card from hand here to prevent all wounds to that Dwarf.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Lockbearer
card.lore: 'You speak evil of that which is fair beyond the reach of your thought, and only little wit can excuse you.'
card.game_text: Damage +1. Gimli is strength +1 for each unbound Hobbit companion you can spot.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Unbidden Guest
card.lore: But a small dark figure that none had observed sprang out of the shadows and gave a hoarse shout: Baruk Khazd!
card.game_text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert Gimli to make an unbound companion strength +1 (or +2 if that companion is Legolas).

card.title: Here Is Good Rock
card.lore: 'Give me a year and a hundred of my kin and I would make this a place that armies would break upon like water.'
card.game_text: Tale.Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Stack a Free Peoples card from hand here to make a Dwarf damage +1.

card.title: Khazad Ai-menu
card.lore: 'The Orcs are behind the wall. Ai-oi! Come, Legolas! There are enough for both of us.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or strength +3 and damage +1 if you spot Legolas).

card.title: My Axe Is Notched
card.notes: The strength bonus derived from this condition is based on the lowest number of tokens on either card. For example: If there are two [ELVEN] tokens on Final Count and three [DWARVEN] tokens on My Axe Is Notched, the strength bonus is +2.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, place a [DWARVEN] token on this card. While you can spot X [DWARVEN] tokens on this card and the same number of [ELVEN] tokens on Final Count, Gimli is strength +X (limit +3).

card.title: Quick As May Be
card.lore: 'I think, nonetheless, that we no longer need any trail to tell us which way to go.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot a Dwarf companion and an Elf companion to wound a minion.

card.title: Rest by Blind Night
card.lore: 'And yet even I, Dwarf of many journeys... cannot run all the way to Isengard without any pause....'
card.game_text: Regroup: Shuffle any number of [DWARVEN] conditions (and all cards stacked on them) into your draw deck.

card.title: Restless Axe
card.lore: 'Give me a row of orc-necks and room to swing and all weariness will fall from me!'
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert a Dwarf to shuffle a [DWARVEN] condition (and all cards stacked on it) into your draw deck. Exert a minion for each card shuffled into your draw deck.

card.title: Search Far and Wide
card.lore: 'We have been set many riddles since we came to Tol Brandir, but this is the hardest to unravel.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf and discard the top card of your draw deck to draw 2 cards.

card.title: Stout and Strong
card.lore: 'Never did I see an axe so wielded.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time a Dwarf wins a skirmish, you may place a [DWARVEN] token on this card. Skirmish: Make an unbound companion strength +1 for each [DWARVEN] token here (limit +3). Discard this condition.

card.title: Alliance Reforged
card.lore: 'If we do not trust the strength of Men, then we trust to the victory of Sauron.'
card.game_text: Tale. Fellowship: Draw a card for each Elf companion you spot.

card.title: Arrow and Blade
card.lore: The Elven bow and the sword of Man fought together as one weapon.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert X Elf companions to make a minion skirmishing an unbound companion strength -X.

card.title: Blades Drawn
card.lore: The sword skills of the Elven archers were unexpected.
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Plays to your support area. For each wound on each minion, that minion is strength -2. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.

card.title: Company of Archers
card.lore: The Naith Company, a veteran band from the South of Lrien, concentrated fire on the Uruk machines.
card.game_text: Archery: Spot 2 Elf companions to discard a condition.

card.title: Elven Bow
card.lore: No finer bows could defend Helm's Deep than those of the Golden Wood.
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Elf. Bearer is an archer.

card.title: Elven Brooch
card.lore: 'Not idly do the leaves of Lrien fall.'
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Bearer must be a companion. Response: If another possession borne by bearer is about to be discarded by a Shadow card, discard this possession instead.

card.title: Elven Sword
card.lore: Fine blades forged by Elven smiths are centuries-old heirlooms.
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Elf. Skirmish: Exert bearer or discard 2 cards from hand to make a minion skirmishing bearer strength -1.

card.title: Erethon
card.subtitle: Naith Lieutenant
card.lore: At close range, Erethn's accuracy is uncanny.
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. While Erethon bears a ranged weapon, he is strength +1 and damage +1, and he does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.title: Feathered
card.lore: Elven swords found the same targets as their arrows.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -2 for each wound on that minion.

card.title: Fereveldir
card.subtitle: Son of Thandronen
card.lore: Thandronen's sons patrol the borders of Lrien together.
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: Exert Fereveldir and discard an [ELVEN] token from your condition to wound a minion Fereveldir is skirmishing.

card.title: Ferevellon
card.subtitle: Son of Thandronen
card.lore: The Uruks at Helm's Deep fell to his blade as easily as Goblins from the mountains.
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: Exert Ferevellon to make a minion skirmishing him strength -2.

card.title: Final Count
card.notes: The strength bonus derived from this condition is based on the lowest number of tokens on either card. For example: If there are two [ELVEN] tokens on Final Count and three [DWARVEN] tokens on My Axe Is Notched, the strength bonus is +2.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time Legolas wins a skirmish, you may place an [ELVEN] token on this card. While you can spot X [ELVEN] tokens on this card and the same number of [DWARVEN] tokens on My Axe Is Notched, Legolas is strength +X (limit +3).

card.title: Flashing Steel
card.lore: 'Good!... But my count is now two dozen. It has been knife-work up here.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert an Elf to make a minion skirmishing that Elf strength -3.

card.title: Haldir
card.subtitle: Emissary of the Galadhrim
card.lore: 'In days of old, my people stood beside the King of Gondor - we come to honor that allegiance.'
card.game_text: While no opponent controls a site, Haldir is strength +2. Regroup: Exert Haldir at a battleground and exert another Elf to liberate a site.

card.title: Killing Field
card.lore: The courage of the defenders blunted the Uruk assaults.
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Plays to your support area. Each wounded minion is prevented from being fierce. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Dauntless Hunter
card.lore: 'They are far, far away.... I know in my heart that they have not rested this night.'
card.game_text: Archer. The twilight cost of each Shadow event and Shadow condition is +1 for each unbound Hobbit you can spot.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Dauntless Hunter
card.lore: 'They are far, far away.... I know in my heart that they have not rested this night.'
card.game_text: Archer. The twilight cost of each Shadow event and Shadow condition is +1 for each unbound Hobbit you can spot.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Elven Comrade
card.lore: 'Come, you shall sit behind me, friend Gimli.'
card.game_text: Archer. Skirmish: Exert Legolas to make a minion skirmishing an unbound companion strength -1 (or -2 if that companion is Gimli).

card.title: Lembas
card.lore: Sam thought that it tasted far better, somehow, than it had for a good while....
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Bearer must be a companion. Regroup: Discard this possession to reconcile your hand.

card.title: Lorien Guardian
card.lore: Haldir's Elven bowmen were experienced defenders of the borders of the Golden Wood
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert this companion to make a Shadow player wound a minion.

card.title: Lorien Is Most Welcome
card.lore: 'We are proud to fight alongside Men once more....'
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Plays to your support area. Each wounded minion loses all damage bonuses. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.

card.title: Lorien Swordsman
card.lore: Long, curved Elven steel cut down Uruks already weakened by Elven arrows.
card.game_text: Each minion skirmishing this companion is strength -2 for each wound on that minion.

card.title: Night Without End
card.lore: 'Would that this night would end, and I could have better light for shooting.'
card.game_text: Response: If an Elf wins a skirmish, exert that Elf to liberate a site or wound a minion.

card.title: Ordulus
card.subtitle: Young Warrior
card.lore: Ordulus always has an arrow nocked and a full quiver too.
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. The twilight cost of each ranged weapon played on Ordulus is -1.

card.title: Pengedhel
card.subtitle: Naith Warrior
card.lore: Pengedhel can wield an arrow like a short spear.
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. While Pengedhel bears a ranged weapon, he is strength +2 and he does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.title: Strength of Arms
card.lore: Elvish weapons were more than a match for the Uruks.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time an Elf wins a skirmish, you may place an [ELVEN] token on this card. Skirmish: Make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -1 for each [ELVEN] token here (limit -3). Discard this condition.

card.title: Supporting Fire
card.lore: Sword-work is made easier with archery support.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +3 if you spot 3 Elf companions).

card.title: Sword-wall
card.lore: A fixed line of Elven blades can hold off great numbers of the Enemy's hordes.
card.game_text: Skirmish or Regroup: Spot 3 Elf companions to liberate a site or exert a minion.

card.title: Thandronen
card.subtitle: Veteran Protector
card.lore: The twin sons of Thandronen marched with their father to defend Helm's Deep.
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Regroup: Exert Thandronen to discard a minion stacked on a condition or stacked on a site.

card.title: Thonnas
card.subtitle: Naith Captain
card.lore: Elves of Lrien hone their knife-work fighting Goblin raiders.
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. While Thonnas bears a ranged weapon, each minion skirmishing him is strength -2 and Thonnas does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.title: Valor
card.lore: An Elf avoids taking up arms, but once committed to the fray, his will is resolute.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +3 if skirmishing a wounded minion).

card.title: Behold the White Rider
card.lore: 'Gandalf is come again.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time Gandalf wins a skirmish, you may place a [GANDALF] token here. Skirmish: Wound a minion skirmishing Gandalf for each [GANDALF] token here. Discard this condition.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Greyhame
card.lore: 'Dangerous!... And so am I, very dangerous; more dangerous than anything you will ever meet....'
card.game_text: Fellowship: If the twilight pool has fewer than 2 twilight tokens, add [2] to play a character from your discard pile.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: The White Wizard
card.lore: 'Behold, I am not Gandalf the Grey, whom you betrayed. I am Gandalf the White, who has returned from death.'
card.game_text: While you can spot 3 twilight tokens, Gandalf is strength +3.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: The White Wizard
card.lore: 'Behold, I am not Gandalf the Grey, whom you betrayed. I am Gandalf the White, who has returned from death.'
card.game_text: While you can spot 3 twilight tokens, Gandalf is strength +3.

card.title: Gandalf's Staff
card.subtitle: Walking Stick
card.lore: 'The staff in the hand of a Wizard may be more than a prop for age....'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. While you can spot 2 twilight tokens, Gandalf is damage +2.

card.title: Grown Suddenly Tall
card.lore: His hood and grey rags were flung away. His white garments shone.
card.game_text: Spell. Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to discard all conditions.

card.title: Have Patience
card.lore: 'Go where you must go, and hope!'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to heal an unbound companion twice.

card.title: Hearken to Me
card.lore: 'Not all is dark. Take courage, Lord of the Mark; for better help you will not find.'
card.game_text: Spell. To play, spot Gandalf. Bearer must be Theoden. Discard all Shadow conditions on Theoden. Shadow conditions may not be played on Theoden.

card.title: Into Dark Tunnels
card.lore: 'Even Sauron knows them not. They are older than he. Now I have walked there, but I will bring no report to darken the light of day.'
card.game_text: Spell. Response: If you play a [GANDALF] event, exert Gandalf twice to place that event in your hand instead of your discard pile.

card.title: Keep Your Forked Tongue
card.lore: 'A witless worm you have become.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Spot Gandalf and 3 twilight tokens to prevent all wounds to a companion who has the Gandalf signet.

card.title: Long I Fell
card.lore: 'His fire was about me. I was burned.'
card.game_text: Spell. Skirmish: Spot Gandalf to prevent all wounds to him. Any Shadow player may make you wound a minion to prevent this.

card.title: Mithrandir
card.subtitle: Mithrandir!
card.lore: The wild men fell on their faces before him.
card.game_text: Spell. Maneuver: Exert Gandalf to wound each minion who has strength of 6 or less.

card.title: Roll of Thunder
card.lore: 'I have not passed through fire and death to bandy crooked words with a serving-man till the lightning falls.'
card.game_text: Fellowship or Maneuver: Spot Gandalf to discard a Shadow possession or Shadow artifact.

card.title: Shadowfax
card.lore: 'He is the chief of the Mearas, lords of horses....'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Discard any hand weapon he bears. Gandalf may not bear a hand weapon. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, each minion skirmishing him must exert.

card.title: Shadowfax
card.lore: 'He is the chief of the Mearas, lords of horses....'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Discard any hand weapon he bears. Gandalf may not bear a hand weapon. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, each minion skirmishing him must exert.

card.title: Stump and Bramble
card.lore: 'Many of those trees were my friends... many had voices of their own that are lost for ever now.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot an [ISENGARD] minion and an Ent ally. Until the regroup phase, that ally is damage +2 and participates in archery fire and skirmishes.

card.title: Task Was Not Done
card.lore: 'Naked I was sent back - for a brief time, until my task is done. And naked I lay upon the mountain-top.'
card.game_text: Spell. Regroup: Exert Gandalf to discard up to 2 wounded minions.

card.title: Treebeard
card.subtitle: Earthborn
card.lore: 'Do not be hasty, that is my motto.'
card.game_text: Unhasty. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to be discarded, stack him here instead. Fellowship: Exert Treebeard and add[1] to play an unbound Hobbit stacked here.

card.title: Treebeard
card.subtitle: Earthborn
card.lore: 'Do not be hasty, that is my motto.'
card.game_text: Unhasty. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to be discarded, stack him here instead. Fellowship: Exert Treebeard and add [1] to play an unbound Hobbit stacked here.

card.title: Treebeard
card.subtitle: Oldest Living Thing
card.lore: 'No, I am not tired. I do not easily get tired. And I do not sit down. I am not very, hm, bendable.'
card.game_text: Unhasty. Fellowship: Exert Treebeard and discard an unbound companion from hand to heal an unbound companion.

card.title: Under the Living Earth
card.notes: The twilight token added for the cost of this card adds to the strength bonus provided by its effect. For example: if the twilight pool is empty when this card is played, Gandalf is strength +1.
card.lore: 'Thither I came at last, to the uttermost foundations of stone. He was with me still.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make Gandalf strength +1 for each twilight token you spot (limit +5).

card.title: Well Met Indeed
card.lore: 'And what may you be doing in these parts? An Elf, a Man, and a Dwarf, all clad in elvish fashion.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot an Elf, a [GONDOR] Man, and a Dwarf to play Gandalf from your dead pile.

card.title: Windows in a Stone Wall
card.game_text: To play, exert an Ent. Plays on that Ent. Response: If an [ISENGARD] minion is killed, discard this condition to reveal the top 10 cards of an opponent's draw deck. Discard 1 Shadow card and 1 Free Peoples card revealed. Your opponent reshuffles that deck.

card.title: Wizardry Indeed
card.lore: The hosts of Isengard roared, swaying this way and that, turning from fear to fear.
card.game_text: Maneuver: If you can spot more minions than companions, exert Gandalf to make an opponent discard a minion.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Heir of Elendil
card.lore: 'Sauron fears you, Aragorn, he fears what you may become.'
card.game_text: Defender +1.

card.title: Arrows Thick in the Air
card.lore: He came to rest in the fern a few feet away, face downward, green arrow-feathers sticking from his neck below a golden collar.
card.game_text: Archery or Skirmish: Exert 2 Ring-bound Men to wound each roaming minion.

card.title: Boromir
card.subtitle: My Brother
card.lore: 'Where is thy horn? Whither goest thou? O Boromir! But he was gone.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Faramir. Skirmish: Discard a [GONDOR] card from hand to make a Ring-bound Man strength +1.

card.title: Boromir's Gauntlets
card.lore: '...now Boromir has taken his road, and we must make haste to choose our own.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Skirmish: Exert bearer to cancel a skirmish involving bearer. Any Shadow player may remove [1] to prevent this.

card.title: Curse Them
card.lore: 'It is close on ten leagues hence to the eastshore of Anduin... and we seldom come so far afield.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert a Ring-bound Man to cancel a skirmish involving a roaming minion.

card.title: Damrod
card.subtitle: Ranger of Ithilien
card.lore: 'I doubt not that the days of Gondor are numbered, and the walls of Minas Tirith are doomed, so great is His strength and malice.'
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Ranger. To play, spot a Ring-bound Man. Skirmish: Exert Damrod to exhaust a Man he is skirmishing.

card.title: Defend It and Hope
card.lore: 'Is it not said that no foe has ever taken the Hornburg, if men defended it?'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a [GONDOR] Man to wound a minion once (or twice if that minion is an Uruk-hai).

card.title: Faramir
card.subtitle: Captain of Gondor
card.lore: 'He leads us now in all perilous ventures.'
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Ranger. The twilight cost of each other [GONDOR] Man in your starting fellowship is -1. While skirmishing a roaming minion, Faramir is strength +2.

card.title: Faramir
card.subtitle: Son of Denethor
card.lore: He could see Faramir's face, which was now unmasked; it was stern and commanding, and a keen wit lay behind his searching glance.
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Ranger. An opponent may not play skirmish events or use skirmish special abilities during skirmishes involving Faramir.

card.title: Faramir's Bow
card.lore: 'Were I as hasty as you, I might have slain you long ago.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Faramir. He is an archer. Skirmish: If Faramir is skirmishing a Man or a roaming minion, exert Faramir to wound that minion.

card.title: Faramir's Cloak
card.lore: Captain Faramir and his rangers were clad in green and brown of varied hues, better to walk unseen in the glades of Ithilien.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Faramir. Each roaming minion skirmishing a Ring-bound Man is strength -1.

card.title: Forbidden Pool
card.lore: '...tonight you have come where it is death to come.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at site 6T, each Ring-bound Man takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase. Fellowship: Add [2] and discard this condition to heal a Ring-bound Man.

card.title: Forests of Ithilien
card.lore: ...a fair country of climbing woods and swift-falling streams.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at site 5T, the site number of each Man in a skirmish is +2. Regroup: Discard this condition and exert a Ring-bound Man to liberate a site.

card.title: Gondorian Ranger
card.lore: Green gauntlets covered their hands, and their faces were hooded and masked with green, except for their eyes, which were very keen and bright.
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Ranger. The site number of each minion assigned to skirmish a Ring-bound Man is +2.

card.title: Hard Choice
card.lore: 'Shall we rest by night, or shall we go on while our will and strength hold?'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot Aragorn to heal a companion who has the Aragorn signet twice.

card.title: Help in Doubt and Need
card.lore: 'The Heir of Elendil would be a strength indeed to the Sons of Eorl in this evil tide.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert an unbound [GONDOR] Man to make a [ROHAN] companion strength +2, or exert a [ROHAN] companion to make an unbound [GONDOR] Man strength +2.

card.title: Henneth Annun
card.lore: 'This is the Window of the Sunset....'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at site 6T, each roaming minion skirmishing a Ring-bound companion is strength -2. Skirmish: Spot a [GONDOR] Man and discard this condition to wound a roaming minion.

card.title: Ithilien Trap
card.lore: He was glad he could not see the dead face.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time a [GONDOR] Man wins a skirmish, you may place a [GONDOR] token here. Maneuver: Exert a minion for each [GONDOR] token here (limit 3). Discard this condition.

card.title: Mablung
card.subtitle: Soldier of Gondor
card.lore: '...we have a new errand on this journey....'
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Ranger. To play, spot a Ring-bound Man. Skirmish: Exert Mablung to exhaust a roaming minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: New Errand
card.lore: '...we come to ambush the Men of Harad.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Spot a Ring-bound Man to make a minion's site number +2. If that minion loses this skirmish, you may wound a minion.

card.title: Pathfinder
card.lore: 'If you take my counsel, you will not turn eastward yet. Go straight on, for thus you will have the cover of the woodland for many miles.'
card.game_text: Fellowship or Regroup: Spot a ranger to play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

card.title: Ranger of Ithilien
card.lore: ...they were goodly men, pale-skinned, dark of hair, with grey eyes and faces sad and proud.
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Ranger. When this companion is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. While skirmishing a roaming minion, this companion is strength +2.

card.title: Ranger's Bow
card.lore: Two had great bows, almost of their own height, and great quivers of long green-feathered arrows.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Ring-bound Man. Skirmish: If bearer is skirmishing a Man or a roaming minion, exert bearer to wound that minion.

card.title: Ranger's Sword
card.subtitle: Blade of Aragorn
card.lore: 'I am not weaponless.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Aragorn. While skirmishing an Uruk-hai, Aragorn is strength +2.

card.title: Ruins of Osgiliath
card.lore: The Citadel of the Stars had fallen into ruin.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at site 7T, each Ring-bound Man is defender +1. Skirmish: Spot a Ring-bound Man and discard this condition to wound an opponent's Man.

card.title: Sword of Gondor
card.lore: Four tall Men stood there.... All had swords at their sides....
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. While skirmishing a Man or a roaming minion, bearer is damage +1.

card.title: War and Valor
card.lore: 'So even was my brother, Boromir: a man of prowess, and for that he was accounted the best man in Gondor.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a [GONDOR] Man strength +2 (or +3 and damage +1 if skirmishing a roaming minion).

card.title: Advance Uruk Patrol
card.lore: 'This is no rabble of mindless Orcs.'
card.game_text: Damage +1. While at a battleground, this minion is fierce. While you control a battleground, this minion is strength +4.

card.title: Attack on Helm's Deep
card.lore: 'Ten thousand strong at least....'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Play an Uruk-hai to place an [ISENGARD] token on this card. Regroup: Remove 3 [ISENGARD] tokens from this card and discard an Uruk-hai to take control of a site.

card.title: Band of Uruk Bowmen
card.lore: Taking the high ground provides a better field of fire.
card.game_text: Archer. Damage +1. While you control a site, the minion archery total is +1.

card.title: Banished
card.lore: 'Oh, but this is not from me - it comes from the King. He signed it this morning.'
card.game_text: To play, exert Saruman or an [ISENGARD] Man. Plays on a Free Peoples Man. Each time another ally or companion loses a skirmish, bearer must exert.

card.title: Beyond All Hope
card.lore: 'How shall any tower withstand such numbers and such reckless hate?'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert 2 Uruk-hai to add a burden for each card in the dead pile.

card.title: Beyond Dark Mountains
card.lore: Where now was the Ring-bearer? How thin indeed was the thread upon which doom still hung!
card.game_text: Response: If a companion or ally is killed, exert an [ISENGARD] minion to add a burden (or 2 burdens if Aragorn, Gandalf, or Theoden is killed).

card.title: Broad-bladed Sword
card.lore: They were armed with short broad-bladed swords, not with the curved scimitars usual with Orcs....
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Uruk-hai. Bearer may not take wounds (except during skirmish phases).

card.title: Brought Back Alive
card.lore: 'What are they wanted for?... Why alive? Do they give good sport?'
card.game_text: Search. Assignment: Exert an [ISENGARD] tracker to assign it to an unbound companion. That companion may exert to prevent this (unless that companion is a Hobbit).

card.title: Burning of Westfold
card.lore: 'We have found many of our folk lying slain as they fled....'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: If you control a site, play an Uruk-hai to discard a Free Peoples condition.

card.title: Cloud of Arrows
card.lore: Behind them orc-archers crowded, sending a hail of darts against the bowmen on the walls.
card.game_text: Archery: Exert an [ISENGARD] archer to make the minion archery total +1 and the fellowship archery total -1.

card.title: Come Down
card.notes: This card allows all allies to take wounds from archery fire.
card.lore: 'We are the fighting Uruk-hai.... Bring out your skulking king!'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Archery: Spot 2 [ISENGARD] archers to make allies take wounds from archery fire instead of companions.

card.title: Covering Fire
card.lore: Archers cowered on the walls, unable to reply.
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [ISENGARD] archers. Plays to your support area. The Free Peoples player may not play archery events or use archery special abilities. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.

card.title: Down to the Last Child
card.lore: The Uruks brought death to the villages of Rohan.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving an Uruk-hai, place an [ISENGARD] token on this card. Shadow: Remove 2 [ISENGARD] tokens from this card to take control of a site.

card.title: Driven Back
card.lore: With each fallen defender, the morale of the attacking army rose.
card.game_text: Archery: Spot 2 [ISENGARD] archers to make the minion archery total +1 for each card in the dead pile.

card.title: Elite Crossbowmen
card.lore: The best archers were held in reserve, awaiting the final assault.;Archer. Damage +1. Archery: Exert Elite Crossbowmen to make the Free Peoples player wound an unbound companion
card.game_text: this minion does not add to the minion archery total.

card.title: Ferocity
card.lore: Uruk savagery remained despite their battle training.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make an Uruk-hai strength +2 (or +3 if at a battleground).

card.title: Get Back
card.lore: 'We do not answer to Mordor scum!'
card.game_text: Assignment: Prevent an [ISENGARD] tracker from being assigned to a skirmish by any player.

card.title: Grima
card.subtitle: Son of Galmod
card.lore: 'Did I not counsel you, lord, to forbid his staff?'
card.game_text: Each unbound companion (or ally) bearing a Shadow condition is strength -1.

card.title: Grima
card.subtitle: Wormtongue
card.lore: 'I care for you and yours as best I may. But do not weary yourself, or tax too heavily your strength.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert Grima and spot an unbound companion bearing 3 or more cards to return each Free Peoples card that companion bears to its owner's hand.

card.title: Grima
card.subtitle: Wormtongue
card.lore: 'I care for you and yours as best I may. But do not weary yourself, or tax too heavily your strength.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert Grima and spot an unbound companion bearing 3 or more cards to return each Free Peoples card that companion bears to its owner's hand.

card.title: Haunting Her Steps
card.lore: 'What was the promised price? When all the men were dead, you were to pick your share of the treasure and take the woman you desire?'
card.game_text: Response: If a special ability of an ally or unbound companion is used, exert Grima to cancel that action.

card.title: Kill Them Now
card.lore: 'They're a cursed nuisance, and we're in a hurry.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make an [ISENGARD] tracker strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing a character bearing a search card).

card.title: Leechcraft
card.lore: 'Your leechcraft ere long would have had me walking on all fours like a beast.'
card.game_text: Spell. To play, exert Saruman or an [ISENGARD] Man. Plays on a Free Peoples Man. Special abilities in bearer's game text may not be used.

card.title: Lieutenant of Orthanc
card.lore: 'Do you wish to see the greatness of our army? We are the fighting Uruk-hai.'
card.game_text: Damage +1. Maneuver: Exert Lieutenant of Orthanc to make another Uruk-hai fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Many Riddles
card.lore: 'It will be hard news for Frodo....'
card.game_text: Search. To play, exert an [ISENGARD] tracker. Plays on a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Assignment: Exert an [ISENGARD] tracker and remove [2] to assign that tracker to bearer. Bearer may exert to prevent this.

card.title: Mauhur
card.subtitle: Patrol Leader
card.lore: 'Mauhr and his lads are in the forest, and they should turn up any time now.'
card.game_text: Tracker. Fierce. Skirmish: Remove [2] to prevent an [ISENGARD] tracker from taking wounds.

card.title: Men Will Fall
card.lore: 'The Ring of Barahir. So, Gandalf Greyhame thinks he has found Isildur's heir, the Lost King of Gondor... Fool! That line was broken years ago.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Spot Saruman or an [ISENGARD] Man to make an unbound companion strength -2.

card.title: New Power Rising
card.lore: 'For those who aid the Great Eye there will be rich reward.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Spot Saruman or an [ISENGARD] Man, reveal your hand, and discard all Free Peoples cards revealed to take an [ISENGARD] card into hand from your discard pile.

card.title: No Dawn for Men
card.lore: 'This night, the land will be stained with the blood of Rohan....'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert an Uruk-hai to exert X unbound companions, where X is the number of sites you control.

card.title: Orthanc Champion
card.lore: A warrior trained in single combat, he tore a swath through the defenders.
