card.game_text: Damage +1. Assignment: Exert Orthanc Champion to assign it to an unbound companion. That companion may exert to prevent this.

card.title: Orthanc Warrior
card.lore: The Uruk-hai bred by Saruman are stronger and more fell than Orcs of Mordor.
card.game_text: Damage +1.

card.title: The Palantir of Orthanc
card.subtitle: Seventh Seeing-stone
card.lore: 'The name meant that which looks far away.'
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ISENGARD] minion. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Spot an [ISENGARD] minion and remove [2] to reveal the top card of any draw deck. You may place that card beneath that draw deck.

card.title: Pillage of Rohan
card.lore: Rumor of plunder swelled the ranks of the Isengarders.
card.game_text: Plays on a site you control. While an Uruk-hai is stacked on this site, the Free Peoples player may not play skirmish events or use skirmish special abilities.

card.title: Race Across the Mark
card.lore: 'But in the meantime, the Uruk-hai of Isengard can do the dirty work as usual.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Spot a site you control and remove [2] to cancel a skirmish involving an Uruk-hai.

card.title: Ranged Commander
card.lore: Hand-picked Uruks led Saruman's crossbowmen.;Archer. The twilight cost of each [ISENGARD] archer is -1. Archery: Exert Ranged Commander to make the Free Peoples player wound an unbound companion
card.game_text: this minion does not add to the minion archery total.

card.title: Ranks Without Number
card.lore: 'All Isengard must be emptied....'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns an ally to a skirmish, you may play an [ISENGARD] minion from your discard pile. That minion's twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Rest While You Can
card.game_text: Search. To play, spot an [ISENGARD] tracker. Plays on a companion. Limit 1 per companion. If bearer is killed, reveal the top 10 cards of opponent's draw deck and discard 1 Shadow card and 1 Free Peoples card. Your opponent reshuffles that deck.

card.title: Rohan Is Mine
card.lore: 'You have no power here, Gandalf the Grey.'
card.game_text: To play, spot Saruman or an [ISENGARD] Man. Plays on a Free Peoples Man. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns bearer to a skirmish, exert each ally.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Black Traitor
card.game_text: Saruman may not take wounds during the archery phase and may not be assigned to a skirmish. When you play Saruman, you may discard a condition. Shadow: Exert Saruman to play Saruman's Staff from your discard pile.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Black Traitor
card.game_text: Saruman may not take wounds during the archery phase and may not be assigned to a skirmish. When you play Saruman, you may discard a condition. Shadow: Exert Saruman to play Saruman's Staff from your discard pile.

card.title: Saruman's Staff
card.subtitle: Wizard's Device
card.lore: His hand clutched his heavy black staff like a claw.
card.game_text: Plays on Saruman. He is fierce and damage +1. Maneuver: Make the first sentence of Saruman's game text not apply until the regroup phase.

card.title: Still They Came
card.lore: Before the wall's foot the dead and broken were piled like shingle in a storm; ever higher rose the hideous mounds....
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert an Uruk-hai who is not assigned to a skirmish to make another Uruk-hai strength +3.

card.title: Ugluk
card.subtitle: Servant of Saruman
card.lore: 'I am Uglk. I command.'
card.game_text: Tracker. Fierce. The roaming penalty for each [ISENGARD] tracker you play is -2. While you can spot 2 [ISENGARD] trackers, Ugluk is strength +3. While you can spot 3 [ISENGARD] trackers, Ugluk is damage +1.

card.title: Ugluk
card.subtitle: Servant of Saruman
card.lore: 'I am Uglk. I command.'
card.game_text: Tracker. Fierce. The roaming penalty for each [ISENGARD] tracker you pay is -2. While you can spot 2 [ISENGARD] trackers, Ugluk is strength +3. While you can spot 3 [ISENGARD] trackers, Ugluk is damage +1.

card.title: Ugluk's Sword
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Uruk-hai. Shadow: If bearer is Ugluk, exert it and discard a minion from hand to play a minion. Its twilight cost is -3.

card.title: Unferth
card.subtitle: Grima's Bodyguard
card.lore: Grma promised him riches when Rohan fell to Saruman.
card.game_text: Each time the Free Peoples player assigns a companion or ally to an [ISENGARD] Man, that companion or ally must exert.

card.title: Uruk Assault Band
card.game_text: Damage +1. To play, spot an Uruk-hai. While at a battleground, this minion is fierce. While you control a battleground, this minion is strength +6. While you control 2 battlegrounds, this minion may not take wounds.

card.title: Uruk Besieger
card.lore: Fresh troops awaited to attack any weakness.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Regroup: Stack this minion on a site you control. Shadow: If stacked on a site you control, play this minion. Its twilight cost is -1.

card.title: Uruk Chaser
card.lore: 'Now we'll have to leg it double quick.'
card.game_text: Tracker. Fierce. During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it is strength +2.

card.title: Uruk Crossbow Troop
card.lore: Bolts from the Uruk crossbows shattered the shields of the defenders.
card.game_text: Archer. When you play this minion, you may place an [ISENGARD] token on a machine.

card.title: Uruk Crossbowman
card.lore: Both the weapon and its wielder were foul creations of Saruman.;Archer. Archery: Exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player wound an unbound companion
card.game_text: this minion does not add to the minion archery total.

card.title: Uruk Defender
card.lore: Saruman's Uruk army trained in formation tactics.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert this minion at a battleground to make another Uruk-hai strength +2.

card.title: Uruk Fanatic
card.lore: Despite intensive training, the smell of blood still enraged the Uruk warriors.
card.game_text: Damage +1. If there are at least 3 cards in the dead pile, this minion is fierce.

card.title: Uruk Follower
card.lore: But at the moment Uglk was not engaged in sport. He needed speed and had to humour unwilling followers.
card.game_text: Tracker. Fierce. Unbound Hobbits may not be discarded. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is killed, exert this minion to add a burden.

card.title: Uruk Foot Soldier
card.lore: 'Evening's coming on, and we ought to get a move on.'
card.game_text: Tracker. Fierce. During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it is strength +3 and damage +1.

card.title: Uruk Hunter
card.lore: 'We came out of Isengard, and led you here, and we shall lead you back the way we choose.'
card.game_text: Tracker. Fierce. Unbound Hobbits may not be discarded. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is killed, exert this minion twice to exhaust a companion.

card.title: Uruk Plains Runner
card.lore: 'Run! Or you'll never see your beloved holes again!'
card.game_text: Tracker. Fierce. During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it is strength +3 and damage +1.

card.title: Uruk Pursuer
card.lore: 'None of that! Hold your tongues.'
card.game_text: Tracker. Fierce. Unbound Hobbits may not be discarded. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is killed, exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player wound an unbound companion.

card.title: Uruk Rear Guard
card.lore: Promised a fair share of plunder, they defended against possible reinforcements.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert this minion at a battleground to make another Uruk-hai strength +1.

card.title: Uruk Regular
card.notes: This card's special ability makes the twilight cost of an Uruk-hai -1 for each Uruk-hai you spot other than this card. For example: if you have four Uruk Regulars in play and you use the special ability on one of them to play an Uruk Searcher (twilight cost of 4), the Searcher's twilight cost is 1.
card.lore: 'We are the Uruk-hai; we do not stop the fight for night or day, for fair weather or for storm.'
card.game_text: Damage +1. Shadow: Exert this minion to play an Uruk-hai

card.title: Uruk Runner
card.lore: 'Run, curse you! Run while night lasts!'
card.game_text: Tracker. Fierce. During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it is strength +2.

card.title: Uruk Searcher
card.lore: 'Why don't we search them and find out?'
card.game_text: Tracker. Fierce. While skirmishing a character bearing a search card, this minion is strength +2 and damage +1.

card.title: Uruk Seeker
card.lore: 'No crying out, no trying to escape.'
card.game_text: Tracker. Fierce. While skirmishing a character bearing a search card, this minion is strength +2 and damage +1.

card.title: Uruk Spear
card.lore: The Uruk-hai braced their long pikes to challenge the oncoming Riders.
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Uruk-hai. Maneuver: Exert bearer to discard a Free Peoples mount.

card.title: Uruk Stalker
card.lore: A moment they hesitated, and then on they came.
card.game_text: Damage +1. While an ally is in the dead pile, this minion is strength +3 and fierce.

card.title: Uruk Stormer
card.lore: They wavered, broke, and fled back; and then charged again, broke and charged again
card.game_text: and each time, like the incoming sea, they halted at a higher point.

card.title: Uruk Trooper
card.lore: Thousands of Uruk-hai came to take the Hornburg.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Regroup: Stack this minion on a site you control. Shadow: If stacked on a site you control, play this minion. Its twilight cost is -1.

card.title: Uruk Vanguard
card.lore: 'These are Uruk-hai - their armour is thick, their shields broad.'
card.game_text: Damage +1 (or damage +2 if at a battleground). To play, spot an Uruk-hai. While at a battleground, this minion is fierce.

card.title: Uruk Veteran
card.lore: 'We come to kill, by sun or moon.'
card.game_text: Damage +1. Regroup: Stack this minion on a site you control. Shadow: If stacked on a site you control, play this minion. Its twilight cost is -1.

card.title: Uruk-hai Band
card.lore: There were four... of greater stature, swart, slant-eyed, with thick legs and broad hands.
card.game_text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +2 for each site you control.

card.title: Uruk-hai Horde
card.lore: The rumour of war grew behind them.
card.game_text: Damage +1. The twilight cost of this minion is -1 for each site you control.

card.title: Uruk-hai Marauder
card.lore: 'We shall have some fun later.'
card.game_text: Damage +1. The twilight cost of this minion is -1 for each site you control.

card.title: Uruk-hai Mob
card.lore: 'Let the fighting Uruk-hai do the work, as usual.'
card.game_text: Damage +1. The twilight cost of this minion is -1 for each site you control.

card.title: Uruk-hai Patrol
card.lore: 'We are the servants of Saruman the Wise....'
card.game_text: Damage +1(or damage +2 while you control a site).

card.title: Uruk-hai Raiding Party
card.lore: Bands of Uruks crossed the plains of Rohan.
card.game_text: Damage +1.

card.title: Vengeance
card.lore: Saruman instilled a spirit for revenge in his fighting brood.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make an [ISENGARD] tracker strength +2 for each card borne by the character it is skirmishing.

card.title: Volley Fire
card.lore: Defenders on the walls made perfect targets for the Isengard crossbowmen.
card.game_text: Archery: Discard 2 [ISENGARD] archers to exhaust an unbound companion.

card.title: We Are the Fighting Uruk-hai
card.lore: 'But for us you'd all have run away.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make an Uruk-hai strength +2 (and damage +1 if you control a site).

card.title: Weapons of Isengard
card.lore: Crossbowmen arrived with munitions from Isengard.
card.game_text: Machine. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Play an [ISENGARD] archer to place an [ISENGARD] token on this card. Archery: Remove 2 [ISENGARD] tokens from this card to make the minion archery total +2. Discard this condition.

card.title: Weary
card.lore: 'We shall not turn back here.'
card.game_text: Search. Plays on a companion or ally. Limit 1 per character. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns bearer to skirmish an [ISENGARD] tracker, bearer must exert.

card.title: What Did You Discover?
card.lore: 'The scouts have come back at last.'
card.game_text: Search. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may discard 2 cards from hand to take an [ISENGARD] tracker from your discard pile into hand.

card.title: Where Has Grima Stowed It?
card.lore: 'Loth was he to render up the keys. Many other things are there which men have missed.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot Grima to discard a possession borne by an ally or unbound companion.

card.title: Wounded
card.lore: 'He's alive!'
card.game_text: To play, exert an [ISENGARD] Man. Plays on a Free Peoples Man. When you play this condition, exert bearer. Wounds may not be removed from bearer.

card.title: Arrow From the South
card.lore: Haradrim is the Gondorian name for Southrons.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving a [RAIDER] Man, you may place a [RAIDER] token here. Archery: Heal a [RAIDER] archer for each [RAIDER] token here. Discard this condition.

card.title: Desert Lancers
card.lore: 'Mordor has allied itself with... the cruel Haradrim....'
card.game_text: Southron. To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. Regroup: Exert Desert Lancers twice to take control of a site.

card.title: Desert Legion
card.game_text: Southron. Ambush [1]. While you can spot 4 burdens, this minion is strength +5. While you can spot 5 burdens, this minion is fierce. While you can spot 6 burdens, this minion is damage +1.

card.title: Desert Lord
card.lore: Southron legends tell of powerful warrior leaders and the kingdoms they have conquered.;Southron. Archer. Archery: Exert Desert Lord to exert a companion (except the Ring-bearer)
card.game_text: Desert Lord does not add to the minion archery total.

card.title: Desert Lord
card.lore: Southron legends tell of powerful warrior leaders and the kingdoms they have conquered.;Southron. Archer. Archery: Exert Desert Lord to exert a companion (exept the Ring-bearer)
card.game_text: Desert Lord does not add to the minion archery total.

card.title: Desert Soldier
card.lore: 'Not nice; very cruel wicked Men they look.'
card.game_text: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove [3] to wound a companion or ally he is skirmishing.

card.title: Desert Spearman
card.lore: Long spears are used by Southrons to attack while riding desert beasts.
card.game_text: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove [3] to wound a companion or ally he is skirmishing.

card.title: Desert Warrior
card.lore: The Haradrim wear cloaks and head wraps to survive the deserts of their homeland.
card.game_text: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove [3] to wound a companion or ally he is skirmishing.

card.title: Discovered
card.lore: The voices and the clink of weapons and harness were very close.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a [RAIDER] Man to discard a Free Peoples condition (or 2 Free Peoples conditions if you spot 3 burdens).

card.title: Easterling Axeman
card.lore: Poleaxes wielded by tall Easterling warriors cut through armor and bone.
card.game_text: Easterling. While you can spot 2 burdens, this minion is strength +3 and fierce.

card.title: Easterling Captain
card.game_text: Easterling. Fierce. Skirmish: Spot 2 burdens and remove [2] to make an Easterling strength +2. Skirmish: Spot 4 burdens and remove [2] to make an Easterling strength +3. Skirmish: Spot 6 burdens and remove [2] to make an Easterling strength +4.

card.title: Easterling Captain
card.game_text: Easterling. Fierce. Skirmish: Spot 2 burdens and remove [2] to make an Easterling strength +2. Skirmish: Spot 4 burdens and remove [2] to make an Easterling strength +3. Skirmish: Spot 6 burdens and remove [2] to make an Easterling strength +4.

card.title: Easterling Guard
card.lore: Armored Easterlings protect their commanders from enemy assaults.
card.game_text: Easterling. Each time this minion is assigned to an unbound companion, you may exert him to add a burden.

card.title: Easterling Infantry
card.lore: Sometimes called the Men of Rhn, the Easterlings hated Gondor for her riches.
card.game_text: Easterling. While you can spot 3 burdens, this minion is fierce and damage +1.

card.title: Easterling Lieutenant
card.lore: 'Easterlings... have passed through the Black Gate....'
card.game_text: Easterling. Each time this minion is assigned to an unbound companion, you may exert him to add a burden.

card.title: Easterling Skirmisher
card.lore: Enemy formations are threatened by the spears of Easterling light troops.
card.game_text: Easterling. When you play this minion, you may spot another Easterling to add [1] for each burden (limit [4]).

card.title: Easterling Trooper
card.lore: Trained Easterling fighters formed ranks of axes and spears to charge the knights of Gondor.
card.game_text: Easterling. While you can spot 3 burdens, this minion is fierce and damage +1.

card.title: Eastern Emyn Muil
card.lore: The Emyn Muil was a strange, twisted knot of hills.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each Ring-bound companion moving from site 2T must exert twice. Maneuver: Discard this condition and exert a [RAIDER] Man to exert a Ring-bound companion.

card.title: Elite Archer
card.lore: Veteran bowmen are highly valued in the kingdoms of the South.;Southron. Archer. Archery: Exert this minion to exert a companion (except the Ring-bearer)
card.game_text: this minion does not add to the minion archery total.

card.title: Fearless
card.lore: Despite their foreign ways, the Men from the South and East were formidable fighters.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a Southron strength +1 for each burden you spot (limit +5), or make a [RAIDER] Man strength +2.

card.title: Flanking Attack
card.lore: 'Our scouts report more Haradrim making their way up here....'
card.game_text: Maneuver or Skirmish: Exert a Southron to add [3].

card.title: Gathering to the Summons
card.lore: These were Men of other race, out of the wide Eastlands....
card.game_text: Skirmish: Spot a [RAIDER] Man skirmishing a Ring-bound companion to add a burden.

card.title: Howl of Harad
card.lore: Blood-curdling cries rout the Southrons' enemies from the battlefield.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving a Southron, you may remove [4] to make the Free Peoples Player wound a Ring-bound companion.

card.title: Ithilien Wilderness
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. At the end of each phase during which the fellowship moved to site 7[TOWER], 8[TOWER], or 9[TOWER] and the twilight pool has fewer than 7 twilight tokens, you may add [8]. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [RAIDER] Man strength +2.

card.title: Men of Harad
card.lore: The savage Haradrim, men from the kingdoms south of Gondor and Mordor, were called Southrons.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Spot a site you control, spot 3 Southrons, and remove [2] to draw a card.

card.title: Men of Rhun
card.lore: Sudden war came upon Gondor out of Rhn, land of the East.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a [RAIDER] Man strength +3 (or +4 if you spot 4 burdens).

card.title: New Fear
card.lore: They heard singing and coarse shouting. At first it seemed a long way off, but it drew nearer....
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert a [RAIDER] Man to add a burden for each companion over 4. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 companions (except the Ring-bearer) to prevent this.

card.title: On the March
card.lore: Easterlings traveled up the ancient roads of Gondor to swell the hosts of the Dark Tower.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a [RAIDER] Man strength +3 (or +5 if you spot 6 companions).

card.title: Raiders From the East
card.lore: The Easterlings raid their enemies to gather supplies and equipment.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove [3] and exert a [RAIDER] Man to place a [RAIDER] token here. Maneuver: Remove a [RAIDER] token here to add [1].

card.title: Rapid Fire
card.lore: Wars between the southern kingdoms taught speed and precision to the archers of the Haradrim.
card.game_text: Archery: Exert a [RAIDER] archer to make the minion archery total +1 for each burden (limit +5).

card.title: Regiment of Haradrim
card.lore: 'One of their regiments is due by our reckoning to pass by, some time ere noon....'
card.game_text: Southron. To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. Regroup: Exert Regiment of Haradrim twice to take control of a site.

card.title: Southron Archer
card.lore: 'They have passed on to the Black Gate; but more may follow.'
card.game_text: Southron. Archer. While you can spot another Southron, the minion archery total is +1 for each site you control.

card.title: Southron Assassin
card.lore: 'Some of the Southrons have broken from the trap and are flying from the road.'
card.game_text: Southron. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving a Southron, you may remove [1] to make the Free Peoples player wound a Ring-bound companion.

card.title: Southron Bow
card.lore: Volleys from Southron bows are deadly in large numbers.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [RAIDER] Man. Bearer is an archer. While you can spot another [RAIDER] Man, the minion archery total is +1.

card.title: Southron Bowman
card.lore: The Southron armies deploy archers to harass enemy troop formations.;Southron. Archer. Archery: Exert this minion to exert a companion (except the Ring-bearer)
card.game_text: this minion does not add to the minion archery total.

card.title: Southron Commander
card.lore: 'Almost as bad as Orcs, and much bigger.'
card.game_text: Southron. Ambush [1]. Assignment: Spot 6 companions to assign this minion to the Ring-bearer. The Free Peoples player may discard an unbound companion to prevent this.

card.title: Southron Explorer
card.lore: Scouts find oases for Southron armies as they cross the deserts of Harad.
card.game_text: Southron. Regroup: Exert this minion and remove [5] to take control of a site.

card.title: Southron Fighter
card.notes: The foil version of this card has a different image from the non-foil version.
card.lore: '...they have come out of the South beyond the Great River's end....'
card.game_text: Southron. Ambush [1]. Maneuver: Exert this minion and spot 5 companions to make the Free Peoples player exert a companion.

card.title: Southron Scout
card.lore: 'They have black eyes, and long black hair, and gold rings in their ears....'
card.game_text: Southron. Ambush [2].

card.title: Southron Sentry
card.lore: Pickets guarded the borders of the Southron encampment.
card.game_text: Southron. Maneuver: Exert this minion to add [2] for each site you control.

card.title: Southron Soldier
card.lore: The kingdoms of Harad fight countless wars and train thousands of warriors.
card.game_text: Southron. Ambush [2].

card.title: Southron Spear
card.lore: Long pikes defend the Southrons against the armored knights of Gondor.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Southron. Skirmish: Remove [4] and exert bearer to wound a companion or ally bearer is skirmishing.

card.title: Southron Troop
card.game_text: Southron. Archer. Ambush [1]. To play, spot a Southron. Assignment: Spot 7 companions to assign this minion to the Ring-bearer. The Free Peoples player may make you discard a companion (except the Ring-bearer) to prevent this.

card.title: Southron Veterans
card.lore: He caught a glimpse of swarthy men... running down the slope some way off....
card.game_text: Southron. Ambush [1]. Maneuver: Exert this minion and spot 6 companions to make the Free Peoples player exert 2 companions.

card.title: Southron Wanderer
card.lore: Some desert warriors have no allegiance and work for any faction that will pay them.
card.game_text: Southron. Ambush [1]. Assignment: Exert this minion and spot 5 companions to assign this minion to the Ring-bearer. The Free Peoples player may add [4] to prevent this.

card.title: Vision From Afar
card.lore: Then he knew that the hope that had for one wild moment stirred in his heart was vain.
card.game_text: Assignment: Assign an Easterling to the Ring-bearer. The Free Peoples player may add a burden to prevent this.

card.title: Whirling Strike
card.lore: The Southrons fight with tactics the men of Gondor have never before seen.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Wound a companion or ally skirmishing a [RAIDER] Man.

card.title: Wrath of Harad
card.lore: Massed Southron troops prepared to attack Gondor.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. While you can spot a [RAIDER] Man, each Free Peoples event that spots or exerts a ranger gains this cost: 'wound a companion.' Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [RAIDER] Man strength +2.

card.title: Aldor
card.subtitle: Soldier of Edoras
card.lore: Fighting to defend his people, Aldor found courage to replace his youth.
card.game_text: Archery: Exert Aldor and spot a villager to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.title: Brego
card.lore: Brego was named for the second King of Rohan.
card.game_text: To play, spot a [ROHAN] Man. Bearer must be a Man, Elf, or Wizard. When you play Brego, you may heal bearer. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert.

card.title: Ceorl
card.subtitle: Weary Horseman
card.lore: 'We were driven back yesterday over the Isen with great loss; many perished at the crossing.'
card.game_text: Response: If your opponent is about to take control of a site, exert Ceorl and a villager to prevent this.

card.title: Elite Rider
card.lore: After him they rode: a long line of mailclad men, swift, shining, fell and fair to look upon.
card.game_text: When this companion is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. While skirmishing a wounded minion, this companion is strength +2.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Sister-son of Theoden
card.lore: 'Now indeed there is hope of victory!'
card.game_text: While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. At the start of each turn, you may heal a [ROHAN] ally.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Third Marshal of Riddermark
card.lore: Then one rode forward, a tall man, taller than the rest; from his helm as a crest a white horsetail flowed.
card.game_text: While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Eomer is strength +2 for each wound on each minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Eomer's Spear
card.lore: He advanced until the point of his spear was within a foot of Aragorn's breast.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. If bearer is Eomer and he is mounted, Eomer is damage +2.

card.title: Eothain
card.subtitle: Scout of the Mark
card.lore: 'Time is pressing.... We must hasten south, lord.'
card.game_text: Each time the fellowship moves to a plains site, each minion must exert.

card.title: Eowyn
card.subtitle: Lady of Rohan
card.lore: Thus Aragorn... beheld owyn... and thought her fair, fair and cold, like a morning of pale spring that is not yet come to womanhood.
card.game_text: Valiant. Response: If an unbound companion is about to take a wound, exert Eowyn and add [1] to prevent that wound.

card.title: Eowyn
card.subtitle: Sister-daughter of Theoden
card.lore: Slender and tall she was... but strong she seemed and stern as steel, a daughter of kings.
card.game_text: Valiant. Response: If Eowyn is exhausted and about to take a wound in a skirmish, discard 2 cards from hand to prevent that wound.

card.title: Eowyn's Sword
card.lore: ...the sword was set upright before her, and her hands were laid upon the hilt.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Eowyn. While you can spot a villager, Eowyn is damage +1.

card.title: Fight for the Villagers
card.lore: 'Bar the gates, set a watch on the surrounds, and get the women and children to the caves.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a [ROHAN] Man strength +2 (or +3 if you spot a villager).

card.title: Firefoot
card.lore: Riders of his ored claimed that omer's horse had no equal, save Shadowfax.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. If bearer is Eomer, he is defender +1. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert.

card.title: Forth Eorlingas!
card.lore: Behind them from the Deep came the stern cries of men issuing from the caves, driving forth the enemy.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert Theoden to make a companion who has the Theoden signet defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Fortress Never Fallen
card.lore: '...it was the spirit of your people that held it strong.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time a [ROHAN] Man wins a skirmish, you may place a [ROHAN] token on this card. Regroup: Discard a Shadow condition for each [ROHAN] token here. Discard this condition.

card.title: Guma
card.subtitle: Plains Farmer
card.lore: Foodstores swelled as refugees like Guma brought provisions to the Hornburg.
card.game_text: Villager. Discard Guma if an opponent controls his home site. Fellowship: Exert Guma to heal a [ROHAN] Man.

card.title: Heavy Chain
card.lore: What Man of an earlier age wore this chain? Was his end worth a song?
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Man. Bearer may not be overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.title: Helm! Helm!
card.lore: And with that shout the king came. His horse was white as snow, golden was his shield, and his spear was long.
card.game_text: Regroup: Spot 2 mounted [ROHAN] Men to liberate a site or draw 3 cards.

card.title: Herugrim
card.lore: 'Here, lord, is Herugrim, your ancient blade....'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Theoden. He is damage +1.

card.title: Hlafwine
card.subtitle: Village Farmhand
card.lore: Too old to fight, Hlafwine prepared meals for the defenders.
card.game_text: Villager. Discard Hlafwine if an opponent controls his home site. Skirmish: Exert Hlafwine to make a [ROHAN] Man strength +2.

card.title: An Honorable Charge
card.lore: 'A time may come when there will be a need for valour without renown....'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make an unbound companion strength +1 for each [ROHAN] Man you spot (limit +3).

card.title: Horse of Rohan
card.lore: Very swift were the horses of Rohan.
card.game_text: To play, spot a [ROHAN] Man. Bearer must be a Man, Elf, or Wizard. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert.

card.title: King's Mail
card.lore: Now men came bearing raiment of war from the king's hoard....
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. Bearer takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase. If bearer is Theoden, he may not take wounds except during a skirmish involving him.

card.title: Leod
card.subtitle: Westfold Herdsman
card.lore: Humble Lod was a rancher before he became a soldier at Helm's Deep.
card.game_text: Villager. Discard Leod if an opponent controls his home site. Skirmish: Exert Leod to make a mounted companion strength +2.

card.title: Rider of Rohan
card.lore: 'They are proud and wilful, but they are true-hearted, generous in thought and deed....'
card.game_text: Skirmish: If this companion is mounted, exert him to exert a minion skirmishing an unbound companion.

card.title: Rider's Mount
card.lore: Their horses were of great stature, strong and clean-limbed; their grey coats glistened, their long tails flowed in the wind....
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert.

card.title: Rider's Spear
card.lore: Shafts of the sun flared above the eastern hills and glimmered on their spears.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. If bearer is mounted, bearer is damage +1.

card.title: Simbelmyne
card.lore: 'How fair are the bright eyes in the grass! Evermind they are called... for they blossom in all seasons of the year, and grow where dead men rest.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot 2 [ROHAN] Men (or 1 valiant [ROHAN] Man) to play a [ROHAN] character or [ROHAN] possession from your draw deck.

card.title: Simbelmyne
card.lore: 'How fair are the bright eyes in the grass! Evermind they are called... for they blossom in all seasons of the year, and grow where dead men rest.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot 2 [ROHAN] Men (or 1 valiant [ROHAN] Man) to play a [ROHAN] character or [ROHAN] possession from your draw deck.

card.title: Supplies of the Mark
card.lore: 'This is all we could save, my Lady.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Add [2] and place a villager from hand beneath your draw deck to heal a [ROHAN] ally.

card.title: Sword of Rohan
card.lore: 'This is a good sword, Haleth, son of Hma... there is always hope.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. While bearer is skirmishing an Uruk-hai, bearer is damage +1.

card.title: Theoden
card.subtitle: Son of Thengel
card.lore: 'I myself will go to war, to fall in the front of the battle, if it must be.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Spot a [ROHAN] ally and exert Theoden to liberate a site.

card.title: Valleys of the Mark
card.lore: 'Where is the hand on the harpstring, and the red fire glowing? / Where is the spring and the harvest and the tall corn growing?'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time your opponent plays a roaming minion, you may spot a villager to exert that minion.

card.title: Weapon Store
card.lore: 'And to you my other guests I will offer such things as may be found in my armoury.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Exert a [ROHAN] Man to play a hand weapon from your discard pile.

card.title: Weland
card.subtitle: Smith of the Riddermark
card.lore: A tender of horses, Weland found much work at Helm's Deep.
card.game_text: Villager. Discard Weland if an opponent controls his home site. Fellowship: Exert Weland to heal a mounted companion.

card.title: Well Stored
card.lore: 'Behind us in the caves of the Deep are... old and young, children and women. But great store of food, and many beasts and their fodder, have also been gathered there.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. At the start of each fellowship phase, you may heal a villager.

card.title: Work for the Sword
card.lore: 'The Orcs are destroyed. We slaughtered them during the night.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a [ROHAN] Man strength +2 (and damage +2 if mounted).

card.title: Brace of Coneys
card.lore: 'He let them stew for close on an hour, testing them now and again with his fork, and tasting the broth.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Ring-bound Hobbit. Fellowship: Discard this possession to remove a burden.

card.title: Cliffs of Emyn Muil
card.lore: 'We've escaped from the Emyn Muil!'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. When the fellowship moves from site 1T, remove up to 2 burdens. Skirmish: Discard this condition to wound a minion a Hobbit companion is skirmishing.

card.title: Escape
card.lore: Suddenly Merry and Pippin realized that without moving they were now outside the circle....
card.game_text: Stealth. Bearer must be an unbound Hobbit. Limit 1 per character. Skirmish: Exert bearer twice to cancel a skirmish involving him. Any Shadow player may remove [1] to prevent this.

card.title: Frodo
card.subtitle: Courteous Halfling
card.notes: This card only prevents Shadow cards that make you discard from hand or draw deck. If a Shadow card gives you a choice, you may choose to discard. For example: if a Dunlending Rampager is played, Courteous Halfling does not prevent the Free Peoples player from discarding. Since the game text of the Rampager says may discard, a choice is provided.
card.lore: 'But as for us, we are Hobbits of the Shire, far to the North and West, beyond many rivers.'
card.game_text: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). While you can spot 3 unbound companions, Shadow cards may not discard cards from your hand or from the top of your draw deck.

card.title: Frodo
card.subtitle: Courteous Halfling
card.notes: Tengwar. This card only prevents Shadow cards that make you discard from hand or draw deck. If a Shadow card gives you a choice, you may choose to discard. For example: if a Dunlending Rampager is played, Courteous Halfling does not prevent the Free Peoples player from discarding. Since the game text of the Rampager says may discard, a choice is provided.
card.lore: 'But as for us, we are Hobbits of the Shire, far to the North and West, beyond many rivers.'
card.game_text: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). While you can spot 3 unbound companions, Shadow cards may not discard cards from your hand or from the top of your draw deck.

card.title: Frodo
card.subtitle: Tired Traveller
card.lore: 'We have come by long ways - out of Rivendell, or Imladris as some call it.'
card.game_text: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). Fellowship: Play a Ring-bound companion to remove a burden.

card.title: Frodo's Cloak
card.lore: Neither weather nor searching eyes found Frodo.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Frodo. Skirmish: At sites 1T to 4T, add a burden and discard this possession to cancel a skirmish involving Frodo. At any other site, discard this possession to remove a burden and heal Frodo.

card.title: Get On and Get Away
card.lore: 'The Dead can't be really there! Is it some devilry hatched in the Dark Land?'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Add 2 burdens to play the fellowship's next 2 sites (replacing opponent's sites if necessary).

card.title: Good Work
card.lore: 'You seem to have been doing well, Master Took.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time a Hobbit wins a skirmish, you may place a [SHIRE] token here. Fellowship: Remove a burden for each [SHIRE] token here (limit 3). Discard this condition.

card.title: Hobbit Sword
card.lore: Although the Ranger had never before seen a Hobbit, he recognized the swords they carried.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Hobbit.

card.title: Impatient and Angry
card.lore: He planted himself... as if he was addressing a young hobbit who had offered him what he called 'sauce' when questioned about visits to the orchard.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert Sam to make him strength +3. If Sam wins this skirmish, you may remove a burden.

card.title: Knocked on the Head
card.lore: 'I wonder if poor Merry is much hurt.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Play an unbound Hobbit from your discard pile.

card.title: Light Shining Faintly
card.lore: 'He's like that, and sometimes it shines through, somehow.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Add a burden to heal a Ring-bound companion twice.

card.title: Merry
card.subtitle: Learned Guide
card.lore: 'I don't suppose you have much notion where we are; but I spent my time at Rivendell rather better.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert the Ring-bearer to discard Merry. Any Shadow player may remove [2] to prevent this.

card.title: Merry
card.subtitle: Unquenchable Hobbit
card.lore: 'All Wizards should have a hobbit or two in their care - to teach them the meaning of the word, and to correct them.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: If Merry is not assigned to a skirmish, discard him to remove a [SAURON] Orc from a skirmish involving an unbound companion.

card.title: Mind Your Own Affairs
card.lore: 'Yet those who claim to oppose the Enemy would do well not to hinder it.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Spot Frodo and add a burden to wound a minion skirmishing a companion who has the Frodo signet.

card.title: Pippin
card.subtitle: Just a Nuisance
card.lore: 'What good have I been?... a passenger, a piece of luggage.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: If Pippin is not assigned to a skirmish, discard him to remove an Uruk-hai from a skirmish involving an unbound companion.

card.title: Pippin
card.subtitle: Woolly-footed Rascal
card.lore: 'We had foul fare with the Orcs, and little enough for days before that. It seems a long while since we could eat to heart's content.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Add a burden to discard Pippin. Any Shadow player may remove [2] to prevent this.

card.title: Sam
card.subtitle: Frodo's Gardener
card.lore: 'I am only a hobbit, and gardening's my job at home, sir, if you understand me....'
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Fellowship: Play Sam's Pack from your draw deck. Response: If Frodo is killed, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.title: Sam
card.subtitle: Samwise the Brave
card.lore: 'Frodo wouldn't have got far without Sam....'
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Response: If a Shadow card is about to add any number of burdens, spot Frodo and exert Sam to prevent this. Response: If Frodo is killed, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.title: Sam's Pack
card.lore: He still hopefully carried some of his gear in his pack....
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Ring-bound Hobbit. At the start of each turn, you may add [2] to heal a Ring-bound companion.

card.title: Seven We Had
card.lore: '...one we lost at Moria, the others we left at Parth Galen above Rauros....'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Add a burden to discard a condition borne by a Hobbit.

card.title: Severed His Bonds
card.lore: 'The cord was cut!'
card.game_text: Stealth. Skirmish: At sites 1T to 4T, cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit. At any other site, prevent a Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.title: Store-room
card.lore: 'Saruman kept enough wisdom not to trust his Orcs. He had Men to guard his gates.... Anyway, they were favoured and got good provisions.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Heal an unbound Hobbit once (or twice if you spot Gandalf).

card.title: Swiftly and Softly
card.lore: In the deep of night under hard clear stars they set off.
card.game_text: Stealth. Skirmish: At sites 1T to 5T, cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit. At any other site, prevent a Hobbit from taking more than 1 wound.

card.title: Warmed Up a Bit
card.lore: '...we shall be able to stand again, and walk.'
card.game_text: Stealth. Skirmish: Discard an unbound Hobbit.

card.title: East Wall of Rohan
card.game_text: When the fellowship moves from East Wall of Rohan, add [2].

card.title: Eastemnet Downs
card.game_text: Each time you play a companion here, you must discard 2 cards from hand.

card.title: Eastemnet Gullies
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert 2 unbound companions to play Legolas from your draw deck.

card.title: Horse-country
card.notes: This Two Towers card was misprinted in an Ents of Fangorn starter deck.
card.game_text: Plains. While you can spot a [ROHAN] mount at Horse-country, the move limit is +1 for this turn.

card.title: Plains of Rohan
card.game_text: Plains. Fellowship: Exert 2 unbound companions to play Gimli from your draw deck.

card.title: The Riddermark
card.game_text: Plains. Fellowship: Exert 2 unbound companions to play Aragorn from your draw deck.

card.title: Western Emyn Muil
card.game_text: When the Fellowship moves from Western Emyn Muil, each Ring-bound companion must exert.

card.title: Derndingle
card.notes: This Two Towers card was misprinted in an Ents of Fangorn starter deck.
card.game_text: Forest. While you can spot an unbound Hobbit at Derndingle, the move limit is +1 for this turn.

card.title: Eastfold
card.game_text: Plains. Shadow: Spot 3 [ISENGARD] trackers to prevent the fellowship from moving again this turn.

card.title: Fangorn Forest
card.game_text: Forest. Fellowship: Play Treebeard from your draw deck.

card.title: Plains of Rohan Camp
card.game_text: Plains. At the start of each fellowship phase, heal up to 3 wounds from companions.

card.title: Rohirrim Village
card.game_text: Each [DUNLAND] Man may not take wounds during the archery phase.

card.title: Uruk Camp
card.game_text: Plains. Battleground. Each time an Uruk-hai is played, that minion must exert.

card.title: Wold of Rohan
card.game_text: Plains. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns a companion or ally to a skirmish, add [1].

card.title: Barrows of Edoras
card.game_text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Place your hand beneath your draw deck and draw 4 cards.

card.title: Golden Hall
card.game_text: Sanctuary. When the fellowship moves to Golden Hall, all Free Peoples weapons must be discarded.

card.title: Stables
card.game_text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Exert a [ROHAN] Man to play a [ROHAN] mount from your draw deck (limit once per turn).

card.title: Streets of Edoras
card.game_text: Sanctuary. Each [ROHAN] ally may not participate in archery fire or skirmishes at Streets of Edoras.

card.title: Throne Room
card.game_text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Play Theoden from your draw deck.

card.title: Westemnet Plains
card.game_text: Plains. Sanctuary. Each [DUNLAND] Man may not take wounds during the archery phase.

card.title: Ered Nimrais
card.notes: When Smeagol is played to Ered Nimrais and The Nine Walkers is in play, his twilight cost is 1.
card.game_text: Mountain. The twilight cost of each companion and ally played at Ered Nimrais is +3.

card.title: Westemnet Hills
card.game_text: Plains. When the fellowship moves to Westemnet Hills, heal each mounted companion and mounted ally.

card.title: White Mountains
card.game_text: Mountain. When the fellowship moves to White Mountains, Theoden or 2 companions must exert.

card.title: White Rocks
card.game_text: Battleground. The Shadow number of this site is +1 for each mounted companion.

card.title: Deep of Helm
card.game_text: Plains. Battleground. The twilight cost of the first Uruk-hai played at Deep of Helm each turn is -3.

card.title: Deeping Wall
card.game_text: Battleground. Shadow: Play Saruman from your draw deck.

card.title: Helm's Gate
card.game_text: Battleground. Each companion and minion bearing a hand weapon is strength +2.

card.title: Hornburg Courtyard
card.game_text: Battleground. While you can spot Aragorn, the Shadow number of Hornburg Courtyard is -2.

card.title: Hornburg Parapet
card.game_text: Battleground. The fellowship archery total is +1. The minion archery total is -1.

card.title: Caves of Aglarond
card.notes: Version: *. Game text is a clarification.
card.game_text: Underground. Sanctuary. Maneuver: Spot your Uruk-hai and remove [2] to make one of your Uruk-hai fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Great Hall
card.notes: Each [ROHAN] ally participates in archery fire and skirmishes at this site as if this were his or her home site.
card.game_text: Sanctuary. Battleground. Each [ROHAN] ally may participate in archery fire and skirmishes at Great Hall.

card.title: Hornburg Armory
card.game_text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Play a possession to draw a card.

card.title: Cavern Entrance
card.game_text: Underground. Skirmish events may not be played and skirmish special abilities may not be used.

card.title: Hornburg Causeway
card.game_text: Battleground. The minion archery total is +2 for each unbound companion over 3

card.title: King's Room
card.game_text: When the fellowship moves to King's Room without a [ROHAN] companion, each unbound companion must exert.

card.title: Ring of Isengard
card.game_text: Shadow: Play a [DUNLAND] minion to draw a card.

card.title: Wizard's Vale
card.game_text: At the start of the first Shadow phase, if the twilight pool has fewer than 9 twilight tokens, add [4] (limit once per turn).

card.title: Fortress of Orthanc
card.game_text: Battleground. The Shadow number of Fortress of Orthanc is +2 for each companion over 4.

card.title: Orthanc Balcony
card.lore: ;Battleground. Shadow: Play Saruman from your discard pile
card.game_text: his twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Orthanc Library
card.game_text: When the fellowship moves to Orthanc Library, each Shadow player may draw a card for each companion over 4.

card.title: Palantir Chamber
card.game_text: Shadow: Remove 2 burdens to play a minion from your discard pile.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Wingfoot
card.lore: 'Forty leagues and five you have measured ere the fourth day is ended! Hardy is the race of Elendil!'
card.game_text: Ranger. Each time the fellowship moves, you may wound a minion for each unbound Hobbit you spot.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Wingfoot
card.lore: 'Forty leagues and five you have measured ere the fourth day is ended! Hardy is the race of Elendil!'
card.game_text: Ranger. Each time the fellowship moves, you may wound a minion for each unbound Hobbit you spot.

card.title: Theoden
card.subtitle: Lord of the Mark
card.lore: 'Every man and strong lad able to bear arms, all who have horses, let them be ready in the saddle at the gate ere the second hour from noon!'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Play a [ROHAN] possession on a [ROHAN] companion to heal that companion (limit once per turn).

card.title: The One Ring
card.notes: Oversized. Release schedule for 2004-2007: 8. Siege of Gondor - March 2004. 9. Mount Doom - July 2004. 10. Shadows - November 2004. 11. Black Rider - March 2005. 12. Bloodlines - July 2005. 13. The Hunters - November 2005. 14. Rise of Saruman - March 2006. 15. Treachery and Deceit - July 2006. 16. The Great Eye - November 2006. 17. Shelob's Lair - March 2007. 19. Age's End - July 2007.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Dauntless Hunter
card.game_text: Archer. The twilight cost of each Shadow event and Shadow condition is +1 for each unbound Hobbit you can spot.

card.title: Dunlending Rampager
card.lore: To kill and destroy was the mission of the wild hillmen.
card.game_text: When you play this minion, the Free Peoples player may discard 2 cards from hand to discard him.

card.title: Dunlending Renegade
card.lore: The strength of the hillmen was driven by passion and anger.
card.game_text: When you play this minion, the Free Peoples player may discard 2 cards from hand to discard him.

card.title: Leaping Blaze
card.lore: ...they saw torches, countless points of fiery light upon the black fields behind, scattered like red flowers, or winding up from the lowlands....
card.game_text: Shadow: Spot 3 [DUNLAND] minions to shuffle your hand into your draw deck and draw 8 cards. The Free Peoples player may discard 3 cards from hand to prevent this.

card.title: Wild Men of the Hills
card.lore: The swarm of Dunlendings destroyed everything in its path.
card.game_text: The twilight cost of this minion is -2 during the skirmish phase. When you play this minion, the Free Peoples player may discard 4 cards from hand to discard it.

card.title: Baruk Khazad
card.lore: ...a small dark figure that none had observed sprang out of the shadows and gave a hoarse shout....
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a Dwarf to wound a minion. You may take the next maneuver action.

card.title: Defending the Keep
card.lore: 'I have fought many wars, master Dwarf. I know how to defend my own Keep.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf to Draw a card or play a [DWARVEN] condition from your discard pile.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Skilled Defender
card.lore: Despite Thoden's preparations, Gimli found it necessary to warn him of the advancing Uruk army.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may wound a minion assigned to skirmish an unbound companion.

card.title: Horn of Helm
card.lore: ...sudden and terrible, from the tower above, the sound of the great horn of Helm rang out.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Exert a Dwarf companion to make each minion at a battleground lose all damage bonuses until the regroup phase.

card.title: More to My Liking
card.lore: 'This country has tough bones.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Stack the top card from your draw deck here (limit once per phase). Maneuver: Spot a Dwarf and discard a card stacked on a [DWARVEN] condition to take a Free Peoples card stacked here into hand.

card.title: Balglin
card.subtitle: Elven Warrior
card.lore: He is a strong fighter. He asks for no quarter and gives none.
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. While skirmishing a wounded minion, Balglin takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase.

card.title: Break the Charge
card.lore: A storm of white arrows answered the attacking hand of Isengard.
card.game_text: Archery: Exert 3 Elf companions to make the fellowship archery total +2.

card.title: Legolas' Sword
card.lore: Legolas wielded a longsword to strike from horseback.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Legolas. Each time the fellowship moves, you may spot a wounded minion to heal Legolas.

card.title: Taurnil
card.subtitle: Sharp-eyed Bowman
card.lore: Taurnil's careful aim can disarm his enemies at long range.
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. While Taurnil bears a ranged weapon, the twilight cost of each Shadow possession is +2, and he does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.title: That Is No Orc Horn
card.lore: Anxious defenders cheered the welcome sound of Elvish trumpets.
card.game_text: Regroup: Spot 3 Elf companions to heal a companion and liberate a site.

card.title: Birchseed
card.subtitle: Tall Statesman
card.lore: Slender and royal, he presided over many Entmoots.
card.game_text: Unhasty. Assignment: Exert an unbound Hobbit or discard 2 cards from hand to allow Birchseed to skirmish. Fellowship: Exert Birchseed to Heal an unbound Hobbit.

card.title: Down From the Hills
card.lore: Down leaped Shadowfax, like a deer....
card.game_text: Spell. Maneuver: Exert Gandalf 3 times to make an unbound companion with the Gandalf signet strength +5, defender +1, damage +2, and unable to take wounds until the regroup phase.

card.title: Forest Guardian
card.lore: 'We keep off strangers and the foolhardy; and we train and we teach, we walk and we weed.'
card.game_text: Unhasty. Assignment: Exert an unbound Hobbit or discard 2 cards from hand to allow this companion to skirmish.

card.title: Fury of the White Rider
card.lore: The White Rider was upon them, and the terror of his coming filled the enemy with madness.
card.game_text: Spell. Maneuver: Spot 3 twilight tokens and exert Gandalf to wound a minion twice.

card.title: Lindenroot
card.subtitle: Elder Shepherd
card.lore: A most well-founded and considerate Ent.
card.game_text: Unhasty. Assignment: Exert an unbound Hobbit or discard 2 cards from hand to allow Lidenroot to skirmish. Skirmish: Exert Lidenroot to wound an [ISENGARD] minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Turn of the Tide
card.lore: 'Indeed my friends, none of you have any weapon that could hurt me.'
card.game_text: Spell. Maneuver: Exert Gandalf to discard up to 2 shadow possessions. Any Shadow player may discard a minion to prevent this.

card.title: Be Back Soon
card.lore: 'Now I wonder where he's got to?'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Discard Smeagol to discard a minion. An opponent may exert a minion twice to prevent this.

card.title: Evil-smelling Fens
card.lore: 'No birds here. There are snakeses, wormses, things in the pools. Lots of things, lots of nasty things.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each site on the adventure path is a marsh. Shadow: Exert Gollum twice and discard this condition to play a minion from your discard pile.

card.title: Follow Smeagol
card.lore: 'Follow Smagol very carefully, and you may go a long way, quite a long way, before He catches you, yes perhaps.'
card.game_text: Plays on Smeagol. Regroup: Exert Smeagol or Gollum to play the fellowship's next site ( replacing opponent's site if necessary ).

card.title: Gollum
card.subtitle: Nasty Treacherous Creature
card.lore: '...we won't let you go, either. You're full of wickedness and mischief, Gollum.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Discard Gollum to exert a companion or ally.

card.title: Gollum
card.subtitle: Stinker
card.lore: 'Still he's a Baggins, my precious, yes, a Baggins. A Baggins stole it. He found it and he said nothing. We hates Bagginses.'
card.game_text: Gollum is strength +1 for each burden. Each times Gollum wins a skirmish, you may add a burden.

card.title: Gollum
card.subtitle: Stinker
card.lore: 'Still he's a Baggins, my precious, yes, a Baggins. A Baggins stole it. He found it and he said nothing. We hates Bagginses.'
card.game_text: Gollum is strength +1 for each burden. Each time Gollum wins a skirmish, you may add a burden.

card.title: Look at Him
card.lore: 'That's what it is. It's that Gollum! Snakes and adders! And to think I thought that we'd puzzle him with our bit of a climb!'
card.game_text: Shadow: Spot Smeagol or Gollum to add [1] for each burden.

card.title: Poor Wretch
card.lore: 'Throttle us in our sleep, that's his plan.'
card.game_text: Plays on Smeagol. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make Smeagol damage +1.

card.title: Smeagol
card.subtitle: Old Noser
card.lore: 'Could you find anything fit for a hungry hobbit?'
card.game_text: Ring-bound. To play add a burden. Regroup: Exert Smeagol (or Gollum) twice to reveal the top 4 cards of your draw deck. Wound a minion for each Shadow card revealed. Place those 4 cards beneath your draw deck in any order.

card.title: Smeagol
card.subtitle: Slinker
card.lore: '... that it is my fate to receive help from you, where I least looked for it, and your fate to help me whom you long pursued with evil purpose.'
card.game_text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Skirmish: Add a burden to make Smeagol strength +2 and takes no wound.

card.title: Smeagol
card.subtitle: Slinker
card.lore: '... that it is my fate to receive help from you, where I least looked for it, and your fate to help me whom you long pursued with evil purpose.'
card.game_text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Skirmish: Add a burden to make Smeagol strength +2 and take no wounds.

card.title: We Must Have It
card.lore: 'No, sweet one. See, my precious: if we has it, then we can escape, even from Him, eh?'
card.game_text: Shadow: Play Gollum from your draw deck or your discard pile. Skirmish: Discard a card at random from hand to make Gollum strength +3.

card.title: Alcarin
card.subtitle: Warrior of Lamedon
card.lore: Named for a mighty king, Alcarin is determined to prove himself in battle.
card.game_text: Knight. The twilight cost of each other knight in your starting fellowship is -1. Assignment: Assign Alcarin to a minion bearing a [GONDOR] fortification to heal Alcarin.

card.title: Citadel of the Stars
card.lore: The city of Osgiliath was the first capital of Gondor.
card.game_text: Fortification. Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert a [GONDOR] Man or spot 3 knights to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man.

card.title: City Wall
card.lore: The war-weary defenses of Osgiliath still protected the Men of Gondor.
card.game_text: Fortification. Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert a [GONDOR] Man or spot 3 knights to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man.

card.title: Fall Back
card.lore: Osgiliath's defenses protected the Gondorian troops.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Discard all Shadow cards borne by a minion bearing a [GONDOR] fortification.

card.title: Gondorian Knight
card.lore: Soldiers of Gondor share a long heritage of defending their borders against Sauron's attackers.

card.title: Knight of Gondor
card.lore: The brave men of Gondor's army were well-armed and armored.
card.game_text: Knight. Fellowship: Discard a [GONDOR] condition to heal this companion.

card.title: Men of Numenor
card.lore: '...I do not love the bright sword for its sharpness, nor the arrow for its swiftness, nor the warrior for his glory....'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Wound a minion bearing a [GONDOR] fortification.

card.title: Rally Point
card.lore: A strategic fallback helps Gondorian knights to plan their counterattack.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a knight to transfer a [GONDOR] fortification borne by a minion to your support area.

card.title: Stone Tower
card.lore: The battlements of Osgiliath provided some defense against Sauron's attackers.
card.game_text: Fortification. Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert 2 [GONDOR] Men to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man.

card.title: Take Cover
card.lore: Gondor forces at Osgiliath were too few to fight the advancing armies in the field.
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert a knight to play a [GONDOR] fortification from your discard pile.

card.title: These Are My People
card.lore: '...I will die as one of them.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert Aragorn twice to play any number of possessions from your discard pile onto companions with the Aragorn signet.

card.title: Turgon
card.subtitle: Man of Belfalas
card.lore: He hopes to someday become one of the knights of Dol Amroth.
card.game_text: Knight. To play, spot a knight. Maneuver: Exert Turgon to wound a minion bearing a [GONDOR] fortification.

card.title: War Must Be
card.lore: '...we defend ourselves against a destroyer who would devour all....'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a [GONDOR] Man strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing a minion bearing a [GONDOR] fortification).

card.title: Battering Ram
card.lore: The trees... smote the timbers with a rending boom.
card.game_text: Machine. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Exert an Uruk-hai to place an [ISENGARD] token on this card. Skirmish: Spot 5 companions and an [ISENGARD] token here to make an Uruk-hai damage +1. Discard this condition.

card.title: Berserk Rager
card.notes: The strength bonus for this minion is increased for any wound on any minion, companion, or ally in its skirmish. The tokens removed for the special ability on this card must all be removed from the same machine.
card.lore: Their mission at Helm's Deep was to clear the walls.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Berserk Rager is strength +1 for each wound on a character in its skirmish. Skirmish: Remove 3 [ISENGARD] tokens from a machine and exert Berserk Rager twice to wound every ally twice.

card.title: Berserk Savage
card.notes: The strength bonus for this minion is increased for any wound on any minion, companion, or ally in its skirmish. The tokens removed for the special ability on this card must all be removed from the same machine.
card.lore: Skull-like helmets are distinctive to the Berserkers.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Berserk Savage is strength +1 for each wound on a character in its skirmish. Skirmish: Remove 4 [ISENGARD] tokens from a machine and exert Berserk Savage twice to make it strength +8.

card.title: Berserk Slayer
card.notes: The strength bonus for this minion is increased for any wound on any minion, companion, or ally in its skirmish. The tokens removed for the special ability on this card must all be removed from the same machine.
card.lore: Berserkers are the first wave of Uruks sent to battle.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Berserk Slayer is strength +2 for each wound on a character in its skirmish. Skirmish: Remove 5 [ISENGARD] tokens from a machine and exert Berserk Slayer twice to wound every companion.

card.title: Black Shapes Crawling
card.lore: Some were squat and broad, some were tall and grim, with high helms and sable shields.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot X Uruk-hai. The Free Peoples player may assign X wounds to your minions. Play X [ISENGARD] weapons from your discard pile.

card.title: Devilry of Orthanc
card.lore: 'They have a blasting fire, and... they took the Wall.'
card.game_text: Machine. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Exert an Uruk-Hai to place an [ISENGARD] token on this card. Maneuver: Spot 8 [ISENGARD] tokens here to exert every character. Discard this condition.

card.title: Foul Horde
card.game_text: Warg-rider. While Foul Horde is not exhausted, it is fierce. While Foul Horde has at least 3 vitality, it is ambush [1]. While Foul Horde has at least 4 vitality, it is damage + 1.

card.title: Grima
card.subtitle: Chief Counselor
card.lore: 'I care for you and yours as best I may.... Let others deal with these irksome guests.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot 4 Free Peoples cultures and exert Grima to return an unbound companion, and all cards on him or her, to their owners' hands.

card.title: Isengard Flanker
card.lore: Sharku used his warg-riders to scout and defend.
card.game_text: Warg-rider. While this minion is not exhausted, he is fierce.

card.title: Isengard Rider
card.lore: 'He has taken Orcs into his service, and Wolf-riders, and evil Men....'
card.game_text: Warg-rider. While this minion is not exhausted, he is fierce.

card.title: Isengard Scimitar
card.lore: Orcs from Isengard favor a short, curved sword when mounted.
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ISENGARD] Orc. When you play this weapon, you may add [1] for each site you control.

card.title: Isengard Scout Troop
card.lore: '...where the warg howls, there also the orc prowls.'
card.game_text: Warg-rider. While this minion is not exhausted, it is fierce. Each time an [ISENGARD] Orc wins a skirmish, you may exert this minion to control a site.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Master of Foul Folk
card.game_text: Saruman may not take wounds during the archery phase and may not be assigned to a skirmish. Each time the fellowship moves, you may heal each [ISENGARD] Orc twice. Shadow: Exert Saruman to play an [ISENGARD] possession from your discard pile.

card.title: Scaling Ladder
card.lore: Hundreds of long ladders were lifted up. Many were cast down in ruin, but many more replaced them....
card.game_text: Machine. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Exert an Uruk-hai to place an [ISENGARD] token on this card. Skirmish: Spot an [ISENGARD] token here to heal an Uruk-hai. Discard this condition.

card.title: Sharku
card.subtitle: Warg-captain
card.lore: Only Sharku commanded enough respect to control Saruman's warg-riders.
card.game_text: Warg-rider. While Sharku is not exhausted, he is fierce. Each time you play an [ISENGARD] mount, you may make the Free Peoples player exert a companion (except a Hobbit).

card.title: Sharku's Warg
card.lore: The warg-captain picked the fastest and strongest mount.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a warg-rider. If bearer is Sharku, he is damage +1. Response: If a skirmish special ability is used in a skirmish involving bearer, exert bearer to cancel that action.

card.title: Siege Engine
card.lore: Ropes... were hurled over the parapet....
card.game_text: Machine. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Play an Uruk-hai to place an [ISENGARD] token on a machine. Response: If one or more machines are about to be discarded by an opponent, discard this condition to prevent that.

card.title: Uruk Engineer
card.lore: Trained Uruk-hai operated Saruman's siege engines at Helm's Deep.
card.game_text: Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may place an [ISENGARD] token on a machine.

card.title: Uruk Sapper
card.lore: The destruction of the Hornburg fortifications was the task of Saruman's engineer troops.
card.game_text: Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may place an [ISENGARD] token on a machine.

card.title: Uruk-hai Berserker
card.notes: The strength bonus for this minion is increased for any wound on any minion, companion, or ally in its skirmish.
card.lore: Goatskins full of blood poured upon berserkers before battle instill their bloodlust.
card.game_text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each wound on a character in its skirmish.

card.title: War-warg
card.lore: Bigger and stronger wargs were ridden into battle.
card.game_text: Bearer must a warg-rider. Response: If a skirmish special abiliy is used in a skirmish involving bearer, exert bearer to cancel that action.

card.title: Warg
card.lore: 'Tell him there is no hope ahead. He should return to Edoras before the wolves of Isengard come there.'
card.game_text: Bearer must a warg-rider. Response: If a skirmish special abiliy is used in a skirmish involving bearer, exert bearer to cancel that action.

card.title: Warg-master
card.lore: '...yet I feared that wolf-riders and plunderers might ride nonetheless to Meduseld, while it was undefended.'
card.game_text: Warg-rider. When you play this minion, you may play an [ISENGARD] mount from your discard pile. While this minion is not exhausted, he is fierce.

card.title: Warg-rider
card.lore: Swiftly a scout rode back and reported that wolf-riders were abroad in the valley....
card.game_text: Warg-rider. While this minion is not exhausted, he is fierce.

card.title: Wolf-voices
card.lore: '...these howls freeze my blood.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make an [ISENGARD] Orc strength +2 (and heal it if mounted).

card.title: Wolves of Isengard
card.lore: Saruman's warg-riders traveled the plains faster than even the Riders of Rohan.
card.game_text: Plays on a plains site you control. Regroup: Exert an [ISENGARD] Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.title: Army of Haradrim
card.lore: The desert lords of Harad support their huge forces with mammoth war beasts.
card.game_text: Southron. Skirmish: Remove [3] to play a [RAIDER] mount from your discard pile.

card.title: Company of Haradrim
card.lore: The quick movements of Southron soldiers cut off all paths of retreat.
card.game_text: Southron. Regroup: Remove [9] and spot antother Southron to make the move limit -1 for this turn ( to a minimum of 1 ).

card.title: Desert Stalker
card.lore: They strike only when their prey is haggard and tired.
card.game_text: Southron. Ambush [2]. Maneuver: Exert this minion and spot 4 free peoples cultures to exert every companion.

card.title: Mumak
card.lore: Sam saw a vast shape crash out of the trees and come careening down the slope.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Southron. Bearer is fierce. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may add [2].

card.title: Southron Marcher
card.lore: Hardy desert warriors needed little rest.
card.game_text: Southron. Ambush [2]. While you can spot a Southron, this minion's twilight cost is - 2.

card.title: Southron Runner
card.lore: Swift scouts track enemy movements to set up surprise attacks.
card.game_text: Southron. Ambush [2]. While you can spot a Southron, this minion's twilight cost is - 2.

card.title: Southron Traveler
card.lore: Men of Harad were used to long journeys.
card.game_text: Southron. Ambush [2]. Response: If a Southron is about to take a wound, remove [3] to prevent that wound.

card.title: Strength in Numbers
card.lore: Lacking arms and armor, the Haradrim use swift movements to outnumber their opponents.
card.game_text: To play, spot a Southron. Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Discard this condition to add [1] for each Man with ambush you spot.

card.title: War Mumak
card.lore: Big as a house, much bigger than a house, it looked to him, a grey-clad moving hill.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Southron. Bearer is fierce. Each time bearer overwhelms a character, you may add [5].

card.title: Armory
card.lore: 'Choose from these ere we go, and may they serve you well!'
card.game_text: Fortification. Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Spot 2 [ROHAN] Men to remove 2 tokens from a machine or to take a [ROHAN] possession into hand from your discard pile. Discard this condition.

card.title: Arrow-slits
card.lore: Here and there were clefts in the stone through which men could shoot.
card.game_text: Fortification. Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Spot 2 [ROHAN] Men to discard a possession or a machine. Discard this condition.

card.title: Ecglaf
card.subtitle: Courageous Farmer
card.lore: Like many of the Rohirrim, Ecglaf no longer had a home awaiting his return.
card.game_text: Villager. Fellowship: Exert Ecglaf and spot 2 valiant Men to play a [ROHAN] possession from your discard pile.

card.title: Gamling
card.subtitle: Warrior of Rohan
card.lore: He was one of Thoden's most trusted lieutenants.
card.game_text: Valiant. To play spot a [ROHAN] Man. Skirmish: Play a [ROHAN] possession on Gamling to make him strength +2 and damage +1.

card.title: Household Guard
card.lore: The king and the men of his household were in the Hornburg....

card.title: I Am Here
card.lore: 'The last host of the Eorlingas has ridden forth. It will not return without battle.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert Theoden twice to heal every other companion with the Theoden signet twice.

card.title: Let Us Be Swift
card.lore: 'Let us drive through such foes as are already between us and the fastness.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Spot 3 valiant Men to discard up to 2 conditions and liberate a site.

card.title: No Rest for the Weary
card.lore: 'We must draw all our forces now behind the walls.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot 3 valiant Men to make one of those Men defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Parapet
card.lore: Upon the spur of rock from the cliff stood high walls of ancient stone.
card.game_text: Fortification. Plays to your support area. Archery: Spot 2 [ROHAN] Men to remove 2 tokens from a machine or to make the minion archery total -3. Discard this condition.

card.title: Rohirrim Bow
card.lore: 'The Rohirrim have good bowmen after their fashion, but there are too few here, too few.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. Archery: Exert bearer and discard this possession to wound a minion.

card.title: Rohirrim Helm
card.lore: The armory of Helm's Deep provided raiment of war for her defenders.
card.game_text: Bearer must be [ROHAN] Man. Skirmish: Discard this possession to cancel a skirmish involving bearer. A minion in this skirmish may exert to prevent this.

card.title: Rohirrim Scout
card.lore: ...scouts rode out far ahead, passing like shadows in the folds of the land.
card.game_text: Valiant. Regroup: Exert this companion and spot a [ROHAN] possession to return that possession to hand.

card.title: Rohirrim Shield
card.lore: The Rohirrim carried round wooden shields, usable on foot and on horseback.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. The minion archery total is -1. Regroup: Discard this possession to heal bearer.

card.title: Sigewulf
card.subtitle: Brave Volunteer
card.lore: The courage of Sigewulf and other Rohirrim like him will not be forgotten.
card.game_text: Villager. Regroup: Exert Sigewulf and spot 5 valiant Men to discard a minion.

card.title: Theoden
card.subtitle: King of the Golden Hall
card.lore: 'You thought I remained in Meduseld bent like an old tree under winter snow.... But a west wind has shaken the boughs.'
card.game_text: Valiant. Maneuver: Play a [ROHAN] possession on Theoden to heal a [ROHAN] ally.

card.title: Thundering Host
card.lore: ...with a rush like the sudden onset of a great wind the last host of Rohan rode thundering into the West.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a mounted [ROHAN] Man strength +3 (and heal that Man if at a plains).

card.title: Dead Marshes
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at site 4T, Ring-bound companions skirmishing [SAURON] orcs are strength -1. Maneuver: Spot 2 [SAURON] Orcs to play up to 2 [SAURON] conditions from your discard pile. Discard this condition.

card.title: Eye of Barad-Dur
card.notes: This card must be played in order to use its response text, which is affected by cards like Legolas, Dauntless hunter. The text discard this card to is superfluous.
card.lore: The Lidless Eye looked out from Sauron's fortress.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a companion or ally skirmishing a [SAURON] Orc strength -1 for each ring-bound companion. Response: If a free people player reveals this card from your hand, discard this card to add 2 burdens.

card.title: Gate Soldier
card.lore: ...a host of orcs lurked, ready at a signal to issue forth like black ants going to war.
card.game_text: When you play a [SAURON] condition, you may exert this minion and remove [2] to draw a card.

card.title: Gate Trooper
card.lore: Another dreadful day of fear and toil had come to Mordor; and the night-guards were summoned....
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may exert him and spot 5 burdens to draw a card.

card.title: Gate Veteran
card.lore: ...the day-guards, evil-eyed and fell, were marching to their posts.
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may exert him and spot 6 companions to draw a card.

card.title: Grishnakh
card.subtitle: Orc Captain
card.lore: 'They might agree with me, with Grishnkh....'
card.game_text: Tracker. The site number of each [SAURON] Orc is -3. Shadow: Exert Grishnakh twice and spot another [SAURON] Orc to draw 3 cards. The Free Peoples player may add 2 burdens to prevent this.

card.title: Grishnakh
card.subtitle: Orc Captain
card.lore: 'They might agree with me, with Grishnkh....'
card.game_text: Tracker. The site number of each [SAURON] Orc is -3. Shadow: Exert Grishnakh twice and spot another [SAURON] Orc to draw 3 cards. The Free Peoples player may add 2 burdens to prevent this.

card.title: I'd Make You Squeak
card.lore: 'If I had my way, you'd wish you were dead now.'
card.game_text: To play, exert 2 [SAURON] Orcs. Plays to your support area. The Shadow number of each site is +1 for each wound on a Hobbit (limit +3).

card.title: Morannon
card.lore: The black gate of Mordor was called the Morannon.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of the first [SAURON] Orc played at site 4T is -3. Shadow: Spot 2 [SAURON] Orcs and discard 4 cards from hand to draw 3 cards. Discard this condition.

card.title: Orc Captain
card.lore: ...far away from hidden holds and outposts in the hills came answering calls....
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may spot a [SAURON] condition to draw a card for each site you control (limit 3).

card.title: Orc Cutthroat
card.lore: A few Orc casualties were of no concern to him.
card.game_text: Tracker. The site number of each [SAURON] Orc is -3. Skirmish: Discard another [SAURON] Orc and exert Orc Cutthroat to wound a companion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Orc Fighter
card.lore: The Orcs of Mordor extended the will of Sauron to control the weak Men of the East.
card.game_text: Regroup: Spot a [SAURON] condition and exert this minion to take control of a site.

card.title: Orc Infantry
card.lore: Barad-dr sent Orcs to all corners of Middle-earth.
card.game_text: Regroup: Spot a [SAURON] condition and discard this minion to take control of a site.

card.title: Orc Patrol
card.lore: Sauron's Orcs ranged far and wide, searching for Baggins and the Ring.
card.game_text: Tracker. The site number of each [SAURON] Orc is -3. Maneuver: Exert Orc Patrol twice and spot another [SAURON] Orc to discard a condition.

card.title: Orc Pursuer
card.lore: '...why not kill them now? They're a cursed nuisance, and we're in a hurry.'
card.game_text: Tracker. The site number of each [SAURON] Orc is -1. When you play this minion, you may exert him and remove [2] to draw a card.

card.title: Orc Runner
card.lore: 'There's no time to kill them properly.... No time for play on this trip.'
card.game_text: Tracker. The site number of each [SAURON] Orc is -1. When you play this minion you may exert him and discard 2 cards from hand to draw a card.

card.title: Teeth of Mordor
card.lore: None could pass the Teeth of Mordor and not feel their bite....
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Spot a [SAURON] Orc and remove [3] to stack that minion here. Shadow: Play a [SAURON] Orc stacked here as if played from hand.

card.title: Frodo
card.subtitle: Master of the Precious
card.lore: 'We promises, yes I promise!... Good master, good Smagol, gollum, gollum!'
card.game_text: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). Fellowship: Add a burden to play Smeagol from your discard pile.

card.title: No Help for It
card.lore: '...he'll come back, you'll see. The promise will hold yet a while. And he won't leave his Precious, anyway.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Spot Sam and discard Smeagol or Gollum to remove 3 burdens.

card.title: No Use That Way
card.lore: 'Don't take the Precious to Him!... Keep it, nice master, and be kind to Smagol.'
