card.game_text: Skirmish: Add 3 burdens to wound a minion skirmishing a companion who has the Frodo signet twice.

card.title: Rare Good Ballast
card.lore: 'What a hobbit needs with coney... is some herbs and roots, especially taters - not to mention bread.'
card.game_text: Plays on Sam. Response: If a regroup special ability is used, discard Smeagol or Gollum to cancel that action.

card.title: Sam
card.subtitle: Nice Sensible Hobbit
card.lore: 'Trust Smagol now? Very, very good.'
card.game_text: Ring-bound. While you can spot Frodo and Smeagol, Sam may not be overwhelmed unless is strength is tripled. Response: If Frodo is killed, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.title: Sting
card.subtitle: Baggins Heirloom
card.lore: 'This is Sting. You have seen it before once upon a time.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Frodo. Skirmish: Exert Frodo to make Smeagol strength +2 or Gollum strength -2.

card.title: Sting
card.subtitle: Baggins Heirloom
card.notes: Tengwar. Image fixed. The collector's information on the Tengwar version of this card (a tournament promo card) was printed incorrectly as 4R100. There are no printed Tengwar versions with the correct info (5R116).
card.lore: 'This is Sting. You have seen it before once upon a time.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Frodo. Skirmish: Exert Frodo to make Smeagol strength +2 or Gollum strength -2.

card.title: You Must Help Us
card.lore: 'You will have to come with us, that's all, while we keep an eye on you.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Play Smeagol from your discard pile to heal each Ring-bound Hobbit twice.

card.title: Hornburg Wall
card.game_text: Regroup: Spot your minion and remove [9] to make the fellowship move again this turn (if the move limit allows).

card.title: Nan Curunir
card.game_text: Plains. Response: If your mounted minion is about to take a wound, remove [2] to prevent that wound.

card.title: Caverns of Isengard
card.game_text: Underground. The Free Peoples player wins the game only if the Ring-bearer survives until Shadow players reconcile.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Archer of Mirkwood
card.lore: '...even more would I give for a hundred good archers of Mirkwood. We shall need them.'
card.game_text: Archer. Each time Legolas wins a skirmish, you may heal a Dwarf companion or another Elf companion.

card.title: Eowyn
card.subtitle: Daughter of Eomund
card.lore: 'Let the heralds announce to the folk that the Lady owyn will lead them!'
card.game_text: Valiant. Maneuver: Play a [ROHAN] possession on Eowyn to heal her.

card.title: Baruk Khazad (AI)
card.lore: Axes of the Dwarves! cried Gimli in the secret tongue of his kin.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert a Dwarf to wound a minion. You may take the next maneuver action.

card.title: Break the Charge (AI)
card.lore: A wall of Elven arrows met the attackers before they reached the Hornburg itself.
card.game_text: Archery: Exert 3 Elf companions to make the fellowship archery total +2.

card.title: Foul Horde (AI)
card.game_text: Warg-rider. While Foul Horde is not exhausted, it is fierce. While Foul Horde has at least 3 vitality, it is ambush [1]. While Foul Horde has at least 4 vitality, it is damage + 1.

card.title: Army of Haradrim (AI)
card.lore: Lacking shields and armor, Southron forces rely on speed and numbers.
card.game_text: Southron. Skirmish: Remove [3] to play a [RAIDER] mount from your discard pile.

card.title: Rohirrim Helm (AI)
card.lore: A helm split by an Uruk blade often still saves the rider who wears it.
card.game_text: Bearer must be [ROHAN] Man. Skirmish: Discard this possession to cancel a skirmish involving bearer. A minion in this skirmish may exert to prevent this.

card.title: Thundering Host (AI)
card.lore: The roar of hooves was enough to rout the Uruk-hai without sword or spear.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a mounted [ROHAN] Man strength +3 (and heal that man if at a plains).

card.title: Gollum
card.subtitle: Stinker
card.game_text: Gollum is strength +1 for each burden. Each times Gollum wins a skirmish, you may add a burden.

card.title: Grima
card.subtitle: Chief Counselor
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot 4 Free Peoples cultures and exert Grima to return an unbound companion, and all cards on him or her, to their owners' hands.

card.title: Bound By Rage
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot 2 [DUNLAND] Men to place 2 [DUNLAND] tokens here. Response: If a [DUNLAND] Man is about to take a wound, discard this condition or remove a [DUNLAND] token from here to prevent that wound.

card.title: Dunlending Elder
card.lore: Hatred of the Rohirrim is passed from generation to generation.
card.game_text: While you control 2 sites, this minion is strength +5, fierce and damage +1.

card.title: Dunlending Footmen
card.lore: Driven by Saruman's ranting, waves of Dunlendings descended upon the holdings of Rohan.
card.game_text: The twilight cost of this minion during a skirmish phase is -2.

card.title: Dunlending Headman
card.lore: The diminished Rohirrim offered little resistance to the advancing Dunland horde.
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may spot 2 other [DUNLAND] Men to take control of a site. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 cards from hand to prevent this.

card.title: Dunlending Reserve
card.lore: The relentless campaign of the hillmen drove citizens of the Westfold to the shelter of their capital.
card.game_text: The twilight cost of this minion during a skirmish phase is -2.

card.title: Hill Clan
card.lore: 'We will take their king.'
card.game_text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may play a [DUNLAND] Man from hand. That Man is fierce and damage +2 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Ready to Fall
card.lore: 'Why do you lay these troubles on an already troubled mind?'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Spot 2 sites you control and remove [2] to play a [DUNLAND] Man from your discard pile.

card.title: Too Long Have These Peasants Stood
card.lore: The rabble of Dunland pillaged their way across the Mark.
card.game_text: Response: If a [DUNLAND] Man wins a skirmish, discard all conditions.

card.title: Lend Us Your Aid
card.lore: He hewed a two-handed stroke and laid the last Orc before his feet. 'Now my count passes Master Legolas again.'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert Gimli twice to make him and each Elf companion strength +3 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Suspended Palaces
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot a Dwarf to place 2 [DWARVEN] tokens here. Fellowship: Discard this condition or remove a [DWARVEN] token from here to stack the top card of your draw deck on a [DWARVEN] condition that has a card stacked on it.

card.title: Toss Me
card.lore: 'Don't tell the Elf.'
card.game_text: While this card is stacked on a [DWARVEN] condition, Gimli is strength +1. Fellowship: Place this card or another [DWARVEN] card from hand on top of or beneath your draw deck.

card.title: Agility
card.lore: Elves rely upon more than strength in combat.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot an Elf to place 2 [ELVEN] tokens here. Skirmish: Discard this condition or remove an [ELVEN] token from here to make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -1.

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: Evenstar of Her People
card.lore: 'If you trust nothing else, trust this... trust us.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert an Elf to make a minion skirmishing Arwen strength -1.

card.title: Banner of Elbereth
card.lore: 'First name the four, the free peoples: / Eldest of all, the elf-children...'
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Elf companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may draw a card. Response: If bearer wins a skirmish, discard this possession to liberate a site.

card.title: Elrond
card.subtitle: Keeper of Vilya
card.lore: 'You have foreseen it. War is coming... many will die.'
card.game_text: At the start of each turn, heal Elrond. Fellowship: Exert Elrond to discard the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [ELVEN] card, you may take it into hand and heal an Elf companion.

card.title: Forearmed
card.lore: 'Give them a volley.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Reveal the top card of your draw deck to make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -X, where X is the twilight cost of the revealed card.

card.title: Forewarned
card.lore: 'Whether by the sword or the slow decay of time, Aragorn will die.'
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 Elves. Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Add [1] to look at the top card of your draw deck. You may discard this condition to discard that card.

card.title: Galadriel
card.subtitle: Keeper of Nenya
card.lore: 'In Dwimordene, in Lrien / More fair than thoughts of Mortal Men.'
card.game_text: At the start of each turn, heal Galadriel. Skirmish: Exert Galadriel to discard the top card of your draw deck. If it is a Shadow card, make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -3.

card.title: Gift of Foresight
card.lore: 'Here you will dwell, bound to your grief, under the fading trees.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot an Elf to reveal the top card of your draw deck. You may discard it, return it to the top of your draw deck, or take it into hand.

card.title: Must Be a Dream
card.lore: 'May the Grace of the Valar protect you.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot an Elf to reveal the top card of your draw deck. Heal up to 2 companions whose culture matches the revealed card. You may discard the revealed card.

card.title: Naith Longbow
card.lore: 'Show them no mercy, for you shall receive none.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Elf companion. Archery: Exert bearer to discard the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [ELVEN] card, exert a minion.

card.title: Naith Troop
card.lore: Now only the bow and the sword can forestall the coming of the Shadow.
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 Elf companions. Skirmish: Exert Naith Troop to discard the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [ELVEN] card, make a minion skirmishing Naith Troop strength -2.

card.title: Naith Warband
card.lore: 'But do not think that only by singing amid the trees... is Lothlrien maintained and defended....'
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 Elf companions. While Naith Warband bears a ranged weapon, it takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase and does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.title: Boomed and Trumpeted
card.lore: 'For bole and bough are burning now, the furnace roars-we go to war!'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make an Ent strength +X and damage +X, where X is the number of unbound Hobbits you can spot.

card.title: Crack Into Rubble
card.lore: 'To Isengard! Though Isengard be ringed and barred with doors of stone; / Though Isengard be strong and hard, as cold as stone and bare as bone....'''
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert 2 Ents to liberate a site and discard a Shadow condition.

card.title: Enraged
card.lore: 'An angry Ent is terrifying.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Ent. Limit 1 per bearer. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

card.title: Ent Avenger
card.lore: As they drew near the flash and flicker of their eyes could be seen.
card.game_text: While you can spot 3 Ents, this companion is strength +2.

card.title: Ent Horde
card.lore: 'With doom we come, with doom we come!'
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 Ent companions. Ent Horde's twilight cost is -2 for each Ent or unbound Hobbit you can spot. While you can spot more minions than companions, Ent Horde is defender +1.

card.title: Ent Moot
card.lore: But when the Ents all gathered round Treebeard,... then the Hobbits saw that they were all of the same kindred, and all had the same eyes....
card.game_text: To play, exert an unbound Hobbit. Bearer must be an Ent. Limit 1 per bearer.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Mithrandir
card.lore: 'The Dark Lord has Nine. But we have One, mightier than they: the White Rider. He has passed through the fire and the abyss, and they shall fear him.'
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time the fellowship moves, wound Gandalf.

card.title: Glamdring
card.subtitle: Lightning Brand
card.lore: 'Thunder they heard, and lightning... smote upon Celebdil, and leaped back broken into tongues of fire.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. He is damage +1. Each time you play a spell during a skirmish, you may make Gandalf damage +1 until the end of that skirmish.

card.title: Host of Fangorn
card.lore: 'Of course, it is likely enough, my friends...that we are going to our doom, the last march of the Ents.'
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 Ent companions. Host of Fangorn's twilight cost is -2 for each Ent or unbound Hobbit you can spot.

card.title: Quickbeam
card.subtitle: Bregalad
card.notes: Like other similar cards, this card's game text should say 'Ent or unbound Hobbit. ' For each Ent or each unbound Hobbit, the twilight cost is -1.
card.lore: 'But if we stayed home and did nothing, doom would find us anyway, sooner or later.'
card.game_text: Quickbeam's twilight cost is -1 for each Ent and unbound Hobbit you can spot.

card.title: Roused
card.lore: 'To Isengard!' the Ents cried in many voices.
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert an Ent to make him strength +1 for each Ent you spot (limit +4).

card.title: Skinbark
card.subtitle: Fladrif
card.lore: 'He was wounded by Orcs, and many of his folk and tree-herds have been murdered and destroyed.'
card.game_text: Skinbark's twilight cost is -1 for each Ent or unbound Hobbit you can spot. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to take a wound, exert Skinbark to prevent that wound.

card.title: Threw Down My Enemy
card.lore: '...he fell from the high place and broke the mountain-side where he smote it in his ruin.'
card.game_text: Spell. Skirmish: Make a minion skirmishing Gandalf strength -1 for each wound on each character in the skirmish.

card.title: Treebeard
card.subtitle: Guardian of the Forest
card.lore: 'The little that I know of his long slow story would make a tale for which we have no time now.'
card.game_text: Unhasty. Assignment: Exert an unbound Hobbit to allow Treebeard to skirmish. Skirmish: Exert Treebeard to make an Ent damage +1.

card.title: Don't Follow the Lights
card.lore: 'Careful, careful now or Hobbits go down to join the dead ones and light little candles.'
card.game_text: Response: If Smeagol wins a skirmish, add a burden to discard a minion.

card.title: Don't Look at Them
card.lore: 'You should not look in when the candles are lit.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Spot Smeagol and discard 3 cards from hand to wound a minion Smeagol is skirmishing once (or twice if that minion is a [WRAITH] minion).

card.title: Gollum
card.subtitle: Old Villain
card.lore: 'Must take it. The Wraiths are searching. Must take it.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Discard a card from hand to make Gollum strength +1 (or +2 if skirmishing a Ring-Bound companion).

card.title: Master Broke His Promise
card.lore: 'Kill them! Kill them! Kill them both! And then we take the Precious! We be the Master!'
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert Gollum 3 times to wound each companion. The move limit for this turn is -1.

card.title: Nasty
card.subtitle: Foul Hobbitses
card.lore: 'We ought to wring their filthy little necks!'
card.game_text: Response: If Gollum wins a skirmish, add a burden.

card.title: Not Listening
card.lore: 'They'll wake too quick and kill us... Not now. Not yet.'
card.game_text: Response: If Smeagol wins a skirmish, heal him and remove 2 burdens.

card.title: Safe Paths
card.lore: 'Soft and quick as shadows we must be!'
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert Smeagol 3 times and discard him to wound each minion. The move limit for this turn is +1. If the fellowship moves, each Shadow player may take up to 3 Shadow cards into hand from his or her discard pile.

card.title: Smeagol
card.subtitle: Poor Creature
card.lore: 'And we're so lonely... We'll be nice to them, very nice, if they'll be nice to us, won't we, yes, yess.'
card.game_text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Skirmish: Discard a card from hand to make Smeagol strength +1.

card.title: They Stole It
card.lore: 'Where iss it, where iss it: my precious....'
card.game_text: Plays to your support arear Skirmish: Spot Gollum and discard 3 cards from hand to wound a companion Gollum is skirmishing once (or twice if that companion is a [SHIRE] companion).

card.title: You're a Liar and a Thief
card.lore: 'No, sweet one. See, my precious: if we has it, then we can escape, even from Him, eh?'
card.game_text: Response: If Gollum wins a skirmish, wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Anborn
card.subtitle: Skilled Huntsman
card.lore: 'Perhaps under the shadow of the Unnamed some of the beasts of Mirkwood are wandering hither to our woods.'
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Ranger. Each time Anborn wins a skirmish, you may make a minion's site number +3 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Ancient Roads
card.lore: '...they go ever more heedlessly, we learn, thinking that the power of their new master is great enough....'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. While you can spot 3 rangers, the site number of each minion skirmishing a ranger is +2.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Defender of Free Peoples
card.lore: '...this is the hour when we draw swords together.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Remove an [ELVEN] token to make a minion skirmishing Aragorn strength -3. Skirmish: Remove a [DWARVEN] token to heal a Dwarf. Regroup: If Aragorn is mounted, remove a [ROHAN] token to wound a minion twice.

card.title: Banner of Westernesse
card.lore: 'What brought they from the foundered land / Over the flowing sea?... / and one white tree.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may heal another [GONDOR] companion. Response: If bearer wins a skirmish, discard this possession to liberate a site.

card.title: Garrison of Osgiliath
card.lore: 'So ever do we watch the shores nigh Osgiliath....'
card.game_text: Fortification. Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot a [GONDOR] Man to place 2 [GONDOR] tokens here. Skirmish: Discard this condition or remove a [GONDOR] token from here to make a [GONDOR] Man strength +1.

card.title: Mortal Men
card.lore: 'I fear neither death nor pain.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a [GONDOR] Man strength +2 (and exert a minion if you spot a [ROHAN] token).

card.title: Perilous Ventures
card.lore: 'But still we will not sit idle and let Him do all as He would....'
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert 2 rangers to discard a minion (or 2 [WRAITH] minions).

card.title: Ring of Barahir
card.lore: 'This is a thing of worth beyond your reckoning. For its ancientry alone. It has no power, save the esteem in which those hold it who love my house.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be Aragorn. At the start of each of your turns, you may spot a culture token to heal a companion of that culture.

card.title: Trust
card.lore: 'You cannot falter now.'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Make a [GONDOR] Man strength +2 (and heal a companion if you spot an [ELVEN] token).

card.title: Agents of Orthanc
card.lore: 'How long is it since Saruman bought you?'
card.game_text: This minion is strength +2 and damage +1 for each Free Peoples culture that you can spot over 2.

card.title: Assault Ladder
card.lore: 'It is a great host....'
card.game_text: Machine. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Exert an Uruk-hai to place an [ISENGARD] token on this card. Skirmish: Spot 3 [ISENGARD] tokens here to make an Uruk-hai strength +3. Discard this condition.

card.title: Banner of Isengard
card.lore: ...blazoned upon every helm and shield the ghastly hand of Isengard was seen.
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ISENGARD] minion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion for each site you control.

card.title: Berserk Butcher
card.game_text: Damage +1. Berserk Butcher is strength +1 for each wound on each character in its skirmish. Maneuver: Remove an [ISENGARD] token from a machine and exert Berserk Butcher twice to prevent all wounds to Uruk-hai until the assignment phase.

card.title: Desertion
card.lore: 'Who knows what you've spoken to the darkness in the bitter watches of the night?'
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ISENGARD] Man. Plays on a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Assignment: Assign an [ISENGARD] minion with less strength than bearer to skirmish bearer. Discard this condition.

card.title: Fires and Foul Fumes
card.lore: 'One of them... got caught in a spray of some liquid fire and burned like a torch: a horrible sight.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Discard 4 [ISENGARD] orcs to wound a companion 4 times (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Gnawing
card.subtitle: Biting, Hacking, Burning
card.lore: 'Destroyers and usurpers.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time a regroup action discards an [ISENGARD] Orc, you may stack that Orc on this card. Shadow: Discard 2 cards stacked here and remove [1] to play an [ISENGARD] Orc from your discard pile.

card.title: Iron Fist of the Orc
card.lore: 'The old world will burn in the fires of industry.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time a regroup action discards an [ISENGARD] Orc, you may stack that Orc on this card. Regroup: Discard 3 cards stacked here and remove [1] to discard a Free Peoples possession.

card.title: Isengard Artisan
card.lore: Minions of Orthanc shared their master's fascination with machines.
card.game_text: Regroup: Discard an [ISENGARD] Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.title: Isengard Builder
card.lore: 'They were all singing with harsh voices, and laughing, making a hideous din.'
card.game_text: Regroup: If stacked on an [ISENGARD] card, discard this card to add [2].

card.title: Isengard Journeyman
card.lore: Drudgery and toil at Isengard left Saruman's minions hungry for sport.
card.game_text: Regroup: Discard an [ISENGARD] Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.title: Isengard Mechanics
card.game_text: Regroup: Discard an [ISENGARD] Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion (or 2 companions if you spot 6 companions). Regroup: If this minion is stacked on an [ISENGARD] card, spot an [ISENGARD] Orc and discard this minion to add [3].

card.title: Isengard Plodder
card.lore: Saruman dispatched his trusted Orcs to aid in the sack of Rohan.
card.game_text: Regroup: Discard an [ISENGARD] Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.title: Isengard Tender
card.lore: Unfortunate Orcs assisted in Saruman's foul wizardry.
card.game_text: Regroup: If stacked on an [ISENGARD] card, discard this card and remove [2] to exhaust a companion.

card.title: Isengard Tinker
card.lore: 'I wonder if his fame was... due to his cleverness in settling at Isengard.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Discard an [ISENGARD] Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.title: Rohirrim Traitor
card.lore: 'Once it was a man, and did you service in its fashion.'
card.game_text: While you can spot a companion bearing an [ISENGARD] condition, this minion is strength +2.

card.title: Scaffolding
card.lore: Towers marked the inner ring, implements of industry.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time a regroup action discards an [ISENGARD] Orc, you may stack that Orc on this card. Response: If an [ISENGARD] Orc is about to take a wound, discard 2 cards stacked here to prevent that wound.

card.title: Sharku
card.subtitle: Vile Marauder
card.lore: 'Send out your warg-riders.'
card.game_text: Warg-rider. While Sharku is not exhausted, he is fierce. Regroup: Exert Sharku to add [1].

card.title: Twisted Tales
card.lore: 'Too long have you sat in the shadows....'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving a [ISENGARD] Man, you may spot a possession to stack that possession here.

card.title: The Balrog
card.subtitle: Terror of Flame and Shadow
card.lore: '...he burst into new flame.'
card.game_text: Damage +2. The twilight cost of The Balrog is -3 if you can spot a [MORIA] minion. The Balrog cannot be assigned to skirmish companions or allies of strength less than 6.

card.title: Durin's Tower
card.lore: '...carved in the living rock of Zirakzigil, the pinnacle of the Silvertine.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. At sites 2T and 3T, The Balrog's twilight cost is -3. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a unique [MORIA] minion strength +3.

card.title: Easterling Army
card.game_text: Easterling. Fierce. Skirmish: Spot 2 burdens and exert this minion to make an Easterling strength +1. Skirmish: Spot 4 burdens and exert this minion to make an Easterling strength +2. Skirmish: Spot 6 burdens and exert this minion to make an Easterling strength +3.

card.title: Easterling Polearm
card.lore: '...and the tips of their spears....'
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Easterling. While you can spot 2 burdens, bearer cannot take wounds. While you can spot 5 burdens, bearer is damage +1.

card.title: Southron Archer Legion
card.lore: 'But I've heard tales of the big folk down away in the Sunlands.'
card.game_text: Southron. Archer. Archery: Remove [3] to add 1 to the minion archery total for each companion over 4 (limit +4).

card.title: Southron Invaders
card.lore: 'So when you said Men out of the South, all in red and gold, I said were there any oliphaunts? For if there was, I was going to take a look....'
card.game_text: Southron. Ambush [1]. When you play this minion, you may spot another Southron to play a minion with ambush from your discard pile.

card.title: Trample
card.lore: '...I stomp round and round, / Never lie on the ground, / Not even to die. / Oliphaunt am I....'
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot a mounted [RAIDER] Man to discard a companion (except the Ring-bearer). The Free Peoples player may add [4] to prevent this.

card.title: Fell Beast
card.lore: 'And these winged creatures that they ride on now, they can probably see more than any other creature. They are like great carrion birds.'
card.game_text: To play, discard 2 cards from hand. Bearer must be a Nazgul. Bearer is fierce.

card.title: Spied From Above
card.lore: It leaped into all of their minds that the Black Wings had spied them and had sent armed soldiers to seize them....
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a Nazgul twice to play a [WRAITH] or [SAURON] minion. That minion's twilight cost is -8 and it comes into play exhausted.

card.title: Sword of Dol Guldur
card.lore: The weapons of the Nine are wrought with sorcery.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. While bearer is Ulaire Toldea, each time he wins a skirmish the Free Peoples player must discard a Free Peoples possession or a Free Peoples condition.

card.title: Ulaire Lemenya
card.subtitle: Winged Hunter
card.lore: ...the helpless horror that had come with the cry in the wind and the shadow on the moon....
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert Ulaire Lemenya and discard 3 cards from hand to return a companion (except the Ring-bearer) to owner's hand.

card.title: Ulaire Nertea
card.subtitle: Winged Hunter
card.lore: A vast winged shape passed over the moon like a black cloud... The stars fainted before it....
card.game_text: When you play Ulaire Nertea, spot another Nazgul to make the Free Peoples player exert a Ring-bound companion for each Free Peoples culture you can spot over 2.

card.title: Ulaire Toldea
card.subtitle: Winged Sentry
card.lore: 'They are calling for it. Calling for the precious.'
card.game_text: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Toldea wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion or add a burden.

card.title: Ulaire Toldea
card.subtitle: Winged Sentry
card.lore: 'They are calling for it. Calling for the precious.'
card.game_text: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Toldea wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion or add a burden.

card.title: Winged and Ominous
card.lore: It scudded across the moon... outrunning the wind in its fell speed.
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a Nazgul to place a [WRAITH] token on this card. Shadow: Remove 3 [WRAITH] tokens from here to add [2].

card.title: Banner of the Mark
card.lore: 'Fell deeds awake. Now for wrath. Now for ruin, and the red dawn.'
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert a minion. Response: If bearer wins a skirmish, discard this possession to liberate a site.

card.title: Blood Has Been Spilled
card.lore: They were hemming the Orcs in, preventing them from scattering, and driving them....
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Discard a mount borne by a [ROHAN] Man to prevent that Man from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Rohirrim Captain
card.lore: 'Gthwin for the Mark!'
card.game_text: Valiant. While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Skirmish: Discard 3 cards from hand to make a [ROHAN] Man strength +2 for each wound on each minion in his or her skirmish.

card.title: Ever the Hope of Men
card.lore: 'Would that day was here and we might ride down upon them like a storm out of the mountains!'
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert 2 mounted [ROHAN] Men to discard up to 2 wounded minions.

card.title: Hama
card.subtitle: Doorward of Theoden
card.lore: 'Yet in doubt a man of worth will trust to his own wisdom. I believe you are friends and folk worthy of honour, who have no evil purpose.'
card.game_text: To play, spot a [ROHAN] Man. Skirmish: Exert Hama to discard a possession borne by a minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Hrethel
card.subtitle: Rider of Rohan
card.lore: ...gaining on the Orcs, gaining on them like a tide over the flats on folk straying in a quicksand.
card.game_text: To play, spot a [ROHAN] Man. Skirmish: Heal a minion skirmishing Hrethel to make Hrethel strength +3 (limit +3).

card.title: News From the Mark
card.lore: 'We are friends of Rohan, and of Thoden, your king.'
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot 3 mounted [ROHAN] Men to make the move limit for this turn +2. Each Shadow player may draw 6 cards.

card.title: We Left None Alive
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot a [ROHAN] Man to place 2 [ROHAN] tokens here. Skirmish: Discard this condition or remove a [ROHAN] token from here to make a [ROHAN] Man skirmishing an exhausted minion strength +2.

card.title: Banner of the Eye
card.lore: Stony-faced they were, with dark window- holes staring north and east and west, and each window was full of sleepless eyes.
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [SAURON] Orc. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may add [1] for each site you control.

card.title: Corpse Lights
card.lore: 'I tried once; but you cannot reach them. Only shapes to see, perhaps, not to touch.'
card.game_text: Twilight. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make a [SAURON] or twilight minion strength +1 for each twilight minion you can spot.

card.title: Dead Ones
card.lore: 'The Dead can't really be there! Is it some devilry hatched in the Dark Land?'
card.game_text: Twilight. Damage +1. To play this minion, remove a burden or spot a twilight minion.

card.title: Gate Picket
card.lore: Now the watch-towers, which had fallen into decay, were repaired, and filled with arms, and garrisoned with ceaseless vigilance.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert this minion twice to make the Free Peoples player name 3 cultures. Wound each companion and ally not of a named culture.

card.title: Gate Sentry
card.lore: In it there was a single gate of iron, and upon its battlement sentinels paced unceasingly.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert this minion twice and spot another [SAURON] minion to discard a condition.

card.title: Gate Troll
card.lore: This was Cirith Gorgor, the Haunted Pass, the entrance to the land of the Enemy.
card.game_text: Fierce. While you can spot a Troll, Gate Troll's twilight cost is -4. For each other [SAURON] minion you can spot, this minion is strength +1.

card.title: Orc Insurgent
card.lore: 'You've spoken more than enough, Uglk,' sneered the evil voice. 'I wonder how they would like it in Lugbrz.'
card.game_text: Shadow: Exert this minion to draw X cards and add (X), where X is the number of Free Peoples cultures you spot over 2.

card.title: Peril
card.lore: 'A winged Nazgl awaits us northward on the east-bank.'
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a [SAURON] Orc to play a Nazgul or [SAURON] minion. Its twilight cost is -4 and it comes into play exhausted.

card.title: Troll of Udun
card.lore: '...Trolls are only counterfeits, made by the Enemy in the Great Darkness, in mockery of Ents....'
card.game_text: Fierce. While you can spot a Troll, this minion's twilight cost is -4. Skirmish: Discard a [SAURON] card from hand to make this minion strength +1.

card.title: Troll's Chain
card.lore: Trolls they were, but filled with the evil will of their master.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [SAURON] Troll. When you play this possession, you may draw a card.

card.title: Wisp of Pale Sheen
card.lore: 'They do not see what lies ahead / When Sun has failed and Moon is dead.'
card.game_text: Twilight. Regroup: Spot another [SAURON] or twilight minion and discard this minion to add a burden.

card.title: Held
card.notes: The site 9 referred to on this card is any site 9 card from any block.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Frodo. Each time Frodo is about to be killed by a wound, add a burden instead. When the fellowship moves to site 9, Frodo is corrupted. Regroup: If you can spot no minions, discard this condition.

card.title: It Burns Us
card.notes: This card counts both Free Peoples cultures and Shadow cultures when cards are revealed.
card.lore: 'No more than you deserve.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Spot Sam and Smeagol (or Gollum) to choose an opponent who must reveal his or her hand. Wound a minion X times, where X is the number of different cultures revealed.

card.title: Kept Safe
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, place 2 [SHIRE] tokens here. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to take a wound, discard this condition or remove a [SHIRE] token from here to prevent that wound.

card.title: Long Slow Wrath
card.lore: 'The coming of the hobbits and the tidings that they brought have spilled it: it will soon be running like a flood....'
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert an unbound Hobbit to make him strength +1 and damage +1 for each [GANDALF] companion you can spot.

card.title: Merry
card.subtitle: Impatient Hobbit
card.lore: 'Don't talk to it Merry. Don't encourage it.'
card.game_text: Regroup: Discard Merry to heal a [GANDALF] companion.

card.title: Pippin
card.subtitle: Hastiest of All
card.lore: 'By root and twig, but this is a strange business: up sprout a little folk that are not in the old lists....'
card.game_text: Regroup: Discard Pippin to choose a Shadow player who must wound one of his or her minions.

card.title: Rocks of Emyn Muil
card.game_text: Fellowship: Play a companion with the Frodo signet to remove a burden.

card.title: Westfold
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert Aragorn twice to play a companion with the Aragorn signet from your draw deck.

card.title: Meduseld
card.game_text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Exert 3 companions with the Gandalf signet to play an unbound companion from your dead pile.

card.title: Hornburg Hall
card.game_text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Spot 3 companions with the Theoden signet and discard your hand to draw 4 cards.

card.title: Valley of Saruman
card.game_text: When the fellowship moves to this site, discard all allies.

card.title: Saruman's Laboratory
card.game_text: Response: If your minion is about to take a wound, discard 2 cards from hand to prevent that wound.

card.title: Faramir
card.subtitle: Ithilien Ranger
card.lore: 'Not while Faramir is Captain... his life is charmed, or fate spares him for some other end.'
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Ranger. If Faramir is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. Fellowship: Play a ranger to heal a Ring-bound companion.

card.title: The Witch-king
card.subtitle: Deathless Lord
card.lore: 'Dead? No, you cannot kill them.'
card.game_text: Fierce. Each time a companion is killed in a skirmish involving a Nazgul, wound an ally twice or exert a companion.

card.title: Enraged (AI)
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Ent. Limit 1 per bearer. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

card.title: Skinbark
card.subtitle: Fladrif (AI)
card.game_text: Skinbark's twilight cost is -1 for each Ent or unbound Hobbit you can spot. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to take a wound, exert Skinbark to prevent that wound.

card.title: Don't Look at Them (AI)
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Spot Smeagol and discard 3 cards from hand to wound a minion Smeagol is skirmishing once (or twice if that minion is a [WRAITH] minion).

card.title: Ancient Roads (AI)
card.game_text: Plays to your support area. While you can spot 3 rangers, the site number of each minion skirmishing a ranger is +2.

card.title: Isengard Mechanics (AI)
card.game_text: Regroup: Discard an [ISENGARD] Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion (or 2 companions if you spot 6 companions). Regroup: If this minion is stacked on an [ISENGARD] card, spot an [ISENGARD] Orc and discard this minion to add [3].

card.title: Gate Troll (AI)
card.game_text: Fierce. While you can spot a Troll, Gate Troll's twilight cost is -4. For each other [SAURON] minion you can spot, this minion is strength +1.

card.title: Treebeard
card.subtitle: Guardian of the Forest
card.game_text: Unhasty. Assignment: Exert an unbound Hobbit to allow Treebeard to skirmish. Skirmish: Exert Treebeard to make an Ent damage +1.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Defender of Free Peoples
card.game_text: Skirmish: Remove an [ELVEN] token to make a minion skirmishing Aragorn strength -3. Skirmish: Remove a [DWARVEN] token to heal a Dwarf. Regroup: If Aragorn is mounted, remove a [ROHAN] token to wound a minion twice.

card.title: Merry
card.subtitle: Impatient Hobbit
card.game_text: Regroup: Discard Merry to heal a [GANDALF] companion.

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: The Ruling Ring
card.game_text: Response: If bearer is about to take a wound in a skirmish, he wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound during a skirmish, add a burden instead.

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: Such a Weight to Carry
card.game_text: Maneuver: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: Such A Weight To Carry
card.game_text: Maneuver: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

card.title: Battle Tested
card.game_text: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (+4 if you spot a card stacked on a [DWARVEN] condition).

card.title: Calculated Risk
card.game_text: Spot a Dwarf and add a threat to draw 3 cards.

card.title: Dark Ways
card.game_text: To play, spot a Dwarf. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Regroup: Discard this condition to heal a Dwarf twice and take a [DWARVEN] skirmish event into hand from your discard pile.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Faithful Companion
card.game_text: Damage +1. While you have initiative, Gimli is strength +2.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Feared Axeman
card.game_text: Damage +1. Response: if a [DWARVEN] condition is about to be discarded by an opponent, exert a Dwarf or discard a [DWARVEN] card from hand to prevent that.

card.title: Gimli's Armor
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gimli. Response: If you have initiative and Gimli is about to take a wound, discard 2 cards from hand to prevent that wound.

card.title: Gimli's Battle Axe
card.subtitle: Trusted Weapon
card.game_text: Bearer must be a dwarf. While you can spot a threat, bearer is damage +1. While you can spot 2 threats, bearer is strength +1. While you can spot 3 threats, the fellowship archery total is +1.

card.title: Loyalty Unshaken
card.game_text: When you play this condition, you may stack 2 cards from hand here and draw a card for each [DWARVEN] card you stack. Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2. Also, make that Dwarf damage +2 for each [DWARVEN] card stacked on this condition. Discard this condition.

card.title: Out of Darkness
card.game_text: Make a Dwarf strength +2. You may also exert that Dwarf to draw 2 cards.

card.title: Preparations
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert a Dwarf companion to stack a card from your discard pile here. Skirmish: Wound a minion skirmishing a Dwarf once for each [DWARVEN] card stacked here. Discard this condition.

card.title: Reckless Pride
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [DWARVEN] companion. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to bearer of Reckless Pride.' Regroup: Discard this condition to draw 4 cards.

card.title: Slaked Thirsts
card.lore: ;Choose one: Spot a Dwarf to draw a card
card.game_text: or, if this card is stacked on a [DWARVEN] condition, spot a Dwarf companion and discard this event to exert a minion twice.

card.title: Ancient Blade
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ELVEN] companion. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to bearer of Ancient Blade.' Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion and reconcile your hand.

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: Fair Elf Maiden
card.game_text: While skirmishing a fierce minion, Arwen is strength +3.

card.title: Asfaloth
card.subtitle: Elven Steed
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Elf. Skirmish: If bearer is Arwen, exert her to make each minion skirmishing her strength -2.

card.title: Bow of the Galadhrim
card.subtitle: Gift of Galadriel
card.game_text: Bearer must be Legolas. Each time you play an [ELVEN] skirmish event during a skirmish involving Legolas, you may heal him.

card.title: Careful Study
card.game_text: Spot an Elf and discard 3 cards from hand to reconcile your hand.

card.title: Defiance
card.game_text: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing a Nazgul).

card.title: Elrond
card.subtitle: Elven Lord
card.game_text: To play, spot Aragorn or an Elf. At the start of each turn, you may exert Elrond to heal a character bearing an artifact.

card.title: Hope Comes
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 Elves. Response: If an [ELVEN] skirmish event is played, discard this condition to draw 3 cards.

card.title: Into the West
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert an Elf to reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [ELVEN] card, remove 3 threats. Place the revealed card beneath your draw deck.

card.title: Leaving Forever
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a condition or draw 2 cards.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Fearless Marksman
card.game_text: Archer. Archery: If you have initiative, discard 4 cards from hand to wound a minion.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Nimble Warrior
card.game_text: Archer. Archery: If you cannot spot a threat, add a threat to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.title: Mirkwood Bowman
card.game_text: Exert 2 [ELVEN] companions to discard the top 3 cards of your draw deck. Make the fellowship archery total +1 for each [ELVEN] card discarded.

card.title: Shadow Between
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. At the start of your regroup phase, you may discard this condition or a card from hand to heal an Elf.

card.title: Still Needed
card.game_text: Make an Elf strength +2. You may place this event on top of your draw deck.

card.title: Uncertain Paths
card.game_text: Make an Elf strength +2 and you may shuffle your draw deck.

card.title: All Save One
card.game_text: Make Gandalf strength +2 (or +4 and damage +1 if you have initiative).

card.title: The Board Is Set
card.game_text: Spell. If an event is played, exert Gandalf to make that opponent remove [2] or cancel that event.

card.title: Citadel to Gate
card.game_text: Exert Gandalf twice to remove all threats and to heal all companions of one culture (except [GANDALF]).

card.title: Echoes of Valinor
card.game_text: Each time Gandalf wins a skirmish, you may exert him to draw 2 cards.

card.title: Fool's Hope
card.game_text: Spot Gandalf and discard 2 cards from hand to make an opponent discard all but 2 Shadow conditions.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Defender of the West
card.game_text: While you cannot spot 3 companions of the same culture, Gandalf is strength -2.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Manager of Wizards
card.game_text: Skirmish: Place 3 cards from hand on top of your draw deck to make a minion skirmishing an unbound companion strength -3. Any Shadow player may place 3 cards from his or her hand on top of his or her draw deck to prevent this.

card.title: Gandalf's Staff
card.subtitle: Focus of Power
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. While you can spot 4 twilight tokens, Gandalf is strength +1.

card.title: Glamdring
card.subtitle: Elven Blade
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. He is damage +1. Skirmish: If you have more cards in hand than each opponent, discard 2 cards from hand to make an opponent exert a minion.

card.title: Have Patience
card.game_text: Spot Gandalf to heal an unbound companion twice.

card.title: Intimidate
card.game_text: Spell. If a companion is about to take a wound, spot Gandalf to prevent that wound.

card.title: King's Advisor
card.game_text: Exert Gandalf twice to make an opponent exert a minion for each [ROHAN] companion you spot.

card.title: Light the Beacons
card.game_text: Exert Gandalf three times (or twice if you have initiative) to make all unbound companions of one culture (except [GANDALF]) strength +3 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Moment of Respite
card.game_text: At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard 2 cards from hand to heal Gandalf.

card.title: Numenor's Pride
card.game_text: To play, spot Gandalf and add 3 threats. Gandalf is defender +1 and cannot take wounds. Discard this condition at the start of the regroup phase.

card.title: Peace of Mind
card.game_text: Spot Gandalf to heal an unbound Hobbit 3 times.

card.title: Sharpen Your Swords
card.game_text: Spot Gandalf to make a [GONDOR] companion strength +1 for each [GONDOR] companion you spot (limit +4).

card.title: Stay This Madness
card.game_text: To play, spot Gandalf. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Regroup: Discard this condition to wound 2 minions.

card.title: Steadfast Champion
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to Gandalf.' Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion and heal a companion 3 times.

card.title: Terrible and Evil
card.notes: If Gandalf is exhausted, he cannot exert to pay the cost of this card, even if X is equal to zero.
card.game_text: Spell. Exert Gandalf X times to wound a minion X times. If that minion is a Nazgul, wound it again.

card.title: Undaunted
card.game_text: Exert Gandalf to make him strength +1 for each twilight token you spot (limit +8).

card.title: Wizard Staff
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Wizard. Skirmish: Exert bearer twice to make a minion strength -3.

card.title: Captured by the Ring
card.game_text: Play Gollum from your draw deck or discard pile to add a threat.

card.title: Clever Hobbits
card.game_text: Discard any number of [GOLLUM] conditions. For each condition discarded, make Smeagol strength +3 and damage +1.

card.title: Days Growing Dark
card.game_text: Fellowship: Discard 3 cards from hand to play Smeagol from your discard pile.

card.title: The Dead City
card.game_text: Stealth. Bearer must be Smeagol. If Smeagol is about to be killed in a skirmish, he is discarded instead.

card.title: Fat One Wants It
card.game_text: Each time Gollum or Smeagol is played, add a threat. Regroup: Discard this condition to return Gollum to his owner's hand.

card.title: Gollum
card.subtitle: Plotting Deceiver
card.game_text: If you have initiative during the Shadow phase, you may play this minion from your discard pile.

card.title: Gollum
card.subtitle: Vile Creature
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert Gollum twice or remove a threat to make him strength +2.

card.title: Heavy Burden
card.game_text: Regroup: Discard Gollum and remove a threat to add a burden.

card.title: Hobbitses Are Dead
card.lore: ;Spot Gollum or Smeagol to make a Nazgul, [SAURON] minion, or [GOLLUM] minion strength +2. If you have initiative, you may play this event from your discard pile
card.game_text: place it under your draw deck instead of discarding it.

card.title: It's Mine
card.game_text: Shadow: Remove [1] and exert Gollum to discard the top card of your draw deck. If that card is a [GOLLUM] or [WRAITH] card, take it into hand.

card.title: Let Her Deal With Them
card.game_text: To play, spot Gollum or Smeagol. Bearer must be a minion. Limit 1 per bearer. Bearer is damage +1. If you have initiative during the Shadow phase, you may play this condition from your discard pile.

card.title: Nasty
card.game_text: Make Smeagol strength +1 for each [GOLLUM] card you spot.

card.title: Never
card.game_text: To play, spot Smeagol. Regroup: Discard Smeagol to remove 2 threats.

card.title: No Safe Places
card.game_text: Exert Smeagol to reveal an opponent's hand. That opponent must discard a card from hand for each culture revealed.

card.title: Plotting
card.game_text: To play, spot Gollum and add up to 9 threats. Gollum is strength +2. Discard this condition and remove 9 threats at the start of the regroup phase.

card.title: Scouting
card.game_text: To play, spot Smeagol. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Maneuver: Discard Smeagol to discard a minion. An opponent may exert a minion twice to prevent this.

card.title: Secret Paths
card.game_text: To play, spot Smeagol and add 2 threats. The move limit for this turn is +1. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

card.title: Serving the Precious
card.game_text: Discard Smeagol to play a companion from your discard pile.

card.title: Smeagol
card.subtitle: Always Helps
card.game_text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Assignment: Assign a minion to Smeagol and add 2 threats to exhaust that minion.

card.title: Smeagol
card.subtitle: Hurried Guide
card.game_text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Skirmish: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from your hand. Smeagol cannot be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled.

card.title: Sneaking!
card.game_text: Stealth. Heal Smeagol (or cancel Smeagol's skirmish if he has more vitality than the minion or minions he is skirmishing).

card.title: So Polite
card.game_text: Play Gollum from your discard pile to add [1] for each threat you spot.

card.title: Sweeter Meats
card.game_text: If a minion is about to take a wound, spot Gollum to prevent that wound.

card.title: Very Nice Friends
card.game_text: Play Smeagol from your discard pile to play the fellowship's next site (replacing an opponent's site if necessary). If you do not move again this turn, discard your hand.

card.title: We Hates Them
card.game_text: Bearer must be Smeagol. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to Smeagol.' Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion and play a companion from your discard pile.

card.title: Where Shall We Go
card.game_text: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from hand to wound a minion Smeagol is skirmishing twice.

card.title: Anduril
card.subtitle: Flame of the West
card.game_text: Bearer must be Aragorn. Discard any other weapon he bears. He is damage +1 and cannot bear other weapons. Fellowship or Regroup: If the fellowship is at any site 2 or any site 5, play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

card.title: Anduril
card.subtitle: Flame of the West
card.game_text: Bearer must be Aragorn. Discard other weapons he bears. He is damage +1 and cannot bear other weapons. Fellowship or Regroup: If the fellowship is at any site 2 or any site 5, play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

card.title: Anduril
card.subtitle: King's Blade
card.game_text: Bearer must be Aragorn. If you cannot spot a threat, Aragorn is defender +1.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Captain of Gondor
card.game_text: Knight. At the start of each fellowship phase, you may add [2] to heal another [GONDOR] companion.

card.title: Cirion
card.game_text: While you have only 4 or 5 cards in hand, Cirion is strength +2.

card.title: City of Men
card.notes: You may discard only one [SAURON] minion for each copy of this card played.
card.game_text: Make a [GONDOR] Man strength +2. If that Man is skirmishing a [SAURON] minion, discard that minion at the end of the skirmish.

card.title: Dagger Strike
card.game_text: Make a [GONDOR] or [SHIRE] companion bearing a hand weapon strength +2 and damage +1.

card.title: Denethor
card.subtitle: Steward of the City
card.game_text: Fellowship: Play a [GONDOR] knight. That knight's twilight cost is -2. Each time a Shadow card adds a threat, add a burden. Each time a Shadow card adds a burden, add a threat.

card.title: Denethor
card.subtitle: Wizened Steward
card.game_text: Denethor is strength +1 for each other [GONDOR] Man you can spot (limit +4).

card.title: Derufin
card.game_text: Regroup: While you have exactly 5 cards in hand, you may exert Derufin to discard an engine, machine, or possession.

card.title: Dervorin
card.game_text: At the start of the regroup phase, if you have only 4 cards in hand, you may spot another [GONDOR] Man to discard a minion.

card.title: Duty of Two
card.game_text: Add 3 threats to heal all [GONDOR] companions.

card.title: Faramir
card.subtitle: Stout Captain
card.game_text: Ranger. To play, spot a [GONDOR] Man. Each time Faramir wins a skirmish involving a fierce minion, you may exert Faramir to discard that minion.

card.title: Faramir
card.subtitle: Wizard's Pupil
card.game_text: Ranger. Fellowship: Play a [ROHAN] Man to heal Faramir. Skirmish: Exert Faramir to make an unbound Hobbit strength +2. Skirmish: Exert Gandalf to prevent all wounds to Faramir.

card.title: First Level
card.game_text: Fortification. Maneuver: Exert a [GONDOR] Man or spot a knight to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion.

card.title: Footman's Armor
card.notes: Each time the response for this card is activated, the conditions for being overwhelmed must be checked again.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Response: if bearer is about to be overwhelmed, discard a [GONDOR] fortification or a card from hand to make bearer strength +2.

card.title: Gondor Bow
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. If bearer is a knight, he or she is strength +1. Skirmish: Exert bearer to wound a minion he or she is skirmishing if that minion bears a fortification.

card.title: Gondor Still Stands
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 [GONDOR] companions. While no opponent controls a site, wound a minion at the start of each regroup phase. Regroup: Discard this condition to place a [GONDOR] fortification from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

card.title: Gondorian Captain
card.game_text: Knight. Fellowship: Discard a fortification to remove a threat.

card.title: Gondorian Merchant
card.game_text: Maneuver: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from hand to make the site number of a minion +2 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Gondorian Sword
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Skirmish: Discard 3 cards from hand to make bearer damage +1.

card.title: Great Gate
card.game_text: Make a [GONDOR] companion strength +2 and, if you can spot 2 [GONDOR] fortifications, exert a minion that companion is skirmishing.

card.title: Greatest Stronghold
card.game_text: Exert a [GONDOR] Man and spot 3 fortifications to make the fellowship archery total +2.

card.title: Guarded
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 [GONDOR] Men. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion (or all roaming minions).

card.title: Hasty Repairs
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 [GONDOR] Men. Regroup: While you have only 4 cards in hand, you may discard 2 cards from hand to play a [GONDOR] fortification from your discard pile.

card.title: Hearts Raised
card.game_text: At the start of your regroup phase, you may spot a [GONDOR] Man and discard a card from hand to remove a threat.

card.title: Hidden Knowledge
card.game_text: Spot a [GONDOR] companion to reveal the top 5 cards of an opponent's draw deck. For each Shadow card revealed, add a threat. For each Free Peoples card revealed, place a [GONDOR] token on one of your conditions with a [GONDOR] token on it. Shuffle that draw deck.

card.title: I Will Go
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. If you have initiative, bearer is defender +1.

card.title: Ingold
card.game_text: Knight. Fellowship: Discard a fortification to heal Ingold twice.

card.title: Iorlas
card.game_text: Response: If a possession or engine is played by your opponent, remove a [GONDOR] token from your condition to make that opponent remove [1]. If he or she cannot, discard that possession or engine.

card.title: Knight's Spear
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Skirmish: If you cannot spot 2 threats, add a threat to make bearer strength +1.

card.title: Long Prepared
card.game_text: To play, add 2 threats. Skirmish: Exert a [GONDOR] Man to wound a roaming minion that Man is skirmishing. Discard this condition at the start of the regroup phase.

card.title: Madril
card.subtitle: Faramir's Aide
card.game_text: Ranger. Skirmish: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from hand to wound a roaming minion Madril is skirmishing.

card.title: Man the Walls
card.game_text: The site number of each minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man is +1.

card.title: Noble Leaders
card.game_text: When you play this condition, place a [GONDOR] token here for each of the following characters you can spot: Aragorn, Boromir, Denethor or Faramir. Skirmish: Remove a token from here or discard this condition to make a [GONDOR] companion strength +1 and damage +1.

card.title: Pippin's Armor
card.game_text: Bearer must be Pippin. While you can spot 3 [GONDOR] Men, Pippin may take no more than 1 wound in a skirmish.

card.title: Pippin's Sword
card.game_text: Bearer must be Pippin. Skirmish: Exert Pippin twice to make him strength +1 for each [GONDOR] companion you spot.

card.title: Ranger of Minas Tirith
card.game_text: Ranger. While skirmishing a roaming minion, this companion is strength +2 and damage +1.

card.title: Ranger of Osgiliath
card.game_text: Ranger. Regroup: Discard 2 cards from hand to exhaust a minion.

card.title: Reckless Counter
card.game_text: Spot 2 knights or exert 2 [GONDOR] Men to liberate a site or discard any number of cards from hand.

card.title: Second Level
card.game_text: Fortification. Maneuver: Exert a [GONDOR] Man or spot a ranger to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion.

card.title: Seventh Level
card.game_text: Fortification. Skirmish: Exert 3 [GONDOR] Men to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man.

card.title: Stand to Arms
card.game_text: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from hand to wound a roaming minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man twice.

card.title: Stout Resistance
card.game_text: Add a threat to make a [GONDOR] Man strength +3.

card.title: Strong and Old
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [GONDOR] Men. The twilight cost of each of your [GONDOR] fortifications is -1. Response: If an opponent is about to control a site, discard 2 [GONDOR] fortifications to prevent this.

card.title: Support of the City
card.game_text: Fellowship: Play a [GONDOR] Man to place a [GONDOR] token here. Fellowship: Play a [GONDOR] companion. That companion's twilight cost is -1 for each token here. Discard this condition.

card.title: Targon
card.game_text: Ranger. Skirmish: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from hand to wound a Man Targon is skirmishing.

card.title: Unexpected Visitor
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [GONDOR] companion. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to bearer of Unexpected Visitor.' Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion and remove [4].

card.title: Vorondil
card.game_text: While no opponent controls a site, Vorondil is strength +2. Regroup: Exert 3 [GONDOR] Men or 2 knights to liberate a site.

card.title: While We Yet Live

card.game_text: Regroup: Spot 2 [RAIDER] Men and remove [3] to add a threat (limit 1).

card.title: Desert Runner
card.game_text: Southron. Ambush [1]. When the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a character and you have initiative, you may wound that character.

card.title: Desert Scout
card.game_text: Southron. Ambush [1]. When the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a character and you have initiative, you may wound that character.

card.game_text: Southron. Ambush [1]. When the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a character and you have initiative, you may wound that character.

card.game_text: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove [3] to wound a companion or ally he is skirmishing.

card.game_text: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove [1] to add a threat.

card.game_text: Easterling. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make him damage +1.

card.title: Easterling Footman
card.game_text: Easterling. Maneuver: If you cannot spot 2 burdens, spot another Easterling and discard a card from hand to add a burden.

card.title: Easterling Ransacker
card.game_text: Easterling. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make him damage +1.

card.title: Easterling Regiment
card.game_text: Easterling. Fierce. Each time Easterling Regiment wins a skirmish, you may add [1] for each burden.

card.title: Easterling Sergeant
card.game_text: Easterling. Maneuver: If you cannot spot a burden, spot another Easterling and exert this minion to add a burden.

card.title: Easterling Veteran
card.game_text: Easterling. Skirmish: Remove 2 burdens to heal another Easterling.

card.title: Fierce in Despair
card.game_text: Spot 2 [RAIDER] Men to discard a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Great Beasts
card.game_text: To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. Regroup: Remove [9] and spot 3 [RAIDER] Men to make the move limit -1.

card.title: Harsh Tongues
card.game_text: To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. Regroup: Remove [3] and spot a [RAIDER] Man to place a [RAIDER] token here. While there are 3 [RAIDER] tokens here, the Shadow has initiative regardless of the Free Peoples player's hand.

card.title: Hosts Still Unfought
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [RAIDER] Men. Discard any number of cards from hand. The Free Peoples player then discards any number of cards from hand. For each card you discarded more than the Free Peoples player, add [1].

card.game_text: Southron. To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. While you can spot 6 threats, each time this minion wins a skirmish, the companion he was skirmishing is killed.

card.title: Mumakil of the Harad
card.game_text: Spot a [RAIDER] minion to add [2] for each threat.

card.game_text: Make a [RAIDER] Man strength +3 (or +6 if you have initiative).

card.title: Raider Bow
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [RAIDER] Man. Bearer is an archer and ambush [5].

card.title: Raider Halberd
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [RAIDER] Man. Skirmish: Exert bearer to add [2].

card.title: Red Wrath
card.game_text: Exert a [RAIDER] Man to wound a companion he is skirmishing twice.

card.title: Rout
card.game_text: To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. Each time the fellowship moves, the Free Peoples player must exert 2 companions if you have initiative.

card.title: Small Hope
card.game_text: Maneuver: If you cannot spot 2 burdens, exert an Easterling to add a burden. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make an Easterling strength +2.

card.game_text: Southron. Maneuver: Exert this minion to add [5]. The Free Peoples player may add a threat to prevent this.

card.title: Southron Captain
card.game_text: Southron. While you can spot 4 threats, this minion is damage +2.

card.title: Southron Chieftain
card.game_text: Southron. To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a character, the Shadow has initiative until the end of the turn.

card.title: Southron Conqueror
card.game_text: Southron. Archer. While you can spot 6 twilight tokens, other [RAIDER] Men are damage +1. While you can spot 9 twilight tokens, other [RAIDER] Men are damage +1.

card.title: Southron Intruder
card.game_text: Southron. Archer. While you can spot 3 twilight tokens, all [RAIDER] Men are strength +1. While you can spot 6 twilight tokens, all [RAIDER] Men are strength +1. While you can spot 9 twilight tokens, all [RAIDER] Men are strength +1.

card.title: Southron Leader
card.game_text: Southron. Archery: Spot 4 Free Peoples cultures and either exert this minion or remove a threat to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Southron Marksmen
card.game_text: Southron. Archer. Fierce. To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. Archery: Exert this minion and remove a threat to make the minion archery total +1.

card.title: Southron Thief
card.game_text: Southron. Archery: Spot another [RAIDER] Man, spot 6 companions, and remove a threat to exert a companion.

card.title: Surging Up
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert an Easterling and discard this condition to make the move limit -1 for this turn. The Free Peoples player may add 2 burdens to prevent this. Skirmish: Discard this condition to heal an Easterling.

card.title: Suzerain of Harad
card.game_text: Southron. Archer. While you have initiative, the Ring-bearer cannot take wounds during the archery phase and this minion is ambush [8].

card.title: Thrice Outnumbered
card.game_text: Spot a threat and X [RAIDER] Men to make the Free Peoples player exert X companions (limit 3).

card.title: Troop of Haradrim
card.game_text: Southron. While you can spot 2 threats, this minion is an archer. While you can spot 3 threats, this minion is fierce. While you can spot 4 threats, this minion is damage +1.

card.title: War Towers
card.game_text: Spot a [RAIDER] minion to add a threat. Add an additional threat for each companion over 4.

card.title: Called
card.game_text: Assignment: Remove 5 threats to assign a Nazgul to a companion (except the Ring-bearer). The Free Peoples player may discard that companion.

card.title: Corrupt
card.game_text: Make a Nazgul strength +1 for each Free Peoples culture you spot.

card.title: Disposable Servants
card.game_text: Spot a Nazgul to discard any number of cards from your hand. The Free Peoples player then discards any number of cards from his or her hand. For each card you discarded more than the Free Peoples player, add a threat.

card.title: Feel His Blade
card.game_text: Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to a character skirmishing a Nazgul. During the turn this card is transferred, the Shadow has initiative, regardless of the Free Peoples player's hand.

card.title: Foul Clutches
card.game_text: Discard 3 cards from hand to make a Nazgul strength +3.

card.title: Ghastly Host
card.game_text: Shadow: Spot a Nazgul and remove a threat to play a Nazgul. Its twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Gorbag
card.subtitle: Lieutenant of Cirith Ungol
card.game_text: While you can spot a Nazgul, Gorbag is strength +2 and damage +1.

card.title: Held Ground
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 Nazgul and add up to 3 threats. Each time a companion is about to be killed, you may remove a threat to discard up to 2 possessions. Discard this condition and remove 3 threats during the regroup phase.

card.title: Loathsome
card.game_text: If a skirmish that involved a Nazgul is about to end, discard a possession borne by a companion in that skirmish.

card.title: Mind and Body
card.game_text: If a Nazgul kills a character, wound each character bearing a [WRAITH] condition.

card.title: More Unbearable
card.game_text: To play, spot a Nazgul. Regroup: Discard a Nazgul to place a [WRAITH] token on this card. While there are 3 [WRAITH] tokens on this card, the Shadow has initiative, regardless of the Free Peoples player's hand.

card.title: Morgul Answers
card.game_text: To play, spot a Nazgul. Skirmish: Remove [3] and spot 3 Nazgul to discard a possession or condition borne by a companion a Nazgul is skirmishing.

card.title: Morgul Axe
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [WRAITH] Orc. While you can spot 2 wounds on the Ring-bearer, bearer is damage +1.

card.title: Morgul Brawler
card.game_text: While the Ring-bearer is exhausted, this minion is strength +3, fierce and damage +1.

card.title: Morgul Brute
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may spot a Nazgul to add a burden. The Free Peoples player may wound the Ring-bearer to prevent this. Skirmish: Remove a burden to make this minion strength +3.

card.title: Morgul Cur
card.game_text: While you can spot a Nazgul, this minion is strength +2.

card.title: Morgul Destroyer
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may spot a Nazgul to add 2 threats. The Free Peoples player may wound the Ring-bearer to prevent this. Skirmish: Remove a threat to make this minion strength +3.

card.title: Morgul Detachment
card.game_text: While you can spot a Nazgul, this minion is fierce and damage +1.

card.title: Morgul Hound
card.game_text: While you can spot 2 wounds on the Ring-bearer, this minion is strength +4 and fierce.

card.title: Morgul Lackey
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to make a Nazgul or [WRAITH] Orc strength +1.

card.title: Morgul Mongrel
card.game_text: While you can spot 3 wounds on the Ring-bearer, this minion is fierce and damage +1.

card.title: Morgul on the March
card.game_text: To play, spot a Nazgul. Each time the Free Peoples player draws a card (except during the regroup phase), add a threat. Regroup: Discard a Nazgul and this condition to add a threat.

card.title: Morgul Predator
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to make a Nazgul or [WRAITH] Orc strength +1.

card.title: Morgul Regiment
card.game_text: For each Nazgul you can spot, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion to assign this minion to a skirmish. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make a Nazgul or [WRAITH] Orc strength +1.

card.title: Morgul Ruffian
card.game_text: While you can spot a Nazgul, this minion may only take wounds during skirmish phases.

card.title: Morgul Soldier
card.game_text: Nazgul are strength +1.

card.title: Morgul Spawn
card.game_text: While you can spot a Nazgul, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion to assign this minion to a skirmish.

card.title: Morgul Spearman
card.game_text: While you can spot a Nazgul, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion to assign this minion to a skirmish.

card.title: Morgul Whelp

card.title: Nazgul Scimitar
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [WRAITH] minion. While you can spot 5 threats, bearer is damage +1.

card.title: Out of Sight and Shot
card.game_text: To play, spot a Nazgul. Each time a companion is played, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion. Shadow: Spot a Nazgul and discard this condition to play a Nazgul from your discard pile.

card.title: Put Forth His Strength
card.game_text: To play, spot a Nazgul. Shadow: If you have initiative and there are 3 characters in the dead pile, spot 3 burdens, 3 threats and a Nazgul to corrupt the Ring-bearer.

card.title: Stronghold of Minas Morgul
card.game_text: Response: If your [WRAITH] minion wins a skirmish, place a [WRAITH] token here (limit 1 per site). Regroup: Spot 3 [WRAITH] tokens here to exhaust the Ring-bearer. Discard this condition.

card.title: Their Power Is in Terror
card.game_text: Exert a Nazgul to wound each ally.

card.title: There Came a Cry
card.game_text: Spot a Nazgul to add a threat (or 3 threats if you have initiative).

card.title: Too Late
card.game_text: Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to a character skirmishing a Nazgul. Each time bearer exerts, add [1].

card.title: Ulaire Attea
card.subtitle: Wraith on Wings
card.game_text: Fierce. Shadow: If you have initiative, exert Ulaire Attea and spot another [WRAITH] minion to add a burden.

card.title: Ulaire Cantea
card.subtitle: Faster Than Winds
card.game_text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Cantea, add a threat for each companion over 4. Maneuver: Remove 2 threats and spot another [WRAITH] minion to discard a possession.

card.title: Ulaire Cantea
card.subtitle: Faster Than Winds
card.game_text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Cantea, add a threat for each companion over 4. Maneuver: Remove 2 threats and spot another [WRAITH] minion to discard a possession.

card.title: Ulaire Enquea
card.subtitle: Faster Than Winds
card.game_text: Fierce. While you can spot 6 companions, Ulaire Enquea is damage +1. Each time a companion is killed, you may exert Ulaire Enquea to exert the Ring-bearer.

card.title: Ulaire Lemenya
card.subtitle: Assailing Minion
card.game_text: Ulaire Lemenya is strength +1 for each other [WRAITH] minion you spot. While you can spot 3 [WRAITH] minions Ulaire Lemenya is fierce. While you can spot 4 [WRAITH] minions Ulaire Lemenya is damage +1.

card.title: Ulaire Lemenya
card.subtitle: Wraith on Wings
card.game_text: Regroup: If you have initiative, discard Ulaire Lemenya to discard a possession.

card.title: Ulaire Nelya
card.subtitle: Assailing Minion

card.title: Ulaire Nelya
card.subtitle: Black-Mantled Wraith
card.game_text: Fierce. Regroup: If you have initiative, discard Ulaire Nelya to exert each Ring-bound companion.

card.title: Ulaire Nertea
card.subtitle: Black-Mantled Wraith
card.game_text: Regroup: If you have initiative, discard Ulaire Nertea to add a burden.

card.title: Ulaire Otsea
card.subtitle: Black-Mantled Wraith
card.game_text: Regroup: If you have initiative, discard Ulaire Otsea to make the Free Peoples player exert a Ring-bound companion twice or return and unbound companion to his or her hand.

card.title: Ulaire Toldea
card.subtitle: Wraith on Wings
card.game_text: Fierce. While you have initiative and can spot a Nazgul, Ulaire Toldea's twilight cost is -6.

card.title: War Long Planned
card.game_text: Make a [WRAITH] Orc strength +2 (or +4 if you spot 2 wounds on the Ring-bearer).

card.title: The Witch-king
card.subtitle: Morgul King
card.game_text: Fierce. When you play the Witch-King, you may remove a threat to take a [WRAITH] card into hand from your discard pile. The Ring-bearer cannot take threat wounds.

card.title: The Witch-king
card.subtitle: Morgul King
card.game_text: Fierce. When you play The Witch-king, you may remove a threat to take a [WRAITH] card into hand from your discard pile. The Ring-bearer cannot take threat wounds.

card.title: Deor
card.game_text: Villager. Skirmish: If you have initiative, discard a card from hand to make a [ROHAN] Man strength +1.

card.lore: ;Spot a mounted [ROHAN] Man to exert a minion. That minion's owner may exert a companion and if he or she does so, you may exert a minion
card.game_text: repeat this until a player does not exert a character.

card.title: Elfhelm
card.subtitle: Marshal of Rohan
card.game_text: Valiant. Skirmish: Exert Elfhelm to make him strength +1 for each uncontrolled plains site you can spot.

card.title: Elite Rider
card.game_text: When this companion is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. While skirmishing a wounded minion, this companion is strength +2.

card.title: Enraged Horseman
card.game_text: While you can spot another [ROHAN] Man and this companion is skirmishing a wounded minion, this companion is strength +2 and damage +1.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Skilled Tactician
card.game_text: Valiant. While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Fellowship: Play a [ROHAN] companion to take a [ROHAN] possession or [ROHAN] skirmish event into hand from your discard pile.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Skilled Tactician

card.title: Eowyn
card.subtitle: Dernhelm

card.subtitle: Restless Maiden
card.game_text: Skirmish: Discard a possession borne by Eowyn to make her strength +2.

card.title: Fey He Seemed
card.game_text: Make a [ROHAN] Man strength +2 (or +3 and damage +1 if skirmishing a wounded minion).

card.title: Firefoot

card.title: Grimbold
card.subtitle: Marshal of Rohan

card.title: His Golden Shield
card.game_text: Spot 3 [ROHAN] Men to make an opponent remove [1] or place a random card from hand beneath his or her draw deck. Do this once for each card in that player's hand when you play this event.

card.game_text: Make a [ROHAN] Man strength +4. Any Shadow player may place a random card from hand beneath his or her draw deck to make that Man strength +2 instead.

card.game_text: Skirmish: Discard a card from hand to exert a minion skirmishing this companion.

card.title: Snowmane

card.title: Stern People

card.title: Strong Arms
card.game_text: To play, spot a [ROHAN] Man. Plays on a site. This site is a plains. Each [ROHAN] Man is strength +1 at this site.

card.title: Swift Steed
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. While at a plains site, bearer takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert.

card.title: Theoden
card.subtitle: Leader of Spears
card.game_text: Valiant. While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Theoden's twilight cost is -1. Each time the fellowship moves, you may exert a [ROHAN] companion to exert a minion.

card.title: Theoden

card.game_text: While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Theoden's twilight cost is -1. Fellowship: If the twilight pool has fewer than 2 twilight tokens, play a [ROHAN] possession on Theoden and add [2] to heal another [ROHAN] companion.

card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert this companion to make him strength +1 for each mounted companion you spot.

card.title: With Strength to Fight
card.game_text: To play, spot a [ROHAN] companion. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Regroup: Discard this condition to heal up to 2 [ROHAN] companions.

card.game_text: For each 2 sites you control, the twilight cost of each of your [SAURON] cards is -1. Regroup: Spot a [SAURON] minion to draw a card (or draw 2 cards instead if that minion is a besieger). Discard this condition.

card.game_text: The site number of each [SAURON] Orc is -1 for each threat. While you can spot 3 threats, each [SAURON] Orc that is not roaming is strength +1

card.game_text: Response: If your [SAURON] minion wins a skirmish, place a [SAURON] token here (limit 1 per site). Regroup: Add [2] for each token here. Discard this condition.

card.game_text: Skirmish: If Pippin is not assigned to a skirmish, return him to your hand to wound a roaming minion twice.

card.game_text: Shadow: Spot 2 [RAIDER] Men and remove a threat to add [2].

card.title: Morgul Vale
card.game_text: Skirmish: Spot your [SAURON] minion and remove 2 threats to make your [SAURON] minion strength +3.

card.title: Morgulduin
