card.game_text: Shadow: Remove 2 threats to play a Nazgul from your discard pile. His twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Northern Ithilien
card.game_text: Shadow: Remove 2 threats and play Gollum from your discard pile to add 2 burdens.

card.title: Dagorlad
card.game_text: Plains. When the fellowship moves to this site, add 3 threats.

card.title: Haunted Pass
card.game_text: Shadow: Remove a threat and spot your minion to draw a card.

card.title: Narchost
card.game_text: Shadow: Spot 8 burdens to make the Ring-bearer wear The One Ring until the regroup phase.

card.title: Slag Mounds
card.game_text: Each time a companion is killed, add a burden.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Driven by Need
card.game_text: While you cannot spot 4 threats, Aragorn is strength +1 for each threat. Regroup: Exert Aragorn twice to remove 3 threats.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Valiant Warchief
card.game_text: Valiant. While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Skirmish:If you have initiative, discard 3 cards from hand to make Eomer strength +1 for each valiant companion you spot.

card.title: Aggression
card.game_text: While you have initiative, each Dwarf is damage +1. Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf who is damage +X to draw X cards. Discard this condition.

card.title: Battle in Earnest
card.game_text: Spot a Dwarf who is damage +X to place X wounds on minions.

card.title: Blood Runs Chill
card.game_text: Spot a Dwarf who is damage +X and exert that Dwarf twice to make an opponent discard X Shadow cards.

card.title: Counts But One
card.game_text: If Gimli is not assigned to a skirmish, add a threat to have him replace an unbound companion in a skirmish.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Counter of Foes
card.game_text: Damage +1. For each wound on Gimli, he is strength +1 and damage +1.

card.title: Honed
card.game_text: Spot a Dwarf who is damage +X to make him strength +X.

card.title: Unheard of
card.game_text: If a Dwarf who is damage +X wins a skirmish, wound a minion not assigned to a skirmish X times.

card.title: Wish For Our Kinfolk
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert a Dwarf companion and either an [ELVEN] companion or a [GONDOR] Man to add a [DWARVEN] token here. Skirmish: Remove a [DWARVEN] token here to make a companion damage +1.

card.title: A Grey Ship
card.game_text: Spot an Elf companion and make the fellowship archery total -X (to a minimum of 0) to heal X unbound companions. You cannot use archery special abilities.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Elven Stalwart
card.game_text: Archer. While you can spot 3 wounded minions, each minion skirmishing Legolas is strength -3.

card.title: Life of the Eldar
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 Elves. Discard an Elf to draw 3 cards.

card.title: Reckless We Rode
card.game_text: Exert an Elf companion and make the fellowship archery total -X (to a minimum of 0) to wound a minion X times. You cannot use archery special abilities.

card.title: Shake Off the Shadow
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert an Elf companion and either a [GANDALF] companion or a [DWARVEN] companion to add an [ELVEN] token here. Archery: Remove an [ELVEN] token here to make the fellowship archery total +1 (limit +2).

card.title: A Fool
card.game_text: At sites 1[KING] to 5[KING], heal Gandalf. At any other site, prevent a Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Leader of Men
card.game_text: When Gandalf is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Leader of Men
card.game_text: When Gandalf is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Let Us Not Tarry
card.game_text: Exert Gandalf to make a minion skirmishing an unbound companion strength -1 for each Gandalf signet you spot.

card.title: Mighty Steed
card.game_text: If Gandalf is not assigned to a skirmish, spot Shadowfax or exert Gandalf to have Gandalf replace an unbound companion in a skirmish.

card.title: Not the First Halfling
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert Gandalf and either an [ELVEN] companion or a [SHIRE] companion to add a [GANDALF] token here. Skirmish: Remove a [GANDALF] token here to make a minion skirmishing an unbound companion strength -2.

card.title: On Your Doorstep
card.game_text: Spot Gandalf and exert a companion to place a card of that companion's culture from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

card.title: Saved From the Fire
card.game_text: Spot Gandalf and place a companion (except the Ring-bearer) in the dead pile to take 3 cards from that companion's culture into hand from your draw deck. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.title: Shadowfax
card.subtitle: Greatheart
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, each minion skirmishing Gandalf must exert. Skirmish: Add a threat to make Gandalf strength +1.

card.title: Hidden Even From Her
card.game_text: Gollum is fierce. Shadow: Spot 6 companions to play Gollum from your discard pile and exert a companion. Place this condition on top of your draw deck.

card.title: Larder
card.game_text: To play, spot a [GOLLUM] minion. Regroup: Discard an Orc from hand to add a [GOLLUM] token here. Skirmish: Remove a [GOLLUM] token here to make Shelob strength +3 (limit +6).

card.title: Promise Keeping
card.game_text: Each time a companion takes a wound during a skirmish that involves a [GOLLUM] minion, exert a companion.

card.title: Shelob
card.subtitle: Eater of Light
card.game_text: Fierce. When you play Shelob, you may play a [GOLLUM] possession from your draw deck. Shelob is strength +3 for each minion stacked on a [GOLLUM] possession.

card.title: Shelob
card.subtitle: Eater of Light
card.game_text: Fierce. When you play Shelob, you may play a [GOLLUM] possession from your draw deck. Shelob is strength +3 for each minion stacked on a [GOLLUM] possession.

card.title: Shelob
card.subtitle: Last Child of Ungoliant
card.game_text: Enduring. Fierce. While in a fierce skirmish, Shelob is damage +1.

card.title: Smeagol
card.subtitle: Slippery Sneak
card.game_text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Skirmish: Add threats equal to the total vitality of the minions Smeagol is skirmishing to discard Smeagol. Regroup: Discard Smeagol to take a [GOLLUM] minion from your discard pile into hand.

card.title: Spider Poison
card.game_text: Skirmish: Remove a threat or a burden to transfer this possession to a companion skirmishing Shelob. Each time bearer is assigned to a skirmish, bearer must exert.

card.title: Still Far Ahead
card.game_text: Spot Smeagol to play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary). The Shadow number of the fellowship's next site is -1 until the end of the turn.

card.title: Web
card.game_text: Regroup: If there are fewer than 3 cards stacked here, spot your Orc or [GOLLUM] minion to stack that minion here. Shadow: Play a [GOLLUM] minion stacked here as if played from hand.

card.title: At His Command
card.game_text: Exert Aragorn to make an unbound companion with the Aragorn signet strength +1 for each threat you spot.

card.title: Catapult
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [GONDOR] knights. Maneuver: Discard 2 cards from hand to reveal the top card of an opponent's draw deck. Choose an opponent who must discard a Shadow card that has a twilight cost that is the same as the twilight cost of the revealed card.

card.title: Elessar's Edict
card.game_text: If a [GONDOR] Wraith is about to be killed, discard him and either exhaust another [GONDOR] Wraith or spot another exhausted [GONDOR] Wraith to prevent that.

card.title: Faramir
card.subtitle: Defender of Osgiliath
card.game_text: Knight. When you play Faramir (except in your starting fellowship), you may reveal the top 10 cards of your draw deck. You may play a knight revealed. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.title: Fourth Level
card.game_text: Fortification. Skirmish: Exert 2 [GONDOR] Men or spot 3 knights to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man. Exhaust that minion.

card.title: Garrison of Gondor
card.game_text: Archer. Knight. To play, spot 3 [GONDOR] companions. While you can spot a fortification, Garrison of Gondor is defender +1.

card.title: Imrahil
card.subtitle: Prince of Dol Amroth
card.game_text: Knight. To play, spot a knight. Each time Imrahil wins a skirmish, you may exert 2 minions.

card.title: King of the Dead
card.subtitle: Oathbreaker
card.game_text: Enduring. To play, spot a [GONDOR] Wraith and add 2 threats. Response: If Aragorn is about to take a wound in a skirmish, exert King of the Dead to prevent that wound.

card.title: King of the Dead
card.subtitle: Oathbreaker
card.game_text: Enduring. To play, spot a [GONDOR] Wraith and add 2 threats. Response: If Aragorn is about to take a wound in a skirmish, exert King of the Dead to prevent that wound.

card.title: Knight of Dol Amroth
card.game_text: Knight. Each time this companion wins a skirmish, you may wound a minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Knight's Mount
card.game_text: Bearer must be a knight. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may wound a minion who is not assigned to a skirmish.

card.title: Oathbreaker
card.game_text: Enduring. To play, add a threat. Skirmish: Discard 3 cards from hand to discard a possession borne by a minion skirmishing this companion.

card.title: A Path Appointed
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert a [GONDOR] Man and either a [DWARVEN] companion or a [ROHAN] companion to add a [GONDOR] token here. Regroup: Remove a [GONDOR] token here to discard a minion.

card.title: Shadow Host
card.game_text: Enduring. To play, spot 2 exhausted [GONDOR] Wraiths and add 2 threats. While Shadow Host is exhausted, it is defender +1.

card.title: Sixth Level
card.game_text: Fortification. Regroup: Exert a [GONDOR] Man to play a [GONDOR] fortification from your discard pile (limit 1).

card.title: Sleepless Dead
card.game_text: Enduring. To play, add a threat. Each time this companion wins a skirmish, you may exert him to discard a minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Spectral Sword
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Wraith. Skirmish: Discard 3 cards from hand to heal bearer.

card.title: Stronger and More Terrible
card.game_text: To play, add a threat. Each time your [GONDOR] Wraith wins a skirmish, you may remove a threat.

card.title: Swept Away
card.game_text: Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. While you have initiative, exhausted [GONDOR] Wraiths cannot take wounds.

card.title: Black Numenorean
card.game_text: Corsair. Fierce. Skirmish: If you have initiative, remove a [RAIDER] token to discard a possession borne by a character skirmishing this minion.

card.title: Black Sails of Umbar
card.lore: ;When you play this possession, you may add a [RAIDER] token here. Shadow: Remove X [RAIDER] tokens here to play a corsair from your discard pile
card.game_text: its twilight cost is -X. Discard this possession.

card.title: Castamir of Umbar
card.game_text: Corsair. Enduring. Fierce. Shadow: Exert Castamir of Umbar and play a corsair to add 2 [RAIDER] tokens to a card that already has a [RAIDER] token on it.

card.title: Castamir of Umbar
card.game_text: Corsair. Enduring. Fierce. Shadow: Exert Castamir of Umbar and play a corsair to add 2 [Raider] tokens to a card that already has a [Raider] token on it.

card.title: Corsair Ballista
card.game_text: Bearer must be a corsair. While you have initiative, bearer is an archer and fierce.

card.title: Corsair Buccaneer
card.game_text: Corsair. When you play this minion, you may remove a threat to add 2 [RAIDER] tokens to a card that already has a [RAIDER] token on it.

card.title: Corsair Freebooter
card.game_text: Corsair. When you play this minion, you may remove 2 culture tokens to add 2 [RAIDER] tokens to a card that already has a [RAIDER] token on it.

card.title: Corsair Gunners
card.game_text: Corsair. Skirmish: If you have initiative, remove a [RAIDER] token to make a corsair fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Corsair Lookout
card.game_text: Corsair. When you play this minion, if you have initiative, you may discard an ally to add 2 [RAIDER] tokens to a card that already has a [RAIDER] token on it.

card.title: Corsair Marauder
card.game_text: Corsair. When you play this minion, if you can spot another corsair, you may discard a possession to add 2 [RAIDER] tokens to a card that already has a [RAIDER] token on it.

card.title: Corsair Marauder
card.game_text: Corsair. When you play this minion, if you can spot another corsair, you may discard a possession to add 2 [Raider] tokens to a card that already has a [Raider] token on it.

card.title: Corsair Plunderer
card.game_text: Corsair. When you play this minion, you may discard 2 cards from hand to add 2 [RAIDER] tokens to a card that already has a [RAIDER] token on it.

card.title: Corsair War Galley
card.game_text: When you play this possession, you may add a [RAIDER] token here. While you can spot 6 [RAIDER] tokens and a [RAIDER] Man, the Shadow has initiative, regardless of the Free Peoples player's hand. Regroup: Add [1] for each [RAIDER] token you can spot. Discard this possession.

card.title: Haradrim Marksman
card.game_text: Southron. Archer. While you can spot another [RAIDER] Man, Ring-bound companions cannot take archery wounds.

card.title: Haradwaith
card.game_text: While you can spot a [RAIDER] minion at site 4[KING], the Shadow has initiative, regardless of the Free Peoples player's hand. Response: If a companion is played, discard a [RAIDER] card from hand to add [5]. Discard this condition.

card.title: Heavy Axeman
card.game_text: Easterling. While you can spot 4 burdens, Heavy Axeman is strength +4 and fierce.

card.title: Line of Defense
card.game_text: While you can spot a mounted [RAIDER] Man, [RAIDER] Men cannot take wounds (except during skirmishes).

card.title: Mumakil
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Southron. Bearer is fierce. While you have initiative or can spot 4 threats, bearer is damage +1.

card.title: Ships of Great Draught
card.game_text: Shadow: Remove a threat or discard a [RAIDER] card from hand to add a [RAIDER] token here. Regroup: Remove 2 [RAIDER] tokens here to place a [RAIDER] card from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

card.title: Wind That Sped Ships
card.game_text: Make a corsair strength +1 for each [RAIDER] token you spot (limit +6). If you have initiative, you may place this event on top of your draw deck.

card.title: Between Nazgul and Prey
card.game_text: Exert an enduring [WRAITH] minion twice to assign that minion to an unbound companion.

card.title: Beyond All Darkness
card.game_text: Exert a Nazgul to make him strength +2 and damage +1. If the character he is skirmishing is killed, the Free Peoples player must place his or her hand beneath his or her draw deck.

card.title: Black Dart
card.game_text: Archery: Spot your enduring or mounted Nazgul to transfer this condition from your support area to an unbound companion. Discard a mount borne by that companion. Bearer cannot heal or bear mounts.

card.title: Black Flail
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Skirmish: If bearer is The Witch-king, exert him and spot a possession borne by a character he is skirmishing to discard that possession.

card.title: Flung Into the Fray
card.game_text: When you play a minion stacked here, you may exert a companion. Regroup: If no minion is stacked here, spot your [WRAITH] minon to stack it here. Shadow: Spot 2 [WRAITH] minions to play a [WRAITH] minion stacked here as if played from hand.

card.title: Gothmog
card.subtitle: Morgul Commander
card.game_text: While you have initiative, each [WRAITH] minion is an archer.

card.title: Mastered By Madness
card.game_text: Make a Nazgul strength +2. If that Nazgul wins this skirmish, you may discard a Free Peoples mount.

card.title: Morgul Ambusher
card.game_text: While you can spot 3 threats, the minion archery total is +2.

card.title: Morgul Creeper
card.game_text: While you can spot 3 burdens, the minion archery total is +2.

card.title: Morgul Lurker
card.game_text: While you have initiative, the minion archery total is +2.

card.title: Morgul Squealer
card.lore: ;Shadow: Discard this minion to play a [WRAITH] minion from your discard pile. Shadow: Spot 6 companions and discard this minion to play up to 2 [WRAITH] minions from your draw deck
card.game_text: their twilight costs are each -1.

card.title: Streaming to the Field
card.game_text: For each [WRAITH] Orc you can spot, the Free Peoples player must have an additional card in hand to have initiative. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [WRAITH] Orc strength +2.

card.title: Ulaire Attea
card.subtitle: Thrall of the One
card.game_text: Enduring. Regroup: Exert Ulaire Attea and spot your [WRAITH] minion to return that minion to your hand.

card.title: Ulaire Nertea
card.subtitle: Thrall of the One
card.game_text: Enduring. Fierce. The site number of each [WRAITH] minion is -1.

card.title: Ulaire Otsea
card.subtitle: Thrall of the One
card.game_text: Enduring. Fierce. Regroup: Discard Ulaire Otsea to add (X), where X is the current site number.

card.title: Unhindered
card.game_text: Make a Nazgul strength +2. If that Nazgul wins this skirmish, the Shadow has initiative until the end of the turn, regardless of the Free Peoples player's hand.

card.title: Winged Mount
card.game_text: To play, discard 2 cards from hand. Bearer must be a Nazgul. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, remove a threat to prevent that wound.

card.title: The Witch-king
card.subtitle: Black Captain
card.game_text: Enduring. Each Man skirmishing The Witch-king loses all strength bonuses from weapons.

card.title: Charged Headlong
card.game_text: If you have initiative, discard a [ROHAN] possession to play a [ROHAN] possession from your discard pile.

card.title: Doom Drove Them
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert a [ROHAN] companion and either a [GONDOR] Man or a [SHIRE] companion to add a [ROHAN] token here. Skirmish: Remove a [ROHAN] token here to exert a minion skirmishing a companion.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Keeper of Oaths
card.game_text: Valiant. When you play Eomer (except in your starting fellowship), you may reveal the top 10 cards of your draw deck. You may play each [ROHAN] possession revealed. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.title: Eowyn's Shield
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. The minion archery total is -1. Skirmish: If bearer is Eowyn, add a threat and discard Eowyn's Shield to discard a hand weapon borne by a minion she is skirmishing.

card.title: Fury of the Northmen
card.game_text: Exert a minion skirmishing a mounted [ROHAN] Man.

card.title: No Living Man
card.game_text: Exert Theoden to exert a minion for each Theoden signet you spot.

card.title: Rohirrim Army
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 [ROHAN] companions. You may play Rohirrim Army any time you could play a regroup event. When you play Rohirrim Army, you may discard a minion.

card.title: Theoden
card.subtitle: Tall and Proud
card.game_text: Valiant. While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Theoden's twilight cost is -1. When Theoden is killed, you may play a [ROHAN] companion from your discard pile or draw deck.

card.title: Called Away
card.game_text: Regroup: Discard a [SAURON] minion, spot a companion (except the Ring-bearer), and remove X burdens, where X is that companion's vitality, to return that companion to its owner's hand.

card.title: Gorgoroth Agitator
card.game_text: Besieger. To play, spot a [SAURON] Orc. When you play this minion, if you can spot another besieger, you may add a threat for each companion over 4. Shadow: Remove a threat to play a [SAURON] engine from your discard pile.

card.title: Gorgoroth Assassin
card.game_text: Besieger. Assignment: Spot a [SAURON] engine or a site you control to assign this minion to an unbound companion.

card.title: Gorgoroth Berserker
card.game_text: Besieger. Enduring. To play, spot a [SAURON] Orc. Maneuver: If you have initiative, exert this minion twice to take control of a site. Maneuver: Remove a threat and exert this minion twice to take control of a site.

card.title: Gorgoroth Breaker
card.game_text: Besieger. Archery: Exert this minion or stack it on a site you control to make the fellowship archery total -2.

card.title: Gorgoroth Looter
card.game_text: Besieger. When you play this minion, you may remove a burden to play a besieger stacked on a site you control.

card.title: Gorgoroth Patrol
card.game_text: Besieger. Regroup: If this minion is stacked on a site you control, discard this minion to make the move limit for this turn -1.

card.title: Gorgoroth Servitor
card.game_text: Besieger. Archery: Return this minion to your hand to make the fellowship archery total -2 and prevent the Free Peoples player from using archery special abilities.

card.title: Gorgoroth Stormer
card.game_text: Besieger. Shadow: If you have initiative, exert this minion to add a burden and make the Free Peoples player draw a card.

card.title: Great Hill Troll
card.game_text: Besieger. Fierce. The twilight cost of this minion is -1 for each [SAURON] engine you spot. When you play this minion at sites 5[KING] to 9[KING], you may discard a Free Peoples condition.

card.title: Grond
card.subtitle: Hammer of the Underworld
card.game_text: Engine. Shadow: Play a [SAURON] minion to add a [SAURON] token here. Regroup: Remove X [SAURON] tokens here to discard a Free Peoples card (except a companion) with a twilight cost of X. Discard a [SAURON] minion or this possession.

card.title: Grond
card.subtitle: Hammer of the Underworld
card.game_text: Engine. Shadow: Play a [SAURON] minion to add a [SAURON] token here. Regroup: Remove X [SAURON] tokens here to discard a Free Peoples card (except a companion) with a twilight cost of X. Discard a [SAURON] minion or this possession.

card.title: Morgai
card.game_text: While you can spot a [SAURON] minion at site 5[KING], the Shadow has initiative, regardless of the Free Peoples player's hand. Response: If a companion is played, discard a [SAURON] card from hand to take control of a site. Discard this condition.

card.title: Olog-hai of Mordor
card.game_text: Besieger. Fierce. The twilight cost of this minion is -2 for each [SAURON] minion stacked on a site. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may play a besieger stacked on a site you control. That besieger is fierce and damage +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Siege Troop
card.game_text: Besieger. Regroup: Exert this minion twice to take control of a site.

card.title: Their Marching Companies
card.game_text: Engine. To play, spot a [SAURON] minion. Regroup: Remove a threat to stack your [SAURON] minion on a site you control. Shadow: Remove a threat to play a [SAURON] minion stacked on a site you control.

card.title: Troll of Gorgoroth
card.subtitle: Abomination of Sauron
card.game_text: Besieger. Fierce. To play, spot a [SAURON] Orc. The twilight cost of Troll of Gorgoroth is -2 for each [SAURON] engine you spot. Regroup: Exert Troll of Gorgoroth to stack your besieger on a site you control.

card.title: Closer and Closer He Bent
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert an unbound Hobbit and add a burden to reveal your hand. Place each Free Peoples card revealed this way beneath your draw deck.

card.title: Morgai Foothills
card.game_text: When the fellowship moves from site 4[KING], remove [1] for each Ring-bound companion you spot. Regroup: Discard a card from hand for each Ring-bound companion you spot. Discard this condition.

card.title: So Fair
card.subtitle: So Desperate
card.game_text: If the Shadow has initiative, add a threat to make an unbound Hobbit strength +1 for each [SHIRE] card you spot.

card.title: Song of the Shire
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert a [SHIRE] companion and either a [ROHAN] companion or a [GANDALF] companion to add a [SHIRE] token here. Skirmish: Remove a [SHIRE] token here to prevent an unbound companion from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.title: Sting
card.subtitle: Bane of the Eight Legs
card.game_text: Bearer must be Frodo or Sam. Response: If a fierce skirmish involving bearer is about to end, add a threat to discard a minion involved in that skirmish.

card.title: Straining Towards Us
card.game_text: Exert Frodo to remove [1] for each Frodo signet you spot.

card.title: Unheeded
card.game_text: If a minion exerts, exert an unbound Hobbit to wound that minion.

card.title: We Shall Meet Again Soon
card.game_text: If the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, exert an unbound Hobbit to place a Shadow card from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

card.title: The Dimholt
card.game_text: Sanctuary. Underground. Fellowship: Add 3 threats to play an enduring companion from your draw deck.

card.title: City of the Dead
card.game_text: Underground. Shadow: Remove 2 burdens to play an enduring minion from your draw deck or discard pile.

card.title: Crashed Gate
card.game_text: At the start of the regroup phase, the Free Peoples player must add 3 threats or choose an opponent who may take control of a site.

card.title: Osgiliath Channel
card.game_text: River. Regroup: Spot your minion and 6 companions to make the Free Peoples player choose to move again this turn.

card.title: Merry
card.subtitle: Noble Warrior
card.game_text: To play, spot a [ROHAN] companion. Skirmish: Discard 4 cards from hand to make Merry strength +2 for each [ROHAN] companion you spot.

card.title: Pippin
card.subtitle: Guard of Minas Tirith
card.game_text: To play, spot a [GONDOR] Man. Skirmish: Discard 4 cards from hand to wound a minion Pippin is skirmishing twice if that minion bears a fortification.

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: The Binding Ring
card.game_text: Fellowship: Add 2 burdens to play a ring from your draw deck. Maneuver: Exert bearer to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

card.title: Freca
card.subtitle: Hungry Savage
card.game_text: When you play Freca, you may spot another [DUNLAND] Man to take control of a site. When Freca is killed, the Free Peoples player may liberate a site.

card.title: Durin III
card.subtitle: Dwarven Lord
card.game_text: Damage +1. While you can spot 2 Dwarves, Durin III is twilight cost -2. Durin III is strength +1 for each artifact and each possession he bears.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Bearer of Grudges
card.game_text: Damage +1. While Gimli is the Ring-bearer, at the start of each skirmish involving him, add 2 burdens or 2 threats. While Gimli is damage +X, he is resistance +X.

card.title: Linnar
card.subtitle: Dwarven Lord
card.game_text: Each time a Dwarf wins a fierce skirmish, you may heal that Dwarf. Skirmish: Discard a [DWARVEN] card from hand to make a Dwarf damage +1.

card.title: Ring of Accretion
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Bearer is damage +1. Maneuver: For each Dwarf you spot, reveal a card from the top of your draw deck. Take all Free Peoples cards revealed into hand and discard the rest. Discard this artifact.

card.title: Ring of Fury
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Bearer is damage +2. Regroup: Spot a Dwarf that is damage +X to heal X Dwarves. Discard this artifact.

card.title: Ring of Guile
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Bearer is damage +1. Maneuver: Take a [DWARVEN] event into hand from your discard pile. Discard this artifact.

card.title: Ring of Retribution
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Response: If bearer wins a skirmish, discard this artifact to exert each Orc.

card.title: Sindri
card.subtitle: Dwarven Lord
card.game_text: You may play [DWARVEN] skirmish events stacked on [DWARVEN] conditions as if from hand.

card.title: Uri
card.subtitle: Dwarven Lord
card.game_text: Skirmish: If Uri is damage +X, exert him to make him strength +X.

card.title: Aiglos
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Elf. If bearer is Gil-galad, he is strength +1 for each [ELVEN] artifact you can spot (limit +6). Regroup: Discard Aiglos to wound a minion for each Elf you spot.

card.title: Elven Rope
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Bearer must be an Elf or Hobbit. Maneuver: Discard this possession to make a Shadow player return a minion with strength 6 or less to its owner's hand.

card.title: Galadriel
card.subtitle: Bearer of Wisdom
card.game_text: While Galadriel bears an artifact or The One Ring, she is resistance +1 for each [ELVEN] companion you can spot.

card.title: Gil-galad
card.subtitle: Elven High King
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [ELVEN] companions. Regroup: Exert Gil-Galad to wound each wounded minion.

card.title: Glorfindel
card.subtitle: Revealed in Wrath
card.game_text: When Glorfindel is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -2. Skirmish: Reveal the top card of your draw deck. You may exert Glorfindel to make a Nazgul he is skirmishing strength -X, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.title: Knife of the Galadhrim
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. If bearer is Aragorn, he may bear this hand weapon in addition to 1 other hand weapon. Skirmish: Discard this weapon to wound a minion bearer is skirmishing.

card.title: Merry's Dagger
card.game_text: Bearer must be Merry. Skirmish: Exert Merry twice or discard this possession to wound a minion he is skirmishing. Any Shadow player may remove [1] to prevent this.

card.title: Narya
card.subtitle: Ring of Fire
card.game_text: Bearer must be Cirdan or Gandalf. Fellowship: Remove X culture tokens, where X is equal to bearer's vitality. Discard this artifact.

card.title: Nenya
card.subtitle: Ring of Adamant
card.game_text: Bearer must be Galadriel. Maneuver: Heal 2 companions and place up to 2 cards from hand on top of your draw deck. Discard this artifact.

card.title: Pippin's Dagger
card.game_text: Bearer must be Pippin. Skirmish: Exert Pippin twice or discard this possession to wound a minion an Elf is skirmishing. Any Shadow player may remove [1] to prevent this.

card.title: Strands of Elven Hair
card.game_text: To play, spot a Dwarf. When you play this possession, add 2 [ELVEN] tokens here. Fellowship: Discard this possession or remove an [ELVEN] token from here to reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is a [DWARVEN] or [ELVEN] card, you may take it into hand.

card.title: Vilya
card.subtitle: Ring of Air
card.game_text: Bearer must be Elrond or Gil-galad. Skirmish: Discard the top card of your draw deck. Make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -X, where X is the twilight cost of the discarded card. Discard this artifact.

card.title: Ent Draught
card.game_text: To play, spot an Ent. Bearer must be a companion. Limit 1 per bearer. Skirmish: Exert bearer to make him or her damage +1.

card.title: Huorn
card.game_text: Damage +1. This companion is strength +1 for each Ent you spot. Response: If this companion is about to take a wound, exert an Ent to prevent that.

card.title: Radagast
card.subtitle: The Brown
card.game_text: The move limit is +1. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, each opponent may discard 2 cards to draw 2 cards.

card.title: Sent Back
card.game_text: Skirmish: Discard this condition to discard each minion skirmishing a Wizard. Place that Wizard in your dead pile. Fellowship or Regroup: Play a Wizard (even if another copy of that Wizard is in your dead pile).

card.title: Gollum
card.subtitle: Dark as Darkness
card.game_text: Shadow: Exert Gollum twice to exert the Ring-bearer. Shadow: Remove a burden to add [1]. Skirmish: Remove a burden to add [2]. Regroup: Remove a burden to add [3]. Regroup: Exert Gollum twice to wound the Ring-bearer.

card.title: Slippery as Fishes
card.game_text: While Gollum is at a mountain, river, or underground site, he is strength +2. Regroup: Spot Gollum to reveal your hand. Place all Shadow cards revealed beneath your draw deck. Discard this condition.

card.title: Smeagol
card.subtitle: Bearer of Great Secrets
card.notes: You do not add a burden when you start this card as your Ring-bearer. (Your Ring-bearer is placed on the table, not played.)
card.game_text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each time the fellowship moves, place an unbound companion in the dead pile. Regroup: If Smeagol is the Ring-bearer, add 2 burdens to discard each minion.

card.title: Boromir
card.subtitle: Bearer of Council
card.game_text: While Boromir is the Ring-bearer, at the start of each skirmish involving him, add 3 burdens or wound him twice. Each time Boromir wins a skirmish, discard each minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Elendil
card.subtitle: The Tall
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [GONDOR] Men. Fellowship: Play an artifact on Elendil to make the move limit +1 for this turn. Regroup: Discard a [GONDOR] artifact to liberate a site.

card.title: Isildur
card.subtitle: Bearer of Heirlooms
card.game_text: While Isildur is the Ring-bearer, at the start of each skirmish involving him, add 2 burdens or exert 3 companions. While Isildur bears The One Ring or an artifact, each [GONDOR] knight is strength +1.

card.title: Narsil
card.subtitle: Blade of the Faithful
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. If bearer is Elendil or Isildur, he is strength +1 for each [GONDOR] artifact you can spot (limit +6). Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, exert 2 [GONDOR] Men to prevent that.

card.title: Sapling of the White Tree
card.game_text: To play, spot an unbound [GONDOR] Man. Response: If a [GONDOR] Man is about to take a wound, discard this artifact to prevent that.

card.title: Scroll of Isildur
card.game_text: Tale.To play, spot a [GONDOR] Man. The Ring-bearer is resistance +1 for each [GONDOR] artifact you can spot (limit +3). Fellowship: Discard this artifact to play a ring from your discard pile.

card.title: Seeing Stone of Minas Anor
card.game_text: To play, spot a [GONDOR] Man with 3 or more vitality (or spot a [GONDOR] Man and add 2 threats). Regroup: Exert a [GONDOR] Man or discard this artifact to discard your hand and draw 3 cards.

card.title: Seeing Stone of Orthanc
card.game_text: To play, spot a [GONDOR] Man with 3 or more vitality (or spot a [GONDOR] Man and add 2 threats). Regroup: Add a threat or discard this artifact to remove [2] or to draw a card.

card.title: Library of Orthanc
card.game_text: Shadow: Play an [ISENGARD] minion to stack the top card of your draw deck on this card. Skirmish: Remove[1] and discard a Free Peoples card stacked here to make an [ISENGARD] minion strength +1. Regroup: Remove [1] to take an [ISENGARD] card stacked here into hand.

card.title: Sack of the Shire
card.game_text: If an [ISENGARD] minion wins a skirmish, until the regroup phase, make that minion strength +1 for each site you control and fierce.

card.title: Host of Moria
card.subtitle: Legion of the Underdeeps
card.game_text: When you play Host of Moria, you may play a [MORIA] card from your discard pile.

card.title: Ring of Asperity
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. When you play this artifact, you may wound an unwounded companion. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owner's hand.

card.title: Ring of Ire
card.game_text: Bearer must be The Witch-king. Skirmish: Exert bearer twice to make a [WRAITH] minion damage +1. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owner's hand.

card.title: Ring of Rancor
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Maneuver: Remove a burden to heal each Nazgul. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owner's hand.

card.title: Horn of the Mark
card.game_text: Bearer must be Merry or Pippin. Bearer gains the Theoden signet. Response: If bearer wins a skirmish, exert him to discard each minion involved in that skirmish.

card.title: The Red Arrow
card.game_text: Assignment: Exert a [GONDOR] Man to play a [ROHAN] Man. You may exert that [ROHAN] Man to play a possession on him or her. Discard this artifact.

card.title: Ithil Stone
card.game_text: To play, exert a [WRAITH] or [SAURON] minion. At the start of each of your Shadow phases, you may draw a card. Shadow: Discard this artifact to play a [SAURON] minion. Its twilight cost is -3.

card.title: Sauron
card.subtitle: The Lord of the Rings
card.game_text: Damage +2. Enduring. Fierce. For each burden you spot, threat you spot, and site you control, Sauron's twilight cost is -1.

card.title: Bilbo
card.subtitle: Bearer of Things Burgled
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Each time the fellowship moves, if the twilight pool has 2 or fewer twilight tokens, add 2 burdens or add [3]. Regroup: Add a burden to play a [SHIRE] tale.

card.title: Everyone Knows
card.game_text: Tale. Each unbound Hobbit is strength +1 for each vitality over 3 he or she has. Skirmish: Prevent an unbound Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled. Discard this condition.

card.title: Goldberry
card.subtitle: River-daughter
card.game_text: Each time the fellowship moves to a river, heal Goldberry and Tom Bombadil. Skirmish: If the fellowship is at a river, exert Goldberry to make a companion strength +1.

card.title: Tom Bombadil
card.subtitle: The Master
card.game_text: To play, remove 2 burdens or 2 threats. Skirmish: Spot 2 [SHIRE] companions and exert Tom Bombadil X times, where X is the fellowship's site number, to cancel a skirmish involving a [SHIRE] companion.

card.title: Great Day
card.subtitle: Great Hour
card.game_text: If an opponent plays a minion, exert a Dwarf who is damage +X to exert that minion X times.

card.title: Memories of Darkness
card.game_text: To play, spot a Dwarf. Each time you lose initiative (except during the fellowship phase), you may play a [DWARVEN] condition from hand or from your discard pile.

card.title: More Yet to Come
card.game_text: If a Dwarf kills a minion in a skirmish and that minion did not take all wounds caused by that Dwarf's damage bonus, assign those remaining wounds to minions not assigned to a skirmish.

card.title: Aegnor
card.subtitle: Elven Escort
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert Aegnor to make a minion skirmishing an unbound [ELVEN] companion strength -1 for each archer you spot.

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: Echo of Luthien
card.game_text: Skirmish: Discard a card from hand to discard the bottom card of your draw deck. If the bottom card was an [ELVEN] card, each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -3.

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: Queen of Elves and Men
card.game_text: Each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -2 for each wounded minion you can spot.

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: Queen of Elves and Men
card.game_text: Each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -2 for each wounded minion you can spot.

card.title: Celeborn
card.subtitle: Lord of the Galadhrim
card.notes: This card's collector's info was misprinted as 10 R 6.
card.game_text: At the start of each skirmish involving Celeborn, you may reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [ELVEN] card, you may discard it to wound each minion in that skirmish.

card.title: Cirdan
card.subtitle: The Shipwright
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 Elves. Skirmish: Exert Cirdan to make a minion he is skirmishing strength -1 for each [ELVEN] event in your discard pile.

card.title: Elrond
card.subtitle: Venerable Lord
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. At the start of each skirmish involving Elrond, you may reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [ELVEN] card, you may heal another Elf.

card.title: Elrond
card.subtitle: Venerable Lord
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. At the start of each skirmish involving Elrond, you may reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [ELVEN] card, you may heal another Elf.

card.title: Fleet-footed
card.game_text: Make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -2. Spot a site in a support area to place this event on top of your draw deck.

card.title: Galadriel
card.subtitle: Lady Redeemed
card.game_text: When Galadriel is in your starting fellowship, her twilight cost is -3. Fellowship or Regroup: Discard an [ELVEN] event from hand to discard a Shadow condition or Shadow possession.

card.title: Glimpse of Fate
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 Elves. Each time you lose initiative, make a minion strength -4 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Phial of Galadriel
card.subtitle: Star-glass
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Skirmish: Until the regroup phase, remove the game text (except card type and race) from a minion skirmishing bearer and make it unable to gain game text. Discard this artifact.

card.title: Borne Far Away
card.game_text: Spot your Wizard to exchange a companion in hand with a companion in your dead pile or discard pile.

card.title: Brooding on Tomorrow
card.game_text: Each time you lose initiative (except during the fellowship phase), you may spot a [GANDALF] companion to choose an opponent who must discard one of his or her conditions.

card.title: Gathering Wind
card.game_text: Exert your Wizard and choose a number. Make each minion with that twilight cost strength -2 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Out of the High Airs
card.game_text: If the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, exert your Wizard to discard each minion.

card.title: Treebeard
card.subtitle: Keeper of the Watchwood
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 [GANDALF] companions. Regroup: Exert Treebeard twice to play a [GANDALF] condition from your discard pile and make an opponent discard one of his or her conditions.

card.title: A Dark Shape Sprang
card.game_text: If an opponent plays a possession on a companion, play Gollum at twilight cost -2 from your discard pile or hand to suspend the current phase. Begin a skirmish phase involving Gollum and that companion. When it ends, resume the suspended phase.

card.title: Final Strike
card.game_text: Any site 9 is a Mountain. Shadow: If the fellowship is at any site 9, play Gollum from your discard pile. Response: If the Free Peoples player uses a maneuver or archery special ability, exert Gollum to cancel its effect.

card.title: Gollum
card.subtitle: Mad Thing
card.notes: Gollum's game text does not apply if a Shadow player assigns him to a skirmish.
card.game_text: To assign Gollum to a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must make Gollum strength +3 until the regroup phase or add a burden.

card.title: Reclaim the Precious
card.game_text: Assignment: Assign Gollum to a companion bearing an artifact. The Free Peoples player may add a burden to prevent this and assign Gollum. Regroup: Exert Gollum twice to discard a possession. Discard this condition.

card.title: Shelob
card.subtitle: Her Ladyship
card.game_text: Enduring. Fierce. When you play Shelob, if you can spot Gollum, you may spot a companion. That companion cannot be assigned to a skirmish until the end of the turn.

card.title: Unabated in Malice
card.game_text: While you have initiative, each [GOLLUM] minion is damage +1. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [GOLLUM] minion strength +1 for each culture you can spot.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Elessar Telcontar
card.game_text: When you play Aragorn, you may heal another companion. At the start of each fellowship phase, you may exert a companion of one culture to heal a companion of another culture.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Elessar Telcontar
card.game_text: When you play Aragorn, you may heal another companion. At the start of each fellowship phase, you may exert a companion of one culture to heal a companion of another culture.

card.title: Cursed of Erech
card.game_text: Enduring. To play, add a threat. When you play Cursed of Erech, exert him twice. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may exert another [GONDOR] Wraith to make Cursed of Erech defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Dead Man of Dunharrow
card.game_text: Enduring. To play, add a threat. When you play this companion, exert him twice.

card.title: Denethor
card.subtitle: Lord of Minas Tirith
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [GONDOR] Men. Fellowship: If at a sanctuary, exert Denethor to take a [GONDOR] card into hand from your draw deck, then reshuffle. Choose an opponent who may draw 2 cards.

card.title: Drawing His Eye
card.game_text: For each [GONDOR] companion you spot, reveal 1 card at random from a Shadow player's hand. Choose a revealed Shadow card to be discarded, then its owner draws a card.

card.title: End of the Game
card.game_text: Make an exhausted [GONDOR] companion strength +2. If that companion wins this skirmish, heal that companion or make him or her damage +1.

card.title: Every Little is a Gain
card.game_text: Spot a [GONDOR] Man to discard a stacked Shadow card or to wound a minion bearing a fortification.

card.title: Fifth Level
card.game_text: Fortification. Bearer is strength -1 for each Fortification you can spot. Maneuver: Exert 2 [GONDOR] Men or spot 3 knights to transfer this condition to a minion.

card.title: Hardy Garrison
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [GONDOR] Men. Each time you lose initiative, you may wound a minion.

card.title: Last Throw
card.game_text: If no opponent controls a site, spot 2 [GONDOR] Men to make the move limit +1 for this turn.

card.title: Suffered Much Loss
card.game_text: Each site on the adventure path is a battleground. While you have initiative, each Uruk-Hai is strength +1.

card.title: Cast Unto the Winds
card.game_text: Regroup: Spot a Southron, remove a threat, and remove [3] to wound an unbound companion.

card.title: Corsair Boatswain
card.game_text: Corsair. To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. Shadow: Exert this minion to play a [RAIDER] support area possession from your draw deck.

card.title: Corsair Brute
card.game_text: Corsair. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove a [RAIDER] token to wound a companion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Corsair Ruffian
card.game_text: Corsair. When you play this minion, you may spot another corsair and discard the top card of the Free Peoples player's draw deck to add 2 [RAIDER] tokens to a card that already has a [RAIDER] token on it.

card.title: Easterling Berserker
card.game_text: Easterling. To play, spot an Easterling. While this minion is unwounded, he is damage +2. Skirmish: Wound 2 other [RAIDER] Men to heal this minion.

card.title: Easterling Pillager
card.game_text: Easterling. Fierce. When you play this minion, you may spot another Easterling to add a burden for each companion you spot over 5.

card.title: Far Harad Mercenaries
card.game_text: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may spot 6 companions and another [RAIDER] Man to discard an unbound companion this minion is skirmishing.

card.title: Field of the Fallen
card.game_text: To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. While there is a character in the dead pile, each companion of the same culture as that character is strength -1. Skirmish: Exert your Southron to make him strength +1.

card.title: High Vantage
card.game_text: Until the end of the assignment phase, each time a Southron is about to take a wound, prevent that.

card.title: Mumak Chieftain
card.game_text: Southron. When you play this minion, you may play a mount on him from your discard pile. Its twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Quelled
card.game_text: Exert a [RAIDER] Man to discard a Free Peoples condition. If you spot a [ROHAN] Man, discard an additional Free Peoples condition.

card.title: Rallying Call
card.game_text: To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. Threats cannot be removed by Free Peoples cards. Shadow: Remove [1] and play a Southron to add a threat.

card.title: Seasoned Leader
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Southron. Bearer is enduring. Skirmish: Remove a threat to play a [RAIDER] condition from your discard pile.

card.title: Southron Fanatic
card.game_text: Southron. Each time a Man is assigned to skirmish this minion, wound that Man.

card.title: Southron Savage
card.game_text: Southron. While the total number of other minions and twilight tokens is 3 or fewer, this minion is strength +3 and fierce.

card.title: Stampeded
card.game_text: If a Free Peoples possession is played, spot a [RAIDER] card to discard that possession. If that possession was a [GONDOR] or [ROHAN] possession, wound an unbound Man.

card.title: Under Foot
card.game_text: Shadow: If you have initiative, spot a [RAIDER] Man and discard this condition to reconcile your hand. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [RAIDER] Man strength +2.

card.title: Black Marshal
card.game_text: Shadow: Exert a Nazgul and play a [WRAITH] minion to add [1] (or [2] if you have initiative).

card.title: Cirith Ungol Scavenger
card.game_text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may exert it to discard a possession borne by a character this minion is skirmishing.

card.title: Cirith Ungol Soldier
card.game_text: Shadow: Spot a possession to make this minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Cirith Ungol Warrior
card.game_text: Shadow: Spot a possession to make this minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Cirith Ungol Watchman
card.game_text: Each companion skirmishing this minion loses all damage and strength bonuses from possessions.

card.title: Dark Swooping Shadows
card.game_text: Heal an enduring [WRAITH] minion to add a burden or 2 threats.

card.title: Gorbag
card.subtitle: Covetous Captain
card.game_text: For each wound on the Ring-bearer, each [WRAITH] Orc is strength +1.

card.title: Gorbag's Sword
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [WRAITH] Orc. When you play this possession, you may discard a possession. Its owner may place it on top of his or her draw deck instead. If bearer is Gorbag, he is fierce.

card.title: Houses of Lamentation
card.game_text: Make a [WRAITH] minion strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing a companion of the same culture as a card in the dead pile).

card.title: Morgul Banner-bearer
card.game_text: While the total number of other minions and twilight tokens is 3 or fewer, this minion is strength +3 and an archer.

card.title: Morgul Vanguard
card.game_text: Assignment: Assign this minion to an unbound companion bearing a hand weapon.

card.title: Stooping to the Kill
card.game_text: While you have initiative, each of your [WRAITH] minions is damage +1. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [WRAITH] minion strength +2.

card.title: Swarming Like Beetles
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot a [WRAITH] Orc and remove a threat to wound an unwounded companion.

card.title: Ten Times Outnumbered
card.game_text: Make a [WRAITH] Orc strength +2 for each wound on the Ring-bearer.

card.title: Ulaire Cantea
card.subtitle: Thrall of the One
card.game_text: Enduring. Fierce. Shadow cards cannot exert Ulaire Cantea during a skirmish phase. Skirmish: Heal Ulaire Cantea to discard a possession borne by a character he is skirmishing.

card.title: Ulaire Enquea
card.subtitle: Thrall of the One
card.game_text: Enduring. Shadow cards cannot exert Ulaire Enquea during a skirmish phase. Skirmish: If Ulaire Enquea is skirmishing, heal him to add a burden.

card.title: Ulaire Lemenya
card.subtitle: Thrall of the One
card.game_text: Enduring. Fierce. Shadow cards cannot exert Ulaire Lemenya during a skirmish phase. Skirmish: Heal Ulaire Lemenya to wound up to 3 other [WRAITH] minions.

card.title: Ulaire Nelya
card.subtitle: Thrall of the One
card.game_text: Enduring. Fierce. Shadow cards cannot exert Ulaire Nelya during a skirmish phase. Skirmish: Heal Ulaire Nelya to add [1] for each burden.

card.title: Ulaire Toldea
card.subtitle: Thrall of the One
card.game_text: Enduring. Shadow cards cannot exert Ulaire Toldea during a skirmish phase. Skirmish: Heal Ulaire Toldea to make him damage +1.

card.title: Eowyn
card.subtitle: Lady of Ithilien
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert Eowyn to choose an opponent. That opponent must wound a minion for each wound on each minion skirmishing Eowyn.

card.title: Fell Deeds Awake
card.game_text: To play, spot a [ROHAN] Man. Each time you lose initiative, you may liberate a site.

card.title: Unyielding
card.game_text: If your [ROHAN] Man wins a skirmish, discard a [ROHAN] possession to wound a minion or to liberate a site.

card.title: Advance Captain
card.game_text: Each roaming [SAURON] minion is damage +1.

card.title: Advance Marauder
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to make a roaming [SAURON] minion strength +3.

card.title: Advance Regular
card.game_text: Each roaming [SAURON] minion is fierce.

card.title: Advance Scout
card.game_text: Shadow: Exert or discard this minion to make each [SAURON] minion you spot roaming until the regroup phase.

card.title: Barren Land
card.game_text: To play, spot a [SAURON] minion. Each time the fellowship moves to any site 8 or 9, exert each Ring-bound companion. Shadow: Discard this condition to play a [SAURON] minion. Its twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Beaten Back
card.game_text: Make a [SAURON] minion strength +2 for each site you control. If you have initiative, that minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Cirith Ungol Guard
card.game_text: Damage +1.

card.title: Cirith Ungol Patroller
card.game_text: Damage +1. While you can spot 3 possessions, this minion is fierce.

card.title: Cirith Ungol Sentinel
card.game_text: Damage +1. If you can spot another [SAURON] Uruk-hai, this minion is twilight cost -1 for each possession you can spot.

card.title: Cirith Ungol Sentry
card.game_text: Damage +1.

card.title: Flames Within
card.game_text: While you have initiative, each of your [SAURON] minions is strength +2. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [SAURON] minion strength +2 (or +4 if it is roaming).

card.title: Gorgoroth Keeper
card.game_text: Besieger. While you control a site, this minion's twilight cost is -2. Regroup: Stack this minion on a site you control.

card.title: Gorgoroth Swarm
card.game_text: Besieger. When you play this minion, you may spot 6 companions and another besieger to play a besieger from your discard pile and control a site.

card.title: Gothmog
card.subtitle: Lieutenant of Morgul
card.game_text: Besieger. When you play Gothmog, the Free Peoples player must wound a companion for each site you control. While you control a site, Gothmog is fierce.

card.title: Gothmog
card.subtitle: Lieutenant of Morgul
card.game_text: Besieger. When you play Gothmog, the Free Peoples player must wound a companion for each site you control. While you control a site, Gothmog is fierce.

card.title: Gothmog's Warg
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [SAURON] Orc. For each site you control, bearer is strength +1 (or +2 if bearer is Gothmog).

card.title: Mordor Brute
card.game_text: Each [SAURON] Orc bearing a possession cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases).

card.title: Mordor Fiend
card.game_text: Shadow: If you cannot spot another minion and there are 3 or fewer twilight tokens, add [3] (or [5] if this minion is roaming).

card.title: Mordor Pillager
card.game_text: Besieger. Fierce. Shadow: Exert this minion and spot another [SAURON] minion to control a site. If you cannot spot 3 Free Peoples cultures, the Free Peoples player may exert a companion to prevent this.

card.title: Mordor Wretch
card.game_text: Shadow: Spot 4 Free Peoples cultures and exert another [SAURON] minion twice to add [3] and draw a card.

card.title: Orc Ravager
card.game_text: To play, spot a [SAURON] minion. Shadow: Remove 2 threats to discard a condition.

card.title: Orc Slaughterer
card.game_text: Enduring. For each wound on this minion, it is strength +2.

card.title: Rank and File
card.game_text: Each time a roaming [SAURON] minion takes a wound, you may add a [SAURON] token here. Regroup: Exert an Uruk-hai or discard a [SAURON] minion to add a [SAURON] token here. Skirmish: Remove 2 [SAURON] tokens from here to make a [SAURON] minion strength +2.

card.title: The Ring is Mine!
card.game_text: If a burden is added, spot a [SAURON] minion to add an additional burden.

card.title: Ruinous Hail
card.game_text: If the Free Peoples player plays a possession, discard a [SAURON] minion from hand to prevent him or her from playing any more cards until the end of this phase.

card.title: Shagrat
card.subtitle: Captain of Cirith Ungol
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time Shagrat loses a skirmish, you may exert a character.

card.title: Speak No More to Me
card.game_text: Exert a [SAURON] minion to return a Free Peoples condition to its owner's hand (or 2 if both are [SHIRE] conditions).

card.title: Troll of Cirith Gorgor
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot a [SAURON] minion. This minion is strength +1 for each possession you can spot.

card.title: Uruk Axe
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [SAURON] Minion. If bearer is an Uruk-hai, it is strength +2.

card.title: Window of the Eye
card.game_text: To play, spot a [SAURON] minion. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may remove a threat to wound an unbound companion.

card.title: Birthday Present
card.notes: If the Free Peoples player has only 1 event (or up to 4 copies of the same event, but no other [Shire] events) in his or her discard pile, that event is taken into hand.
card.game_text: Fellowship: Add a burden to choose 2 [SHIRE] events with different card titles from your discard pile. Choose an opponent and make him or her choose 1 of those cards for you to take into hand.

card.title: Brave and Loyal
card.game_text: If a Hobbit companion is not assigned to a skirmish, exert that Hobbit to have him or her replace a companion (except the Ring-bearer) in a skirmish.

card.title: Chance Observation
card.game_text: If there are 4 or more [SHIRE] cards in your discard pile, make a Hobbit strength +1 for each Hobbit you can spot.

card.title: Great Heart
card.game_text: Play this condition only during a skirmish. Bearer must be a Hobbit. When this condition is played, wound a minion skirmishing bearer.

card.title: A Light in His Mind
card.game_text: Each time you lose initiative, you may spot 2 [SHIRE] companions to remove a burden.

card.title: Make Haste
card.game_text: Stealth. Spot a [SHIRE] companion and return him or her to your hand to make a Shadow player choose to remove [2] or discard a minion.

card.title: A Marvel
card.game_text: Exert a Hobbit to make another Hobbit strength +3.

card.title: Narrow Escape
card.game_text: Spot 2 Hobbit companions to make a Shadow player discard a minion (or spot 4 Hobbit companions to make that player discard 2 minions).

card.title: Nine-fingered Frodo and the Ring of Doom
card.game_text: Tale. Exert a [SHIRE] character to remove a burden or 2 threats.

card.title: Orc Armor
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Each Orc and each Uruk-hai skirmishing bearer is strength -1.

card.title: Shadowplay
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [SHIRE] companions. Each time a minion is played, you may exert a Hobbit companion to exert that minion (limit once per turn).

card.title: Slunk Out of Sight
card.game_text: Stealth. If there are 6 or more [SHIRE] cards in your discard pile, cancel a skirmish involving your Hobbit and a minion who is not fierce. Each minion in that skirmish is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: The Tale of the Great Ring
card.game_text: Tale. Skirmish: Prevent a Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless a Shadow event is (or was) played during this skirmish. Discard this condition.

card.title: Base of Mindolluin
card.game_text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: If you cannot spot 2 threats, add a threat to play a fortification from your draw deck.

card.title: Pelennor Prairie
card.game_text: Plains. Shadow: Exert a minion and remove a burden to make the Free Peoples player discard one of his or her conditions.

card.title: Steward's Tomb
card.game_text: Wounds cannot be prevented or healed. Burdens cannot be removed.

card.title: Watchers of Cirith Ungol
card.game_text: Skirmish: Spot your [WRAITH] Orc and remove 2 threats to make that [WRAITH] Orc strength +3.

card.title: Frodo
card.subtitle: Resolute Hobbit
card.game_text: Ring-bearer (resistance 12).

card.title: Sam
card.subtitle: Great Elf Warrior
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Sam is strength +1 for each [SHIRE] companion you can spot. Response: If Frodo dies, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.title: Sam
card.subtitle: Great Elf Warrior
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Sam is strength +1 for each [SHIRE] companion you can spot. Response: If Frodo dies, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: The Ring of Rings
card.game_text: Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, he or she wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While the Ring-bearer is wearing The One Ring, each time he or she is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: The Ring of Rings
card.game_text: Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, he or she wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While the Ring-bearer is wearing The One Ring, each time he or she is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: The Ruling Ring
card.game_text: Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound in a skirmish, he or she wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While the Ring-bearer is wearing The One Ring, each time he or she is about to take a wound in a skirmish, add a burden instead.

card.title: Axe of Khazad-dum
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. While bearer is at a mountain site, he is damage +1.

card.title: Battle to the Last
card.game_text: Spot a Dwarf. For each wound on that Dwarf, make him strength +2 and damage +1.

card.title: Dwarven Embassy
card.game_text: To play, spot a Dwarf. Each companion is damage +1. Discard this condition at the end of your turn.

card.title: Fallen Lord
card.game_text: Exert the Ring-bearer and a Dwarf to make that Dwarf strength +X, where X equals that Dwarf's resistance.

card.title: Farin
card.subtitle: Emissary of Erebor
card.game_text: While Farin is at a battleground or underground site, he gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Lively Combatant
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may draw a card.

card.title: Gimli's Battle Axe
card.subtitle: Vicious Weapon
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Bearer gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Skirmish: If bearer is Gimli and he is at a battleground site, exert him to wound a minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Grimir
card.subtitle: Dwarven Emissary
card.game_text: Response: If a [DWARVEN] companion is about to take a wound in a skirmish, discard 2 [DWARVEN] cards from play (except characters) to prevent that.

card.title: Hall of Our Fathers
card.game_text: When you play this condition, stack the top 8 cards of your draw deck here. At the start of your maneuver phase, you may spot a Dwarf to exchange the cards stacked here with your hand.

card.title: Mountain Homestead
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 Dwarf companions. While the fellowship is at a mountain site, each Dwarf is strength +2.

card.title: On Guard
card.game_text: If a Dwarf who has resistance 3 or more is about to take a wound, prevent that.

card.title: Well-equipped
card.game_text: Discard a [DWARVEN] card from hand to play a [DWARVEN] possession from your draw deck on a [DWARVEN] companion who has resistance 5 or more.

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: Staunch Defender
card.game_text: Each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -1 for each forest site on the adventure path.

card.title: Blade of Lindon
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Elf. While bearer is at a forest or river site, each minion he or she is skirmishing is strength -1.

card.title: Elven Marksmanship
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Toil 2. (For each [ELVEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Archery: Discard this condition to make the fellowship archery total +2.

card.title: Elven Scout
card.game_text: While you can spot another Elf, this companion has muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.title: Farewell to Lorien
card.game_text: Spot an Elf to heal each companion who has resistance 5 or more.

card.title: The Lady's Blessing
card.game_text: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +3 at a river site).

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Companion of the Ring
card.game_text: While Legolas is at a battleground or forest site, he is strength +2 and resistance +2.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Woodland Emissary
card.game_text: At the start of the archery phase, you may spot another Elf to exert a minion.

card.title: Legolas' Bow
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Elf. Bearer is an archer. If bearer is Legolas, each time you exert him to play an [ELVEN] condition or [ELVEN] event, you may heal him (limit once per phase).

card.title: Might of the Elf-lords
card.game_text: Exert an Elf to reveal the top card of your draw deck. If that card's twilight cost is 3 or less, make a minion strength -3.

card.title: Nocked
card.game_text: Exert an Elf who has resistance 4 or more to wound a minion.

card.title: Uncertain Future
card.game_text: When you play this condition, spot an Elf to add 3 [ELVEN] tokens here. Maneuver: Discard this condition or remove an [ELVEN] token from here to reveal the top card of your draw deck. You may place that card beneath your draw deck.

card.title: Woodland Sentinel
card.game_text: While this companion is at a forest site, he is strength +2.

card.title: The Art of Gandalf
card.game_text: To play, spot a [GANDALF] Wizard. Regroup: Stack a spell from hand here. Fellowship: Discard a [GANDALF] card from hand to take a card stacked here into hand.

card.title: Ease the Burden
card.game_text: Exert a [GANDALF] Wizard to remove a burden (or 2 burdens, if the fellowship is at a dwelling site).

card.title: Erland
card.subtitle: Dale Counselor
card.game_text: To play, spot a [GANDALF] companion. Skirmish: Exert Erland to take a [GANDALF] skirmish event from your discard pile into hand.

card.title: Final Account
card.game_text: To play, exert a [GANDALF] Wizard. Discard 2 cards from hand to take a Free Peoples card and a Shadow card from your discard pile into hand.

card.title: G for Grand
card.game_text: While you can spot a [GANDALF] Wizard, each companion who has resistance 6 or more is strength +1.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Leader of the Company
card.game_text: While Gandalf is in region 1, each other companion is strength +2. While Gandalf is in region 2, each companion is strength +1. While Gandalf is in region 3, he is strength +2.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Leader of the Company
card.game_text: While Gandalf is in region 1, each other companion is strength +2. While Gandalf is in region 2, each companion is strength +1. While Gandalf is in region 3, he is strength +2.

card.title: Gandalf's Staff
card.subtitle: Ash-Staff
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Wizard. If bearer is Gandalf, he gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Each time bearer wins a skirmish, choose a Shadow player who must wound a minion.

card.title: Glamdring
card.subtitle: Foe-hammer
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Each time Gandalf wins a skirmish, you may remove a burden.

card.title: Inspiration
card.game_text: Spot a [GANDALF] Wizard to reveal your hand and make a minion strength -3 for each companion in your hand (or -4 for each if the fellowship is at a battleground site).

card.title: New Authority
card.game_text: To play, spot a [GANDALF] Wizard. Each time a Shadow card adds a burden, you may remove [3]. Response: If a minion uses its special ability, discard this condition to cancel the effect of that special ability.

card.title: New-awakened
card.game_text: Spell. Toil 2. (For each [GANDALF] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a [GANDALF] Wizard to discard 2 conditions from play.

card.title: Prolonged Struggle
card.game_text: Exert a [GANDALF] Wizard and spot 2 companions who each have resistance 7 or more to wound a minion that Wizard is skirmishing twice.

card.title: Shadowfax
card.subtitle: Unequaled Steed
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Each time Gandalf is about to take a wound, you may add a burden to prevent that.

card.title: Frenzied Attack
card.game_text: If a minion is skirmishing a Free Peoples character who has resistance 2 or less, spot Gollum to wound that character twice.

card.title: Gollum
card.subtitle: Skulker
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert Gollum twice to make another minion strength +2.

card.title: Horribly Strong
card.game_text: Discard Gollum from play to wound an unbound companion who has resistance 6 or less.

card.title: Incited
card.game_text: Each time a companion loses a skirmish, you may exert Gollum to take a [GOLLUM] card into hand from your discard pile.

card.title: Led Astray
card.game_text: Spot Gollum to add [3] and exchange one of your sites on the adventure path with another site from your adventure deck.

card.title: Master Commands It
card.game_text: Make Smeagol strength +1 for each companion who has resistance 5 or more.

card.title: No End of Wickedness
card.game_text: Exert Gollum to make another minion strength +2 (or +3 if Gollum is at a mountain site).

card.title: Not Yet Vanquished
card.game_text: Each time a companion loses a fierce skirmish, you may exert Gollum to add a burden.

card.title: One Good Turn Deserves Another
card.game_text: Spot Smeagol to play the fellowship's next site. Then you may add a burden to take this card back into hand.

card.title: Safe Passage
card.game_text: When you play this condition, name forest, mountain, plains, or river. Each time the fellowship moves to a site that has the named keyword, you may exert Gollum or Smeagol to remove [4].

card.title: Smeagol
card.subtitle: Scout and Guide
card.game_text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each time Smeagol wins a skirmish, you may play the fellowship's next site. Skirmish: If Smeagol is at a marsh, exert him to cancel a skirmish involving him.

card.title: Strange and Terrible
card.game_text: Spot a [GOLLUM] minion at a mountain site to play a minion from your discard pile.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Guide and Protector
card.game_text: Ranger. Each time a Free Peoples skirmish event is played, you may exert Aragorn to wound a minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Strider
card.game_text: Ranger. Each time the fellowship moves, add [1].

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Strider
card.game_text: Ranger. Each time the fellowship moves, add [1].

card.title: Armor of the Citadel
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Each minion skirmishing bearer loses all damage bonuses. While bearer is at a battleground site and unwounded, he or she is defender +1.

card.title: Battle Cry
card.game_text: Make a ranger strength +2 (or +3 if he or she is skirmishing a minion who has a damage bonus).

card.title: Boromir
card.subtitle: Hero of Osgiliath
card.game_text: Knight. Each time Boromir wins a skirmish, you may heal a [GONDOR] companion.

card.title: Boromir
card.subtitle: Hero of Osgiliath
card.game_text: Knight. Each time Boromir wins a skirmish, you may heal a [GONDOR] companion.

card.title: Bow of Minas Tirith
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. At the start of the archery phase, if bearer is at a battleground site, you may exert him or her to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.title: Gondorian Blade
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. While bearer is a ranger or at a river site, he or she is damage +1.

card.title: The Highest Quality
card.game_text: Exert any number of [GONDOR] companions who have total resistance 12 or more to make a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] companion strength -3 for each companion exerted this way.

card.title: Houses of Healing
card.game_text: When you play this condition, spot a [GONDOR] Man to add 3 [GONDOR] tokens here. Fellowship: Add [2] and either discard this condition or remove a [GONDOR] token from here to heal a [GONDOR] Man.

card.title: Madril
card.subtitle: Ranger of Ithilien
card.game_text: Ranger. Fellowship: If Madril is at a forest site, exert him to play the fellowship's next site.

card.title: Much-needed Rest
card.game_text: Heal each [GONDOR] companion who has resistance 5 or more.

card.title: Pledge of Loyalty
card.game_text: Make a [GONDOR] companion strength +2 (or +3 if he or she has resistance 4 or more).

card.title: Ranger of Westernesse
card.game_text: Ranger. When you play this companion, you may play the fellowship's next site.

card.title: Well-traveled
card.game_text: To play, exert a ranger. If the fellowship is in region 1, play the fellowship's next 2 sites. Otherwise, play the fellowship's next site.

card.title: Archer of Harad
card.game_text: Archer. While you can spot a companion who has resistance 4 or less, the minion archery total is +1.

card.title: Armored Easterling
card.game_text: Skirmish: Remove [2] to make a lurker strength +1. Skirmish: Remove [2] to make a lurker fierce until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Remove [2] to make a lurker damage +1.

card.title: Axeman of Harad
card.game_text: While you can spot a companion who has resistance 3 or less, this minion's twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Bloodthirsty
card.game_text: Spot 2 [MEN] minions to wound an unbound companion.

card.title: Bold and Cunning
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [MEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a [MEN] minion to discard a possession from play.

card.title: Column of Easterlings
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Discard this minion to make a [MEN] minion strength +4.

card.title: Corps of Harad
card.game_text: While this minion is at a battleground site, it is fierce.

card.title: Detachment of Haradrim
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert this minion to add [1] for each companion who has resistance 5 or less.

card.title: Easterling Host
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert Easterling Host and make it strength -2 until the regroup phase to make each other [MEN] minion strength +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Easterling Shield Wall
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Response: If a [MEN] minion is about to take a wound in a skirmish, exert this minion and remove [1] to prevent that.

card.title: Elder of Dunland
card.game_text: While this minion is at a plains site, it is damage +1.

card.title: Elevated Fire
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [MEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a [MEN] minion to make the minion archery total +3.

card.title: Fearsome Dunlending
card.game_text: Ambush [1]. When you play this minion at a plains site, you may spot an unbound companion to make that companion resistance -1 until the end of the turn.

card.title: Ferocious Haradrim
card.game_text: Archer. Each time a Free Peoples character is killed, each of your [MEN] minions is strength +3 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Fletcher of Harad
card.game_text: While this minion is at a plains site, it is an archer. While you can spot 6 companions, each [MEN] minion is an archer.

card.title: Footman of Dunland
card.game_text: The fellowship's current site gains plains.

card.title: Force of Harad
card.game_text: When you cannot spot another [MEN] minion, discard this minion.

card.title: Harad Standard-bearer
card.game_text: Skirmish: Remove [3] to make this minion damage +1.

card.title: Horde of Harad
card.game_text: While this minion is at a battleground site, it is fierce.

card.title: Invading Haradrim
card.game_text: Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a skirmish, add [1] for each Free Peoples character who has resistance 5 or less.

card.title: Lathspell
card.game_text: To play, spot a [MEN] minion. Bearer must be a companion. While bearer is skirmishing a [MEN] minion, bearer loses from possessions all strength and damage bonuses.

card.title: Legion of Harad
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [MEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.)

card.title: Long Battle Bow
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Bearer is an archer. When you play this possession, you may make the Free Peoples player exert his or her Man.

card.title: Man of Bree
card.game_text: This minion is strength +1 for each card in the Free Peoples player's hand.

card.title: Oath Sworn
card.game_text: At the start of the maneuver phase, if you have 2 or more cards in hand, you may spot 2 [MEN] minions and discard your hand to add [8].

card.title: Overrun
card.game_text: Make a [MEN] minion strength +2 (or +4 if that minion is at a battleground or plains site).

card.title: Patroller of Haradrim
card.game_text: Each time this minion is assigned to a character who has resistance 5 or less, you may discard a possession borne by that character.

card.title: Pavise
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. The twilight cost of this possession is -1 for each Free Peoples possession you spot. Bearer cannot take wounds except during a skirmish.

card.title: Poleaxe
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Skirmish: Remove [2] to make a [MEN] minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Precision Targeting
card.game_text: Spot a [MEN] minion to make the minion archery total +1 and make the Free Peoples player choose 3 companions. Other companions cannot take archery wounds.

card.title: Raging Dunlending
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may exert it to make it fierce until the regroup phase. While you can spot 6 companions, each [MEN] minion is fierce.

card.title: Rampaging Easterling
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time another [MEN] minion wins a skirmish, make this minion strength +3 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Squad of Haradrim
card.game_text: Regroup: Spot another [MEN] minion and 2 Free Peoples characters who each have resistance 5 or less to make the move limit -1 for this turn.

card.title: Strange-looking Men
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert this minion to transfer a possession or condition borne by a character to another eligible bearer.

card.title: Swarthy Bree-lander
card.game_text: At the start of the maneuver phase, you may remove [2] to transfer a condition borne by a character to another eligible bearer.

card.title: Throng of Harad
card.game_text: Each time this minion is assigned to skirmish a character who has resistance 5 or less, it is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Warrior of Dunland
card.game_text: Ambush [1]. While this minion is at a plains site, it gains an additional ambush [1].

card.title: Whistling Death
card.game_text: Wound a character skirmishing a [MEN] minion. If the fellowship is at a battleground site, you may remove [3] to wound that character again.

card.title: Wielding the Ring
card.game_text: To play, spot a [MEN] minion. Bearer must be a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Armed for Battle
card.game_text: Spot your [ORC] minion to play an [ORC] possession from your discard pile (or, if that minion is at a battleground site, from your draw deck or discard pile).

card.title: Barbarous Orc
