card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert another [ORC] minion to make this minion strength +2 (or +4 if this minion is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 4 or less).

card.title: Beastly Olog-hai
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot an [ORC] minion. Assignment: Exert this minion to assign it to a companion bearing an artifact. The Free Peoples player may discard an artifact from play to prevent this.

card.title: Bladed Gauntlets
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ORC] minion. Bearer is a lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert bearer to make an [ORC] minion strength +2.

card.title: Bound to its Fate
card.game_text: Spot an [ORC] minion to reveal the Free Peoples player's hand. The Free Peoples player chooses to either discard a revealed Free Peoples event or add a burden.

card.title: Champion Orc
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [ORC] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.)

card.title: Conquered Halls
card.game_text: Make an [ORC] minion strength +1 for each underground site you can spot.

card.title: Cutthroat Orc
card.game_text: This minion is strength +1 for each companion who has resistance 5 or less.

card.title: Demoralized
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ORC] minion. Each time a companion exerts, you may add [1] (or [2] if you can spot 6 companions).

card.title: Denizen of Khazad-dum
card.game_text: While this minion is at an underground site, it is strength +2.

card.title: Denizen of Moria
card.game_text: While this minion is at an underground site, it is strength +3.

card.title: Denizen of the Black Pit
card.game_text: While this minion is at an underground site, it is strength +2.

card.title: Dread and Despair
card.game_text: Spot 2 [ORC] minions to discard a condition from play. The Free Peoples player may discard the top 6 cards of his or her draw deck to prevent this.

card.title: Emboldened Orc
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) This minion is strength +1 for each companion who is not assigned to a skirmish.

card.title: Entrapping Orc
card.game_text: Assignment: Assign this minion to an unbound companion who has resistance 4 or less.

card.title: Foraging Orc
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may spot another [ORC] minion and a companion who has resistance 3 or less to add [2].

card.title: Frenzied Orc
card.game_text: While this minion is at an underground site, each character skirmishing it is strength -2. While you can spot 6 companions, each character skirmishing an [ORC] minion is strength -2.

card.title: Goblin Hordes
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ORC] minion. Each time the fellowship moves from an underground site, you may take an [ORC] minion from your discard pile into hand.

card.title: Goblin Hordes
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ORC] minion. Each time the fellowship moves from an underground site, you may take an [ORC] minion from your discard pile into hand.

card.title: Hill Orc
card.game_text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may exert each companion who has resistance 4 or less.

card.title: Isengard Underling
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may take an [ORC] event from your discard pile into hand.

card.title: Marauding Orcs
card.game_text: When you cannot spot another [ORC] minion, discard this minion from play.

card.title: Mocking Goblin
card.game_text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, add a burden unless the Free Peoples player discards a Free Peoples event from hand.

card.title: Mordor Scimitar
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ORC] minion. Each time bearer is assigned to skirmish a companion, you may exert that companion.

card.title: Mountain Orc
card.game_text: Each time this minion is assigned to skirmish a companion who has resistance 5 or less, exert that companion.

card.title: Orc Hammer
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Orc. When you play this possession, you may exert a companion.

card.title: Orc Miscreant
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ORC] minion. Regroup: Exert this minion to add a burden.

card.title: Orkish Smith
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may take an [ORC] condition from your discard pile into hand.

card.title: Orkish Worker
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may spot another [ORC] minion to reveal the top card of the Free Peoples player's deck. If it is a Shadow card, add (X), where X is its twilight cost.

card.title: Persistent Orc
card.game_text: Each time this minion is about to be killed or discarded from play, you may spot another [ORC] card to place this minion on top of your draw deck instead.

card.title: Porter Troll
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot an [ORC] minion. When you play this minion, add a burden unless the Free Peoples player reveals a Free Peoples event from his or her hand.

card.title: Prowling Orc
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Remove [2] to make an [ORC] minion strength +1.

card.title: Scurrying Goblin
card.game_text: When you play this minion at an underground site, you may spot another [ORC] minion to add [2].

card.title: Skulking Goblin
card.game_text: The fellowship's current site gains underground.

card.title: Spurred to Battle
card.game_text: To play, exert an [ORC] minion. At the start of the Shadow phase, add [1].

card.title: Strength in Shadows
card.game_text: Make an [ORC] minion strength +2 (or +4 if it is a lurker).

card.title: Undisciplined
card.game_text: Toil 3. (For each [ORC] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -3.) Assign an [ORC] minion to a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Unyielding Goblin
card.game_text: Skirmish: If this minion is at an underground site, exert it to exert a companion it is skirmishing.

card.title: Watchful Orc
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may spot another [ORC] minion to replace the fellowship's current site with an underground site from your adventure deck.

card.title: Border Patrol
card.game_text: When you play this condition, spot a mounted [ROHAN] Man to add 3 [ROHAN] tokens here. Response: If a minion is played at a plains site, discard this condition or remove a [ROHAN] token from here to exert that minion.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Guardian of the Eastmark
card.game_text: While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Each time the fellowship moves, you may exert Eomer to return a minion to its owner's hand.

card.title: Eowyn
card.subtitle: Shieldmaiden of Rohan
card.game_text: Each time Eowyn wins a skirmish, each other [ROHAN] Man is strength +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Gamling
card.subtitle: Defender of the Hornburg
card.game_text: At the start of the fellowship phase, you may add [1] to play a possession on Gamling from your draw deck.

card.title: Hrothlac
card.subtitle: Man of Rohan
card.game_text: Response: If a [ROHAN] companion who has resistance 4 or more is about to take a wound, exert Hrothlac to prevent that.

card.title: Protecting the Hall
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [ROHAN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. Assignment: Discard this condition from play to make bearer defender +1.

card.title: Rally Cry
card.game_text: Make a [ROHAN] Man who has resistance 4 or more strength +2 for each wound on each minion he or she is skirmishing.

card.title: Riddermark Javelin
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. Archery: Discard this possession to make the fellowship archery total +1 (or +2 if the fellowship is at a plains site).

card.title: Riddermark Soldier
card.game_text: When you play this companion, each [ROHAN] companion is strength +2 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Rider's Spear
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. If bearer is mounted, bearer is damage +1.

card.title: Riders of the Mark
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [ROHAN] companions. You may play Riders of the Mark any time you could play a skirmish event. When you play Riders of the Mark, you may exhaust a minion.

card.title: Riding Like the Wind
card.game_text: To play, exert a [ROHAN] Man. While you can spot 2 [ROHAN] mounts, the move limit is +1. Each of your companions that is not mounted is strength -1.

card.title: Rohirrim Mount
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert. While bearer is at a plains site, he or she is defender +1.

card.title: Rush of Steeds
card.game_text: To play, spot a [ROHAN] Man. Each time a Shadow condition is played, you may exert a minion. Response: If a minion exerts as a cost of its special ability, discard this condition to prevent that and return that minion to its owner's hand.

card.title: Sword Rack
card.game_text: Response: If a [ROHAN] possession is discarded from play and no more than one possession is stacked here, stack it here. Fellowship: Add [1] to play a possession stacked here as if from hand.

card.title: Theoden
card.subtitle: King of the Eorlingas
card.game_text: While you can spot a [GANDALF] companion, Theoden gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) While Theoden is at a battleground or plains site each [ROHAN] Man is strength +1.

card.title: War Now Calls Us
card.game_text: Exert a [ROHAN] companion to make him or her strength +3 (and damage +1 if he or she has resistance 5 or more).

card.title: Concerning Hobbits
card.game_text: For each dwelling and forest site on the adventure path, make a Hobbit strength +1.

card.title: Crouched Down
card.game_text: Stealth. Cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit and a minion whose strength is lower than that Hobbit's resistance.

card.title: Farmer Maggot
card.subtitle: Hobbit of the Marish
card.game_text: While Farmer Maggot is at a dwelling or forest site, he is strength +4.

card.title: Frodo
card.subtitle: Protected by Many
card.game_text: Ring-bearer. Ring-bound. At the start of the regroup phase, you may exert Frodo to make him gain muster until the end of the regroup phase. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.title: Habits of Home
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [SHIRE] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Bearer must be a Hobbit. Limit 1 per bearer. Each time the fellowship moves from a dwelling or forest site, remove [1].

card.title: Hobbit Sword
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Hobbit.

card.title: Incognito
card.game_text: Stealth. If the fellowship is at a dwelling site, exert 2 Hobbits to cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit. At any other site, exert 2 Hobbits to make a Hobbit strength +3.

card.title: Merry
card.subtitle: Loyal Companion
card.game_text: For each other unbound companion assigned to a skirmish, Merry is strength +2.

card.title: The More
card.subtitle: The Merrier
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [SHIRE] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot 2 [SHIRE] companions to remove 2 burdens.

card.title: Pippin
card.subtitle: Brave Decoy
card.game_text: Skirmish: If Pippin is not assigned to a skirmish, spot an unbound companion who has less resistance than Pippin to have Pippin replace him or her in a skirmish.

card.title: Salt from the Shire
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Fellowship: Discard this possession to remove a burden. Skirmish: If bearer is an unbound Hobbit, discard this possession to prevent him or her from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.title: Sam
card.subtitle: Steadfast Friend
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Each other companion is resistance +1.

card.title: Sting
card.subtitle: Weapon of Heritage
card.game_text: Bearer must be Bilbo, Frodo, or Sam. Maneuver: If bearer is Bilbo or Frodo, exert him to make another companion resistance +2 until the regroup phase. If bearer is Sam, each time he wins a skirmish, you may remove a burden.

card.title: Sworn Companion
card.game_text: Make a Hobbit strength +1 for each companion who has resistance 7 or more.

card.title: A Task Now to Be Done
card.game_text: Spot X Hobbits to make an unbound Hobbit resistance +X.

card.title: Unharmed
card.game_text: Heal a Hobbit for each minion you spot.

card.title: Army of Uruk-hai
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each Free Peoples archer who has resistance 5 or less does not add to the Free Peoples archery total.

card.title: Bloodthirsty Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. While you can spot an exhausted companion, this minion is strength +3.

card.title: Brawling Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. Response: If a special ability of a companion who has resistance 5 or less is used, exert this minion to cancel its effect.

card.title: Brutality
card.game_text: Make an [URUK-HAI] minion strength +1 for each battleground site you can spot.

card.title: Determined Uruk
card.game_text: To play, spot a [URUK-HAI] minion. Each time a companion exerts, you may draw a card.

card.title: Devastation
card.game_text: If your [URUK-HAI] minion wins a skirmish, discard a condition from play.

card.title: Feral Uruk
card.game_text: While this minion is at a battleground site, it is strength +1 and damage +1.

card.title: Force of Uruk-hai
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time this minion is about to take a wound at a battleground site, you may spot another [URUK-HAI] card to make the Free Peoples player draw a card instead.

card.title: Fortitude
card.game_text: When you play this condition, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion to add 3 [URUK-HAI] tokens here. Response: If an [URUK-HAI] minion is about to take a wound, discard this condition or remove an [URUK-HAI] token from here to prevent that.

card.title: Furious Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. While this minion is assigned to a skirmish, each companion and Free Peoples possession loses its special abilities.

card.title: Furor
card.game_text: Make an [URUK-HAI] minion strength +2 (or +3 if you can spot an exhausted companion).

card.title: Hounding Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. While you can spot an exhausted companion, this minion is strength +3.

card.title: Intimidating Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. When you play this minion at a battleground site, spot an unbound companion to make that companion resistance -2 until the end of the turn.

card.title: Invincible Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. While this minion is at a battleground site, it cannot take wounds. While you can spot 6 companions, each [URUK-HAI] minion cannot take wounds.

card.title: Isengard Siege Bow
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] minion. While bearer is at a battleground site, it is an archer.

card.title: Isengard Sword
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] minion. Each character skirmishing bearer is strength -2.

card.title: Lookout Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. The fellowship's current site gains battleground.

card.title: Lurtz
card.subtitle: Minion of the White Wizard
card.game_text: Archer. Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Lurtz is strength +3 for each exhausted companion you can spot.

card.title: Murderous Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.title: Our Foes Are Weak
card.game_text: To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion. Bearer must be an unbound companion. Limit 1 per bearer.

card.title: Overpowering Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) While this minion is skirmishing a character who has resistance 3 or less, this minion is strength +3.

card.title: Patrol of Uruk-hai
card.game_text: Damage +1. While this minion is skirmishing a Free Peoples character who has resistance 5 or less, this minion cannot take wounds.

card.title: Relentless Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time a Free Peoples event is played during a skirmish involving this minion, this minion is strength -2 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Ruthless Uruk
card.game_text: Each time this minion is assigned to skirmish a character who has resistance 3 or less, you may exert this minion to discard a possession borne by that character.

card.title: Sentinel Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Response: If an [URUK-HAI] minion is about to take a wound in a skirmish, exert or discard this minion to prevent that.

card.title: Squad of Uruk-hai
card.game_text: Damage +1. While this minion is skirmishing a character who has resistance 4 or less, this minion is damage +1.

card.title: Swarming Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. While you can spot another [URUK-HAI] minion assigned to a skirmish, this minion cannot take wounds.

card.title: Tyrannical Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. Toil 1. (For each [URUK-HAI] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1.)

card.title: Vigilant Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) This minion is strength +2 for each [URUK-HAI] minion not assigned to a skirmish.

card.title: Watchman Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. When you play this minion at a battleground site, you may draw a card.

card.title: Dark Powers Strengthen
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [WRAITH] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a Nazgul to draw 3 cards.

card.title: Dark Wings
card.game_text: Each time your [WRAITH] minion wins a skirmish, you may discard this condition to discard a Free Peoples condition from play.

card.title: Drawn to its Power
card.game_text: Each time a companion is killed in a skirmish involving a Nazgul, add a burden.

card.title: Hatred Stirred
card.game_text: Each time a companion loses a fierce skirmish involving a [WRAITH] minion, you may shuffle a [WRAITH] card from your discard pile into your draw deck.

card.title: Keening Wail
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [WRAITH] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a Nazgul to add a burden.

card.title: Lost in the Woods
card.game_text: Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to a companion your Nazgul is skirmishing. Limit 1 per companion. Each [WRAITH] minion skirmishing bearer is strength +1 for each forest site you can spot.

card.title: Moving This Way
card.game_text: Shadow: Spot a Nazgul and reveal a Nazgul from hand to place the revealed card beneath your draw deck and draw a card.

card.title: The Pale Blade
card.subtitle: Sword of Flame
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. If bearer is The Witch-king, each time he wins a skirmish, you may exert him to add a burden.

card.title: Riders in Black
card.game_text: Reveal your hand to make a [WRAITH] minion strength +1 for each [WRAITH] minion in your hand.

card.title: A Shadow Rises
card.notes: When you make this card a minion, move it out of your support area. When this card is no longer a minion, move it back to your support area. For example: if a character bearing Phial of Galadriel, Starglass is skirmishing A Shadow Rises and discards the Phial of Galadriel, A Shadow Rises loses Fierce and can bear other cards. If A Shadow Rises bears cards when its maneuver special ability is used, those cards are discarded.
card.game_text: Maneuver: Remove [5] to make this condition a fierce [WRAITH] minion until the start of the regroup phase that has 10 strength and 3 vitality, and cannot bear other cards. This card is still a condition. At the start of the regroup phase, remove all tokens from here.

card.title: Shapes Slowly Advancing
card.game_text: Regroup: Discard your Nazgul from play to add a [WRAITH] token here. The Free Peoples player may return a companion to hand to prevent the placement of that token. When you can spot 4 [WRAITH] tokens on this condition, the Ring-bearer is corrupted.

card.title: Surrounded by Wraiths
card.game_text: To play, spot a Nazgul. Each time the Free Peoples player plays a companion, that companion is exhausted unless the Free Peoples player pays its twilight cost again.

card.title: Ulaire Attea
card.subtitle: Second of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Attea is assigned to a fierce skirmish involving a character who has resistance 4 or less, you may exert Ulaire Attea to add a burden.

card.title: Ulaire Cantea
card.subtitle: Fourth of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: While Ulaire Cantea is at a forest or dwelling site, he is strength +2 and fierce.

card.title: Ulaire Lemenya
card.subtitle: Fifth of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Each character skirmishing Ulaire Lemenya who has resistance 5 or less is strength -3.

card.title: Ulaire Nelya
card.subtitle: Third of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Fierce. Shadow: Exert Ulaire Nelya to replace the fellowship's current site with a site from your adventure deck.

card.title: Ulaire Nertea
card.subtitle: Ninth of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) While Ulaire Nertea is at a forest site, he is strength +2. While you can spot 6 companions, each Nazgul is strength +2.

card.title: Ulaire Otsea
card.subtitle: Seventh of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: When you play Ulaire Otsea, you may spot a companion who has X wounds to reveal the top X cards of your draw deck. Take each [WRAITH] card revealed this way into hand.

card.title: Ulaire Toldea
card.subtitle: Eighth of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Toldea wins a skirmish, you may play the fellowship's next site.

card.title: The Witch-king
card.subtitle: Captain of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Fierce. Toil 2. (For each [WRAITH] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.title: The Witch-king
card.subtitle: Captain of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Fierce. Toil 2. Muster.

card.title: Anduin Banks
card.game_text: River. The minion archery total is +2 for each companion in the fellowship over 4.

card.title: Anduin Confluence
card.game_text: River. When the fellowship moves to this site, discard each ally from play.

card.title: Barazinbar
card.game_text: Mountain. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may exert a Dwarf to play a [DWARVEN] possession from your draw deck.

card.title: Buckland Homestead
card.game_text: Dwelling. Shadow: Play a Nazgul to discard a condition from play.

card.title: Caras Galadhon
card.game_text: Forest. No more than 1 minion can be assigned to each skirmish.

card.title: Cavern Entrance
card.game_text: Underground. Skirmish special abilities cannot be used.

card.title: Chamber of Mazarbul
card.game_text: Underground. The Free Peoples player may transfer Free Peoples artifacts and possessions at no twilight cost.

card.title: Crags of Emyn Muil
card.game_text: Mountain. If this site is in region 2 when the fellowship moves from it during the regroup phase, wound each companion.

card.title: Dammed Gate-stream
card.game_text: Marsh. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may play a [GOLLUM] Free Peoples card from your draw deck.

card.title: East Road
card.game_text: Forest. Each companion is twilight cost +2.

card.title: Ettenmoors
card.game_text: Plains. Skirmish: Exert your character, (except an enduring character) to make it strength +2.

card.title: Expanding Marshland
card.game_text: Marsh. Shadow: If the total number of minions and twilight tokens is 3 or fewer, play a minion at twilight cost -3.

card.title: Fangorn Glade
card.game_text: Forest. When the fellowship moves to this site, add [1] for each Free Peoples weapon.

card.title: Flats of Rohan
card.game_text: Plains. Each unbound companion skirmishing more than 1 minion is strength +3.

card.title: Fortress of Orthanc
card.game_text: Battleground. When the fellowship moves to the site, add 2 for each companion over 5.

card.title: Green Dragon Inn
card.game_text: Dwelling. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may exert 2 Hobbits to play a Hobbit from your draw deck.

card.title: Harrowdale
card.game_text: Plains. Until the regroup phase, each minion skirmishing a [ROHAN] companion loses fierce and cannot gain fierce.

card.title: Heights of Isengard
card.game_text: Battleground. Each time a [GANDALF] companion wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player may discard a condition from play.

card.title: Helm's Gate
card.game_text: Battleground. Each character bearing a hand weapon is strength +2.

card.title: Mere of Dead Faces
card.game_text: Marsh. Regroup: Exert your Gollum or your Smeagol to play the fellowship's next site.

card.title: Moria Guardroom
card.game_text: Underground. When your fellowship moves from this site, you may spot a Dwarf to draw 2 cards.

card.title: Moria Stairway
card.game_text: Underground. Each character bearing a hand weapon is damage +1.

card.title: Neekerbreekers' Bog
card.game_text: Marsh. When the fellowship moves to here, heal each character who has resistance 5 or more and exert each other character.

card.title: North Undeep
card.game_text: River. The minion archery total is -3.

card.title: Old Forest Road
card.game_text: Forest. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may heal 2 Elves.

card.title: Osgiliath Reclaimed
card.game_text: Battleground. When the fellowship moves from this site, the Free Peoples player may spot 3 burdens to remove a burden.

card.title: Pelennor Fields
card.game_text: Plains. Each [MEN] minion gains ambush 1.

card.title: Pelennor Flat
card.game_text: Plains. At the start of the maneuver phase, the Free Peoples player must add a burden or discard 3 cards from hand.

card.title: Pinnacle of Zirakzigil
card.game_text: Mountain. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may exert 3 companions to play a Wizard from your dead pile.

card.title: The Prancing Pony
card.game_text: Dwelling. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may add a burden to play a ranger from your draw deck.

card.title: Rohan Uplands
card.game_text: Plains. During the archery phase, [URUK] minions cannot take wounds.

card.title: Slag Mounds
card.game_text: Battleground. Each time a companion is killed, add a burden.

card.title: Stables
card.game_text: At the start of your fellowship phase, you may exert a [ROHAN] Man to play a [ROHAN] mount from your draw deck.

card.title: Trollshaw Forest
card.game_text: Forest. Each time you play an artifact or possession on your companion, you may draw a card.

card.title: Valley of the Silverlode
card.game_text: Dwelling. River. When your fellowship moves to this site, you may heal each Hobbit companion.

card.title: Watch-tower of Cirith Ungol
card.game_text: Mountain. Maneuver: Exert your [ORC] minion to discard a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand.

card.title: West Gate of Moria
card.game_text: Underground. When the fellowship moves from this site, remove [2].

card.title: Westemnet Village
card.game_text: Dwelling. When the fellowship moves to this site, the Free Peoples player wounds a companion for each ally.

card.title: Window on the West
card.game_text: Underground. Each unwounded [GONDOR] Man is defender +1.

card.title: Woody-End
card.game_text: Forest. Shadow: Remove a burden to play a Nazgul from your discard pile.

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: The Ring of Rings
card.game_text: Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, he or she wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While the Ring-bearer is wearing The One Ring, each time he or she is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

card.title: Elven Marksmanship
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Toil 2. (For each [ELVEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Archery: Discard this condition to make the fellowship archery total +2.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Woodland Emissary
card.game_text: At the start of the archery phase, you may spot another Elf to exert a minion.

card.title: Glamdring
card.subtitle: Foe-hammer
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Each time Gandalf wins a skirmish, you may remove a burden.

card.title: Gollum
card.subtitle: Skulker
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert Gollum twice to make another minion strength +2.

card.title: Smeagol
card.subtitle: Scout and Guide
card.game_text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each time Smeagol wins a skirmish, you may play the fellowship's next site. Skirmish: If Smeagol is at a marsh, exert him to cancel a skirmish involving him.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Strider
card.game_text: Ranger. Each time the fellowship moves, add [1].

card.title: Bloodthirsty
card.game_text: Spot 2 [MEN] minions to wound an unbound companion.

card.title: Fletcher of Harad
card.game_text: While this minion is at a plains site, it is an archer. While you can spot 6 companions, each [MEN] minion is an archer.

card.title: Porter Troll
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot an [ORC] minion. When you play this minion, add a burden unless the Free Peoples player reveals a Free Peoples event from his or her hand.

card.title: Undisciplined
card.game_text: Toil 3. (For each [ORC] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -3.) Assign an [ORC] minion to a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Gamling
card.subtitle: Defender of the Hornburg
card.game_text: At the start of the fellowship phase, you may add [1] to play a possession on Gamling from your draw deck.

card.title: Sword Rack
card.game_text: Response: If a [ROHAN] possession is discarded from play and no more than one possession is stacked here, stack it here. Fellowship: Add [1] to play a possession stacked here as if from hand.

card.title: Salt from the Shire
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Fellowship: Discard this possession to remove a burden. Skirmish: If bearer is an unbound Hobbit, discard this possession to prevent him or her from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.title: Brawling Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. Response: If a special ability of a companion who has resistance 5 or less is used, exert this minion to cancel its effect.

card.title: Lurtz
card.subtitle: Minion of the White Wizard
card.game_text: Archer. Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Lurtz is strength +3 for each exhausted companion you can spot.

card.title: The Pale Blade
card.subtitle: Sword of Flame
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. If bearer is The Witch-king, each time he wins a skirmish, you may exert him to add a burden.

card.title: The Witch-king
card.subtitle: Captain of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Fierce. Toil 2. (For each [WRAITH] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.title: Argument Ready to Hand
card.game_text: Spot a Dwarf to choose a Shadow player who must spot a race. Discard from play all minions of all other races.

card.title: Belt of Erebor
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Each minion skirmishing bearer loses all damage bonus. Skirmish: Discard this possession to transfer one of bearer's possessions to another eligible bearer.

card.title: A Clamour of Many Voices
card.game_text: Each time a Dwarf wins a skirmish in which you played a [DWARVEN] event, you may draw a card.

card.title: Durability
card.game_text: Make a Dwarf strength +2. Then, if that Dwarf is at a battleground or mountain site, draw a card.

card.title: Dwarven Bracers
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, discard this possession to prevent that wound.

card.title: Dwarven Skill
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [DWARVEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a Dwarf strength +3 (or +4 if he has resistance 4 or more).

card.title: Dwarven Warrior
card.game_text: When you play this companion during the fellowship phase, choose a Shadow player who must discard the top 2 cards of his or her draw deck.

card.title: His Father's Charge
card.lore: ;Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a Dwarf strength +1 for each of the following that is true: he is at a mountain or underground site
card.game_text: he has resistance 3 or more

card.title: Loud and Strong
card.game_text: Skirmish: Discard a [DWARVEN] card from hand and spot a minion skirmishing a Dwarf to make that minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: No Pauses
card.subtitle: No Spills
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [DWARVEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot 2 Dwarves to draw up to 4 cards.

card.title: Nobody Tosses a Dwarf
card.game_text: If a Dwarf wins a skirmish, make an opponent discard 3 cards from the top of his or her draw deck.

card.title: Proud and Able
card.game_text: Each Dwarf is damage +1 for each possession he bears. Fellowship: Discard this condition to play a [DWARVEN] possession from your discard pile.

card.title: Sharp Defense
card.game_text: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or +2 for each possession he bears if he has resistance 4 or more).

card.title: Stalwart Support
card.game_text: Each Dwarf gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Each time the fellowship moves from a plains site, discard a card from your hand.

card.title: Thrarin
card.subtitle: Smith of Erebor
card.game_text: For each artifact and possession Thrarin bears, he is damage +1.

card.title: Attunement
card.game_text: Spot an Elf to reveal cards from the top of your draw deck until you reveal a Shadow card. Make an Elf strength +2 for each card revealed. Place the revealed cards in any order on the bottom of your draw deck.

card.title: Elrond
card.subtitle: Witness to History
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: If Elrond is skirmishing a minion, exert him to place an [ELVEN] card from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

card.title: Elrond
card.subtitle: Witness to History
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: If Elrond is skirmishing a minion, exert him to place an [ELVEN] card from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

card.title: Hadafang
card.game_text: Bearer must be Arwen or Elrond. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert him or her to discard a condition from play.

card.title: Long-knives of Legolas
card.game_text: Bearer must be Legolas. Each Orc or Uruk-hai skirmishing Legolas is strength -2.

card.title: Orophin
card.subtitle: Brother of Haldir
card.game_text: While Orophin is at a forest site and you can spot another Elf, Orophin is an archer.

card.title: Refuge
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Fellowship: Discard a companion from hand to heal a companion.

card.title: Rumil
card.subtitle: Brother of Haldir
card.game_text: Maneuver: Reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [ELVEN] card, Rumil is an archer until the regroup phase.

card.title: Seclusion
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [ELVEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot an Elf companion to discard a condition from play.

card.title: Taking the High Ground
card.game_text: Toil 1. (For each [ELVEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1) Archery: Discard an [ELVEN] character from hand to make the fellowship archery total +1. Each time the fellowship moves from an underground site, return your Elf to your hand.

card.title: Betrayal of Isengard
card.game_text: Each time an opponent draws a card (or takes a card into hand) during the Shadow phase, you may remove [1]. Maneuver: Exert Gandalf to wound Saruman twice.

card.title: Discoveries
card.game_text: Toil 3. (For each [GANDALF] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -3) Spot a [GANDALF] wizard and X other companions to examine the top X cards of your draw deck. Replace those cards in any order.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: The White Rider
card.game_text: Skirmish: If Gandalf is not assigned to a skirmish, exert him and another unbound companion skirmishing a minion to make Gandalf strength +3 and have him replace that companion in that skirmish.

card.title: Gandalf's Hat
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Each time the fellowship moves from a battleground site, add a burden. Regroup: Add 2 burdens to remove all twilight tokens from the twilight pool.

card.title: Introspection
card.lore: ;Spell. Choose one: Spot a [GANDALF] Wizard to choose an opponent who must discard one of his or her conditions from play
card.game_text: or spot a [GANDALF] Wizard at a battleground site to discard a condition from play.

card.title: Jarnsmid
card.subtitle: Barding Emissary
card.game_text: At the start of each skirmish involving Jarnsmid, you may remove a burden (or 2 burdens if you can spot another [GANDALF] companion).

card.title: Mysterious Wizard
card.game_text: Spell. Make Gandalf strength +2 (or +4 if you cannot spot 5 burdens).

card.title: Salve
card.game_text: Spell. To play, spot a [GANDALF] Wizard. Bearer must be a companion. Limit 1 per bearer. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound that would kill him or her, discard this condition to prevent that wound.

card.title: The Terror of His Coming
card.game_text: Make a [GANDALF] companion strength +2. Then, if that companion is at a battleground or dwelling site, you may take a [GANDALF] condition from your discard pile into hand.

card.title: Traveled Leader
card.game_text: Spot a [GANDALF] Wizard to replace a site in the fellowship's current region with a site from your adventure deck.

card.title: Watch and Wait
card.game_text: To play, spot a [GANDALF] companion. Bearer must be a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Limit 1 per bearer. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may remove a burden.

card.title: Watch and Wait
card.game_text: To play, spot a [GANDALF] companion. Bearer must be a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Limit 1 per bearer. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may remove a burden.

card.title: With Doom We Come
card.game_text: While Gandalf is at an underground site, he gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) While the fellowship is at a battleground site, each [GANDALF] character gains muster.

card.title: Come Away
card.game_text: While you can spot Smeagol, the Shadow number of each site is -1. Each time the fellowship moves, wound a companion or discard this condition.

card.title: From Deep in Shadow
card.game_text: Spot X [GOLLUM] cards to reveal the top X cards of your draw deck. You may play a revealed minion. Its twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Not Alone
card.game_text: Each time the fellowship moves to a mountain or underground site, you may discard a [GOLLUM] event from hand to take a minion from your discard pile into hand.

card.title: There's Another Way
card.game_text: To play, spot Smeagol. Smeagol is strength +1. Regroup: Discard this condition to replace the fellowship's current site with a site from your adventure deck.

card.title: Treacherous Little Toad
card.game_text: To play, spot a [GOLLUM] card. Bearer must be a wounded companion. While you can spot a [GOLLUM] character or a [GOLLUM] card in your support area, bearer cannot heal.

card.title: Blade of Gondor
card.subtitle: Sword of Boromir
card.game_text: Bearer must be Boromir. He is damage +1. Skirmish: If Boromir is not assigned to a skirmish, discard a [GONDOR] card borne by him to have him replace an unbound Hobbit skirmishing a minion.

card.title: Boromir
card.subtitle: Defender of Minas Tirith
card.notes: This card has the Gandalf signet.
card.game_text: Ranger. Fellowship: Add [2] to heal Boromir.

card.title: Concealment
card.game_text: Make a [GONDOR] Man strength +1. If he or she is skirmishing a roaming minion, your opponents cannot use special abilities.

card.title: Confronting the Eye
card.game_text: Fellowship: Spot a [GONDOR] Man and add [2] to make each unbound companion strength +1 until the regroup phase (limit +1).

card.title: Elendil's Valor
card.game_text: Make a [GONDOR] companion defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Faramir
card.subtitle: Dunadan of Gondor
card.game_text: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert Faramir to make him strength +1 for each wound on the Ring-bearer.

card.title: Faramir's Sword
card.game_text: Bearer must be Faramir. He is damage +1. Each minion skirmishing Faramir at a battleground or forest site is roaming.

card.title: Gondorian Steed
card.game_text: Bearer must be a knight. Bearer is damage +1. Each time the fellowship moves from a mountain site, add [2].

card.title: Guardian
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [GONDOR] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Skirmish: If a [GONDOR] companion is not assigned to a skirmish, discard this condition to have him or her replace an unbound companion skirmishing a minion.

card.title: Invigorated
card.game_text: Skirmish: Discard this condition to heal a [GONDOR] Man (or to heal 2 [GONDOR] Men if you can spot a roaming minion).

card.title: Tireless
card.lore: ;Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [GONDOR] Man strength +1 for each of the following that is true: he or she is at a battleground site
card.game_text: he or she has resistance 4 or more

card.title: Valorous Leader
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] companion. Limit 1 per bearer. Skirmish: Discard this condition to discard a possession borne by a minion skirmishing bearer.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Of Many Colours
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) When you play Saruman, name a culture. Each companion of the named culture is strength -1.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Of Many Colours
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. Lurker. When you play Saruman, name a culture. Each companion of the named culture is strength -1.

card.title: Brutal Easterling
card.game_text: Each time this minion is assigned to skirmish an exhausted companion, it is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Castamir of Umbar
card.subtitle: Corsair Vandal
card.game_text: Fierce. Toil 1. (For each [MEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1) Each wounded [MEN] minion is strength +2.

card.title: Corrupted Spy
card.game_text: This minion is strength +1 for each other character you can spot. While you can spot a companion who has resistance 3 or less, this minion is damage +1. While you can spot a companion who has resistance 0, this minion is fierce.

card.title: Countless Companies
card.game_text: Response: If a [MEN] possession is discarded from play, stack it here. Shadow: Remove [1] to play a possession stacked here as if from hand.

card.title: Covetous Easterling
card.game_text: While this minion is skirmishing a Man, it is damage +2.

card.title: Crazed Hillman
card.game_text: Fierce. While this minion is in a fierce skirmish, it is strength +7 (or +10 if it is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 4 or less).

card.title: Crooked Townsman
card.game_text: This minion is strength +1 for each other character you can spot.

card.title: Dunlending Zealot
card.game_text: While this minion is exhausted, each unbound companion is resistance -1 (or -2 if the fellowship is at a battleground site).

card.title: Easterling Banner-bearer
card.game_text: This minion is strength +1 for each wound on each companion he is skirmishing (or +2 for each if that companion has resistance 2 or less).

card.title: Enraged Southron
card.game_text: Ambush [3]. The move limit for this turn is +1.

card.title: Frenzied Dunlending
card.game_text: While this minion is bearing a possession, it is fierce.

card.title: Gathering Strength
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [MEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Make a [MEN] minion strength +6.

card.title: Goaded to War
card.game_text: To play, spot a [MEN] minion. Each time the fellowship moves to a battleground or plains site, add [1].

card.title: Grima
card.subtitle: Betrayer of Rohan
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time a companion loses a skirmish involving a [MEN] minion, you may exert Grima to exert a companion.

card.title: Harrying Hillman
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time a companion loses a skirmish involving a [MEN] minion, add [2].

card.title: Hemmed In
card.game_text: While you can spot 6 companions, each companion skirmishing a [MEN] minion loses all strength bonuses from possessions. Maneuver: Spot your [MEN] minion and discard this condition to transfer a Free Peoples possession borne by a companion to another eligible bearer.

card.title: Last Days
card.game_text: Each time a [MEN] minion is killed or discarded from play (except during the regroup phase), you may play a [MEN] minion. Its twilight cost is -2, and it is fierce and strength +2 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Messenger's Mount
card.game_text: Bearer must be The Mouth of Sauron. He is fierce. Response: If a [MEN] minion is about to take a wound, remove [3] to prevent that.

card.title: The Mouth of Sauron
card.subtitle: Messenger of Mordor
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert The Mouth of Sauron to play a [MEN] condition or [MEN] possession from your draw deck.

card.title: The Mouth of Sauron
card.subtitle: Messenger of Mordor
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert The Mouth of Sauron to play a [MEN] condition or [MEN] possession from your draw deck.

card.title: Mumak Rider
card.game_text: Archer. When you play this minion to a battleground or plains site, you may spot another [MEN] minion to discard a possession from play.

card.title: Poisonous Words
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [MEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Add [1] for each [MEN] card you can spot.

card.title: Trail of Terror
card.game_text: At the start of the maneuver phase, you may spot 3 [MEN] minions and remove [1] to make each unbound companion resistance -1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: War Trident
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. While bearer is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 5 or less, bearer is strength +2. While bearer is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 3 or less, bearer is strength +2.

card.title: Wrathful Hillman
card.game_text: Each time this minion is assigned to a skirmish, if it is not at a plains site, remove [2] or discard this minion.

card.title: The Balrog
card.subtitle: The Terror of Khazad-dum
card.game_text: Damage +1. While The Balrog is at an underground site, it is fierce and cannot take wounds or be exerted.

card.title: The Balrog
card.subtitle: The Terror of Khazad-dum
card.game_text: Damage +1. While The Balrog is at an underground site, it is fierce and cannot take wounds or be exerted.

card.title: Whip of Many Thongs
card.subtitle: Weapon of Flame and Shadow
card.game_text: Bearer must be The Balrog. It is fierce. When you play this artifact, the Free Peoples player reveals his or her hand and discards all Free Peoples cards from hand that have a twilight cost of 1 or less.

card.title: Abiding Evil
card.game_text: Spot X burdens to make a character skirmishing an [ORC] Orc strength -X.

card.title: Barrage
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [ORC] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Make each of your [ORC] minions strength +2 until the regroup phase.

card.title: The Beckoning Shadow
card.game_text: To play, exert an [ORC] minion. If you can spot 5 burdens, and the Free Peoples player has no cards in his or her draw deck, the Ring-bearer is corrupted.

card.title: Bloodstained Field
card.game_text: Spot an [ORC] lurker to wound an Elf.

card.title: Cave Troll of Moria
card.subtitle: Savage Menace
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. Toil 2. (For each [ORC] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Each time an [ORC] lurker wins a skirmish, you may make the Free Peoples player discard the top 2 cards of his or her draw deck.

card.title: Cave Troll's Hammer
card.subtitle: Unwieldy Cudgel
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Troll. When you play this possession, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion for each lurker you spot.

card.title: Goblin Aggressor
card.game_text: While this minion is bearing a possession, each [ORC] minion is strength +1.

card.title: Great Cost
card.game_text: At the start of each skirmish involving an [ORC] minion, you may spot 6 companions to exert a companion in that skirmish. Shadow: Discard this condition and spot an [ORC] minion to make the Free Peoples player place a card from his or her hand on top of his or her draw deck.

card.title: Mordor Aggressor
card.game_text: While this minion is bearing a possession, each [ORC] minion is strength +2.

card.title: Morgul Tormentor
card.game_text: Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to skirmish an unwounded companion, he or she must add a burden or discard a card from hand.

card.title: Orc Artisan
card.game_text: Each time you play an [ORC] possession on an [ORC] Orc, you may add [1] (or [2] if that Orc is at a battleground or underground site).

card.title: Orc Dreg
card.game_text: Each time this minion is assigned to a skirmish, if it is not at an underground site, remove [2] or discard this minion.

card.title: Orc Footman
card.game_text: When this minion is discarded from play, you may spot a companion who has resistance 4 or less to shuffle this minion into your draw deck.

card.title: Orc Sapper
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may spot a companion who has resistance 4 or less to prevent that companion from being assigned to this minion until the regroup phase.

card.title: Orc Skulker
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each skirmish event you play is twilight cost -1.

card.title: Orc Spear
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ORC] minion. When you play this possession on a minion that has a twilight cost of 4 or more, add [2].

card.title: Orc Strategist
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Maneuver: Make an [ORC] lurker minion lose lurker until the regroup phase.

card.title: Orc Tormentor
card.game_text: Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to skirmish an unwounded companion, he or she must add a burden or discard a card from hand.

card.title: Pitiless Orc
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may make the Free Peoples player exert a companion for each companion over 4.

card.title: Rallying Orc
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time you play another [ORC] lurker at a battleground or underground site, you may make the Free Peoples player exert a companion.

card.title: Retribution
card.game_text: Each time an [ORC] minion bearing a weapon wins a skirmish, add a burden. Shadow: Discard this condition to play an [ORC] weapon from your discard pile.

card.title: Scavenging Goblins
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may play an [ORC] weapon from your discard pile on your [ORC] Orc.

card.title: Storming the Ramparts
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [ORC] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot an [ORC] minion to make the Free Peoples player discard one of his or her conditions from play.

card.title: Taunt
card.game_text: Reveal the top 5 cards of your draw deck (or, if the fellowship is at a battleground site, the top 7 cards) to make an [ORC] minion strength +1 for each [ORC] card revealed.

card.title: Troll's Keyward
card.subtitle: Keeper of the Beast
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Shadow: Exert Troll's Keyward and reveal your hand to add [1] for each [ORC] Troll revealed.

card.title: Vile Goblin
card.game_text: Each time this minion is assigned to skirmish a Dwarf, this minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Aldred
card.subtitle: Eored Soldier
card.game_text: At the start of each skirmish involving Aldred, you may discard a possession borne by a minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Cast Out
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [ROHAN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Maneuver: Spot a [ROHAN] Man and discard this condition to exert a minion. Maneuver: Spot a mounted [ROHAN] Man and discard this condition to return an exhausted minion to its owner's hand.

card.title: Challenging the Orc-host
card.game_text: Make a [ROHAN] companion strength +2 (or +1 for each minion you can spot if that companion has resistance 5 or more).

card.title: Cleaving a Path
card.lore: ;Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [ROHAN] companion strength +1 for each of the following that is true: he or she is at a plains site
card.game_text: he or she has resistance 4 or more

card.title: Coif
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. Each time a Shadow card adds any number of twilight tokens, you may exert bearer to prevent that. Each time the fellowship moves from a forest site, exert a companion.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Eored Leader
card.game_text: While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Maneuver: If you can spot more minions than companions, exert Eomer to play a [ROHAN] companion from your draw deck.

card.title: Eored Warrior
card.game_text: While this companion is at a battleground or plains site, he is strength +3.

card.title: For the Mark
card.game_text: Spot a [ROHAN] Man to discard a possession from play. You may exert a [ROHAN] Man who has resistance 3 or more to play this event during the maneuver phase.

card.title: Golden Glimmer
card.game_text: Response: If a companion is about to take a wound, spot a [ROHAN] companion and add 2 burdens to prevent that.

card.title: Haethen
card.subtitle: Veteran Fighter
card.game_text: Haethen cannot take wounds during fierce skirmishes. Skirmish: Exert Haethen to make him strength +1.

card.title: Leofric
card.subtitle: Defender of the Mark
card.game_text: Skirmish: If Leofric is in a skirmish, exert him to play a [ROHAN] skirmish event from your draw deck.

card.title: The Mouth of Sauron
card.subtitle: Lieutenant of Barad-dur
card.game_text: Assignment: Assign The Mouth of Sauron to the companion who has the highest strength. (If two or more are tied for highest, choose one.)

card.title: Bilbo
card.subtitle: Melancholy Hobbit
card.game_text: Ring-bound. At the start of each skirmish involving Bilbo, you may exert him to take a [SHIRE] skirmish event into hand from your discard pile.

card.title: Diversion
card.game_text: Discard a Hobbit not assigned to a skirmish from play to discard a minion from play. If the fellowship is at a battleground site, you may add 2 burdens to play this event during a skirmish involving a Hobbit.

card.title: Flotsam and Jetsam
card.game_text: If a companion (except a Hobbit) wins a skirmish, heal a Hobbit.

card.title: Home and Hearth
card.game_text: Each time you play a Hobbit, you may remove a burden. Then, if the fellowship is at a dwelling site, heal the Ring-bearer.

card.title: Hope is Kindled
card.game_text: Make a Hobbit strength +2. If that Hobbit wins this skirmish, you may remove a burden.

card.title: Long Live the Halflings
card.game_text: To play, spot a Hobbit. Skirmish: If your Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, discard this condition to make each companion who has resistance 7 or more strength +2 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Measure of Comfort
card.game_text: While you can spot a Hobbit, each unbound companion is resistance +1.

card.title: No Worse for Wear
card.game_text: Prevent a Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled. Then, if the fellowship is at a dwelling site, you may discard 2 cards from hand to return this event to your hand.

card.title: Pippin
card.subtitle: Hobbit of Some Intelligence
card.notes: This card has the Gandalf signet.
card.game_text: When you play Pippin, remove a burden or heal a companion.

card.title: A Promise
card.game_text: While you can spot Frodo and Sam and neither is exhausted, each is strength +1.

card.title: Rosie Cotton
card.subtitle: Barmaid
card.game_text: Sam cannot be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns Rosie Cotton to a skirmish, add 2 burdens.

card.title: Simple Living
card.game_text: Response: If you play a [SHIRE] event, discard this condition to heal each Hobbit.

card.title: Stand Together
card.game_text: Each time a Hobbit wins a skirmish, he or she gains muster until the end of the turn. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.title: Sudden Fury
card.game_text: Each time a [SHIRE] companion loses a skirmish, add a [SHIRE] token here. Skirmish: Remove a [SHIRE] token from here to make a [SHIRE] companion strength +1.

card.title: Tolman Cotton
card.subtitle: Farmer of Bywater
card.game_text: Response: If a burden is about to be added by a Shadow card, spot another Hobbit and exert Tolman Cotton to prevent that.

card.title: Advancing Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) When you cannot spot another [URUK-HAI] minion, discard this minion.

card.title: Barbaric Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. Assignment: Make the Free Peoples player assign this minion to an unwounded companion.

card.title: Berserker Torch
card.game_text: Toil 1. (For each [URUK-HAI] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1) Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] Uruk-hai. Bearer is strength +2 for each wound on each character in its skirmish.

card.title: Breeding Pit Conscript
card.game_text: Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) When you play this minion, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.

card.title: Broken Heirloom
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [URUK-HAI] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot an [URUK-HAI] minion to discard a possession borne by a companion who has resistance 4 or less.

card.title: Broken in Defeat
card.game_text: Make an [URUK-HAI] minion strength +2. Then you may spot 6 companions to return this event to your hand.

card.title: Crushing Uruk
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Response: If a companion loses a skirmish involving an [URUK-HAI] minion, exert this minion to discard a possession borne by that companion.

card.title: Dark Alliance
card.game_text: Response: If an ally or companion uses a special ability, discard this condition and exert an [URUK-HAI] lurker to prevent that.

card.title: Merciless Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may spot a companion who has resistance 4 or less to place this minion on the bottom of your draw deck.

card.title: Quelling Force
card.game_text: Make an [URUK-HAI] minion strength +1 for each other [URUK-HAI] minion you can spot.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Agent of the Dark Lord
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert Saruman to make an [URUK-HAI] minion strength +2. Each time a companion is killed, you may heal Saruman.

card.title: Shingle in a Storm
card.game_text: While you can spot 6 companions, each [URUK-HAI] minion is damage +1. Assignment: Discard this condition to assign an [URUK-HAI] minion to a companion who has resistance 2 or less.

card.title: Strange Device
card.game_text: Spot an [URUK-HAI] minion to draw 3 cards. Then discard 2 cards from hand or discard an [URUK-HAI] minion from hand.

card.title: Suppressing Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. While there is a companion in the dead pile, each unbound companion is resistance -4.

card.title: Tempest of War
card.game_text: While you can spot an [URUK-HAI] minion, each unbound companion is resistance -1 for each condition he or she bears. Skirmish: Spot an [URUK-HAI] minion and a companion who has resistance 2 or less to discard from play all conditions in all player's support areas.

card.title: Uruk Common
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time this minion is assigned to a skirmish, if it is not at a battleground site, remove [2] or discard this minion.

card.title: Uruk Decimator
card.game_text: While this minion is at a battleground site, it is strength +2. While this minion is bearing a possession, it is damage +1.

card.title: Uruk Desecrator
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each unbound companion is resistance -2 for each wound he or she has.

card.title: Uruk Dominator
card.game_text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make it strength +1 for each [URUK-HAI] Uruk-hai you spot (or +2 for each if you can spot a companion who has resistance 3 or less).

card.title: Uruk Pikeman
card.game_text: Damage +1. While this minion is skirmishing an exhausted companion, this minion is strength +3 (or +5 if that companion has resistance 4 or less).

card.title: Uruk Slaughterer
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time a companion is killed in a skirmish involving an [URUK-HAI] minion, you may discard any number of cards from hand to draw the same number of cards.

card.title: Uruk Zealot
card.game_text: Damage +1. To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion. Each companion who has resistance 0 is strength -3. Each time Uruk Zealot wins a skirmish, you may draw 3 cards.

card.title: Uruk-hai Guard
card.game_text: Damage +1. Assignment: Exert this minion and spot a companion to prevent the Free Peoples player from assigning that companion to this minion.

card.title: Uruk-hai Troop
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each character skirmishing this minion looses all strength bonuses from weapons.

card.title: Vicious Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may draw a card for each wound on a character it is skirmishing.

card.title: Weapon of Opportunity
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] minion. When you play this possession on a minion that has twilight cost of 4 or more, draw a card.

card.title: Worthy of Mordor
card.game_text: At the start of the regroup phase, you may remove [1] to make an [URUK-HAI] minion gain muster until the end of the regroup phase. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.title: Black Rider
card.game_text: Fierce. This minion is strength +1 for each companion you can spot.

card.title: Dark Approach
card.game_text: Play a Nazgul. His twilight cost is -1 for each forest site you can spot (limit -4).

card.title: Dark Temptation
card.game_text: Each time you play a Nazgul, you may heal the Ring-bearer twice to add a burden.

card.title: Echo of Hooves
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [WRAITH] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot your Nazgul at a battleground or forest site to play a mount on him from your draw deck.

card.title: In the Ringwraith's Wake
card.game_text: If a Nazgul wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player chooses to either exert the Ring-bearer or add a burden.

card.title: Lingering Shadow
card.game_text: Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to a character skirmishing a Nazgul. Each time a wound is removed from bearer, add a burden.

card.title: Minas Morgul Answers
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [WRAITH] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot a Nazgul to discard a Free Peoples condition from play.

card.title: Nazgul Blade
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. While bearer is at a battleground or forest site, he is strength +1.

card.title: Sauron's Gaze
card.game_text: Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to a character skirmishing a Nazgul. The Free Peoples player cannot use bearer's special abilities.

card.title: Sense of Obligation
card.game_text: To play, spot a [WRAITH] minion. Bearer must be an unbound companion. Limit 1 per bearer. At the end of each assignment phase, if bearer is not assigned to a skirmish and a companion who does not bear a [WRAITH] condition is, add a burden.

card.title: Shadowy Mount
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. While bearer is at a battleground or forest site, he is fierce. Assignment: Make the Free Peoples player assign bearer to an unbound companion bearing a [WRAITH] condition.

card.title: Steed of Mordor
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Bearer gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may draw 2 cards.

card.title: Ulaire Attea
card.subtitle: Black Predator
card.game_text: Fierce. Skirmish: Remove [2] and discard a [WRAITH] card from hand to make Ulaire Attea strength +3.

card.title: Ulaire Cantea
card.subtitle: Black Assassin
card.game_text: Fierce. Assignment: Assign Ulaire Cantea to a companion who has resistance 0. Skirmish: Spot 6 companions and another [WRAITH] card to kill a companion Ulaire Cantea is skirmishing.

card.title: Ulaire Cantea
card.subtitle: Black Assassin
card.game_text: Fierce. Assignment: Assign Ulaire Cantea to a companion who has resistance 0. Skirmish: Spot 6 companions and another [WRAITH] card to kill a companion Ulaire Cantea is skirmishing.

card.title: Ulaire Enquea
card.subtitle: Black Threat
card.game_text: Fierce.Toil 1. (For each [WRAITH] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1) Response: If you are playing a [WRAITH] event that has toil X, exert Ulaire Enquea to reduce that event's twilight cost by X.

card.title: Ulaire Lemenya
card.subtitle: Black Enemy
card.game_text: When you play Ulaire Lemenya, you may play a [WRAITH] mount from your discard pile.

card.title: Ulaire Nelya
card.subtitle: Black Hunter
card.game_text: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Nelya wins a skirmish, you may draw a card.

card.title: Ulaire Nertea
card.subtitle: Black Horseman
card.game_text: The twilight cost of each mount is -1. While Ulaire Nertea is mounted, each Nazgul is strength +1 and has muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.title: Ulaire Otsea
card.subtitle: Black Specter
card.game_text: Shadow: Exert Ulaire Otsea and discard a [WRAITH] condition from hand to discard a Free Peoples condition from play.

card.title: Ulaire Toldea
card.subtitle: Black Shadow
card.game_text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Toldea, you may exert him to take a [WRAITH] event from your discard pile into hand.

card.title: Unending Life
card.game_text: While you can spot 6 companions, each Nazgul is strength +3. Skirmish: Discard this condition to heal a Nazgul.

card.title: Unimpeded
card.lore: ;Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a Nazgul strength +1 for each of the following that is true: he is at a battleground or forest site
card.game_text: he is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 4 or less

card.title: The Witch-king
card.subtitle: Black Lord
card.game_text: Fierce. The Witch-King is twilight cost -1 for each wound on the Ring-bearer. Each time a companion is played, you may reveal this card from hand to exert the Ring-bearer.

card.title: The Witch-king's Beast
card.subtitle: Fell Creature
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. If bearer is The Witch-king, after all skirmishes and fierce skirmishes have been resolved, you may exert him twice to make him participate in one additional assignment and skirmish phase.

card.title: The Angle
card.game_text: Forest. Shadow: Play a Nazgul (or spot 6 companions and discard 2 cards from hand) to draw a card.

card.title: The Bridge of Khazad-dum
card.game_text: Battleground. Underground. The Balrog is twilight cost -3.

card.title: Emyn Muil
card.game_text: Mountain. Maneuver: Remove 2 and exert your minion that is not fierce to make that minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Hill of Sight
card.game_text: Battleground. Forest. While you can spot 3 minions (or 6 companions), each unbound companion is resistance -2.

card.title: Hobbiton Market
card.game_text: Dwelling. When the fellowship moves from this site, wound each minion that is not a lurker.

card.title: Northern Pelennor
card.game_text: Battleground. Plains. Shadow: Make your lurker minion lose lurker until the regroup phase.

card.title: Shores of Nen Hithoel
card.game_text: River. Shadow: Spot 5 [ORC] Orcs to prevent the fellowship from moving again this turn.

card.title: Slopes of Orodruin
card.game_text: Mountain. Shadow: Remove 2 and discard 2 Free Peoples cards from hand to draw a card.

card.title: Starkhorn
card.game_text: Mountain. Each time your Dwarf wins a skirmish, you may draw a card.

card.title: Wold Battlefield
card.game_text: Plains. Skirmish: Exert your Man (except an enduring Man) to make him or her damage +1.

card.title: Elrond
card.subtitle: Witness to History
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: If Elrond is skirmishing a minion, exert him to place an [ELVEN] card from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

card.title: Hadafang
card.game_text: Bearer must be Arwen or Elrond. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert him or her to discard a condition from play.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: The White Rider
card.game_text: Skirmish: If Gandalf is not assigned to a skirmish, exert him and another unbound companion skirmishing a minion to make Gandalf strength +3 and have him replace that companion in that skirmish.

card.title: Faramir
card.subtitle: Dunadan of Gondor
card.game_text: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert Faramir to make him strength +1 for each wound on the Ring-bearer.

card.title: Faramir's Sword
card.game_text: Bearer must be Faramir. He is damage +1. Each minion skirmishing Faramir at a battleground or forest site is roaming.

card.title: Castamir of Umbar
card.subtitle: Corsair Vandal
card.game_text: Fierce. Toil 1. (For each [MEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1) Each wounded [MEN] minion is strength +2.

card.title: Grima
card.subtitle: Betrayer of Rohan
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time a companion loses a skirmish involving a [MEN] minion, you may exert Grima to exert a companion.

card.title: The Balrog
card.subtitle: The Terror of Khazad-dum
card.game_text: Damage +1. While The Balrog is at an underground site, it is fierce and cannot take wounds or be exerted.

card.title: Cave Troll of Moria
card.subtitle: Savage Menace
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. Toil 2. (For each [ORC] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Each time an [ORC] lurker wins a skirmish, you may make the Free Peoples player discard the top 2 cards of his or her draw deck.

card.title: Orc Artisan
card.game_text: Each time you play an [ORC] possession on an [ORC] Orc, you may add [1] (or [2] if that Orc is at a battleground or underground site).

card.subtitle: Lieutenant of Barad-dur
