card.title: Arod
card.subtitle: Rohirrim Steed
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. When you play Arod, you may reinforce a [DWARVEN] token. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound during a skirmish, remove 2 [DWARVEN] tokens to prevent that.

card.title: Awkward Moment
card.game_text: Make a Dwarf strength +3 (or +4 and damage +1 if you can spot a [DWARVEN] token).

card.title: Deep Hatred
card.game_text: Each time the fellowship moves, add [2]. Skirmish: Exert a Dwarf who is not assigned to a skirmish to wound 2 Orcs (or to wound 1 Orc twice). Discard this from play if the fellowship is ahead on the adventure path.

card.title: Dwarf-lords
card.game_text: You may remove from the game 4 other [DWARVEN] cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Make your Dwarf bearing a hand weapon strength +3.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Lord of the Glittering Caves
card.game_text: Damage +1. Gimli is strength +1 for each minion assigned to a skirmish. Assignment: Exert Gimli and spot a lurker minion to make that minion lose lurker until the regroup phase.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Lord of the Glittering Caves
card.game_text: Damage +1. Gimli is strength +1 for each minion assigned to a skirmish. Assignment: Exert Gimli and spot a lurker minion to make that minion lose lurker until the regroup phase.

card.title: Honoring His Kinfolk
card.game_text: If a Dwarf wins a fierce skirmish, play a [DWARVEN] possession from your discard pile and you may reinforce a [DWARVEN] token.

card.title: Sorrow Shared
card.game_text: Remove a [DWARVEN] token to heal a Dwarf.

card.title: Subterranean Homestead
card.game_text: To play, exert 2 Dwarves. When you play this, add a [DWARVEN] token here for each mountain site and each underground site on the adventure path. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to make a Shadow player discard the top card of his or her draw deck.

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: Reflection of Luthien
card.game_text: While the fellowship is at a forest site, each of your other [ELVEN] companions is resistance +1. Skirmish: Exert Arwen to make a minion she is skirmishing strength -1 for each other companion assigned to a skirmish.

card.title: Asfaloth
card.subtitle: Swift Blossom
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Elf. When you play Asfaloth, you may reinforce an [ELVEN] token. Skirmish: Remove 2 [ELVEN] tokens to heal bearer (or heal bearer and heal another Elf if bearer is in a fierce skirmish).

card.title: Celeborn
card.subtitle: The Wise
card.game_text: While the fellowship is at a forest site, each Elf who has resistance 7 or more gains muster. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may take an [ELVEN] event into hand from your discard pile.

card.title: City of the Trees
card.game_text: At the end of your turn, discard this from play if the fellowship did not move more than once this turn. At the start of each skirmish involving an Elf and a wounded minion, you may draw a card.

card.title: Crashing Cavalry
card.game_text: Assignment: Discard this from play and assign a minion to an [ELVEN] companion. Those characters cannot use skirmish special abilities until the start of the regroup phase.

card.title: Final Shot
card.game_text: Make an [ELVEN] companion strength +2 (or +5 if the fellowship has moved more than once this turn).

card.title: Galadriel
card.subtitle: Sorceress of the Hidden Land
card.notes: When you reveal cards from the top of your deck, you reveal one for each forest on theadventure path. For example: if you have three forests, you would reveal the top three cards of your draw deck.
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may reveal a card from the top of your draw deck for each forest on the adventure path to heal an Elf for each [ELVEN] card revealed.

card.title: Inside a Song
card.game_text: Exert an Elf to take an [ELVEN] skirmish event into hand from your discard pile and you may reinforce an [ELVEN] token.

card.title: Kindreds Estranged
card.game_text: You may remove from the game 4 other [ELVEN] cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Make a minion skirmishing your Elf at a forest or river site strength -3.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: of the Grey Company
card.game_text: Archer. At the start of each archery phase, you may reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [ELVEN] card, wound a minion.

card.title: Let Fly
card.game_text: Spot 3 Elves, spot a Shadow race, and choose a Shadow player to wound each of that player's minions which is not of that race.

card.title: Lorien Protector
card.game_text: While another companion is assigned to a skirmish, during each skirmish, prevent all wounds to this companion after the first wound.

card.title: Many Miles
card.game_text: Spot 2 Elf archers to make the fellowship archery total +1 (or +2 if a Shadow player has replaced the fellowship's current site this turn).

card.title: Secluded Homestead
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 Elves. When you play this, add an [ELVEN] token here for each forest site and each river site on the adventure path. Regroup: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to reconcile your hand.

card.title: Shrouded Elf
card.game_text: Response: If you play an event during a skirmish involving this companion, exert this companion to place that event on top of your draw deck.

card.title: Sprang Forth Nimbly
card.game_text: Make an Elf strength +1 for each card that has an [ELVEN] token on it.

card.title: Standing Tall
card.lore: ;Skirmish: Discard this condition from play to make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -1 for each of the following that is true: it is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 4 or more
card.game_text: it is wounded

card.title: Take Up the Bow
card.game_text: Toil 2. (For each [ELVEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Archery: Discard this from play and spot 3 Elf archers to discard a minion from play. Each of those archers loses archer and cannot gain archer.

card.title: Wells of Deep Memory
card.game_text: At the end of your turn, discard this from play if the fellowship did not move more than once this turn. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may draw a card for each of the following you can spot: Arwen, Celeborn, or Galadriel.

card.title: Alatar
card.subtitle: Final Envoy
card.game_text: Aid - [2]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [2] to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you transfer this to a companion, you may reinforce a [GANDALF] token. While you can spot a [GANDALF] companion, each minion skirmishing bearer is strength -1.

card.title: Dasron
card.subtitle: Merchant from Dorwinion
card.game_text: At the start of the fellowship phase, you may remove 2 Free Peoples culture tokens to take a [GANDALF] event into hand from your discard pile.

card.title: Fear and Great Wonder
card.game_text: When you play this, add a [GANDALF] token here. Maneuver: Discard this from play or remove a token from here to spot a [GANDALF] companion. That companion gains muster until end of turn.

card.title: The Flame of Anor
card.game_text: Spell. Spot 3 [GANDALF] companions to make a minion skirmishing a companion strength -3.

card.title: For a While Less Dark
card.game_text: Spell. Make a [GANDALF] companion strength +2 (or +4 if that companion bears a follower).

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Bearer of Obligation
card.game_text: While Gandalf is the Ring-bearer, each time the fellowship moves, add 3 burdens unless you spot 2 other companions and discard 2 [GANDALF] cards from hand.

card.title: Look to My Coming
card.game_text: You may remove from the game 4 other [GANDALF] cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Spot Gandalf to make your [GANDALF] companion strength +3.

card.title: No Colour Now
card.game_text: Discard your [GANDALF] condition from play to discard a condition from play and draw a card.

card.title: The Palantir of Orthanc
card.subtitle: Recovered Seeing Stone
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. To play this, if you can spot The Palantir of Orthanc, discard it. At the start of the fellowship phase, you may add a burden to reveal a Shadow player's hand. He or she must choose a revealed minion and discard it from hand.

card.title: Pallando
card.subtitle: Far-travelling One
card.game_text: Aid - [2]. Each time you transfer this to a companion, except a [GANDALF] companion, exert bearer twice. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may discard a condition from play.

card.title: Radagast
card.subtitle: Tender of Beasts
card.game_text: Aid - [2]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [2] to transfer this to a companion.) While you can spot 2 [GANDALF] companions, minions skirmishing bearer do not gain strength bonuses from possessions.

card.title: Return to Us
card.game_text: Discard 2 Shadow cards from hand to take a [GANDALF] event into hand from your discard pile.

card.title: Shadowfax
card.subtitle: Roaring Wind
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Wizard. When you play Shadowfax, you may reinforce a [GANDALF] token. Skirmish: Remove 2 [GANDALF] tokens to wound a minion skirmishing bearer.

card.title: Strange Meeting
card.game_text: Each companion bearing a follower gains muster (and is strength +1 if that companion is a [GANDALF] companion).

card.title: Traveler's Homestead
card.game_text: To play, spot a Wizard. When you play this, add X [GANDALF] tokens here, where X is the current region number. Maneuver: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to discard a Shadow condition from play.

card.title: Vapour and Steam
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert your [GANDALF] companion and add a burden to make that companion damage +1.

card.title: Chasm's Edge
card.game_text: Gollum is strength +1 for each Ring-bound companion you can spot.

card.title: Cunningly Hidden
card.game_text: You may remove from the game 4 [GOLLUM] cards in your discard pile instead of paying the twilight cost for this card. Spot Gollum to make a minion strength +2.

card.title: Deagol
card.subtitle: Fateful Finder
card.game_text: To play, spot Smeagol. Aid - Add a burden. Skirmish: If bearer is not assigned to a skirmish, discard this from play to play an artifact or possession from your draw deck on bearer.

card.title: Deagol
card.subtitle: Fateful Finder
card.game_text: To play, spot Smeagol. Aid - Add a burden. Skirmish: If bearer is not assigned to a skirmish, discard this from play an artifact or possession from your draw deck on bearer.

card.title: Duality
card.game_text: Spot Smeagol to choose a Shadow player who must discard a Shadow card from hand or remove [2].

card.title: Fishing Boat
card.game_text: Bearer must be Smeagol. When you play Fishing Boat, you may reinforce a [GOLLUM] token. Each time Smeagol is about to be overwhelmed in a skirmish, you may remove 2 [GOLLUM] tokens to make him strength +2 until the end of that skirmish.

card.title: Gladden Homestead
card.game_text: To play, spot Smeagol. When you play this, add a [GOLLUM] token here for each [GOLLUM] card you can spot. Maneuver: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to spot a Shadow condition and place that condition on top of its owner's draw deck.

card.title: Gollum
card.subtitle: Her Sneak
card.game_text: While a card titled Deagol is removed from the game, Gollum is strength +2 and fierce. Shadow: Remove a card titled Deagol in your discard pile from the game to play this minion from your discard pile.

card.title: It's My Birthday
card.game_text: Make Gollum strength +2 (or +4 if you can spot Smeagol or Deagol).

card.title: Little Snuffler
card.game_text: If the fellowship is in region 1, spot Gollum to wound a companion. If the fellowship is in region 2, spot Gollum to exert a companion. If the fellowship is in region 3, play a [GOLLUM] minion from your discard pile.

card.title: Naked Waste
card.game_text: You may remove from the game 4 other [GOLLUM] cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Spot Smeagol to make a Ring-bound companion strength +3.

card.title: Out of All Knowledge
card.game_text: Spot Smeagol or exert Gollum to make Smeagol strength +2 and you may reinforce a [GOLLUM] token.

card.title: Smeagol
card.subtitle: Simple Stoor
card.game_text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. For each card titled Deagol in your discard pile, Smeagol is strength +2 and resistance -1. Each time Smeagol wins a skirmish, you may take a [GOLLUM] card from your draw deck and place it in your discard pile.

card.title: Softly Up Behind
card.game_text: Spot Smeagol and discard 2 [GOLLUM] cards from hand to return a minion with strength 6 or less to its owner's hand. While this is in your discard pile, Smeagol gains muster.

card.title: Trap Is Sprung
card.game_text: To play, discard Gollum from play. Heal the Ring-bearer to add a burden. If the fellowship is not in region 1, you may repeat this for each other wound on the Ring-bearer.

card.title: Wild Light of Madness
card.game_text: Spot Gollum to make the Free Peoples player choose to either add a burden or exert a companion.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Isildur's Heir
card.game_text: Aragorn is strength +1 for each [GONDOR] card that has a culture token on it. At the start of each assignment phase, you may exert Aragorn to make an unbound companion that has resistance 7 or more defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Away on the Wind
card.game_text: Response: If Faramir is about to take a wound, discard this condition from play and place Boromir or Denethor in the dead pile from play to prevent that and heal Faramir twice.

card.title: Banners Blowing
card.game_text: You may remove from the game 4 other [GONDOR] cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Make your [GONDOR] Man strength +3.

card.title: Boromir
card.subtitle: Doomed Heir
card.game_text: Boromir is resistance -1 for each lurker minion you can spot. Skirmish: Exert Boromir to make him strength +1 for each possession he bears.

card.title: Brego
card.subtitle: Loyal Steed
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] companion. When you play Brego, you may reinforce a [GONDOR] token. Maneuver: Exert bearer and remove 2 [GONDOR] tokens to wound a minion.

card.title: Denethor
card.subtitle: Last Ruling Steward
card.game_text: Denethor is resistance +1 for each [GONDOR] possession in your discard pile. Maneuver: Spot a [GONDOR] possession borne by a companion and remove that possession from the game to exert a minion twice.

card.title: Elendil
card.subtitle: High-King of Gondor
card.game_text: Knight. To play, spot 2 [GONDOR] knights or exert 2 [GONDOR] Men. Each of your [GONDOR] companions is resistance +1. Maneuver: Remove a [GONDOR] token to make an unbound companion resistance +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Faramir
card.subtitle: Prince of Ithilien
card.game_text: While you can spot Boromir, Faramir is twilight cost -1. While you can spot Denethor, Faramir is twilight cost -1. While Faramir bears a [GONDOR] possession, he is defender +1.

card.title: Guard of the White Tree
card.game_text: Knight. Skirmish: Discard a [GONDOR] condition from your support area to make this companion strength +2.

card.title: Guarded City
card.game_text: Spot a [GONDOR] companion to reinforce a [GONDOR] token for each possession borne by that companion.

card.title: Heirs of Gondor
card.game_text: When you play this, add a [GONDOR] token here. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove a token from here to make a [GONDOR] companion bearing a hand weapon strength +2.

card.title: Hope Renewed
card.game_text: Discard a [GONDOR] possession from play to discard a possession from play and you may reinforce a [GONDOR] token.

card.title: Isildur
card.subtitle: Heir of Elendil
card.game_text: Knight. Isildur is resistance +1 for each card in your hand. At the end of any phase, if Isildur has resistance 0, place him in your dead pile. Each time you reconcile, you may draw a card.

card.title: Kings' Legacy
card.game_text: Each time Elendil wins a skirmish, make a [GONDOR] or [ELVEN] companion strength +2 until the start of the regroup phase. Each time Isildur wins a skirmish, heal a Man. Each time Aragorn wins a skirmish, make a [GONDOR] Man damage +1 until the start of the regroup phase.

card.title: Kingsfoil
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Fellowship: Discard this possession from play to heal a companion and, if that companion is a [SHIRE] companion, you may discard a condition he or she bears.

card.title: Rally the Company
card.game_text: Make a [GONDOR] companion strength +2 (or +4 if that companion has resistance 6 or more).

card.title: Stewards' Legacy
card.game_text: Each time Denethor exerts, he gains muster until the end of the regroup phase. Each time Boromir exerts, you may exert a minion. Each time Faramir exerts, you may spot a minion to prevent it from using special abilites until the regroup phase.

card.title: Storied Homestead
card.game_text: When you play this, add a [GONDOR] token here for each [GONDOR] companion who has resistance 7 or more. Response: If a minion's special ability is used, discard this condition or remove 2 [GONDOR] tokens from here to cancel its effect.

card.title: Tradesman From Lebennin
card.game_text: At the start of each fellowship phase, you may add [2] to reinforce a [GONDOR] token.

card.title: Alatar Deceived
card.game_text: Each time a Wizard wins a skirmish, this condition becomes a fierce, damage +1 Wizard minion until the start of the regroup phase that has 11 strength and 1 vitality, and cannot take wounds or bear other cards. This card is still a condition.

card.title: Pallando Deceived
card.game_text: At the start of the maneuver phase, you may exert a Wizard to make this condition a fierce Wizard minion until the start of the regroup phase that has 10 strength and 1 vitality, and cannot take wounds or bear other cards. This card is still a condition.

card.title: Radagast Deceived
card.game_text: Each time a Wizard heals, this condition becomes a fierce Wizard minion until the start of the regroup phase that has 12 strength and 1 vitality, and cannot take wounds or bear other cards. This card is still a condition.

card.title: Staff of Saruman
card.subtitle: Fallen Istar's Stave
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Wizard. Regroup: If Saruman is the only minion you can spot, discard this artifact from play to return him to your hand.

card.title: Bring Down the Wall
card.game_text: Spot a companion to make a [MEN] minion strength +1 for each wound on that companion.

card.title: Caravan From the South
card.game_text: To play, spot a [MEN] minion. When you play this, if you spot a plains site on the adventure path, reinforce 3 [MEN] tokens. Each time the Free Peoples player plays the fellowship's next site, you may discard a possession from play.

card.title: Corsair Champion
card.game_text: Each time a Free Peoples possession is played, you may spot a [MEN] card and reveal this minion from hand to make the Free Peoples player exert a companion. While each companion is wounded, this minion is fierce.

card.title: Cruel Dunlending
card.game_text: Skirmish: If this minion is not assigned to a skirmish, you may exert him to make another [MEN] minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Desert Wind
card.game_text: To play, spot a [MEN] minion. While you can spot 5 or more culture tokens, the minion archery total is +2.

card.title: Driven From the Plains
card.lore: ;Skirmish: Discard this condition from play to make a [MEN] minion damage +1 for each of the following that is true: it is at a plains site
card.game_text: it is bearing a possession

card.title: Dunlending Patriarch
card.game_text: When you play this, you may spot another [MEN] minion to make this minion twilight cost -1 for each wound on the Ring-bearer. While each companion is wounded, this minion is fierce.

card.title: Dunlending Trapper
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved before any others.) To play, spot a [MEN] minion. Assignment: Discard a [MEN] card from your hand to assign this minion to an unbound companion.

card.title: Easterling Runner
card.game_text: Shadow: Exert this minion, spot another [MEN] minion, and remove a culture token to reinforce a [MEN] token.

card.title: Fires Brightly Burning
card.game_text: You may remove from the game 4 [MEN] cards in your discard pile instead of paying the twilight cost for this card. Make your [MEN] minion strength +2.

card.title: Grima
card.subtitle: Footman of Saruman
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time a Free Peoples character is killed, you may spot another [MEN] minion to exert each companion.

card.title: Harmless
card.game_text: Response: If a companion loses a skirmish involving a [MEN] minion, transfer this condition from your support area to that companion. Limit 1 per companion. Minions cannot take wounds during skirmishes involving bearer.

card.title: Howdah
card.game_text: When you play this, add a [MEN] token here for each [MEN] archer you spot. At the start of the archery phase, you may discard this condition from play or remove 2 tokens from here to make the minion archery total +1.

card.title: Lying in Wait
card.game_text: Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to your [MEN] minion. (Limit 1 per bearer.) Bearer is strength +1 for each other [MEN] minion you can spot. Each time a [MEN] minion wins a skirmish, make bearer strength +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Merciless Dunlending
card.game_text: While you can spot another [MEN] minion, this minion is strength +2 for each companion assigned to a skirmish.

card.title: Pirate Cutthroat
card.game_text: To play, spot a [MEN] card in your support area. Shadow: Exert this minion and spot a Free Peoples condition to reinforce a [MEN] token for each card you spot that has the same card title as that condition.

card.title: Southron Murderer
card.game_text: Archer. While you can spot 4 or more culture tokens, this minion cannot take wounds except during skirmishes.

card.title: Stragglers
card.game_text: When you play this, add a [MEN] token here. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove a token from here to make a [MEN] minion strength +2 for each [MEN] minion not assigned to a skirmish.

card.title: Vicious Dunlending
card.game_text: Skirmish: If this minion is not assigned to a skirmish, you may exert him to make another [MEN] minion damage +1.

card.title: Voice of the Desert
card.subtitle: Southron Troop
card.game_text: To play, spot a [MEN] minion. While the fellowship is in region 1, each [MEN] minion cannot take wounds. While the fellowship is in region 2, each [MEN] minion is an archer. While the fellowship is in region 3, each [MEN] minion is fierce.

card.title: Worn Battleaxe
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. While you can spot a culture token, bearer is strength +1 for each companion assigned to a skirmish.

card.title: Always Threatening
card.game_text: When you play this, you may add an [ORC] token here for each [ORC] condition you can spot. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to make a lurker minion strength +2.

card.title: Chamber Patrol
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ORC] minion. While the fellowship is in region 1, [ORC] Orcs cannot take wounds. While the fellowship is in region 2, the current site gains underground. While the fellowship is in region 3, each [ORC] Orc is strength +2.

card.title: Defiled
card.game_text: You may remove from the game 4 [ORC] cards in your discard pile instead of paying the twilight cost for this card. Make your [ORC] lurker minion strength +2.

card.title: Enemy Upon Enemy
card.game_text: Regroup: Spot an [ORC] lurker minion to stack that minion here. Shadow: Remove a burden to play a lurker minion stacked here as if from hand. That minion is twilight cost -3.

card.title: Expendable Servants
card.game_text: If you can spot more [ORC] conditions than [ORC] minions, you may discard your [ORC] condition from play to play an [ORC] minion from your discard pile.

card.title: Forced March
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [ORC] minions. Regroup: Make the Free Peoples player spot another [ORC] condition, discard it from play, and remove [3] to make the Free Peoples player choose to move again this turn (if the move limit allows). Discard this condition.

card.title: Howling Orc
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved before any others.) Each time an [ORC] minion is killed in a skirmish, you may make this minion strength +2 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Isengard Informant
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert this minion to play an [ORC] Troll from your discard pile.

card.title: Massing Strength
card.game_text: Discard any number of your [ORC] minions from play to make an [ORC] minion strength +3 for each one discarded.

card.title: Orc Crusher
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ORC] Orc. This minion is twilight cost -1 for each burden. Each time a Ring-bound companion loses a skirmish involving an [ORC] minion, you may reveal this card from hand to add a burden.

card.title: Orc Crusher
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ORC] Orc. This minion is twilight cost -1 for each burden. Each time a Ring-bound companion loses a skirmish involving an [ORC] minion, you may reveal this card from hand to add a burden.

card.title: Orc Line-breaker
card.game_text: At the end of each skirmish involving this minion, if you can spot a Free Peoples culture token, this minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Orc Plains Runner
card.game_text: Regroup: Discard this minion from play (or exert this minion if the fellowship's next site is an underground site) and spot another [ORC] minion to return that minion to your hand.

card.title: Orc Raid Commander
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ORC] card in your support area. When you play this, spot a Free Peoples condition to discard from play each other card that has the same card title as that condition.

card.title: Orc Reaper
card.game_text: While you can spot a Free Peoples culture token, each minion that has the title Orc Reaper is strength +2.

card.title: Ordnance Grunt
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot an [ORC] minion. Shadow: Discard an [ORC] condition from play to play this minion from your discard pile.

card.title: Picket Denizen
card.game_text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Response: If another [ORC] minion is about to take a wound, exert this minion to prevent that.

card.title: Underdeeps Denizen
card.game_text: While this minion is at an underground site, it cannot take wounds.

card.title: Unforgiving Depths
card.game_text: While you can spot 3 underground sites, each [ORC] Orc gains muster. Shadow: Discard this condition from play and spot an [ORC] minion to replace the fellowship's current site with an underground site from your adventure deck.

card.title: Whatever Means
card.game_text: Make an [ORC] Orc strength +2 (or +6 if you remove 2 burdens).

card.title: Bitter Tidings
card.game_text: If Theoden is about to take a wound in a skirmish, you may discard from play Eomer or Theodred to prevent that. If Theodred is about to take a wound in a skirmish, you may discard from play Eomer or Eowyn to prevent that.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Heir to Meduseld
card.game_text: While Eomer bears a mount, he is damage +1. While no other companion is assigned to a skirmish, Eomer is strength +1 for each other [ROHAN] companion you can spot.

card.title: Eowyn
card.subtitle: Restless Warrior
card.game_text: Each possession you play on Eowyn during the fellowship phase is twilight cost -1. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may reinforce a [ROHAN] token (or reinforce 2 [ROHAN] tokens if you can spot Eomer or Theoden).

card.title: Ferthu Theoden Hal
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [ROHAN] Men. Unless you can spot a companion who has resistance 3 or less, discard a possession from play.

card.title: Firefoot
card.subtitle: Mearas of the Mark
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. When you play Firefoot, you may reinforce a [ROHAN] token. At the start of the maneuver phase, if bearer is Eomer, you may remove 2 [ROHAN] tokens to make him defender +1 and strength +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Freely Across Our Land
card.game_text: When you play this, add a [ROHAN] token here. Regroup: Discard this from play or remove a token from here to play a [ROHAN] possession from your discard pile on your [ROHAN] companion.

card.title: Hama
card.subtitle: Captain of the King's Guard
card.game_text: Hama is strength +1 for each Shadow possession you can spot. Each time Hama wins a skirmish, you may discard a possession from play.

card.title: Hamstrung
card.game_text: Make a [ROHAN] companion strength +2 (or +5 if the fellowship has moved twice this turn).

card.title: Hurried Barrows
card.game_text: You may remove from the game 4 other [ROHAN] cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Make your mounted [ROHAN] companion strength +3.

card.title: King's Board
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert Eomer to make Eowyn or Theoden strength +2. Skirmish: Exert Eowyn to make Eomer or Theoden strength +2. Skirmish: Exert Theoden to make Eomer or Eowyn strength +2.

card.title: Merchant of Westfold
card.game_text: Each time the fellowship moves, you may add [1] and remove a Free Peoples culture token to reinforce a [ROHAN] token.

card.title: Riddermark Tactician
card.game_text: When you play this, you may reinforce a [ROHAN] token. Each time a Shadow player replaces the fellowship's current site, you may spot another [ROHAN] Man to make, until the regroup phase, the fellowship archery total +2 and the minion archery total -2.

card.title: Ride With Me
card.game_text: Make your [ROHAN] companion strength +2 (or exert Theoden to make that companion strength +5 and damage +1 instead.)

card.title: Rider's Bow
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. If bearer is mounted, he or she is strength +1. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may choose a Shadow player who must wound one of his or her minions.

card.title: Snowmane
card.subtitle: Noble Mearas
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. When you play Snowmane, you may reinforce a [ROHAN] token. Skirmish: If bearer is Theoden, you may remove 2 [ROHAN] tokens to exhaust a minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Theoden
card.subtitle: The Renowned
card.game_text: While you can spot Eowyn, Theoden is defender +1. While you can spot Eomer, Theoden is damage +1. While you can spot Theodred, the move limit is +1.

card.title: Theoden
card.subtitle: The Renowned
card.game_text: While you can spot Eowyn, Theoden is Defender +1. While you can spot Eomer, Theoden is damage +1. While you can spot Theodred, the move limit is +1.

card.title: Theodred
card.subtitle: Second Marshal of the Mark
card.game_text: While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man who has resistance of 7 or more, Theodred is twilight cost -1. At the start of each skirmish involving Theodred, you may exert each minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Wind-swept Homestead
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [ROHAN] companions. When you play this, add a [ROHAN] token here for each plains site and each battleground site on the adventure path. At the start of each regroup phase, add a [ROHAN] token here for each of your companions that has muster.

card.title: Sauron
card.subtitle: Dark Lord of Mordor
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. When you play Sauron, you may exert any number of minions. For each minion you exert, Sauron is twilight cost -X, where X is the current region number.

card.title: Sceptre of the Dark Lord
card.game_text: Bearer must be Sauron. He is damage +1. Each time Sauron wins a skirmish and the companion he is skirmishing is not killed, you may assign X wounds to other companions, where X is the current region number.

card.title: Bilbo
card.subtitle: Aged Ring-bearer
card.game_text: Ring-bound. While Bilbo is not assigned to a skirmish, each Ring-bound Hobbit is strength +1. At the start of each skirmish involving Bilbo, you may remove a burden for each other Ring-bound Hobbit you can spot.

card.title: Bill the Pony
card.subtitle: Dearly-loved
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Ring-bound Hobbit. When you play Bill the Pony, you may reinforce a [SHIRE] token. Regroup: Spot 2 minions and remove 2 [SHIRE] tokens to make a Shadow player discard a minion from play.

card.title: Daddy Twofoot
card.subtitle: Next-door Neighbor
card.game_text: Aid - Add a burden. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a burden to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you transfer this to a companion, you may take a [SHIRE] event into hand from your discard pile.

card.title: Don't Let Go
card.lore: ;Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a Hobbit strength +1 for each of the following that is true: he or she is participating in a fierce skirmish
card.game_text: he or she has resistance 7 or more

card.title: Everything but My Bones
card.game_text: You may remove from the game 4 other [SHIRE] cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Make your Hobbit at a dwelling or forest site strength +3.

card.title: Faith in Friendship
card.game_text: When you play this, add a [SHIRE] token here. At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard this from play or remove a token from here to heal a [SHIRE] companion.

card.title: Fates Entwined
card.game_text: Each time a Hobbit wins a skirmish, you may heal another Hobbit once (or heal another Hobbit twice if the Hobbit that won the skirmish was Frodo or Bilbo).

card.title: Frodo
card.subtitle: Frenzied Fighter
card.notes: This version of Frodo cannot become the Ring-bearer.
card.game_text: Ring-bound. While you can spot more minions than companions, Frodo cannot be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled. Skirmish: If Frodo is not assigned to a skirmish, exert Frodo to have him replace a Ring-bound companion skirmishing a minion.

card.title: Frodo Gamgee
card.subtitle: Son of Samwise
card.game_text: Aid - Add 2 burdens. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add 2 burdens to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a Ring-bound Hobbit. Bearer is strength +1 for each Ring-bound Hobbit you can spot.

card.title: The Gaffer
card.subtitle: Master Gardener
card.game_text: Aid - Add a burden. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a burden to transfer this to a companion.) When you transfer The Gaffer to a [SHIRE] companion, heal bearer (or heal bearer twice if he or she is at a dwelling site.)

card.title: Humble Homestead
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. When you play this, add a [SHIRE] token here for each forest site and each dwelling site on the adventure path. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove 3 tokens from here to cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit.

card.title: Mithril-coat
card.subtitle: Dwarf-mail
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Ring-bound Hobbit. Each minion skirmishing bearer loses all damage bonuses. Skirmish: Exert bearer to make each minion he is skirmishing lose fierce and unable to gain fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: New Chapter
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Each time you play a follower, you may heal a companion (or heal Sam twice).

card.title: Phial of Galadriel
card.subtitle: The Light of Earendil
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Ring-bound Hobbit. While bearer is in region 1, bearer gains muster. While bearer is in region 2, each of your [SHIRE] companions gains muster. While bearer is in region 3, each character gains muster.

card.title: Sam
card.subtitle: Bearer of Great Need
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Sam is resistance +1 for each Hobbit you can spot. Regroup: Exert Sam and transfer a follower he is bearing to your support area to discard a minion from play.

card.title: Sam
card.subtitle: Bearer of Great Need
card.game_text: Ring-bound. Sam is resistance +1 for each Hobbit you can spot. Regroup: Exert Sam and transfer a follower her is bearing to your support area to discard a minion from play.

card.title: Westfarthing Businessman
card.game_text: This companion is strength +1 for each [SHIRE] card that has a culture token on it.

card.title: Assault Commander
card.game_text: Damage +1. Shadow: Exert this minion and spot a Free Peoples condition to make an unbound companion resistance -1 for each card that has the same card title as that condition.

card.title: Assault Denizen
card.game_text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each Free Peoples culture token you can spot.

card.title: Cavern Denizen
card.game_text: Damage +1. While you can spot a Free Peoples culture token, this minion cannot take wounds except during skirmishes.

card.title: Endless Assault
card.lore: ;Skirmish: Discard this condition to make an [URUK-HAI] minion strength +1 for each of the following that is true: it is at a battleground site
card.game_text: it is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 4 or less

card.title: Enemy Without Number
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [URUK-HAI] minions. Shadow: Discard 2 cards from hand to add [1]. Regroup: Spot an [URUK-HAI] minion and discard this condition from play to add [3].

card.title: Entranced Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Possessions borne by this minion cannot be discarded by Free Peoples cards.

card.title: Fearless Approach
card.game_text: To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion. When you play this, if you spot a battleground site on the adventure path, reinforce 3 [URUK-HAI] tokens. Each time the Free Peoples player plays the fellowship's next site, you may discard a condition from play.

card.title: Isengard Infiltrator
card.game_text: Damage +1. While the fellowship is at a forest site, the fellowship archery total is -1. Each [ELVEN] companion skirmishing this minion is strength -2.

card.title: New Enemy
card.game_text: You may remove from the game 4 [URUK-HAI] cards in your discard pile instead of paying the twilight cost for this card. Make your [URUK-HAI] minion skirmishing a companion with resistance 4 or less strength +2.

card.title: Signs of War
card.game_text: While you can spot 3 [URUK-HAI] lurker minions, at the start of each skirmish involving an [URUK-HAI] lurker minion, each companion skirmishing that minion must exert.

card.title: Uruk Aggressor
card.game_text: Damage +1. When you play this, you may spot a companion who has resistance 0 to make this minion twilight cost -2.

card.title: Uruk Blitz
card.game_text: To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion. While the fellowship is in region 1, each Uruk-hai is damage +1. While the fellowship is in region 2, each companion is strength -1. While the fellowship is in region 3, each unbound companion is resistance -2.

card.title: Uruk Distractor
card.game_text: Damage +1. Skirmish: If this minion is not assigned to a skirmish, you may exert it to discard a possession borne by a companion skirmishing another [URUK-HAI] minion.

card.title: Uruk Invader
card.game_text: Damage +1. This minion is twilight cost -1 for each companion who has resistance 2 or less.

card.title: Uruk Outrider
card.game_text: This minion is damage +1 for each character in the dead pile.

card.title: Uruk Reserve
card.game_text: Damage +1. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time your [URUK-HAI] minion is about to be killed in a skirmish, you may place that minion on the bottom of your draw deck instead.

card.title: Uruk Rogue
card.game_text: Damage +1. Skirmish: If no other minions are assigned to a skirmish, you may exert this minion twice to make it fierce and strength +4 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Uruk Rogue
card.game_text: Damage +1. Skirmish: If no other minions are assigned to a skirmish, exert this minion twice to make it Fierce and strength +4 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Uruk Tactician
card.game_text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make a companion skirmishing an [URUK-HAI] lurker minion strength -2.

card.title: War Machine
card.game_text: Exert your [URUK-HAI] lurker minion to play an [URUK-HAI] hand weapon from your discard pile on your [URUK-HAI] minion.

card.title: Weapons of Control
card.game_text: When you play this, add an [URUK-HAI] token here for each wounded companion. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to make a companion skirmishing an [URUK-HAI] minion strength -1.

card.title: Dark Fell About Him
card.game_text: To play, exert your Nazgul twice and spot an exhausted companion. Heal that companion to add a burden. If the fellowship is not in region 1, you may repeat this for each other wound on that companion.

card.title: From Hideous Eyrie
card.game_text: You may remove from the game 4 [WRAITH] cards in your discard pile instead of paying the twilight cost for this card. Make your Nazgul in a fierce skirmish strength +2.

card.title: Shadow in the East
card.game_text: Toil 1. (For each [WRAITH] character you exert when playing this, it is twilight cost -1.) To play, spot a [WRAITH] card in your support area. Spot a companion to draw a card for each wound on that companion (and draw an additional card if you can spot a Nazgul).

card.title: They Came From Mordor
card.game_text: When you play this, you may add a [WRAITH] token here for each [WRAITH] card in your support area. Shadow: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to play a [WRAITH] mount from your draw deck on your [WRAITH] minion.

card.title: Ulaire Enquea
card.subtitle: Sixth of the Nine Riders
card.game_text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Enquea, if you can spot 2 other Nazgul, you may exert 2 unbound companions (or exert each companion if you can spot 6 companions).

card.title: Ulaire Lemenya
card.subtitle: Servant of the Shadow
card.game_text: Fierce. Shadow: Exert Ulaire Lemenya and discard a Nazgul from your hand to discard a condition from play.

card.title: Ulaire Nertea
card.subtitle: Servant of the Shadow
card.game_text: Fierce. While you can spot a companion who has resistance 3 or less, Ulaire Nertea is twilight cost -2.

card.title: Abandoned Mine Shaft
card.game_text: Underground. If this site is not in region 1 when the fellowship moves from here during the regroup phase, add a burden.

card.title: Caves of Aglarond
card.game_text: Underground. When the fellowship moves to this site during the regroup phase, the Free Peoples player may remove 2 burdens.

card.title: City of Kings
card.game_text: Battleground. When the fellowship moves to this site during the regroup phase, the Free Peoples player may draw a card.

card.title: Courtyard Parapet
card.game_text: Dwelling. When the fellowship moves to this site, the first Shadow player may discard 2 cards from hand to add a burden.

card.title: Crossroads of the Fallen Kings
card.game_text: Forest. When the fellowship moves to this site during the regroup phase, the Free Peoples player may heal a companion of each culture.

card.title: Doors of Durin
card.game_text: Marsh. Each companion of a race that has the most companions is strength -1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Fords of Isen
card.game_text: River. Each character is strength +1 for each card borne by that character.

card.title: The Great Gates
card.game_text: Battleground. While a player can spot more companions than minions, each minion is strength +1.

card.title: Isenwash
card.game_text: Battleground. Plains. At the start of the regroup phase, each Shadow player may exert a minion to exert a companion.

card.title: Redhorn Pass
card.game_text: Mountain. Culture tokens cannot be added, removed, or reinforced.

card.title: Celeborn
card.subtitle: The Wise
card.game_text: While the fellowship is at a forest site, each Elf who has resistance 7 or more gains muster. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may take an [ELVEN] event into hand from your discard pile.

card.title: Galadriel
card.subtitle: Sorceress of the Hidden Land
card.notes: Legends Series.When you reveal cards from the top of your deck, you reveal one for each forest on theadventure path. For example: if you have three forests, you would reveal the topt hree cards of your draw deck.
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may reveal a card from the top of your draw deck for each forest on the adventure path to heal an Elf for each [ELVEN] card revealed.

card.subtitle: of the Grey Company

card.subtitle: Bearer of Obligation
card.game_text: While Gandalf is the Ring-bearer, each time the fellowship moves, add 3 burdens unless you spot 2 other companions and discard 2 [GANDALF] cards from hand.

card.game_text: Aid - [2]. Each time you transfer this to a companion, except a [GANDALF] companion, exert bearer twice. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may discard a condition from play.

card.game_text: To play, spot Smeagol. Aid - Add a burden. Skirmish: If bearer is not assigned to a skirmish, discard this from play to play an artifact or possession from your draw deck on bearer.

card.subtitle: Southron Troop

card.title: Chamber Patrol

card.game_text: While you can spot Eowyn, Theoden is Defender +1. While you can spot Eomer, Theoden is damage +1. While you can spot Theodred, the move limit is +1.

card.title: Dain Ironfoot
card.subtitle: King Under the Mountain
card.game_text: Each of your other Dwarves and [GANDALF] Men is twilight cost -1. At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a [DWARVEN] or [GANDALF] condition from play to discard a minion from play.

card.title: Elladan
card.subtitle: Son of Elrond
card.game_text: Elrohir is twilight cost -2. Each time you play an [ELVEN] event during a skirmish involving Elladan or Elrohir, that event is twilight cost -2.

card.title: Elrohir
card.subtitle: Son of Elrond
card.game_text: Elladan is twilight cost -2. Each time you play an [ELVEN] event during a skirmish involving Elrohir or Elladan, each minion in that skirmish is strength -2.

card.title: Gildor Inglorion
card.subtitle: of the House of Finrod
card.game_text: At the start of each archery phase, if you can spot more minions than companions, each of your companions is an archer.

card.title: Brand
card.subtitle: King of Dale
card.game_text: Each of your Dwarves and other [GANDALF] Men is strength +1. While you can spot more minions than companions, the fellowship archery total is +X, where X is the number of minions minus the number of companions.

card.title: Grimbeorn
card.subtitle: Beorning Chieftain
card.game_text: At the start of each turn, heal Grimbeorn. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may exert Grimbeorn twice and discard a minion from hand to make Grimbeorn strength +X until the regroup phase, where X is that minion's strength.

card.title: Duilin
card.subtitle: Ranger from Blackroot Vale
card.game_text: Ranger. While the fellowship is at a forest or river site, Duilin is strength +3.

card.title: Duinhir
card.subtitle: Tall Man of Blackroot Vale
card.game_text: While you can spot a mount, Duinhir is damage +1. Each time Duinhir wins a skirmish, if you can spot more minions than companions, you may exert him to discard a minion that has strength 7 or less.

card.title: Halbarad
card.subtitle: Ranger of the North
card.game_text: Ranger. While the Ring-bearer has resistance 9 or more, Halbarad's twilight cost is -1. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may discard a [GONDOR] card from hand to heal a [GONDOR] companion.

card.title: Furious Hillman
card.game_text: Response: If the Free Peoples player plays an event, spot another [MEN] Man and discard this minion from play to cancel that event.

card.title: Swarming Hillman
card.game_text: At the start of the regroup phase, if you can spot more Man characters than any other race, make the move limit -1 this turn.

card.title: Half-troll of Far Harad
card.game_text: At the start of each assignment phase, if you can spot more companions than minions, you may remove [2] to play an [ORC] Orc from your discard pile.

card.title: Horror of Harad
card.game_text: Ambush [1]. Damage +1. Fierce. Lurker. Muster. Toil 2.

card.title: Uruk-hai Healer
card.game_text: Damage +1. At the start of each assignment phase, you may heal an Uruk-hai for each companion you can spot.

card.title: Uruk-hai Scout
card.game_text: Damage +1. When you play this, choose one of the following keywords: battleground, mountain, plains, or underground. The fellowship's current site gains that keyword until the end of the turn.

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: The Ring of Doom
card.game_text: While wearing The One Ring, the Ring-bearer gains hunter 3, and each time he or she is about to take a wound in a skirmish, add a burden instead. Skirmish: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase.

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: The Ruling Ring
card.game_text: Response: If bearer is about to take a wound in a skirmish, he wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound during a skirmish, add a burden instead.

card.title: Chamber of Records
card.game_text: When you play this, you may spot a Dwarf to place 2 [DWARVEN] tokens here. Fellowship: Discard this from play or remove a [DWARVEN] token from here to reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is a [DWARVEN] card, take it into your hand, otherwise, place it in your discard pile.

card.title: The Fortunes of Balin's Folk
card.game_text: Exert a Dwarf to shuffle a [DWARVEN] condition with one or more [DWARVEN] tokens on it into your draw deck. Wound a minion for each [DWARVEN] token that was on that condition.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Eager Hunter
card.game_text: Damage +1. Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.)

card.title: Gloin
card.subtitle: Son of Groin
card.game_text: Each time Gloin wins a skirmish, you may draw 3 cards, then place 3 cards from your hand beneath your draw deck in any order. Skirmish: Remove a [DWARVEN] token to make Gloin strength +2.

card.title: Heavy Axe
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. This is twilight cost -1 for each [DWARVEN] card that has a culture token on it. Skirmish: Remove a [DWARVEN] token to make bearer strength +1.

card.title: Sturdy Stock
card.game_text: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or if you can spot a hunter minion, strength +1 and damage +1 for each hunter minion you can spot).

card.title: Well-crafted Armor
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Each time bearer takes a wound, you may reinforce a [DWARVEN] token. Skirmish: Discard a [DWARVEN] card from hand to make bearer damage +1.

card.title: Whatever End
card.game_text: Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may make a hunter [GONDOR] companion or hunter [ELVEN] companion damage +1 until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [DWARVEN] companion strength +2.

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: She-Elf
card.game_text: While you can spot Aragorn, Arwen is strength +1 and resistance +2. Skirmish: Remove an [ELVEN] token to make a minion skirmishing Arwen strength -2.

card.title: Dinendal
card.subtitle: Mirkwood Archer
card.game_text: Aid - [3]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [3] to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you transfer this to a companion, except an [ELVEN] companion, exert bearer. Bearer is an archer.

card.title: Elven Bow
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Elf. Bearer is an archer.

card.title: Elven Warrior
card.game_text: While this companion is bearing a possession, he is strength +2. Maneuver: Exert this companion to place an [ELVEN] card from your discard pile on the bottom of your draw deck.

card.title: Focus
card.game_text: Each time Legolas wins a skirmish, you may heal a hunter [DWARVEN] Dwarf or hunter [GONDOR] Man. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make an [ELVEN] Elf strength +2.

card.title: Gift of the Evenstar
card.subtitle: Blessed Light
card.game_text: Each time an Elf wins a skirmish, you may exert that Elf or Aragorn to place an [ELVEN] token here. At the start of each maneuver phase, you may remove an [ELVEN] token here to draw a card.

card.title: Haldir
card.subtitle: Sentry of the Golden Wood
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. While the fellowship is at a battleground site, Haldir is strength +2. While the fellowship is at a forest site, Haldir is an archer.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Fleet-footed Hunter
card.game_text: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Regroup: Exert 2 hunter companions to draw a card.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: of the Woodland Realm
card.game_text: Archer. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Archery: Exert Legolas to make the fellowship archery total +1 for each hunter minion you can spot. (limit +3)

card.title: Lorien's Blessing
card.game_text: Spot an [ELVEN] follower to make the minion archery total -3.

card.title: Mighty Shot
card.game_text: Spot an Elf to make the fellowship archery total +1 for each minion with twilight cost 2 or less that you can spot.

card.title: The Mirror of Galadriel
card.subtitle: Dangerous Guide
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Each time you are about to draw a card, you may exert an Elf to look at the top three cards of your draw deck instead. Take a Free Peoples card into your hand and place the other cards on the bottom of your draw deck.

card.title: Point Blank Range
card.game_text: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +4 if you can spot 3 archers).

card.title: Spied From Afar
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 Elves. While you can spot an [ELVEN] follower, the twilight cost of each Shadow possession is +1. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make an [ELVEN] companion strength +1 for each archer companion you can spot.

card.title: Sword of the Fallen
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Elf. Each minion skirmishing bearer is strength -1 for each wound on that minion. Skirmish: Exert bearer to exert a minion skirmishing bearer.

card.title: Uruviel
card.subtitle: Woodland Maid
card.game_text: Aid - [1]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add[1] to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you transfer this to a companion, you may exert an Elf to make the fellowship's current site a forest until the end of the turn.

card.title: Be Gone!
card.game_text: Spell. Exert your [GANDALF] companion X times to make a minion strength -2 until the regroup phase, for each time that [GANDALF] companion exerted.

card.title: Ent Avenger
card.game_text: While you can spot 3 Ents, this companion is strength +2.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Powerful Guide
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Each time you play a spell, you may add a burden to wound a minion. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, you may draw a card and then discard a card from your hand.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Powerful Guide (H)
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Each time you play a spell, you may add a burden to wound a minion. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, you may draw a card and then discard a card from your hand.

card.title: Leaflock
card.subtitle: Finglas
card.game_text: Leaflock's twilight cost is -1 for each Ent you can spot. While you can spot 4 other Ents, Leaflock is strength +4.

card.title: Mellon!
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [GANDALF] companions. At the start of the maneuver phase, discard this condition to make each player count the number of cards in his or her hand, discard each of them and draw the same number of cards from the top of his or her draw deck.

card.title: Momentous Gathering
card.lore: ;Choose one: spot an Ent to take a [GANDALF] companion into hand from your draw deck
card.game_text: or spot 2 Ents to take a [GANDALF] companion and a [GANDALF] condition into hand from your draw deck. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.title: One Last Surprise
card.game_text: Spell. Spot Gandalf and an unbound companion skirmishing a minion to use Gandalf's resistance to resolve that skirmish instead of that companion's strength.

card.title: Quickbeam
card.subtitle: Hastiest of All Ents
card.game_text: Quickbeam is twilight cost -1 for each Ent you can spot. Maneuver: Discard this companion to place another [GANDALF] companion from your discard pile on the bottom of your draw deck and reinforce a [GANDALF] token.

card.title: Shadow of the Wood
card.game_text: This companion is twilight cost -1 for each [GANDALF] companion you can spot. Fellowship: Place this companion in the dead pile to remove [5].

card.title: Shepherd of the Trees
card.game_text: While you can spot 4 Ents, this companion is strength +3. Maneuver: Exert this companion to reveal the bottom card of your draw deck. If it is a [GANDALF] character, you may play it.

card.title: Skinbark
card.subtitle: Elder Ent
card.game_text: Skinbark is twilight cost -1 for each [GANDALF] condition you can spot. Each time Skinbark wins a skirmish, you may place a [GANDALF] card from your discard pile beneath your draw deck.

card.title: Treebeard
card.subtitle: Enraged Shepherd
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 [GANDALF] companions. Each time Treebeard wins a skirmish, the first Shadow player must exert X minions, where X is the difference between Treebeard's strength and the losing character's strength.

card.title: Called to Mordor
card.game_text: Bearer must be Smeagol. While you can spot 2 Ring-bound Hobbits, each time an opponent uses a skirmish special ability in a skirmish involving Gollum or Smeagol, you may wound a minion.

card.title: Connected by Fate
card.game_text: To play, spot Smeagol. While you can spot 2 Ring-bound Hobbits, each Shadow event is twilight cost +1. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make each Ring-bound companion strength +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Controlled by the Ring
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gollum. Skirmish: If Gollum is not assigned to a skirmish, discard this condition to have him replace a minion skirmishing a companion.

card.title: Desperate Move
card.game_text: Discard a [GOLLUM] minion from play to discard a companion. The Free Peoples player may make the move limit -1 this turn to prevent that.

card.title: Gollum
card.subtitle: Hopeless
card.game_text: At the start of each skirmish involving Gollum, he is strength +X until the end of that skirmish, where X is the Ring-bearer's strength.

card.title: Herbs and Stewed Rabbit
card.game_text: While you can spot Frodo, Smeagol is resistance +1. While you can spot Sam, Smeagol is strength +1. While you can spot Bilbo, Smeagol is damage +1.

card.title: Hurry Hobbitses
card.game_text: Make Smeagol strength +1 for each Ring-bound Hobbit you can spot.

card.title: Nice Fish
card.game_text: Each time Smeagol wins a skirmish, place a [GOLLUM] token here. Regroup: Heal a Ring-bound companion for each token here. Discard this condition.

card.title: Not This Time!
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert Gollum and remove a threat to wound a companion Gollum is skirmishing.

card.title: Release Them
card.game_text: Spot Smeagol to prevent a Ring-bound Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled. While this card is in your discard pile, Smeagol is resistance +1.

card.title: Smeagol
card.subtitle: Wretched and Hungry
card.game_text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each Ring-bound companion is resistance +1. Skirmish: Exert 2 Ring-bound Hobbits to make Smeagol strength +1 and prevent him from being overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled.

card.title: Something Slimy
card.game_text: Spot Smeagol to play a Free Peoples condition from your draw deck. If that condition was a [GOLLUM] condition, you may make an opponent place a random card from his or her hand beneath his or her draw deck. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.title: Sudden Strike
card.game_text: Spot Gollum or Smeagol to play a minion from your draw deck. If that minion is a [GOLLUM] minion, you may also play a Shadow possession or Shadow condition from your draw deck. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.title: Swear By the Precious
card.game_text: Spot Frodo and Smeagol to discard a minion. That minion's owner may make each minion strength -2 until the end of the turn to prevent that.

card.title: Unseen Foe
card.game_text: Discard a [GOLLUM] minion from play to wound each companion with strength 8 or more.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Swift Hunter
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Skirmish: Exert Aragorn to make a hunter companion strength +1.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Thorongil
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) Maneuver: Add a threat to exert a non-hunter minion with strength less than Aragorn's.

card.title: Aragorn's Bow
card.subtitle: Ranger's Longbow
card.game_text: Bearer must be Aragorn. He is an archer. Archery: Add a threat to wound a minion with the lowest strength.

card.title: Damrod
card.subtitle: Dunadan of Gondor
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) At the start of each fellowship phase, you may add [1] to heal a ranger.

card.title: Decorated Barricade
card.game_text: Fortification. This condition is twilight cost -1 for each [GONDOR] ranger you spot. Skirmish: Exert 2 [GONDOR] Men to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man.

card.title: Dunedain of the South
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Each time this companion wins a skirmish, you may make a [GONDOR] ranger strength +2 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Forth the Three Hunters!
card.game_text: Archery: Exert Legolas and exert Aragorn to wound a minion. Skirmish: Exert Aragorn and spot Gimli to make a minion strength -1 (or -3 if Aragorn and Gimli are hunters). Regroup: Exert Gimli and spot Legolas to draw a card (or 2 cards if Gimli and Legolas are hunters).

card.title: Forth the Three Hunters!
card.game_text: Archery: Exert Legolas and exert Aragorn to wound a minion. Skirmish: Exert Aragorn and spot Gimli to make a minion strength -1 (or -3 if Aragorn and Gimli are hunters). Regroup: Exert Gimli and spot Legolas to draw a card (or 2 cards if Gimli and Legolas are hunters).

card.title: Forth the Three Hunters!
card.game_text: Archery: Exert Legolas and exert Aragorn to wound a minion. Skirmish: Exert Aragorn and spot Gimli to make a minion strength -1 (or -3 if Aragorn and Gimli are hunters). Regroup: Exert Gimli and spot Legolas to draw a card (or 2 cards if Gimli and Legolas are hunters).

card.title: Gondorian Prowler
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 1. When this companion is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. Skirmish: Remove a [GONDOR] token or exert a [GONDOR] Man to make the site number of a minion +2.

card.title: Ithilien Blade
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. While you can spot a roaming minion, bearer is strength +1. Maneuver: Exert bearer twice to discard a roaming minion.

card.title: Mablung
card.subtitle: Ranger of Ithilien
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Skirmish: Exert Mablung to wound a roaming minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Madril
card.subtitle: Defender of Osgiliath
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 1. While you can spot 2 [GONDOR] rangers, Madril is twilight cost -2. At the start of the maneuver phase, each minion is site number +1 for each threat you can spot until the start of the regroup phase.

card.title: No Quicker Path
card.game_text: Each time Aragorn wins a skirmish, you may make a hunter [DWARVEN] companion or hunter [ELVEN] companion strength +1 until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [GONDOR] Man strength +2.

card.title: No Travellers In This Land
card.game_text: Exert a [GONDOR] Man to wound a minion (or wound that minion twice if it is a hunter).

card.title: Portico
card.game_text: Fortification. This condition is twilight cost -1 for each [GONDOR] ranger you spot. Skirmish: Exert a [GONDOR] Man or spot 2 rangers to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man.

card.title: Ranger's Cloak
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. While bearer is a ranger or at a forest site, each minion skirmishing bearer is site number +2. Skirmish: Add a threat or exert bearer to make a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man site number +2.

card.title: Silent Traveler
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) At the start of each skirmish involving this companion and a roaming minion, you may reinforce a [GONDOR] token.

card.title: Tremendous Wall
card.game_text: Fortification. Characters skirmishing bearer cannot take wounds from losing a skirmish involving bearer. Skirmish: Exert a [GONDOR] Man or spot 3 rangers to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man.

card.title: Unyielding Ranger
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) This companion is strength +1 for each roaming minion you can spot.

card.title: Bill Ferny
card.subtitle: Agent of Saruman
card.game_text: If Bill Ferny is unwounded, the Free Peoples player cannot assign him to skirmish a companion. Shadow: Exert Bill Ferny twice and spot a site you control to add [2].

card.title: Bold Easterling
card.game_text: Skirmish: If this minion is skirmishing, discard this minion to play a [MEN] minion from your discard pile. That minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Chieftain of Dunland
card.game_text: Fierce. Skirmish: Spot a site you control and remove [2] to make a [MEN] Man strength +2. Skirmish: Spot 2 sites you control and remove [2] to make a [MEN] Man strength +3. Skirmish: Spot 3 sites you control and remove [2] to make a [MEN] Man strength +4.

card.title: Courageous Easterling
card.game_text: Skirmish: If this minion is skirmishing, discard this minion to play a [MEN] minion from your discard pile. That minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Destroyed Homestead
card.game_text: When you play this, spot 2 [MEN] Men to randomly reveal a site from the Free Peoples player's adventure deck. Note its cardtitle. Each site on the adventure path with the same card title as the selected site loses its gametext.

card.title: Easterling Scout
card.game_text: Skirmish: If this minion is skirmishing, discard this minion to play a [MEN] minion from your discard pile. That minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Engrossed Hillman
card.game_text: At the start of the maneuver phase, if you can spot another [MEN] Man and 8 characters (or if you can spot 3 Free Peoples cultures), you may take control of a site.

card.title: Enraged Herdsman
card.game_text: While you can spot more companions than minions, each [MEN] hunter is strength +2 and is an archer.

card.title: Great Axe
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MEN] Man. While bearer is skirmishing a hunter companion, bearer is strength +2.

card.title: Grieving the Fallen
card.game_text: To play, spot a [MEN] Man. Bearer must be a companion. Bearer cannot take wounds during the archery phase. At the start of the regroup phase, discard this condition.

card.title: Grousing Hillman
card.game_text: While you control a site, this minion is strength +3 and fierce.

card.title: Hunting Herdsman
card.game_text: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) This minion is strength +3 for each follower you can spot.

card.title: Last Gasp
card.game_text: Wound 3 [MEN] archers to exhaust a companion.

card.title: Lying Counsel
card.game_text: Exert your [MEN] Man and spot an unbound companion bearing 3 or more cards to return each Free Peoples card that companion bears to its owner's hand. The Free Peoples player may add a burden to discard those cards instead.

card.title: Mumak Commander
card.subtitle: Giant Among the Swertings
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert Mumak Commander twice to exert a companion twice (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Primitive Savage
card.game_text: While you can spot a companion of strength 12 or more, this minion is strength +5. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, if he bears a hand weapon, you may take control of a site.

card.title: Pursuing Horde
card.game_text: To play, spot a [MEN] Man. Bearer must be a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Limit 1 per companion. Each time the fellowship moves, add [1].

card.title: Rapid Reload
card.game_text: While you can spot a [MEN] Man, the Free Peoples player cannot replace a site in the current region. Archery: Spot a [MEN] Man and remove [3] to exert an unbound companion.

card.title: Rapt Hillman
card.game_text: At the start of the regroup phase, the Free People's player may liberate a site. You may spot 3 Men to prevent this. Maneuver: Spot another [MEN] Man and exert this minion to take control of a site.

card.title: Ravaging Wild Man
card.game_text: While you can spot a hunter, this minion gains hunter 1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may exert 2 [MEN] Men to discard a follower.

card.title: Savage Southron
card.game_text: Maneuver: If the Free People's player has at least 1 site in his or her adventure deck, exert 2 [MEN] Men to randomly choose a site from that deck. Replace the fellowship's current site with that site.

card.title: Swarthy Hillman
card.game_text: While you control a site, this minion is an archer.

card.title: Wandering Hillman
card.game_text: To play, spot a [MEN] Man. While you can spot a companion of strength 10 or more, this minion is strength +3. Maneuver: Remove 2 burdens or 2 threats to control a site.

card.title: Battlefield Recruit
card.game_text: Skirmish: Discard this minion to make a minion strength +2.

card.title: Battlefield Veteran
card.game_text: Skirmish: Discard this minion to make a minion strength +1.

card.title: Beasts of Burden
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [ORC] minions. At the start of your Shadow phase, you may discard an [ORC] condition from play to play an [ORC] minion. It is twilight cost -2 (or -4 if you can spot 6 or more companions).

card.title: Black Gate Sentry
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a companion it is skirmishing.

card.title: Black Land Chieftain
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ORC] minion. When you play Black Land Chieftain, you may add a threat for each Free Peoples possession and each Free Peoples artifact you can spot.

card.title: Black Land Commander
card.game_text: While you can spot a companion of strength 12 or more, this minion is strength +5. Skirmish: Remove 2 threats to make a character skirmishing this minion strength -2.

card.title: Black Land Observer
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may spot an [ORC] condition to add a threat. While you can spot a companion of strength 10 or more, this minion is strength +3.

card.title: Black Land Overlord
card.game_text: Maneuver: Remove a threat and spot another [ORC] minion to exert an unbound companion.

card.title: Black Land Runner
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ORC] Orc. While you can spot more sites on the adventure path than minions, this minion is strength +5.

card.title: Black Land Shrieker
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ORC] condition. Black Land Shrieker is twilight cost -1 for each threat you spot.

card.title: Black Land Spy
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may spot an [ORC] possession to add a threat. While you can spot a companion of strength 13 or more, this minion is strength +7.

card.title: Coordinated Effort
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [ORC] minions. Each time the Free Peoples player plays a possession, add [2].

card.title: Desolation Orc
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 Free Peoples cultures or discard 2 [ORC] conditions from play.

card.title: Destructive Orc
card.game_text: When you play Destructive Orc, you may discard a fortification for each [ORC] possession and each [ORC] artifact you can spot.

card.title: Gorbag
card.subtitle: Filthy Rebel
card.game_text: Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.) When you play Gorbag, you may discard a card from the top of the Free Peoples player's deck for each hunter character you can spot.

card.title: Isengard Marauder
card.game_text: To play, discard 3 cards from your hand. While you can spot 2 other [ORC] minions, this minion is fierce.

card.title: Moria Menace
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player shuffle his or her draw deck and reveal the top card of that draw deck. Make this minion strength +X, where X is the twilight cost of the revealed card.

card.title: Mountain-troll
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may discard 5 [ORC] minions from play to make it twilight cost -10 and fierce. Shadow: Remove [3] to play an [ORC] Orc from your discard pile. Its twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Orkish Camp
card.game_text: While you can spot a [ORC] Orc, the Free Peoples player cannot replace the fellowship's current site. Shadow: Exert an [ORC] minion and remove [2] to reveal the bottom card of your draw deck. If it is an [ORC] Orc, take it into hand. Otherwise, discard it.

card.title: Orkish Hunting Spear
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Orc. Bearer gains hunter X (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +X.), where X is the number of Free Peoples cultures you can spot.

card.title: Pummeling Blow
card.game_text: To play, exert an [ORC] minion. Plays on the fellowship's current site. This site cannot be replaced. While the fellowship is at this site, each Troll is strength +1.

card.title: Scouting Orc
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a companion it is skirmishing.

card.title: Tower Troll
card.game_text: For each companion over 5, this minion is damage +1. Assignment: Exert this minion twice to assign it to a companion (except the Ring-bearer). If you cannot spot 6 companions, the Free Peoples player may exert a companion to prevent this.

card.title: Unmistakable Omen
card.game_text: While you can spot a threat, the site number of each [ORC] Orc is -1. Regroup: Remove 3 threats and discard 3 [ORC] Orcs from play to make the Free Peoples player spot a companion and place that companion in the dead pile. Discard this condition.

card.title: Unreasonable Choice
card.game_text: Spot 2 [ORC] minions to discard a Free Peoples condition. The Free Peoples player may add [2] for each Free Peoples condition you can spot to prevent that.

card.title: Veteran War Chief
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a companion it is skirmishing.

card.title: Brilliant Light
card.game_text: Make a [ROHAN] companion strength +2 (or +3 and damage +1 if he or she is a hunter companion).

card.title: Burial Mounds
card.game_text: Make a [ROHAN] companion defender +1 and minions skirmishing that companion cannot take wounds during a skirmish involving that companion until the regroup phase.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Horsemaster
card.game_text: Valiant. Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Skirmish: Discard a [ROHAN] card from hand to make Eomer strength +2.

card.title: Eomer's Spear
card.subtitle: Trusty Weapon
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. If bearer is Eomer and he is unwounded, he is damage +1 and resistance +1. Skirmish: If bearer is Eomer, discard this possession to wound a minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Eowyn
card.subtitle: Willing Fighter
card.game_text: Valiant. Response: If a hunter companion or valiant Man is about to take a wound, exert Eowyn to prevent that wound.

card.title: Gamling
card.subtitle: The Old
card.game_text: Valiant. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) To play, spot a [ROHAN] Man. While you can spot 3 hunters, Gamling is strength +3.

card.title: Grim Trophy
card.game_text: Make a [ROHAN] Man strength +1 for each hunter you can spot (or if you can spot more valiant Men than hunters, make a [ROHAN] Man strength +1 for each valiant Man you can spot).

card.title: Haleth
card.subtitle: Son of Hama
card.game_text: While you can spot 2 mounts, Haleth is strength +2. While you can spot 3 mounts, Haleth is damage +1. While you can spot 4 Free Peoples mounts, those mounts can not be discarded by a Shadow player.

card.title: Horse of Great Stature
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert. Skirmish: Exert bearer to make a [ROHAN] Man strength +1.

card.title: Horseman of the North
card.game_text: While you can spot a valiant Man, this companion's twilight cost is -1. While no opponent controls a site, this companion is strength +2.

card.title: Our Inspiration
card.game_text: Spot a [ROHAN] Man to play a possession from your discard pile for each hunter character you can spot.

card.title: Last Days of My House
card.game_text: Spot 2 [ROHAN] Men (or 1 hunter [ROHAN] Man) to play a [ROHAN] companion or a [ROHAN] follower from your draw deck.

card.title: Rider's Mount
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert.

card.title: Rohan Stable Master
card.game_text: Aid - [1]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [1] to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a [ROHAN] Man. Bearer is considered to be mounted.

card.title: Rohan Worker
card.game_text: Aid - [1]. Each time you transfer this to a companion, except a [ROHAN] companion, exert bearer twice. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may liberate a site.

card.title: Rohirrim Axe
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. While bearer is skirmishing a hunter minion, bearer is damage +1.

card.title: Rohirrim Doorwarden
card.game_text: Aid - [2]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [2] to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a [ROHAN] Man. Bearer is strength +1 for each possession he or she bears.

card.title: Rohirrim Soldier
card.game_text: Valiant. While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, this companion's twilight cost is -1. This companion is strength +1 for each hunter minion you can spot.

card.title: Rohirrim Warrior
card.game_text: Valiant. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may spot a hunter minion (or exert 2 valiant Men) to make this companion defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Spear of the Mark
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. If bearer is mounted, bearer is defender +1.

card.title: Sturdy Shield
