card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. While no opponent controls a site, bearer is strength +1. Regroup: Discard this to liberate a site (or two sites if bearer is mounted).

card.title: Swift Stroke
card.game_text: Spot your [ROHAN] Man bearing a possession to discard all possessions from one character.

card.title: Community Living
card.game_text: Spot a Hobbit to play a [SHIRE] follower from your draw deck.

card.title: Frodo
card.subtitle: Weary From the Journey
card.game_text: Ring-bearer. Ring-bound. While skirmishing a minion of strength 8 or less, Frodo is strength +2.

card.title: Hobbit Sword
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Hobbit.

card.title: Hobbiton Brewer
card.subtitle: Maker of Fine Ales
card.game_text: Aid - Add 2 burdens. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add 2 burdens to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a Hobbit. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, transfer Hobbiton Brewer to your support area to prevent that wound.

card.title: Hobbiton Farmer
card.subtitle: Lover of Pipeweed
card.game_text: Aid - Add a burden. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a burden to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Bearer is strength +1 for each fierce minion you can spot.

card.title: Little Golden Flower
card.game_text: Each Hobbit bearing a hand weapon is vitality +1. Each Hobbit bearing a follower is resistance +1. Each unwounded Hobbit is strength +1.

card.title: Merry
card.subtitle: The Tall One
card.game_text: While Merry bears a follower, he is strength +2. Skirmish: If Merry is skirmishing a hunter minion, add a threat to make Merry strength +2.

card.title: No Visitors
card.game_text: Transfer a follower from a Hobbit to your support area to cancel a skirmish involving that Hobbit.

card.title: Pippin
card.subtitle: The Short One
card.game_text: Each [SHIRE] follower is twilight cost -1. Skirmish: If Pippin is skirmishing a hunter minion, exert the Ring-bearer to make Pippin strength +2.

card.title: Relaxation
card.game_text: Response: If a Shadow card is about to add any number of burdens, discard a [SHIRE] follower and this condition from play to prevent that and discard that Shadow card.

card.title: Sam
card.subtitle: Innocent Traveler
card.game_text: Ring-bound. While Sam bears the One Ring, he is resistance -4. Maneuver: If Sam is bearing a follower, exert him to heal another Hobbit. Response: If Frodo is killed, make Sam the Ring-bearer.

card.title: Second Breakfast
card.game_text: Add a threat and exert your Ring-bearer to wound each non-hunter minion skirmishing your [SHIRE] Ring-bearer.

card.title: Advancing Horde
card.game_text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each site you control.

card.title: Charging Uruk
card.game_text: Fierce. During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it is strength +3 and gains hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.)

card.title: Chasing Uruk
card.game_text: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may spot 4 hunters (or Ugluk) to control a site.

card.title: Covetous Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each possession you spot.

card.title: Defensive Rush
card.game_text: While you can spot an [URUK-HAI] minion, the Free Peoples player cannot replace a site. At the start of each skirmish, you may remove [3] to heal an [URUK-HAI] minion (or heal an [URUK-HAI] minion twice if you control a site.)

card.title: Following Uruk
card.game_text: Fierce. Hunter 1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may exert a companion not assigned to a skirmish.

card.title: Hunting Uruk
card.game_text: While this minion is at a battleground site, he gains hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.)

card.title: Lurtz
card.subtitle: Now Perfected
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time Lurtz wins a skirmish, the Free People's player must exert X companions, where X is the current region number.

card.title: Lurtz's Sword
card.subtitle: Mighty Longsword
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] Uruk-hai. Bearer gains hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) If bearer is Lurtz, he is fierce.

card.title: Mauhur
card.subtitle: Relentless Hunter
card.game_text: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.). Assignment: Exert Mauhur to assign him to a non-hunter character (except the Ring-bearer).

card.title: Merciless Berserker
card.game_text: Damage +1. Shadow: Exert this minion to exert X companions and add X threats, where X is the number of Free Peoples cultures you spot over 2.

card.title: Poised for Assault
card.game_text: Each time a companion loses a skirmish involving an [URUK-HAI] minion, place an [URUK-HAI] token here. Skirmish: Remove 2 [URUK-HAI] tokens from here to take control of a site.

card.title: Pursuing Uruk
card.game_text: Fierce. During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it gains hunter 4.

card.title: Searching Uruk
card.game_text: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Searching Uruk is strength +1 for each other [URUK-HAI] hunter you can spot.

card.title: Seeking Uruk
card.game_text: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it is strength +1 for each hunter you can spot.

card.title: Sentry Uruk
card.game_text: To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion. While you can spot a fierce minion, this minion is fierce. While you can spot a hunter, this minion gains hunter 1. While you can spot a character that is damage +1, this minion is damage +1.

card.title: Tracking Uruk
card.game_text: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.)

card.title: Ugluk
card.subtitle: Ugly Fellow
card.game_text: Fierce. Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.) At the start of each skirmish involving Ugluk, each non-hunter skirmishing Ugluk must exert.

card.title: Ugluk's Sword
card.subtitle: Weapon of Command
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] Uruk-hai. While you control 2 or more sites, bearer can not take wounds (except during skirmish phases). If bearer is Ugluk, he is damage +1.

card.title: Uruk Cavern Striker
card.game_text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Spot a Free Peoples player's site on the adventure path and exert this minion twice to exchange the spotted site with a site you control. You now control the spotted site.

card.title: Uruk Infantry
card.game_text: Damage +1. While you can spot a companion of strength 10 or more, this minion is strength +2. Regroup: Exert 4 [URUK-HAI] minions (or discard 3 [URUK-HAI] minions) to take control of a site.

card.title: Uruk Village Assassin
card.game_text: Damage +1. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may spot another [URUK-HAI] minion and remove 3 [URUK-HAI] tokens to take control of a site or discard a follower.

card.title: Uruk Village Rager
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, take control of a site. While you control a site, this minion cannot take wounds (except during the skirmish phase).

card.title: Uruk Village Stormer
card.game_text: Damage +1. While you can spot a companion of strength 12 or more, this minion is strength +4. Each time a companion or ally is killed during a skirmish involving an [URUK-HAI] minion, you may take control of a site.

card.title: Violent Hurl
card.game_text: Make an [URUK-HAI] minion strength +2 (and damage +1 if that minion is a hunter).

card.title: With All Possible Speed
card.game_text: Each unwounded hunter [URUK-HAI] minion is strength +1. Response: If your hunter minion is about to take a wound during a skirmish, discard that minion to exert a non-hunter companion.

card.title: Later Than You Think
card.game_text: Remove 2 threats to play a Nazgul. That Nazgul is twilight cost -2 and gains hunter 2 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) until the start of the regroup phase.

card.title: A Shadow Fell Over Them
card.game_text: Each time a Nazgul wins a skirmish, you may exert 2 Nazgul (or a Nazgul twice) to add a threat. Assignment: Spot a Nazgul and remove [4] to play a Nazgul from your discard pile.

card.title: They Feel the Precious
card.game_text: Response: If a Nazgul is about to take a wound, remove a threat to prevent that wound.

card.title: Ulaire Attea
card.subtitle: Desirous of Power
card.game_text: Fierce. Ulaire Attea is strength +1 for every 3 twilight tokens you can spot.

card.title: Ulaire Lemenya
card.subtitle: Eternally Threatening
card.game_text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Lemenya, you may remove [1] to add a threat for each Free Peoples culture you can spot.

card.title: Ulaire Nelya
card.subtitle: Fell Rider
card.game_text: Fierce. While you can spot 6 companions, [WRAITH] minions cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases). Skirmish: If this minion is mounted, exert him twice to wound a companion bearing a [WRAITH] condition.

card.title: Anduin River
card.game_text: River. The fellowship archery total is -3.

card.title: Breeding Pit of Isengard
card.game_text: Underground. The twilight cost of the first hunter minion played each shadow phase is -2.

card.title: City Gates
card.game_text: When the Fellowship moves to this site, add a threat (or 2 if you can spot a hunter minion) for each companion over 4.

card.title: East Wall of Rohan
card.game_text: At the start of the Fellowship phase, you may exert two hunter companions to play a hunter companion from your draw deck.

card.title: Gate of Mordor
card.game_text: Battleground. Each time the fellowship moves to this site add [1] for each culture you can spot.

card.title: Isengard Ruined
card.game_text: Battleground. Each time a follower is transferred to a character, the first Shadow player may exert a companion twice.

card.title: Mount Doom
card.game_text: Battleground. Mountain. Underground. Until the end of the game, sites in this region cannot be replaced.

card.title: Westfold Village
card.game_text: Plains. Each hunter character is strength +1.

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: The Ring of Doom
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: While wearing The One Ring, the Ring-bearer gains hunter 3, and each time he or she is about to take a wound in a skirmish, add a burden instead. Skirmish: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase.

card.title: Well-crafted Armor
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Each time bearer takes a wound, you may reinforce a [DWARVEN] token. Skirmish: Discard a [DWARVEN] card from hand to make bearer damage +1.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: of the Woodland Realm
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Archer. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Archery: Exert Legolas to make the fellowship archery total +1 for each hunter minion you can spot. (limit +3)

card.title: The Mirror of Galadriel
card.subtitle: Dangerous Guide
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Each time you are about to draw a card, you may exert an Elf to look at the top three cards of your draw deck instead. Take a Free Peoples card into your hand and place the other cards on the bottom of your draw deck.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Powerful Guide
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Each time you play a spell, you may add a burden to wound a minion. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, you may draw a card and then discard a card from your hand.

card.title: One Last Surprise
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Spell. Spot Gandalf and an unbound companion skirmishing a minion to use Gandalf's resistance to resolve that skirmish instead of that companion's strength.

card.title: Quickbeam
card.subtitle: Hastiest of All Ents
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Quickbeam is twilight cost -1 for each Ent you can spot. Maneuver: Discard this companion to place another [GANDALF] companion from your discard pile on the bottom of your draw deck and reinforce a [GANDALF] token.

card.title: Smeagol
card.subtitle: Wretched and Hungry
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each Ring-bound companion is resistance +1. Skirmish: Exert 2 Ring-bound Hobbits to make Smeagol strength +1 and prevent him from being overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Thorongil
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) Maneuver: Add a threat to exert a non-hunter minion with strength less than Aragorn's.

card.title: Madril
card.subtitle: Defender of Osgiliath
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.Lists: SXL
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 1. While you can spot 2 [GONDOR] rangers, Madril is twilight cost -2. At the start of the maneuver phase, each minion is site number +1 for each threat you can spot until the start of the regroup phase.

card.title: Black Land Chieftain
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ORC] minion. When you play Black Land Chieftain, you may add a threat for each Free Peoples possession and each Free Peoples artifact you can spot.

card.title: Gorbag
card.subtitle: Filthy Rebel
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.) When you play Gorbag, you may discard a card from the top of the Free Peoples player's deck for each hunter character you can spot.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Horsemaster
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Valiant. Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Skirmish: Discard a [ROHAN] card from hand to make Eomer strength +2.

card.title: Sentry Uruk
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion. While you can spot a fierce minion, this minion is fierce. While you can spot a hunter, this minion gains hunter 1. While you can spot a character that is damage +1, this minion is damage +1.

card.title: Ulaire Attea
card.subtitle: Desirous of Power
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Fierce. Ulaire Attea is strength +1 for every 3 twilight tokens you can spot.

card.title: Ulaire Lemenya
card.subtitle: Eternally Threatening
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Lemenya, you may remove [1] to add a threat for each Free Peoples culture you can spot.

card.title: Ulaire Nelya
card.subtitle: Fell Rider
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Fierce. While you can spot 6 companions, [WRAITH] minions cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases). Skirmish: If this minion is mounted, exert him twice to wound a companion bearing a [WRAITH] condition.

card.title: Mount Doom
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Battleground. Mountain. Underground. Until the end of the game, sites in this region cannot be replaced.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: of the Woodland Realm
card.game_text: Archer. Hunter 1. Archery: Exert Legolas to make the fellowship archery total +1 for each hunter minion you can spot (limit +3).

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Powerful Guide
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Each time you play a spell, you may add a burden to wound a minion. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, you may draw a card, then discard a card from your hand.

card.title: Quickbeam
card.subtitle: Hastiest of All Ents
card.game_text: Quickbeam is twilight cost -1 for each Ent you can spot. Maneuver: Discard this companion to place another [Gandalf} companion from your discard pile on the bottom of your draw deck and reinforce a [GANDALF] token.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Thorongil
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 2. Maneuver: Add a threat to exert a non-hunter minion with strength less than Aragorn.

card.title: Madril
card.subtitle: Defender of Osgiliath
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 1. While you can spot 2 [GONDOR] rangers, Madril is twilight cost -2. At the start of the maneuver phase, each minion is site number +1 for each threat you can spot until the start of the regroup phase.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Horsemaster
card.game_text: Valiant. Hunter 2. While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Skirmish: Discard a [ROHAN] card from hand to make Eomer strength +2.

card.title: Ulaire Attea
card.subtitle: Desirous of Power
card.game_text: Fierce. Ulaire Attea is strength +1 for every 3 twilight tokens you can spot.

card.title: Ulaire Lemenya
card.subtitle: Eternally Threatening
card.game_text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Lemenya, you may remove [1] to add a threat for each Free Peoples culture you can spot.

card.title: Ulaire Nelya
card.subtitle: Fell Rider
card.game_text: Fierce. While you can spot 6 companions, [WRAITH] minions cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases). Skirmish: If this minion is mounted, exert him twice to wound a companion bearing a [WRAITH] condition.

card.title: Barrow-wight Stalker
card.game_text: Enduring. Each [WRAITH] Wraith cannot take wounds (except during skirmishes). Shadow: Remove a burden to play a [WRAITH] Wraith. That minion's twilight cost is -2.

card.title: Candle Corpses
card.game_text: Enduring. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a companion, you may spot another [WRAITH] Wraith and remove [2] to wound that companion.

card.title: Covetous Wisp
card.game_text: Enduring. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns Covetous Wisp to a companion, you may spot another [WRAITH] Wraith and remove [2] to add a burden.

card.title: Dead Faces
card.game_text: Enduring. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a companion, you may spot another [WRAITH] Wraith and remove [2] to discard a condition.

card.title: Spirit of Dread
card.game_text: Enduring. While you can spot another [WRAITH] Wraith, wounds cannot be healed and burdens can not be removed (except by Wraiths). Skirmish: Exert Spirit of Dread to make another [WRAITH] Wraith strength +1.

card.title: Undead of Angmar
card.game_text: Enduring. While you can spot another [WRAITH] Wraith, each wounded companion is resistance -2. Shadow: Exert Undead of Angmar twice to play a [WRAITH] Wraith from your draw deck, then reshuffle.

card.title: Armor of Khazad
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Each time bearer is about to take a wound, you may add a threat to prevent that. Regroup: Discard this possession to take up to 2 other [DWARVEN] possessions into hand from your discard pile.

card.title: Balin Avenged
card.game_text: When you play this condition, you may add a [DWARVEN] token here. While you can spot 4 [DWARVEN] tokens and 2 Dwarves, each [ORC] Orc gains this text 'To play, remove an [ORC] card from your discard pile from the game.' Skirmish: Discard this condition to exert a minion for each Dwarf you can spot.

card.title: Dwarven Stratagem
card.game_text: Spot a Dwarf hunter and choose one: exert a minion for each hunter you can spot or reinforce a [DWARVEN] token for each hunter you can spot.

card.title: Ring of Artifice
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Bearer is damage +1. Bearer is strength +1 for each [DWARVEN] artifact in your discard pile. Regroup: Discard this to take a non-event [DWARVEN] card into hand from your discard pile.

card.title: Axe- Work
card.game_text: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or if you cannot spot a threat, make that Dwarf strength +1 for each Dwarf you can spot).

card.title: Thorin III
card.subtitle: Stonehelm
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time a minion loses a skirmish involving Thorin III, its owner discards the top card from his or her draw deck.

card.title: Elven Guardian
card.game_text: Hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) While this companion is skirmishing a wounded minion, he is strength +2. Maneuver: Exert this companion to heal another hunter.

card.title: Hearth and Hall
card.game_text: Spot an [ELVEN] hunter and choose one: draw a card for each hunter you can spot or reinforce an [ELVEN] token for each hunter you can spot.

card.title: Lothlorien Guides
card.game_text: Spot 2 Elves (or an Elf and an [ELVEN] follower) to discard a condition (or discard two conditions if you can spot 4 or more Shadow conditions).

card.title: Namarie
card.game_text: When you play this condition, add an [ELVEN] token here for each hunter you can spot. Maneuver: Discard this or remove a token from here and spot an [ELVEN] hunter to discard a condition.

card.title: Orophin
card.subtitle: Silvan Elf
card.game_text: Hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) While Orophin is skirmishing a wounded minion, he is strength +3. Archery: Exert another [ELVEN] hunter and add a threat to wound a minion.

card.title: Rumil
card.subtitle: Silvan Elf
card.game_text: Hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) While you can spot a wounded minion, Rumil is strength +1 and gains archer. Archery: Exert another [ELVEN] hunter and add a threat to wound a minion.

card.title: The World Ahead
card.game_text: To play, spot an Elf. Each time the fellowship moves to a region one site, add a threat. Each time the fellowship moves to a region two site, heal an Elf. Each time the fellowship moves to a region three site, draw a card.

card.title: Weapons of Lothlorien
card.game_text: Spot an [ELVEN] archer and add a threat to wound a minion (or add three threats to exert three minions).

card.title: A New Light
card.game_text: Spell. Spot a [GANDALF] Wizard to search a Shadow player's discard pile and choose a minion, then return that minion to its owner's hand. If you do, you may reveal that Shadow player's hand and discard a minion found there.

card.title: Barliman Butterbur
card.subtitle: Red-Faced Landlord
card.game_text: Barliman Butterbur is strength +1 for each attached [GANDALF] follower. Maneuver: Exert Barliman Butterbur to reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Take any [GANDALF] cards into hand and discard the rest.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Returned
card.game_text: When you play Gandalf (except in your starting fellowship), you may play a [GANDALF] possession on him from your draw deck or discard pile. Each time Gandalf wins a skirmish, you may reinforce a Free Peoples token.

card.title: Glamdring
card.subtitle: Orc Beater
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Bearer is damage +1. Each time a companion is about to take a wound, you may discard a companion from hand to prevent that.

card.title: Guidance of the Istari
card.game_text: Make a [GANDALF] companion strength +1 for each [GANDALF] Man you can spot.

card.title: Gwaihir
card.subtitle: The Windlord
card.game_text: Aid - Add a threat. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a threat to transfer this to a companion.) If bearer is a [GANDALF] Wizard, each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert a minion (if that minion is a Wizard, wound it instead).

card.title: Long-stemmed Pipe
card.game_text: Pipeweed. When you play this, you may search your deck for a [GANDALF] card and place it in your discard pile. Regroup: Discard another pipeweed from play to discard a condition. Discard this condition.

card.title: Meneldor
card.subtitle: Misty Mountain Eagle
card.game_text: Aid - [1]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [1] to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a [GANDALF] follower. Bearer is strength +1 for each other [GANDALF] follower you can spot.

card.title: Scintillating Bird
card.game_text: Spell. Fellowship: Exert your Wizard and choose an opponent to name either Free Peoples or Shadow. Reveal the top three cards of your deck. If you revealed at least two of the chosen card type, take those cards into hand, otherwise, discard those cards.

card.title: Shadowfax
card.subtitle: Greatest of the Mearas
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GANDALF] Wizard. Discard all other possessions on bearer and bearer may not bear a hand weapon. Fellowship: Add a threat to remove a burden.

card.title: The Sap is in the Bough
card.game_text: Discard a companion from hand to make a [GANDALF] companion strength +3 (or +4 if you can spot 3 Ents).

card.title: Woodland Onod
card.game_text: Skirmish: Discard a companion from hand to make an Ent strength +2.

card.title: Anduril
card.subtitle: Sword That Was Broken
card.game_text: Bearer must be Aragorn. He is damage +1. Each time Aragorn wins a skirmish, you may exert him to liberate a site or discard a condition borne by a companion.

card.title: Faramir
card.subtitle: Bearer of Quality
card.game_text: While Faramir is the Ring-bearer, at the start of each skirmish involving him, add 2 burdens or 2 threats. Skirmish: While Faramir is the Ring-bearer, you may wound Faramir to make a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man roaming until the end of turn.

card.title: Faramir's Bow
card.subtitle: Ithilien Longbow
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] ranger. If bearer is Faramir, he is an archer. The site number of each minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] ranger is +1. Skirmish: Exert bearer twice to exhaust a minion Faramir is skirmishing.

card.title: Madril
card.subtitle: Loyal Lieutenant
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 1. While you can spot a roaming minion, your [GONDOR] conditions cannot be discarded from play by Shadow cards. Maneuver: Exert 2 rangers to make a minion site number +2 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Narsil
card.subtitle: Forged by Telchar
card.game_text: Bearer must be Elendil or Isildur. Bearer is damage +1. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert him to discard a Shadow possession.

card.title: Nimble Attack
card.game_text: Spot 2 [GONDOR] companions and add a threat to discard a Shadow possession.

card.title: Ranger of the White Tree
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 1. When this is in your starting fellowship and you can spot an unbound [GONDOR] companion with cost 3 or more, his twilight cost is -2. Maneuver: Exert this companion and spot a roaming minion to make him defender +1 until the start of the regroup phase.

card.title: Spirit of the White Tree
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] companion. An opponent can not play skirmish events or use skirmish special abilities during skirmishes involving bearer. Each time a Shadow player adds a burden, discard this condition.

card.title: Soldier's Cache
card.game_text: Fortification. At the start of your maneuver phase, you may spot 3 rangers or exert a [GONDOR] Man to transfer this condition to a minion. Wound that minion. Regroup: Exert a ranger to reinforce a [GONDOR] token.

card.title: Throne of Minas Tirith
card.game_text: To play, spot Denethor (or 2 [GONDOR] companions). Each time a minion is killed or discarded from play during a skirmish, you may reinforce a [GONDOR] token. Skirmish: Remove 3 [GONDOR] tokens to discard a possession.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Instigator of Insurrection
card.game_text: Saruman cannot be assigned to a skirmish. While you can spot 6 companions, each minion gains hunter 2. Response: If a hunter minion is about to take a wound, exert Saruman to prevent that.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Servant of Sauron
card.game_text: Aid - [1]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may remove [1] to transfer this to a minion.) Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert a companion.

card.title: Throne of Isengard
card.game_text: Each time you play Saruman, spot a minion. That minion is fierce until the start of the regroup phase. Each Wizard is strength +3 and damage +1.

card.title: Beast of War
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MEN] Man. While you can spot a threat, bearer is fierce. While you can spot 3 threats, bearer is damage +1. While you can spot 5 threats, you may play this from your discard pile.

card.title: Ceremonial Armor
card.game_text: Each time a [MEN] minion is discarded during the maneuver phase, you may stack it here. Response: Discard a minion stacked here or discard this to prevent a wound to a [MEN] minion.

card.title: Easterling Dispatcher
card.game_text: When you play this minion, you may spot 2 other [MEN] Men to add [1] for each possession you spot.

card.title: Easterling Sneak
card.game_text: While you control 2 sites, Easterling Sneak is fierce. While you control 4 sites, each [MEN] minion is strength +1 and fierce.

card.title: Grima's Dagger
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MEN] Man. If bearer is Grima, he is strength +1 for each Free Peoples culture you can spot over 2. Response: If a skirmish event is played, discard this possession to cancel that event.

card.title: In the Wild Men's Wake
card.game_text: Spot a [MEN] possession in your support area and a [MEN] minion. Make that minion strength +1 for each minion stacked on that possession. You may discard that possession to make that minion damage +1.

card.title: Pandemonium
card.game_text: Play a [MEN] minion stacked on a [MEN] possession as if from hand.

card.title: Primitive Brand
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish you may transfer this possession to another [MEN] minion. If you do, stack a [MEN] minion from play on a [MEN] possession in your support area.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Coldly Still
card.game_text: Each [MEN] minion bearing a possession is strength +2. Skirmish: Exert Saruman to play a [MEN] possession from your discard pile.

card.title: Stampeding Chief
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. If you play Stampeding Chief from your hand, remove [3] and spot another [MEN] minion or discard Stampeding Chief.

card.title: Stampeding Hillsman
card.game_text: Regroup: Spot a [MEN] minion in your discard pile and discard this minion to place that minion on your [MEN] support area possession.

card.title: Stampeding Madman
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [MEN] Men. When you play this minion, you may make the Free Peoples player exert a companion for each site you control.

card.title: Stampeding Ransacker
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [MEN] Men. Each time this minion wins a skirmish and you can spot a site you control, exhaust an unbound companion.

card.title: Stampeding Savage
card.game_text: Maneuver: Discard this minion and X minions stacked on a [MEN] possession to play a [MEN] minion from your discard pile. That minion is twilight cost -X.

card.title: Stampeding Shepherd
card.game_text: Fierce. Maneuver: Discard this minion and a [MEN] minion with a twilight cost 2 or less from play to play Stampeding Chief from your draw deck. It is twilight cost -8.

card.title: Sunland Guard
card.game_text: Maneuver: Exert this minion to play a [MEN] minion (or 2 if you spot 6 companions) from a [MEN] possession as if from hand.

card.title: Sunland Scout
card.game_text: This minion is strength +1 for each [MEN] possession with a [MEN] minion stacked on it. Maneuver: spot a [MEN] possession and discard this minion from play to discard a condition.

card.title: Sunland Skirmisher
card.game_text: This minion is strength +1 for each [MEN] minion stacked on each [MEN] possession. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may play a minion stacked on a [MEN] possession as if from hand.

card.title: Sunland Sneak
card.game_text: This minion is twilight cost -1 for each [MEN] minion stacked on a [MEN] possession.

card.title: Sunland Trooper
card.game_text: This minion is strength +2 for each [MEN] possession with a [MEN] minion stacked on it. Maneuver: Spot X [MEN] minions stacked on a [MEN] possession and discard this minion to add (X).

card.title: Sunland Warrior
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot a [MEN] possession and discard this minion from play to make each [MEN] minion you spot strength +2 until the start of the regroup phase.

card.title: Sunland Weaponmaster
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [MEN] Men. While this minion bears a possession, he is strength +2 for each Free Peoples culture you can spot.

card.title: Vengeful Savage
card.game_text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may stack a [MEN] minion from your discard pile on a [MEN] possession in your support area.

card.title: Vengeful Wild Man
card.game_text: At the start of the maneuver phase, spot another [MEN] Man and exert this minion to add a threat. Then add an additional threat for each companion you spot over 4.

card.title: Vengeful Pillager
card.game_text: When you play this minion from your draw deck or from your [MEN] possesion it is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Vengeful Primitive
card.game_text: You may play this minion any time you could play a maneuver event. When you play this minion in the maneuver phase, you may discard X [MEN] minions from play to add (X).

card.title: Wildman's Oath
card.game_text: Each time a [MEN] minion is discarded during the maneuver phase, you may stack it here. Skirmish: Discard this possession to make a [MEN] Man strength +2.

card.title: A Defiled Charge
card.game_text: To play, exert your mounted [ORC] Orc. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns a mounted [ORC] Orc to a companion, he or she must choose to either exert that companion or add [2].

card.title: Chaotic Clash
card.game_text: To play, spot no minions. Each time you play a minion, it is twilight cost +1. While you can spot an [ORC] minion, each companion is strength -1.

card.title: Cry and Panic
card.game_text: Each time a mounted [ORC] Orc wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must reveal his or her hand and place two Free Peoples cards revealed on the bottom of his or her draw deck.

card.title: Feral Ride
card.game_text: Make an [ORC] minion strength +2 (or +4 if it is mounted).

card.title: Grishnakh
card.subtitle: Treacherous Captain
card.game_text: Hunter 2. While you can spot an [URUK-HAI] minion, each [ORC] Orc gains hunter 1 (if that [URUK-HAI] minion is Ugluk, each [ORC] Orc gains an additional hunter 1). Shadow: Exert Grishnakh twice to play an [URUK-HAI] hunter minion from your draw deck.

card.title: Orkish Assassin
card.game_text: While you can spot a follower attached to a companion, each [ORC] minion is strength +2.

card.title: Orkish Berserker
card.game_text: When this minion wins a skirmish, discard an [ORC] minion from play.

card.title: Orkish Cavalry
card.game_text: Each time you play an [ORC] mount, you may draw a card. Assignment: If this minion is mounted, exert it twice to assign it to a companion of strength 9 or more.

card.title: Orkish Dreg
card.game_text: Each time you play this minion, you may spot another [ORC] minion to exert a companion for each Free Peoples culture you can spot over 2.

card.title: Orkish Fiend
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ORC] Orc. While at an underground site, this minion is fierce and the Free Peoples player may not replace sites or play a site from his or her adventure deck.

card.title: Orkish Flanker
card.game_text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, if it is mounted, exert a companion. Shadow: Exert 3 [ORC] minions and spot an [ORC] mount to discard a condition.

card.title: Orkish Footman
card.game_text: This minion is strength +1 for each twilight token you can spot.

card.title: Orkish Invader
card.game_text: At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may reveal an [ORC] condition from hand to wound the companion this minion is skirmishing twice and then discard this minion.

card.title: Orkish Lackey
card.game_text: Maneuver: Spot 2 [ORC] conditions and discard this minion from play to wound an unbound companion.

card.title: Orkish Maurader
card.game_text: This minion is strength +1 for each [ORC] condition in your discard pile.

card.title: Orkish Rider
card.game_text: Each mounted [ORC] Orc is strength +1. Shadow: discard an [ORC] card from your hand to play an [ORC] mount from your discard pile.

card.title: Orkish Runner
card.game_text: Shadow: Exert this minion and spot another [ORC] minion to add (X), where X is the number of the current region.

card.title: Orkish Scout
card.game_text: Shadow: Exert this minion to add (X), where X is the current site's Shadow number.

card.title: Orkish Traveler
card.game_text: Each [ORC] mount is twilight cost -1. Skirmish: Remove [3] to make a mounted [ORC] Orc strength +2.

card.title: Orkish Veteran
card.game_text: Each time you play an [ORC] mount, you may reinforce an [ORC] token. Regroup: Exert Orkish Veteran to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.title: Orkish Warg-master
card.game_text: Each time a mounted [ORC] minion wins a skirmish, you may make the Free Peoples player place a card from his or her hand on top of his or her draw deck. Shadow: Exert Orkish Warg-master to play an [ORC] mount from your discard pile.

card.title: Orkish Warrior
card.game_text: While you can spot a companion of strength 12 or more, this minion is strength +4. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, discard this minion.

card.title: Relentless Warg
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Orc with strength 10 or less. Bearer is fierce. When you play this possession, spot a race. While bearer is skirmishing a companion of that race, bearer is strength +3 and damage +1.

card.title: Rider's Gear
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Orc. While bearer is mounted, it cannot take wounds except during the skirmish phase.

card.title: Threatening Warg
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Orc with strength 10 or less. Bearer is fierce. When you play this, you may spot 2 [ORC] Orcs that are not bearing mounts to play an [ORC] mount from your draw deck.

card.title: Vicious Warg
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Orc with strength 9 or less. Bearer is fierce.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Defender of Rohan
card.game_text: Valiant. While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, each [ROHAN] companion gains hunter 1.

card.title: Dispatched with Haste
card.game_text: While at a plains site, each mounted companion is strength +1. Regroup: Spot 2 [ROHAN] Men and discard a [ROHAN] possession to discard a possession.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Northman
card.game_text: Damage +1. While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, Eomer is strength +3. Maneuver: If Eomer is mounted, exert him to make him defender +1 until the end of turn.

card.title: Eowyn
card.subtitle: Northwoman
card.game_text: While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, Eowyn cannot take wounds while skirmishing. Assignment: Exert Eowyn and assign a minion to the Ring-bearer to make that minion lose all game text keywords and unable to gain game text keywords until the regroup phase.

card.title: For Death and Glory
card.game_text: While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, each minion skirmishing a [ROHAN] companion loses hunter and is unable to gain hunter. Skirmish: Exert a [ROHAN] companion to make that companion gain hunter 1 until the start of the regroup phase.

card.title: Throne of the Golden Hall
card.game_text: To play, spot Theoden (or 2 [ROHAN] companions). Saruman and Grima cannot be assigned to skirmishes. Response: If a [ROHAN] Man is about to take a wound, exert another [ROHAN] Man and add [2] to prevent that.

card.title: Hama
card.subtitle: Northman
card.game_text: While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, each minion skirmishing Hama loses strength bonuses and damage bonuses from possessions.

card.title: Into the Caves
card.game_text: To play, spot 3 [ROHAN] companions. Assignment: Assign a minion to Frodo to make that minion lose all keywords of your choice and unable to gain keywords until the regroup phase.

card.title: Soldier of Rohan
card.game_text: While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, this companion is strength +2.

card.title: Theoden
card.subtitle: Northman, King of Rohan
card.game_text: While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, each [ROHAN] companion is strength +1. Regroup: Spot 2 [ROHAN] followers and exert Theoden to liberate a site.

card.title: Where Now the Horse
card.game_text: Spot a [ROHAN] companion to make Frodo strength +5. If Frodo loses the skirmish, discard that [ROHAN] companion.

card.title: Warrior of Rohan
card.game_text: Possessions cannot be transferred from this companion to another character. Fellowship: Play a possession on this companion to liberate a site.

card.title: Throne of the Dark Lord
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 minions. While you can spot Sauron, each other minion is damage +1. While the fellowship is in the same region as Mount Doom, each companion is resistance -2.

card.title: Halfling Leaf
card.game_text: Pipeweed. To play, spot a Hobbit. Skirmish: Discard a pipeweed from play to cancel a skirmish involving an unbound Hobbit.

card.title: Merry
card.subtitle: In the Bloom of Health
card.game_text: Add 1 to the number of Ents you can spot. Regroup: Exert Merry to place a pipeweed from your discard pile beneath your draw deck.

card.title: Hornblower Leaf
card.game_text: Pipeweed. To play, spot an unbound Hobbit. Regroup: Discard a pipeweed from play to remove a threat. Regroup: Discard a pipeweed from play to discard a minion.

card.title: Pippin
card.subtitle: In the Bloom of Health
card.game_text: Add 1 to the number of Ents you can spot. Maneuver: Discard 2 pipeweed cards from play to remove a burden.

card.title: Southfarthing Leaf
card.game_text: Pipeweed. To play, spot an unbound Hobbit. Skirmish: Discard a pipeweed from play to make an unbound Hobbit strength +2. Regroup: Discard this pipeweed from play to play a pipeweed from your draw deck. Reshuffle your draw deck.

card.title: Southlinch Leaf
card.game_text: Pipeweed. To play, spot a Hobbit. Skirmish: Discard a pipeweed from play to prevent an unbound Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless that Hobbit's strength is tripled.

card.title: Blade of the White Hand
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] Uruk-hai. While you can spot 2 controlled sites, this minion is damage +1. While you can spot 4 controlled sites, this minion is damage +3.

card.title: Deathly Roar
card.game_text: Each time the Free Peoples player plays a possession or artifact, place an [URUK-HAI] token here. Each time an [URUK-HAI] minion wins a skirmish, you may remove an [URUK-HAI] token to exert a companion.

card.title: Land Had Changed
card.game_text: Make an Uruk-hai strength +2 (or spot a site you control to make that Uruk-hai strength +3 instead). You may then liberate a site to make that Uruk-hai strength +2 and damage +1.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Curunir
card.game_text: Each time an [URUK-HAI] hunter wins a skirmish, heal a different [URUK-HAI] minion. Skirmish: Exert Saruman twice to make a companion lose the hunter keyword until the start of the regroup phase.

card.title: Saruman
card.subtitle: Master of the White Hand
card.game_text: Each companion is resistance -1. Skirmish: Exert Saruman to discard a condition borne by a companion skirmishing an [URUK-HAI] minion.

card.title: Spear of the White Hand
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] Uruk-hai.

card.title: Vile Pit
card.game_text: To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] hunter. At the start of each Shadow phase, you may discard 2 [URUK-HAI] cards from hand to play an [URUK-HAI] hunter from your discard pile. Regroup: Discard this possession to return an [URUK-HAI] hunter from play to your hand.

card.title: White Hand Aggressor
card.game_text: Damage +1. While you control a site, this minion cannot take wounds, except during the skirmish phase.

card.title: White Hand Attacker
card.game_text: Damage +1. While this minion is assigned to a skirmish, each site on the adventure path gains each terrain keyword from each site you control.

card.title: White Hand Berserker
card.game_text: Damage +1. At the start of the archery phase, if you control a site, you may add 2 to the minion archery total for each Free Peoples culture you can spot over 2.

card.title: White Hand Butcher
card.game_text: Hunter 6 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +6.)

card.title: White Hand Captain
card.game_text: Fierce. While this minion is assigned to a skirmish, each hunter character is strength +1.

card.title: White Hand Destroyer
card.game_text: Fierce. This minion gains hunter 3 for each site you control.

card.title: White Hand Enforcer
card.game_text: Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may liberate a site to add (X) where X is the Shadow number of the liberated site.

card.title: White Hand Guard
card.game_text: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.). Skirmish: Exert this minion to make an [URUK-HAI] hunter minion strength +2.

card.title: White Hand Intruder
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, if you do not control a site, you may take control of a site.

card.title: White Hand Invader
card.game_text: Damage +1. When you play this minion, exert a companion for each site you control.

card.title: White Hand Legion
card.game_text: Damage +1. To play, remove 2 threats.

card.title: White Hand Scout
card.game_text: Damage +1. Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) The roaming penalty for each [URUK-HAI] minion you play is -1.

card.title: White Hand Slayer
card.game_text: Fierce. Each time a player plays an event in a skirmish involving this minion, that player may exert a non-hunter character.

card.title: White Hand Taskmaster
card.game_text: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.). When you play this minion, you may spot another [URUK-HAI] minion to add a threat for each Free Peoples culture you can spot.

card.title: White Hand Trooper
card.game_text: Fierce. While this minion is assigned to a skirmish, each hunter companion loses its special abilities and skirmish events may not be played in those companions skirmishes.

card.title: White Hand Vanquisher
card.game_text: Fierce. This minion is damage +1 for each [URUK-HAI] hunter assigned to a skirmish.

card.title: White Hand Veteran
card.game_text: Damage +1. When you play this minion, if you control a site, you may take an [URUK-HAI] event into hand from your discard pile.

card.title: White Hand Warrior
card.game_text: Fierce. Hunter 4 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +4.). Each time this minion is assigned to a non-hunter companion, you may heal a hunter.

card.title: You Do Not Know Fear
card.game_text: Discard a condition for each [URUK-HAI] minion you can spot.

card.title: You Do Not Know Pain
card.game_text: Each time you take control of a site, you may spot 3 [URUK-HAI] minions to exert an unbound companion. Skirmish: Liberate a site to make an [URUK-HAI] minion damage +1.

card.title: Ulaire Cantea
card.subtitle: Duplicitous Assassin
card.game_text: Fierce. Each unbound companion is resistance -1 for each card he or she bears. Skirmish: Exert Ulaire Cantea to exert a companion with resistance 2 or less.

card.title: Ulaire Enquea
card.subtitle: Duplicitous Lieutenant
card.game_text: Fierce. Each time the Free Peoples player heals a companion, you may add a burden. Maneuver: Exert Ulaire Enquea twice to discard a condition (or two conditions if you can spot 5 Free Peoples player's conditions).

card.title: Ulaire Otsea
card.subtitle: Duplicitous Specter
card.game_text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Otsea, you may spot another Nazgul to draw a card for each wounded companion you can spot. Regroup: Exert Ulaire Otsea and discard a [WRAITH] card from hand to add a burden.

card.title: Ring of Savagery
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must either add a burden or exert a companion. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owner's hand.

card.title: Ring of Terror
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Bearer is damage +1. When you play this artifact, you may remove two threats to take a [WRAITH] card into hand from your discard pile. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owner's hand.

card.title: The Witch-king
card.subtitle: Conqueror of Arthedain
card.game_text: Fierce. Each time the Witch-king wins a fierce skirmish, you may exert a companion for each companion you can spot over 4.

card.title: Dol Guldur
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert your minion and remove a threat to make the Free Peoples player discard one of his or her conditions.

card.title: Falls of Rauros
card.game_text: River. When the fellowship moves to this site in region 2, the Free Peoples player places a card from the dead pile out of play.

card.title: Imladris
card.game_text: River. When the fellowship moves to this site, if it is a Sanctuary, remove 2 burdens.

card.title: Nurn
card.notes: The game text on this card remains active once it is controlled and is in your support area.
card.game_text: Plains. While you control this site, each of your hunter minions is strength +1.

card.title: Ring of Artifice
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Bearer is damage +1. Bearer is strength +1 for each [DWARVEN] artifact in your discard pile. Regroup: Discard this to take a non-event [DWARVEN] card into hand from your discard pile.

card.title: Glamdring
card.subtitle: Orc Beater
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Bearer is damage +1. Each time a companion is about to take a wound, you may discard a companion from hand to prevent that.

card.title: Shadowfax
card.subtitle: Greatest of the Mearas
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GANDALF] Wizard. Discard all other possessions on bearer and bearer may not bear a hand weapon. Fellowship: Add a threat to remove a burden.

card.title: Gwaihir
card.subtitle: The Windlord
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Aid - Add a threat. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a threat to transfer this to a companion.) If bearer is a [GANDALF] Wizard, each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert a minion (if that minion is a Wizard, wound it instead).

card.title: Anduril
card.subtitle: Sword That Was Broken
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Aragorn. He is damage +1. Each time Aragorn wins a skirmish, you may exert him to liberate a site or discard a condition borne by a companion.

card.title: Faramir
card.subtitle: Bearer of Quality
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: While Faramir is the Ring-bearer, at the start of each skirmish involving him, add 2 burdens or 2 threats. Skirmish: While Faramir is the Ring-bearer, you may wound Faramir to make a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man roaming until the end of turn.

card.title: Narsil
card.subtitle: Forged by Telchar
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.

card.title: Throne of Minas Tirith
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: To play, spot Denethor (or 2 [GONDOR] companions). Each time a minion is killed or discarded from play during a skirmish, you may reinforce a [GONDOR] token. Skirmish: Remove 3 [GONDOR] tokens to discard a possession.

card.title: Throne of Isengard
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Each time you play Saruman, spot a minion. That minion is fierce until the start of the regroup phase. Each Wizard is strength +3 and damage +1.

card.title: Stampeding Chief
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fierce. If you play Stampeding Chief from your hand, remove [3] and spot another [MEN] minion or discard Stampeding Chief.

card.title: Orkish Invader
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may reveal an [ORC] condition from hand to wound the companion this minion is skirmishing twice and then discard this minion.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Defender of Rohan
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Valiant. While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, each [ROHAN] companion gains hunter 1.

card.title: Throne of the Golden Hall
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: To play, spot Theoden (or 2 [ROHAN] companions). Saruman and Grima cannot be assigned to skirmishes. Response: If a [ROHAN] Man is about to take a wound, exert another [ROHAN] Man and add [2] to prevent that.

card.title: Theoden
card.subtitle: Northman, King of Rohan
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, each [ROHAN] companion is strength +1. Regroup: Spot 2 [ROHAN] followers and exert Theoden to liberate a site.

card.title: Throne of the Dark Lord
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 minions. While you can spot Sauron, each other minion is damage +1. While the fellowship is in the same region as Mount Doom, each companion is resistance -2.

card.title: Ulaire Otsea
card.subtitle: Duplicitous Specter
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Otsea, you may spot another Nazgul to draw a card for each wounded companion you can spot. Regroup: Exert Ulaire Otsea and discard a [WRAITH] card from hand to add a burden.

card.title: Ring of Savagery
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must either add a burden or exert a companion. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owner's hand.

card.title: Ring of Terror
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Bearer is damage +1. When you play this artifact, you may remove two threats to take a [WRAITH] card into hand from your discard pile. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owner's hand.

card.title: Shadowfax
card.subtitle: Greatest of the Mearas
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GANDALF] Wizard. Discard all other possessions on bearer and bearer may not bear a hand weapon. Fellowship: Add a threat to remove a burden.

card.title: Gwaihir
card.subtitle: The Windlord
card.game_text: Aid - Add a threat. If bearer is a [GANDALF] Wizard, each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert a minion (if that minion is a Wizard, wound it instead).

card.title: Throne of Minas Tirith
card.game_text: To play, spot Denethor (or 2 [GONDOR] companions). Each time a minion is killed or discarded from play during a kirmish, you may reinforce a [GONDOR] token. Maneuver: Remove 3 [GONDOR] tokens to discard a possession.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Defender of Rohan
card.game_text: Valiant. While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, each [ROHAN] companion gains hunter 1.

card.title: Throne of the Golden Hall
card.game_text: To play, spot Theoden (or 2 [ROHAN] companions). Saruman and Grima cannot be assigned to skirmishes. Response: If a [ROHAN] Man is about to take a wound, exert another [ROHAN] Man and add [2] to prevent that.

card.title: Theoden
card.subtitle: Northman, King of Rohan
card.game_text: While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, each [ROHAN] companion is strength +1. Regroup: Spot 2 [ROHAN] followers and exert Theoden to liberate a site.

card.title: Ulaire Otsea
card.subtitle: Duplicitous Specter
card.game_text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Otsea, you may spot another Nazgul to draw a card for each wounded companion you can spot. Regroup: Exert Ulaire Otsea and discard a [WRAITH] card from hand to add a burden.

card.title: Ring of Savagery
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must either add a burden or exert a companion. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owners hand.

card.title: Ring of Terror
card.game_text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Bearer is damage +1. When you play this artifact, you may remove two threats to take a [WRAITH] card into hand from your discard pile. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owners hand.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Sprinter
card.game_text: Damage +1. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may add a threat to wound a minion (or wound a hunter minion twice).

card.title: Run Until Found
card.game_text: When you play this condition, place a [DWARVEN] token here. Skirmish: Discard this condition from play or remove a [DWARVEN] token from here to make a [DWARVEN] companion gain hunter 1.

card.title: Thorin's Harp
card.game_text: Tale. Maneuver: Exert a [DWARVEN] companion to make the fellowship's current site gain mountain until the regroup phase.

card.title: Arwen's Bow
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ELVEN] companion. Archery: If bearer is Arwen, discard 2 [ELVEN] cards from hand to wound a minion.

card.title: Arwen's Dagger
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ELVEN] companion. Bearer may bear this hand weapon in addition to 1 other hand weapon. Maneuver: If bearer is Arwen, exert her to draw 2 cards.

card.title: Back to the Light
card.game_text: To play, exert an [ELVEN] companion or spot Arwen. Examine the top 5 cards of your draw deck and place any number of them aside. Shuffle the remaining cards into your draw deck and place those cards set aside on top of your draw deck in any order.

card.title: Celebring
card.subtitle: Elven-smith
card.game_text: Aid - [2]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [2] to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot 2 [ELVEN] companions. When you play Celebring, you may play an [ELVEN] artifact from your deck.

card.title: Elven Armaments
card.notes: The card type for this card is both Hand Weapon and Shield. Game text is an erratum.
card.game_text: To play, bearer must not be bearing any possessions. Bearer must be an [ELVEN] companion. Bearer cannot bear any other possessions. While a unique companion bears this possession, the Free Peoples player may not use archery special abilities and the minion archery total is -1.

card.title: Elven Defender
card.game_text: While you can spot an [ELVEN] token, this companion is strength +2.

card.title: Elven Supplies
card.game_text: Fellowship: Remove a culture token from a Free Peoples card to add an [ELVEN] token here. Skirmish: Remove 2 [ELVEN] tokens from here to make a minion skirmishing an [ELVEN] companion strength -1.

card.title: Galadriel's Silver Ewer
card.game_text: To play, spot Galadriel or Celeborn. While Galadriel is the Ring-bearer, she is strength +2 and resistance +2. Each time you play an [ELVEN] skirmish event, you may reinforce an [ELVEN] token.

card.title: Gil-galad
card.subtitle: High King of the Noldor
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [ELVEN] companions. Maneuver: Add a threat to take an [ELVEN] skirmish event into hand from your discard pile. Regroup: Remove an [ELVEN] token to play an [ELVEN] condition from your discard pile.

card.title: Glorfindel
card.subtitle: Eldarin Lord
card.game_text: Ranger. To play, spot 2 [ELVEN] companions. Minions skirmishing Glorfindel cannot gain strength bonuses from possessions. Each time Glorfindel wins a skirmish, you may remove a threat.

card.title: Haldir
card.subtitle: Warrior Messenger
card.game_text: Skirmish: Exert Haldir or discard an [ELVEN] card from hand to make a minion skirmishing Haldir strength -2.

card.title: Lembas Bread
card.game_text: To play, spot 2 [ELVEN] companions. Bearer must be a companion. Regroup: Discard this possession from play to reconcile your hand.

card.title: Miruvore
card.game_text: Add 2 threats to heal an [ELVEN] companion.

card.title: Woodhall Elf
card.subtitle: Exile
card.game_text: Aid - [2]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [2] to transfer this to a companion.) When you transfer this to an [ELVEN] companion, you may draw 3 cards.

card.title: Beorning Axe
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GANDALF] Man. While Grimbeorn is bearing this possession, each time he wins a skirmish, you may take a [GANDALF] card from your discard pile into hand.

card.title: Drawn to Full Height
card.game_text: Spell. Spot a [GANDALF] Wizard to make a minion lose all strength bonuses from possessions.

card.title: Ents Marching
card.game_text: If the fellowship is in region 1 or region 2, exert 2 Ents to make an Ent defender +1 until the regroup phase. If the fellowship is in region 3, spot a [GANDALF] companion to draw a card.

card.title: Last Stand
card.game_text: Fellowship: Exert a [GANDALF] Man to add 2 [GANDALF] tokens here. Skirmish: Remove 3 [GANDALF] tokens from here to make a companion strength +3.

card.title: Librarian
card.subtitle: Keeper of Ancient Texts
card.lore: ;While you can spot 2 [GANDALF] tokens, each of your [GANDALF] Men is strength +2. Regroup: Discard a follower from play to choose one: draw a card
card.game_text: or take a [GANDALF] skirmish event from your discard pile into hand.

card.title: One-Upsmanship
card.game_text: Spell. Spot 2 pipeweed cards to remove a burden for each [GANDALF] Wizard you can spot.

card.title: Our Time
card.game_text: Spell. To play, exert Gandalf. When you play this condition, remove [3]. At the start of the maneuver phase, add [4] and remove this condition from the game.

card.title: Perspective
card.game_text: Maneuver: Add 2 threats and spot a Wizard to spot a minion in play. That minion cannot use special abilities until the regroup phase.

card.title: Radagast's Herb Bag
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GANDALF] Wizard. Each time you play a [GANDALF] spell, you may exert bearer to wound a minion.

card.title: Ship of Smoke
card.game_text: Pipeweed. Each time you play a pipeweed card, you may spot Gandalf to reveal the top 3 cards of your draw deck. Take all Free Peoples cards revealed into hand and discard the remaining cards.

card.title: Countless Cords
card.game_text: Spot Shelob to make a minion strength +1 for each threat you can spot.

card.title: Deceit
card.game_text: Response: If a Free Peoples player's card is about to discard your other [GOLLUM] condition, remove [1] to prevent that.

card.title: Enemy in Your Midst
card.game_text: Heal a Ring-bound companion to reinforce a [GOLLUM] token.

card.title: It Draws Him
card.game_text: Spot a [GOLLUM] card to play a minion. Its twilight cost is -1 (or -3 if it is roaming).

card.title: Not Easily Avoided
card.game_text: Shadow: Remove [3] to take a [GOLLUM] card into hand from your draw deck, then randomly discard a card from your hand. Skirmish: Discard a [GOLLUM] card from hand to make a [GOLLUM] minion strength +2.

card.title: Set Up
card.game_text: Spot Gollum or Smeagol to return a follower to its owner's hand.

card.title: Shelob
card.subtitle: Menace
card.lore: ;Fierce. Each time Shelob wins a skirmish, you may add threats up to the number of burdens you can spot. Each time Shelob wins a skirmish, you may play Gollum from your discard pile
card.game_text: he is strength +3 and fierce until the end of turn.

card.title: Sting of Shelob
card.game_text: To play, spot Shelob. The Free Peoples player chooses two companions in play (except the Ring-bearer). He or she then chooses to place one of those companions in the dead pile and return the other to his or her hand.

card.title: Time for Food
card.game_text: If a skirmish event is played, spot Smeagol to cancel that event.

card.title: Trusted Promise
card.game_text: Reinforce a [GOLLUM] token. Each Shadow player may draw a card.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Heir to the Throne of Gondor
card.game_text: Hunter 2. While you can spot 3 Free Peoples cultures, Aragorn is defender +1. While you can spot 2 Shadow cultures, Aragorn is defender +1.

card.title: Armor of the White City
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Bearer is a knight.

card.title: Boromir
card.subtitle: Proud and Noble Man
card.game_text: Ranger. When you play Boromir (except in your starting fellowship), you may play a possession with a twilight cost of 1 or less on him from your draw deck. Reshuffle your draw deck.

card.title: Crown of Gondor
card.game_text: To play, spot Aragorn, Elendil, or Isildur. Skirmish: Spot a [GONDOR] Man with 3 or more vitality and discard a [GONDOR] card from hand to make that Man strength +2.

card.title: Denethor
card.subtitle: On the Edge of Madness
card.game_text: Each time the fellowship moves from a site, add a burden. Skirmish: Exert another [GONDOR] Man to make him of her strength +1 and damage +1.

card.title: Denethor's Sword
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. While bearer is Denethor, his game text does not apply.

card.title: Defenses Long Held
card.game_text: Make a ranger strength +2 and you may reinforce a [GONDOR] token.

card.title: Dunadan's Bow
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] ranger. Archery: Discard 2 [GONDOR] cards from hand to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.title: Disarmed
card.game_text: Bearer cannot bear any Shadow cards. When this condition is transferred to bearer, discard all Shadow cards it bears. Maneuver: Exert a [GONDOR] Man or spot a ranger to transfer this condition from your support area to minion.

card.title: Elendil's Army
card.game_text: Aid - Exert a [GONDOR] companion. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may exert a [GONDOR] companion to transfer this to a companion.)

card.title: Faramir
card.subtitle: Captain of Ithilien
card.game_text: Ranger. Hunter 2. If Faramir is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. Maneuver: Exert Faramir to heal another companion with resistance 5 or more.

card.title: Faramir's Company
card.game_text: Aid - Add a threat. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a threat to transfer this to a companion.) When you attach this card to a companion, spot a [GONDOR] possession to heal that companion.

card.title: The Faithful Stone
card.game_text: Tale. Each time a non-[WRAITH] minion is played, you may spot a Man to put a [GONDOR] token here. Maneuver: Remove 3 [GONDOR] tokens from here to spot a minion. That minion cannot be assigned to a skirmish until the regroup phase. Any Shadow player may remove [2] to prevent this.

card.title: For Gondor!
card.game_text: Exert a knight to make him or her strength +3.

card.title: Gondorian Servant
card.subtitle: Denethor's Handman
card.game_text: Aid - [1]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [1] to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you attach this to a companion, except a [GONDOR] Man, add [4].

card.title: Horn of Boromir
card.subtitle: The Great Horn
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Maneuver: Exert bearer and discard a follower from play to make bearer strength +4 until the regroup phase (if bearer is Boromir, he is also defender +1 and cannot be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled).

card.title: Isildur
card.subtitle: Sword-Bearer
card.game_text: Knight. Each time Isildur loses a skirmish, exert a companion. Each time Isildur wins a skirmish, heal a companion.

card.title: Ranger of the North
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Maneuver: If the fellowship is in region 1 or region 2, you may exert bearer to make him or her defender +1 until the regroup phase. Regroup: Discard this to heal a companion.

card.title: Ranger of the South
card.game_text: Ranger. While you can spot a [GONDOR] token, this companion is strength +2.

card.title: Shield of the White Tree
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. The minion archery total is -1. Regroup: Discard this possession from play to make each opponent shuffle his or her hand into his or her draw deck and draw 8 cards.

card.title: Soldier's Cache
card.game_text: Fortification. At the start of your maneuver phase, you may spot 3 rangers or exert a [GONDOR] Man to transfer this condition to a minion. Wound that minion. Regroup: Exert a ranger to reinforce a [GONDOR] token.

card.title: Watcher at Sarn Ford
card.subtitle: Ranger of the North
card.game_text: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert a [GONDOR] Man with a resistance 6 or more to make that Man strength +3.

card.title: Corsair Boarding Axe
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Skirmish: Remove [3] to reinforce a [MEN] token and make bearer fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Corsair Bow
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Bearer is an archer. Each time a companion is killed during the archery phase, you may control a site.

card.title: Corsair Grappling Hook
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. When you play this possession you may reinforce a [MEN] token twice. Each time a companion is killed during a skirmish phase, you may control a site.

card.title: Corsair Halberd
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Bearer is damage +1. Shadow: Remove a companion in the dead pile from the game to control a site.

card.title: Corsair Scimitar
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Bearer is strength +1 for each [MEN] token you can spot (limit +5).

card.title: Declined Business
card.game_text: If the Free Peoples player plays a companion, discard a [MEN] card from hand to return that companion to its owner's hand.

card.title: Fleet of Corsair Ships
card.game_text: When you play this possession, you may add a [MEN] token here. Regroup: Remove 4 [MEN] tokens from here to place a [MEN] card from your discard pile on the top of your draw deck.

card.title: Grima
card.subtitle: Witless Worm
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert Grima to add [2]. Regroup: Remove a [MEN] token to add [2]. Regroup: Remove [4] to exert an unbound companion.

card.title: Harry Goatleaf
card.game_text: While the fellowship is in region 1, this minion is strength +4. While the fellowship is in region 2, this minion is strength +2.

card.title: Henchman's Dagger
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Bearer may bear this hand weapon in addition to 1 other hand weapon.

card.title: Ill News Is An Ill Guest
card.game_text: Exert a [MEN] minion to discard a follower from play (if you can spot Grima, also draw a card).

card.title: Mumakil Commander
card.subtitle: Bold and Grim
card.game_text: While at a battleground, this minion is strength +2. Each mounted Man is strength +1. Regroup: Shuffle any number of your [MEN] mounts in play into your draw deck.

card.title: Ruffian
card.game_text: While the fellowship is in region 1, this minion is strength +4. While the fellowship is in region 2, this minion is strength +2.

card.title: Rough Man of the South
card.game_text: While the fellowship is in region 1, this minion is strength +4. While the fellowship is in region 2, this minion is strength +2.

card.title: Squint-eyed Southerner
card.game_text: While the fellowship is in region 1, this minion is strength +4. While the fellowship is in region 2, this minion is strength +2.

card.title: Ted Sandyman
card.subtitle: Chief's Men's Ally
card.game_text: Maneuver: Liberate a site you control to make each [MEN] minion strength +2 until the regroup phase. Regroup: Exert Ted Sandyman to stack a [MEN] Man in play on a possession.

card.title: Treachery
card.game_text: Spot Grima to exert an unbound companion. That companion cannot use his or her game text until the regroup phase.

card.title: Whisper in the Dark
card.game_text: Bearer must be a follower. At the start of the maneuver phase, if you can spot a [MEN] Man, the Free Peoples player must exert an unbound companion.

card.title: Destroyers and Usurpers
card.game_text: While you can spot an [ORC] minion and fewer minions than companions, each companion loses all defender bonuses and cannot gain defender bonuses. Maneuver: Spot 2 [ORC] minions to make the fellowship's current site gain battleground until the regroup phase.

card.title: Frenzy of Arrows
card.game_text: Spot an [ORC] archer minion to add 2 to the minion archery total. If you do, you may add an additional 2 to the minion archery total for each follower you can spot.

card.title: Gothmog
card.subtitle: Morgul Leader
card.game_text: Each the fellowship and minion archery totals are +3. Regroup: Remove [2] to play an [ORC] minion from your discard pile. That minion comes into play exhausted.

card.title: Gothmog's Warg
card.subtitle: Leader's Mount
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Orc with strength 9 or less (or bearer must be Gothmog). Bearer is fierce. While bearer is Gothmog, he is damage +1 in fierce skirmishes.

card.title: Grond
card.subtitle: Forged With Black Steel
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ORC] minion. Each time the fellowship moves in the regroup phase, you may discard this possession to search the Free Peoples player's draw deck and choose 2 Free Peoples cards found there. Remove those cards from the game.

card.title: Gruesome Meal
card.game_text: Make a companion skirmishing an [ORC] minion strength -2 (or -3 if he or she is an archer).

card.title: Orkish Ax
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Orc. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may add a threat.

card.title: Orkish Aggressor
card.game_text: While at a battleground, this minion is strength +2.

card.title: Orkish Archer Troop
card.notes: Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden. Image fixed
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ORC] card. The minion archery total is +1 for each hunter companion you can spot.

card.title: Orkish Breeder
card.game_text: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Shadow: Exert this minion to play an [URUK-HAI] hunter at twilight cost -2.

card.title: Orkish Defender
card.game_text: While the fellowship is at a battleground or underground site, this minion cannot take wounds in the archery phase.

card.title: Orkish Headsman
card.game_text: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) This minion is strength +3 for each companion in the dead pile (limit +6).

card.title: Orkish Skirmisher
card.game_text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may exert him twice to wound a companion.

card.title: Orkish Sneak
card.game_text: Assignment: Spot another [ORC] Orc to assign this minion to skirmish a non-[SHIRE] Ring-bearer. The Free Peoples player may add a burden or exert the Ring-bearer twice to discard this minion.

card.title: War Preparations
card.game_text: Remove a threat to reinforce an [ORC] token.

card.title: Wary Orc
card.game_text: This minion is strength +1 for each hunter companion you can spot.

card.title: Cast From the Hall
card.notes: Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden. Game text is an erratum.
card.game_text: Each time you play a [ROHAN] possession from hand, add a [ROHAN] token here. Skirmish: Remove 3 [ROHAN] tokens from here to make a [ROHAN] companion strength +1 and damage +1.

card.title: Eomer's Bow
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. If bearer is mounted, he or she is strength +1. Archery: If bearer is Eomer, exert him to choose a Shadow player who must exert one of his or her minions.

card.title: Erkenbrand's Horn
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. Fellowship: Exert bearer to play a follower from your draw deck. Reshuffle your draw deck. Skirmish: Discard a follower from play to make bearer strength +4 (if bearer is Erkenbrand, he is strength +5 instead).

card.title: Erkenbrand's Shield
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. The minion archery total is -1. Skirmish: If bearer is Erkenbrand, you may add [2] to cancel a fierce skirmish involving him. Response: If a [ROHAN] Man is about to take a wound, spot Gandalf and exert bearer to prevent that wound.

card.title: Fall back to Helm's Deep
card.game_text: If the fellowship is at a plains site, exert a [ROHAN] companion to return a minion to its owner's hand.

card.title: Gamling
card.subtitle: Dutiful Marshal
card.game_text: Valiant. Skirmish: Transfer a [ROHAN] possession that Gamling can bear to him.

card.title: Gamling's Horn
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man or Merry. Skirmish: Discard a follower from play to make bearer strength +4. If bearer is Gamling, you may also spot another companion to make him or her strength +4 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Precise Attack
card.lore: ;Discard a [ROHAN] possession from play to choose one: Wound an unwounded minion
card.game_text: exert a minion

card.title: Rohirrim Diadem
card.game_text: To play, spot Theoden. Skirmish: Spot a [ROHAN] Man bearing a possession and discard a [ROHAN] possession from hand to make that Man strength +2.

card.title: Rohirrim Recruit
card.game_text: Valiant. While you can spot a [ROHAN] token, this companion is strength +2.

card.title: Surrendered Weapons
card.game_text: Each time the fellowship moves, you may spot a [ROHAN] companion to discard a possession a character is bearing from play. Skirmish: Add [1] to transfer a [ROHAN] possession borne by a companion to another eligible bearer.

card.title: Theoden
card.subtitle: Ednew
card.game_text: While you can spot Gandalf, Theoden is resistance +2. While you can spot Eomer, Theoden is damage +1. While you can spot 3 mounted [ROHAN] companions, Theoden is strength +2.

card.title: A Dragon's Tale
card.game_text: Tale. To play, spot a Hobbit. Maneuver: Discard a tale from play to choose a Shadow player who must exert one of his or her minions.

card.title: Fredegar Bolger
card.subtitle: Fatty
card.game_text: While the fellowship is in region 1 and you can spot 2 other [SHIRE] companions, Fredegar Bolger is strength +3.

card.title: Golden Perch Ale
card.game_text: Each time a [SHIRE] companion wins a skimish, you may add a [SHIRE] token here. Fellowship: Remove a [SHIRE] token here to remove a burden.

card.title: Make a Run For It
card.game_text: Remove 2 [SHIRE] tokens to cancel a skirmish involving an unbound Hobbit.

card.title: Prized Lagan
card.game_text: At the start of each turn, you may add [2] to heal a [SHIRE] companion. Maneuver: Add a threat to spot a minion. That minion loses fierce and cannot gain fierce until the regroup phase.

card.title: Robin Smallburrow
card.subtitle: Shirriff Cock-Robin
card.game_text: Aid - [2]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [2] to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you attach this follower to a [SHIRE] companion, you may discard X cards from hand to draw X cards.

card.title: Scouring of the Shire
card.game_text: Tale. When there are 4 [SHIRE] tokens here, discard this condition from play. Response: If a [SHIRE] condition or [SHIRE] possession is about to be discarded from play by a Shadow card, add a [SHIRE] token here to prevent that.

card.title: Sting
card.subtitle: Elven Long Knife
card.game_text: Bearer must be Bilbo or Frodo. Regroup: Exert bearer to remove a threat.

card.title: Cleaved
card.game_text: Regroup: Exert an [URUK-HAI] hunter twice to transfer this condition from your support area to an unbound companion. Archery: Spot an [URUK-HAI] minion to transfer this condition from your support area to a Free Peoples archer.
