card.title: Final Triumph
card.notes: The effect of this card changes the requirements for resolving a skirmish. As a result, none of the cards that previously had an effect on strength during a skirmish have any effect on a skirmish in which this card is played. Only cards or effects that increase or decrease vitality directly would alter the resolution of a skirmish in which this card was played.
card.game_text: Spot your Uruk-hai skirmishing a companion to use vitality to resolve that skirmish instead of strength.

card.title: Fury of the Evil Army
card.lore: ;Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] minion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may choose one: discard a follower from play
card.game_text: heal an [URUK-HAI] minion

card.title: Ghastly Wound
card.game_text: Make an [URUK-HAI] minion strength +2 and damage +1.

card.title: Lurtz
card.subtitle: Halfling Hunter
card.game_text: Archer. Damage +1. Maneuver: Spot 6 companions to make Lurtz fierce until the regroup phase. Assignment: Exert Lurtz twice to assign it to an unbound companion. The Free Peoples player may exert that companion or add a burden to prevent this.

card.title: Lurtz's Bow
card.subtitle: Black-Fletch Bow
card.game_text: Bearer must be an Uruk-hai. When you play this possession on Lurtz, you may draw a card. Archery: If bearer is Lurtz, discard 2 [URUK-HAI] cards from hand to exert an unbound companion.

card.title: New Forges Built
card.game_text: Exert an [URUK-HAI] minion to reinforce an [URUK-HAI] token.

card.title: Pikes Upon Pikes
card.game_text: Each [URUK-HAI] minion bearing a hand weapon cannot take wounds during the archery phase. Skirmish: Discard this condition from play to make an [URUK-HAI] minion bearing a possession strength +2.

card.title: Shagrat
card.subtitle: Tower Captain
card.game_text: Damage +1. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) While you can spot 7 possessions, Shagrat is fierce and cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases).

card.title: Tracking the Prize
card.game_text: While you can spot 3 [URUK-HAI] hunters, at the start of each skirmish involving an [URUK-HAI] hunter, each companion skirmishing that minion must exert.

card.title: White Hand Attacker
card.game_text: Damage +1. While at a battleground, this minion is strength +2.

card.title: White Hand Exorciser
card.game_text: Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may heal an [URUK-HAI] minion.

card.title: White Hand Marchers
card.game_text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each other [URUK-HAI] minion you can spot.

card.title: White Hand Marshal
card.game_text: Damage +1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may control a site.

card.title: White Hand Mystic
card.game_text: Damage +1. Response: If an [URUK-HAI] minion is about to take a wound, exert this minion to prevent that wound.

card.title: White Hand Sieger
card.game_text: Damage +1. To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion and you must control a site.

card.title: White Hand Traveler
card.game_text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Spot 2 other [URUK-HAI] minions and remove [2] to make this minion strength +1 and damage +1.

card.title: White Hand Uruk
card.game_text: Damage +1. To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion.

card.title: All Life Flees
card.lore: ;To play, spot a Nazgul. Remove (X) to choose one: discard a follower from play that has a twilight cost of X
card.game_text: or play from deck a [WRAITH] minion that has a twilight cost of X.

card.title: Pull of the Ring
card.lore: ;Remove a burden to choose one: assign a [WRAITH] minion to a companion who has resistance 0
card.game_text: or have a [WRAITH] minion lose fierce and gain hunter 2 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Doorway to Doom
card.game_text: Mountain. When the fellowship moves to this site, each player wounds two of his characters.

card.title: Foot of Mount Doom
card.game_text: Mountain. Each card that is about to be placed into the discard pile is removed from the game instead.

card.title: Mithlond
card.game_text: River. When the fellowship moves to this site, each player heals each of his or her characters.

card.title: Morannon Plains
card.game_text: Battleground. Plains. When the fellowship moves to this site, each player may reinforce a culture token.

card.title: Sirannon Ruins
card.game_text: River.

card.title: Steward's Tomb
card.game_text: Wounds cannot be prevented or healed. Burdens cannot be removed.

card.title: Streets of Bree
card.game_text: Dwelling. While the fellowship is at this site, followers cannot be transfered to a character.

card.title: Arwen's Bow
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ELVEN] companion. Archery: If bearer is Arwen, discard 2 [ELVEN] cards from hand to wound a minion.

card.title: Arwen's Dagger
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ELVEN] companion. Bearer may bear this hand weapon in addition to 1 other hand weapon. Maneuver: If bearer is Arwen, exert her to draw 2 cards.

card.title: Galadriel's Silver Ewer
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: To play, spot Galadriel or Celeborn. While Galadriel is the Ring-bearer, she is strength +2 and resistance +2. Each time you play an [ELVEN] skirmish event, you may reinforce an [ELVEN] token.

card.title: Beorning Axe
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GANDALF] Man. While Grimbeorn is bearing this possession, each time he wins a skirmish, you may take a [GANDALF] card from your discard pile into hand.

card.title: Radagast's Herb Bag
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GANDALF] Wizard. Each time you play a [GANDALF] spell, you may exert bearer to wound a minion.

card.title: Shelob
card.subtitle: Menace
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.lore: ;Fierce. Each time Shelob wins a skirmish, you may add threats up to the number of burdens you can spot. Each time Shelob wins a skirmish, you may play Gollum from your discard pile
card.game_text: he is strength +3 and fierce until the end of turn.

card.title: Crown of Gondor
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: To play, spot Aragorn, Elendil, or Isildur. Skirmish: Spot a [GONDOR] Man with 3 or more vitality and discard a [GONDOR] card from hand to make that Man strength +2.

card.title: Denethor's Sword
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. While bearer is Denethor, his game text does not apply.

card.title: Watcher at Sarn Ford
card.subtitle: Ranger of the North
card.notes: Legends Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert a [GONDOR] Man with a resistance 6 or more to make that Man strength +3.

card.title: Gothmog
card.subtitle: Morgul Leader
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi. Game text is an erratum.
card.game_text: Each the fellowship and minion archery totals are +3. Regroup: Remove [2] to play an [ORC] minion from your discard pile. That minion comes into play exhausted.

card.title: Erkenbrand's Horn
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. Fellowship: Exert bearer to play a follower from your draw deck. Reshuffle your draw deck. Skirmish: Discard a follower from play to make bearer strength +4 (if bearer is Erkenbrand, he is strength +5 instead).

card.title: Erkenbrand's Shield
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi. Game text is an erratum.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. The minion archery total is -1. Skirmish: If bearer is Erkenbrand, you may add [2] to cancel a fierce skirmish involving him. Response: If a [ROHAN] Man is about to take a wound, spot Gandalf and exert bearer to prevent that wound.

card.title: Rohirrim Diadem
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: To play, spot Theoden. Skirmish: Spot a [ROHAN] Man bearing a possession and discard a [ROHAN] possession from hand to make that Man strength +2.

card.title: Theoden
card.subtitle: Ednew
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: While you can spot Gandalf, Theoden is resistance +2. While you can spot Eomer, Theoden is damage +1. While you can spot 3 mounted [ROHAN] companions, Theoden is strength +2.

card.title: Fredegar Bolger
card.subtitle: Fatty
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: While the fellowship is in region 1 and you can spot 2 other [SHIRE] companions, Fredegar Bolger is strength +3.

card.title: Sting
card.subtitle: Elven Long Knife
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Bearer must be Bilbo or Frodo. Regroup: Exert bearer to remove a threat.

card.title: Shagrat
card.subtitle: Tower Captain
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
card.game_text: Damage +1. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) While you can spot 7 possessions, Shagrat is fierce and cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases).

card.title: Pull of the Ring
card.notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi. Game text is a clarification.
card.lore: ;Remove a burden to choose one: assign a [WRAITH] minion to a companion who has resistance 0
card.game_text: or have a [WRAITH] minion lose fierce and gain hunter 2 until the regroup phase.

card.title: Beorning Axe
card.notes: Legends Masterworks Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GANDALF] Man. While Grimbeorn is bearing this possession, each time he wins a skirmish, you may take a [GANDALF] card from your discard pile into hand.

card.title: Radagast's Herb Bag
card.notes: Legends Masterworks Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GANDALF] Wizard. Each time you play a [GANDALF] spell, you may exert bearer to wound a minion.

card.title: Crown of Gondor
card.notes: Legends Masterworks Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden.
card.game_text: To play, spot Aragorn, Elendil, or Isildur. Skirmish: Spot a [GONDOR] Man with 3 or more vitality and discard a [GONDOR] card from hand to make that Man strength +2.

card.title: Denethor's Sword
card.notes: Legends Masterworks Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. While bearer is Denethor, his game text does not apply.

card.title: Watcher at Sarn Ford
card.subtitle: Ranger of the North
card.notes: Legends Masterworks Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden.
card.game_text: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert a [GONDOR] Man with a resistance 6 or more to make that Man strength +3.

card.title: Erkenbrand's Horn
card.notes: Legends Masterworks Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. Fellowship: Exert bearer to play a follower from your draw deck. Reshuffle your draw deck. Skirmish: Discard a follower from play to make bearer strength +4 (if bearer is Erkenbrand, he is strength +5 instead).

card.title: Erkenbrand's Shield
card.notes: Legends Masterworks Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden. Game text is an erratum.
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. The minion archery total is -1. Skirmish: If bearer is Erkenbrand, you may add [2] to cancel a fierce skirmish involving him. Response: If a [ROHAN] Man is about to take a wound, spot Gandalf and exert bearer to prevent that wound.

card.title: Rohirrim Diadem
card.notes: Legends Masterworks Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden.
card.game_text: To play, spot Theoden. Skirmish: Spot a [ROHAN] Man bearing a possession and discard a [ROHAN] possession from hand to make that Man strength +2.

card.title: Pull of the Ring
card.lore: ;Remove a burden to choose one: assign a [WRAITH] minion to a companion who has resistance 0
card.game_text: or have a [WRAITH] minion lose fierce and gain hunter 2 until the regroup phase.

card.title: The One Ring
card.subtitle: The Great Ring
card.game_text: While wearing The One Ring, each time the bearer is about to take a wound, add a burden instead. Maneuver: Wear The One Ring until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Add a burden to make the Ring-bearer strength +3.

card.title: Gimli
card.subtitle: Opinionated Guide
card.game_text: Damage +1. Fellowship. Each time you play a [DWARVEN] possession, you may draw a card.

card.title: Still Twitching
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [DWARVEN] companion. Bearer gains Hunter 2. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may transfer this condition to another [DWARVEN] companion. At the end of each turn, if bearer did not win a skirmish this turn, discard this condition from play.

card.title: That's Two!
card.game_text: Spot Gimli and exert a fellowship companion to have each Shadow player discard one of his or her Shadow cards from play.

card.title: Army Long Trained
card.game_text: Bearer must be an [ELVEN] companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may transfer this condition to another [ELVEN] companion. At the start of the archery phase, you must exert bearer or return this condition to hand.

card.title: Arwen
card.subtitle: Royal Maiden
card.game_text: Ranger. While you can spot 2 [ELVEN] followers, each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -2. Maneuver: Add 3 threats to reconcile your hand.

card.title: Legolas
card.subtitle: Skeptical Guide
card.lore: ;Archer. Fellowship. Archery: Add two threats to wound a minion
card.game_text: Legolas does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.title: Gandalf
card.subtitle: Wise Guide
card.game_text: Fellowship. Response: If an event is played, exert Gandalf twice to cancel that event.

card.title: Stern Words
card.game_text: To play, spot a [GANDALF] Wizard. Bearer must be a companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may transfer this condition to another companion. At the end of each turn, return this condition to hand.

card.title: Gollum
card.subtitle: Threatening Guide
card.game_text: Gollum is strength +1 for each threat you can spot. Each time Gollum wins a skirmish, you may add a threat.

card.title: Smeagol
card.subtitle: Pitiable Guide
card.game_text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each time Smeagol wins a skirmish, you may shuffle up to 2 [GOLLUM] cards from your discard pile into your draw deck. Skirmish: Exert a Ring-bound companion to make Smeagol strength +2.

card.title: Aragorn
card.subtitle: Well-traveled Guide
card.game_text: Fellowship. Ranger. While the Ring-bearer is the only other companion you can spot, Aragorn is an archer, defender +1, and can take no more than 1 wound each skirmish.

card.title: Boromir
card.subtitle: Destined Guide
card.game_text: Fellowship. Ranger. While you can spot two unbound Hobbits, Boromir's twilight cost is -1. Each time Boromir wins a skirmish, you may exert an unbound Hobbit to discard each minion he is skirmishing from play.

card.title: Not Bound To His Fate
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may transfer this condition to another [GONDOR] Man. At the end of each turn, if bearer is not Aragorn, return this condition to hand.

card.title: Strength In My Blood
card.game_text: Bearer must be a fellowship companion. While bearer is a [GONDOR] companion, he or she is damage +1.

card.title: Grima
card.subtitle: Servant of Another Master
card.game_text: When you play Grima, you may remove [4] to exert an unbound companion. That companion cannot use special abilities until the regroup phase. Assignment: Exert Grima to assign him to an unbound companion. That companion may exert to prevent this.

card.title: Urgency
card.game_text: Weather. Each time the fellowship moves, add [2] for each Ent you can spot. Skirmish: Discard this condition from play to make a non-[WRAITH] minion strength +1.

card.title: The Balrog
card.subtitle: Demon of Might
card.game_text: Damage +2. Fierce. While at an underground site, skip the archery phase, the maneuver phase, and The Balrog cannot be assigned to skirmish companions of strength 6 or less.

card.title: Reaching Tentacle
card.game_text: Tentacle. This minion cannot bear possessions. Discard this minion from play if not at a marsh. This minion is strength +1 for each tentacle you spot.

card.title: Strong Tentacle
card.game_text: Tentacle. This minion cannot bear possessions. Discard this minion from play if not at a marsh. This minion is strength +1 for each tentacle you spot.

card.title: Watcher in the Water
card.subtitle: Many-Tentacled Creature
card.game_text: Discard all other minions (except tentacles). Watcher in the Water cannot bear possessions. The fellowship's current site gains marsh. Shadow: Play a tentacle from your discard pile.

card.title: Pit Troll
card.game_text: Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) To play, spot an [ORC] Orc. When you play this minion, add 2 threats. The Free Peoples player may exert the Ring-bearer to prevent this.

card.title: Troll of the Deep
card.subtitle: Cave Troll
card.game_text: To play, spot an [ORC] Orc. Skirmish: Remove a threat to make an [ORC] minion strength +2.

card.title: Brought Down From Inside
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. At the start of each skirmish you may transfer this condition to a [ROHAN] Man. At the end of each turn, if bearer did not win a skirmish this turn, return this condition to hand.

card.title: Eomer
card.subtitle: Eored Captain
card.game_text: Valiant. Eomer is strength +2 for each wound on each minion he is skirmishing.

card.title: Eowyn
card.subtitle: Lady of the Mark
card.lore: ;Valiant. Fellowship: Play a [ROHAN] companion with a twilight cost of 3 or more
card.game_text: his or her twilight cost is -1.

card.title: Sauron's Might
card.game_text: Remove a Free Peoples culture token to add a threat. When you play this event, you may remove [1] to place this on the bottom of your draw deck instead of in your discard pile.

card.title: Frodo
card.subtitle: Little Master
card.game_text: Fellowship. Ring-bearer. Ring-bound. While you cannot spot 4 threats, Shadow cards cannot discard cards from your hand or from the top of your draw deck.

card.title: Merry
card.subtitle: Resolute Friend
card.game_text: Fellowship. Skirmish: If Merry is not assigned to a skirmish, take 2 [SHIRE] cards from your discard pile and remove them from the game to make a companion strength +2.

card.title: Pippin
card.subtitle: Steadfast Friend
card.game_text: Fellowship. Pippin is strength +1 for each tale you can spot.

card.title: Rabbit Stew
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [SHIRE] companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may transfer this condition to a fellowship companion. Each time this condition is transferred to a companion, heal that companion.

card.title: Sam
card.subtitle: Loyal Friend
card.game_text: Fellowship. Ring-bound. While Sam bears The One Ring, he is resistance -4. While you can spot 3 [SHIRE] companions, Sam is strength +2. Response: If Frodo dies, make Sam the Ring-bearer.

card.title: Lurtz
card.subtitle: Resilient Captain
card.game_text: Archer. Damage +1. Response: If Lurtz is about to take a wound or be exerted, remove [2] (or exert another Uruk-hai) to prevent that wound or exertion.

card.title: In Twilight
card.game_text: Bearer must be a [WRAITH] minion. When you play this, you may draw a card. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may transfer this condition to another [WRAITH] minion.

card.title: Ulaire Attea
card.subtitle: Dark Predator
card.game_text: Fierce. While you can spot 5 twilight tokens in the twilight pool and another [WRAITH] card, Ulaire Attea is strength +3.

card.title: Ulaire Enquea
card.subtitle: Dark Threat
card.game_text: Fierce. Maneuver: Spot 6 companions and discard a Nazgul from hand to wound an unbound companion.

card.title: Ulaire Lemenya
card.subtitle: Dark Enemy
card.game_text: Fierce. Ulaire Lemenya is strength +1 for each [WRAITH] possession in your discard pile.

card.title: Ulaire Nertea
card.subtitle: Dark Horseman
card.game_text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Nertea, name a race. The Free Peoples player cannot assign Ulaire Nertea to skirmish a companion of the named race.

card.title: Ulaire Toldea
card.subtitle: Dark Shadow
card.game_text: Fierce. Ulaire Toldea cannot be assigned to skirmish the same companion in a fierce skirmish that he has already been assigned to this turn.

card.title: The Witch-king
card.subtitle: Dark Lord
card.game_text: Fierce. Skirmish: Discard a Nazgul from hand to make The Witch-king strength +1 (or strength +2 if you can spot that discarded Nazgul).
